links_reviews_title: Classy & edgy for a black tie dinner
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a "black tie preferred" (whatever that means) event. I was hesitant to wear black because I usually opt for flashier ensembles, but I didn't know anyone there, so I played it safe...but not too safe! This dress has a little something extra with the asymmetrical hem and cut out in the back (which I think is a koi fish?). I tried on my usual size 8, but, like other reviewers have mentioned, the 6 fit better, thanks to the free hip measurement. Where previous reviewers led me astray, though, was in the undergarment department: I definitely needed a bra for this look. The fabric is thick and certainly not see-through, but there just wasn't enough boob squishage to make me feel comfortable going without one. I ended up wearing one of those stick-on bras with the clear sides and it worked perfectly. And speaking of undergarments, I was worried that the top of my high-waisted chonies would peek out the bottom of the back cutout, but they were fine. I felt comfortable and fabulous all night!
The dress was comfortable and fit like a glove. The back of the dress stole the show.

links_reviews_title: The dress was an absolute dream. Comfortable fit. True to size.
links_reviews_text: The dress flows and makes you feel like you floating. The material is a little heavier than I expected, but I liked it because it kept the integrity and shape of the dress. I wore it to a wedding and it made dancing so much more fun. The back of the dress is the beautiful detail. I have to take a picture of it. It's very comfortable to wear. I would definitely wear this again.

This was actually my back-up dress. I ended up wearing because my original choice was too long, but this one ended up being perfect! I wore to a school fundraiser, so I needed something more on the conservative side. The asymmetric hemline and the back kept it fun though. The fabric was heavier than I was expecting, which was a plus. I wore pasties underneath, but it was thick enough you could probably get away with nothing if you wanted. The design on the back is also intricate enough to hide a black bra if you want the extra support. So sad to send it back!

The dress was amazing. Fit was perfect and the back looked awesome. It hugged in all the right places without being tight or restricting. I want to own this thing, thatâ€™s how beautiful it is. Got to a of compliments. Be careful if you are someone who ends up taking off your heels, the length is easy to get tripped up on once those come off.

links_reviews_title: Worn for a swanky rehearsal dinner. I received compliments on the dress all night long!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress! The details are stunning. The dress is very comfortable and incredibly flattering.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Fits well, comfortable, and very pretty! I got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: So so so comfortable! I wore a 10... my normal size is a 12. It was comfortable and not too tight. The dress material is nice and not too thin, so I was able to get away with wearing pasties and no bra (score!). I got tons of compliments on this dress! I felt very chic and fancy :) Perfect for my work Holiday Party!

links_reviews_title: Rented for my daughter senior inauguration. Fit was great, looked great. She 5'4, 134lbs.
links_reviews_text: Fabric comfortable, and soft. No cons. Really nice dress.

This dress fit perfect! I am petite 5'2", approx. 115 lbs and 32A. Many compliments, especially on the back detail of the dress. Another great experience with RNR. If there was an option to buy I would.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the Marine Corp Ball!
links_reviews_text: Dress hugs all the right places, the cutouts are super cool, got compliments on it. The hem makes spinning and dancing really fun since it's so flowy. Highly recommend!
Fits beautifully, true to size. Material is quality but a little heavy.
Pictures do not do this dress justice! I wore this to a black tie wedding and received so many compliments. It was easy to dance in and fit perfect.

I felt lovely in this dress, to the point I was sad to send it back. It was great to dance in it. The dress runs large. Typically, I run between a 4 and a 6, but as they were out of the 6, I ordered the 4 and 2P. Surprisingly, the 2 fit best without shapewear (I can't breathe in those things so don't tend to wear them). The petite length was better with my height. The dress seemed to have a bit of wear but not enough to prevent me from wearing it.

I'm 5 months postpartum and needed something classy for a black tie wedding since most of my formal dresses don't fit at the moment. This dress was perfect!! The cut and material was very flattering. The high low skirt added just the right amount of drama. The back was fun and I was still able to wear a regular bra. The 4 was a tiny bit tight under the arms but I made it work. The 6 would've been more comfortable but wasn't available since I ordered so last minute.

This was my backup dress for a black tie optional fundraiser. I loved the look and style of the dress but I didn't wear it because I thought the torso didn't fit right. It pooched out a little just below my waist and made me look slightly pregnant. Either that or it was not quite the right length in the torso--but I'm not sure if it was too long or too short! My husband preferred this dress on me but I just thought it was too big--and this was a 0P! Could have used a 00.

I liked this dress- not my favorite rental but I did like it. I love how it's different lengths and how the fabric cascades down- has a dramatic romantic feel to it. The back was also really cool. It is flattering also. But because I am on the shorter side, the fabric on the long side was very long and I had to hold it a lot, especially on the dance floor. Overall I was happy and it was beautiful and unique!

So sorry I can't remember which size I wore but I do remember both the 4 and 6 worked. It's very forgiving dress. I think I wore the 4. Picture speaks for its self! It's a classy, sophisticated, flattering dress, the back is stunning. Im average build 5'4" and hourglass.
The fit was perfect. Loved the train and asymmetrical hem on this dress! I can't wait for my next RTR purchase to arrive!!

links_reviews_title: Photos do NOT do it justice!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous! Classy with a little bit of sass. Was a bit worried when only the 0R was available, but it fit like a glove! Felt like it was made for me. Wore to a black tie optional wedding. It was perfect for dancing. If you're looking for a twist on your next little black dress, this is it!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly. The length was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. I did wear support garments. The length was good also. I'm 5'3" and 160 pounds. I normally wear a size 10.

links_reviews_title: I did not like the original dress I ordered but RTR was very helpful in sending me a replacement
links_reviews_text: Great dress and very comfortable. Would rent again! This dress is stretchy at the top so I recommend getting a smaller size. I wore the 0R.
First time using RTR and I loved this dress! I was able to wear a smaller size because I am smaller on my top. Tons if compliments.

links_reviews_title: We had a great time at our formal awards ceremony.
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect. It fit just right as soon as I put it on. It wasnâ€™t too loose or too tight. Because of my height, it did drag on the floor slightly. All in all, a very pretty, easy to wear dress.

links_reviews_title: Got this to wear to a governor's Inaugural Gala. Perfect mix of style and comfort!
links_reviews_text: Not the most flattering photo, but I'm usually the one behind the lens. I'm the photographer for one of the featured bands and a gubernatorial Inaugural Gala. I had to find something formal enough for the event and unencumberome enough to work. The asymmetrical design of this dress allowed me the freedom to shoot while still being elegant enough for the gala. Would absolutely recommend this dress for anyone looking for comfort and style!

This dress is amazing! The high low cut makes it fun and flirty and the back detail is so beautiful! The material is thick and high quality! It is fitted and with the detailing of the back I didnt want a bra to be visible or see the lines so I wore pasties. It was perfect!

links_reviews_title: This is by far my favorite dress I've ever worn. It was comfortable and so fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly. Caught everyone's attention at my work holiday party. I loved it so much! Wish I could have kept it. Highly recommend it for pretty much any occasion!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a formal fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: The 4R was a perfect fit. I am 5'0" and 125 lbs. I wore 4" heels and the dress just touched the ground. I felt like a princess all evening and received so many compliments. You can wear with/without a bra. I wore a black bra...no issue as it blended with the pattern on the back. Do yourself a favor...rent this one!!!!

I wore this dress to officiate my brother's wedding. I was looking for something formal but not flashy, simple but not drab - and this dress fit the bill perfectly. It's a bit tight up top and has a defined waist, but drapes beautifully at the hips - great for ladies with more of an hourglass/pear-shaped figure. What really sets this dress apart are the little details that make it fun: the asymmetrical hem and the lace on the back. The fabric is thick and stretchy so it hangs well and really does hide imperfections (I was three months postpartum and felt super comfortable in it.) I was a bit worried about the length since I'm on the shorter side (5' 4"), but with 3 inch heels the hem just barely grazed the floor. Honestly for the price of the rental I think this dress is a bargain. I wouldn't hesitate to rent it again!

Wonderful, beautiful dress. I am 5'9", and weigh 165, athletic build. I usually wear a 10. The 8 fit well. No problem at all. This is a great dress for many different occasions. Very comfortable and fun to dance it because it swings around.

I ordered a 0R and 0P but both dresses shipped were 0R, so I'm glad the length worked! I'm 5'4" and wore 4" block heels. In pics, it appeared to be a plain black dress but was much better in person and with good lighting to show back detail and asymmetrical hem length. Great dress for dancing and twirling!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! Simple in the front and intricate in the back.
links_reviews_text: I am really short (5 feet), so the longest part of the dress did touch the floor which stressed me out. I wore 2.5 in heels. Although the dress was long, I was never stepping on it and I barely even realized when I wasn't looking in a mirror. The rest of the dress fit perfectly and I loved it. I got so many compliments and it was very fun to dance it. Loved the black because I got to pair it with a fun, floral shoe. Definitely would recommend and have recommended to so many people already!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so fun to dance in!
links_reviews_text: Boyfriend and I did a fun dinner date and went to a restaurant with a live jazz band. This dress was so much fun to dance in! It is so comfortable, the material isn't heavy, and whenever he turned me, the skirt would flare around. I am usually a size 2, but I am pretty short (5ft) so I ordered a 2 petite and for back up I got a size 0 regular. The 2 was a little too big for me on the chest and stomach area (bra size 34A) but the length was just right. I went with the 0R because it hugged on top perfectly and I was going to be wearing heels so the height was not too much of a problem. I got so many compliments! From the hostess to the ladies I bumped into in the restroom. To be honest I was a *little* overdressed for my occasion. I was at a restaurant where a lot of people were in jeans and a nice shirt, but even knowing that now, i still would've chosen the same dress. It's an elegant dress but the flirty cut on the bottom makes it perfect for a lot of occasions!

This would not have been my first choice, but I decided too late to rent for this "black tie optional" wedding, and I kept coming back to this one because of the little details that made it different from your normal LBD - the asymmetrical hem, and, OMG, the back! It is true that it makes it difficult to wear a bra (I wore a Brazee that I got from RTR a while ago), because not only is the black sheer, but it really does start toward the side. I normally wear more form fitting dresses (sheaths), so to have such a flowy dress was different for me, and I liked it. I felt completely comfortable all night long. The dress is LONG, though. At 5'7 in 3.5-inch heels, the 4R was manageable. When I switched to my flats for walking back to the car at the end of the night, the dress would have dragged had I not carried it like a train. The 4R was the only size available, but I think I could have easily fit into a 2, and the tightness in the chest might have made me able to go bra-free.

links_reviews_title: Amazing!! Can't wait to use RTR again!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5 130lbs with 32c and wore a size 0. I loved this dress! This was my first time using RTR and I received so many compliments. This dress fit me perfectly and no bra needed. I did use petals though. Good spin factor on this dress :)
Very flattering, comfortable dress for any body type. I'm curvy and it definitely worked for me.
I love this dress and would totally rent again. It's super flattering because it is heavy and has great flow! Wore a regular bra and it worked fine!

My sister had her bridesmaids wear any black dress for her wedding. I saw this dress and thought it was perfect for her winter themed wedding. I loved the side high-low to show off my snow boots and I loved the lacy back for the elegant details. The cut is perfect to feel comfortable and you don't have that "I need to suck it in" feeling. Length is perfect even with flat shoes. Definitely an edgy dress but still elegant.

links_reviews_title: Comfort in the front, party in the back!
links_reviews_text: I was nervous about renting this dress as it is not my usual style but I. Loved. It. It was extremely comfortable and with 4in heels the train in the back was the perfect length. You can see a bra through the back, but personally I wore a regular black bra and I felt it didn't diminish the beauty of the dress. There is no built-in support so if you're larger in the chest area, you'll need something! I will be looking out for this dress in the final sale section ;)

links_reviews_title: I felt absolutely amazing in this dress!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so flattering and comfortable!
Wore this for a photo shoot, the back is amazing and the hi low hem gave it even more drama. It was very comfortable and would really work for any occasion you need something a bit dressy.

links_reviews_title: love the gold color and design
links_reviews_text: I feel the real color of the dress somehow is darker than the picture on site. it fits well, hugs your body. I really love the color and pattern. fun dress to wear to go out, but I don't think it's meant to wear to dance, so the rim of the dress feels limiting and the shoulder part, too.
Fit well. Hide the post baby bod.. tight in the arms and shoulders.. I'd be careful renting if athletically built

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress fit like a glove and felt sooo good in it!
links_reviews_text: Omg this dress!!!!!!! I've rented a lot from RTR but this is by far my favorite pick! I wore this to my company holiday party, it was classy yet sexy and so comfortable. So many amazing compliments on it all night and I felt like a movie star!!!

So many compliments on this dress. Wore it for a clients Christmas party. Stretchy in the mid section. Arms and shoulders was a little tight but nothing crazy. Color of dress is beautiful and perfect for party, wedding ect..

links_reviews_title: Shine bright like a gold bar in this dress
links_reviews_text: Within five minutes of arriving to the wedding I was attending someone came up to tell me I looked like a million dollars. This dress was fabulous!! The sleeves were a little tight at the armor as others had posted but I went up a size in preparation. The length was great to feel covered. I paired the dress with a pair of basic black pumps. I loved that I want exposed all night but looked fun and trendy and sexy. My husband loved this dress and wants me to rent it again.

I wore this dress for a formal party! fits well for pear-shaped bodies, love the color and material was forgiving. Only complain I have about it is the sleeves were TOO tight and the slip kept showing off at the bottom (which I hated) But overall it was a good rental

links_reviews_title: I was a very nice dress for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: On the picture I was 238 lbs. I normally wear a size 18. I ordered a size 18w and it was a good fit. true to size. It was a little tight in the arm area but I think that was because of the cut and style of he top of the dress.
Yes it does properly fit the body nicely, but I never felt uncomfortable. I received plenty of compliments on my NYE dinner cruise.
Arms were extremely tight. I'm a pretty tiny girl and the rest of the dress fit me well but the arms were so tight they left marks on me. Cute but uncomfortable

This was my free second dress, and I chose to wear it instead of the original. I typically wear a 6/8, and this is probably pretty true to size. It was slightly bigger than I would have liked, and the ruching bunched up a little because of that (which made me feel lumpy at times). However, we had dinner in Hell's Kitchen, walked to the theatre for a show, and then walked around for dessert and Christmas light viewing, and it was remarkably comfortable. I'd rent it again.

The color is festive, great for holiday party and the ruching is well placed. But depending on how you feel about your belly, you could fee like the dress hid your belly, or the dress gave you a belly. I usually wear a 4 but it was tight around my armpits so I wore the 6 - which was only slightly larger overall. Highly recommend.

I wore this dress to a fall afternoon wedding and received a ton of compliments. I'd say the dress runs pretty true to size. It was a little tight at the top of the arms but this is due to the neckline. My only complaint is that I couldn't get the bottom over my hips to use the bathroom so I basically had to take the dress off in order to go. So make sure you always have a buddy when wearing this dress :)

links_reviews_title: I really loved this dress, perfect for a fall wedding! Stylish and easy to dance in:)
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well. Size 6 was a little tight and the 8 was slightly loose but fit better. The bottom of the dress wasn't very giving so walking upstairs was not so easy.

links_reviews_title: This color was amazing. Fit like a glove and I got lots of compliments. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I would normally wear a size 2 in loose fitting dresses, since this is a very slim cut I went a size up and it got perfectly. The sleeves were a good length and it came below my knees (5'1") which I liked cause I didnt feel the need to pull it down as I walked. Lovee love loved it! Color was amazing too!

I ordered a size bigger due to reviews saying it was a tight fit and they didn't have it in my true size so i couldn't order two. Luckily i did because the fit was perfect. Not too tight but snug in all the right places. The length was perfect just above the knee. The off the shoulder was perfect to have a strapless bra and a nice statement necklace. I can't say enough good things about this dress it was beautiful

links_reviews_title: Eye-catching and dazzling, but not over the top
links_reviews_text: Compared to other dresses rented on RTR, this fit snug but not too snug. It did limit the length of my stride, so I could not walk very fast in it. Unique neckline is lovely, the fabric really pops but is not over the top. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress is very form fitting but I felt like a million bucks. Many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6, 210lbs. I am between a size 16 and 18 but this 18 was a bit snug, possibly because it is meant to be form fitting. I was very self conscious because I've never worn anything form fitting, but as the night went on and I received numerous genuine compliments, I began to feel like a million bucks. It is very glamorous.

links_reviews_title: worn this dress twice. it is dressy, with glitz and glamour!
links_reviews_text: fits a bit snug thru the bodice/sleeves but going up one size worked.

Was very tight as reviews stated. My problem area is stomach so was tight there, was not tight in arms. Event was just cocktails and dinner. Would not have wanted to dance in this dress. So different than anything I've worn so nice to be unique. If event was more formal would have worn hair up which would be nice with off shoulder dress. And wore gold shoes which were probably too bright for dress but festive for Christmas.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit great, order up a size and wear it like the picture shows.
links_reviews_text: I was a bit worried about this dress because of mixed reviews...however, I LOVED it. I had so many compliments and people asking where it was from. The arms are a little snug, but I think maybe some people are wearing it too far down on their shoulders and that's what it making it so uncomfortable...its supposed to sit right at the top of your shoulders. It was long enough for me, and the liner was comfortable. I ordered up a size and got the 12 with 14 as a backup. I am 5"11, 170lbs, 36D, hourglass shape.

I usually wear a size 2 but because the selves were so small (with no stretch) I had to go up a size. Also the bottom of the dress is tight around your legs. I had to take shorter steps and it was very hard to go to the bathroom. You can NOT get this dress on by yourself because of the sleeves. Other then that the dress was pretty. I got a couple compliments.

Fit very true to size. Thought touching would make this style a little more forgiving in the tummy area but actually seemed to highlight it. Thought the gold sparkle would be fun but instead I kind of felt like I was wearing couch material. This is the first thing I've had from RTR that I haven't been totally in love with. Overall still a very nice piece, and I will always come back to RTR for my needs, but this was not for me
The dress looked very nice on. I felt beautiful. Definitely get 1 to 2 sizes up. The arms are tight and it was annoying in the armpit area.

Although the very bright gold of this dress made it a little too formal for my event (called a "ball" but not really...), it was pretty true to size (ran just a little large) and quite comfortable. I wore a strapless bra because it's nearly off the shoulder. Got quite a few compliments but not my favorite rental.

The dress is true to size, but very fitted. If you have a more athletic build, know that your arms are pretty much locked into position! But, very flattering in pictures...received a lot of compliments as well.

links_reviews_title: Great dress and great service from Rent the Runway!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. It was very comfortable and also very elegant.

This was my first RTR and definitely not my last! I was extremely nervous, as it is extremely difficult to find dresses that fit me. I am a tall woman (6'1) and the length was absolutely perfect! I loved the shimmer and it was extremely comfortable. Thanks for making me feel beautiful RTR!

Got so many compliments; it was the ideal cut, style, color, shape for hosting a cocktail Christmas party. There's not a lot of stretch, so def glad I ordered a larger back up size. The only drawback were the weird hanger loops that due to their placement and the unusual neckline, really liked to poke out, so I spent a lot of time fussing with them. But it's such a gorgeous dress; fits like a glove, but still flattering. Great for a winter party. Bottom of the dress is fairly tight, so don't do too much dancing. Ideal for floating around a party though.

When my husband saw me in this dress, the first words out of his mouth were "Can we buy that one?" Absolutely GORGEOUS on. I wore it to a NYE event and I got compliments all night. I'm usually a 2, but ordered the 4 because the 2 wasn't available. The 4 was perfect. I didn't have any trouble with the hanger straps like other reviewers. This dress is gathered in all the right places. Eat, drink, and be merry - you'll still look like a million bucks! #lace #sleeves

links_reviews_title: Dress with a classic look, but the gold sparkle keeps it interesting and gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: This dress was rented for a holiday toy drive I attended, it does run small, so I had to go with the larger size I ordered. Very classy and the sparkles weren't overwhelming, rather an elegant touch that completed the whole outfit. Definitely recommend for the holidays, absolutely stunning and I received compliments all night!
It was a bit hard to get into but once I was in it , it was so comfortable! So many compliments on it and it's perfect for a winter event.
Many many complaints throughout the night. This dress was absolutely perfect for the event! I wore the 14 normally I wear a 12

This dress does run a bit small as others had commented, so I only ordered the 2 and it was perfect. I love the color and fit, and was also super comfortable! Highly recommend for any fall weddings or formal affairs in cooler weather.

links_reviews_title: Surprised how much I liked it!!
links_reviews_text: When I ordered this dress it was a last minute rental and I ended up loving it! It is the perfect amount of class while still looking cute. I'm 5'5 and it hit at my knee. I wore the size 8 with a strapless bra. No complaints!

I decided to try Rent the Runway for a wedding because I needed a great dress with long sleeves. The ceremony was outside on a mountain in PA in the early evening. Found a great dress on here and ordered my true size (6) and the next size up after reading the comments. Luckily I did, because I ended up wearing the 8. It definitely runs small. It arrived as stated in 2 days, in a beautiful garment bag. The dress's lining was silky smooth and very comfortable. As written in other comments the back zipper was VERY hard to zip! ? It was longer than I like, but did get lots of compliments on it! Again it was very comfortable to wear all evening. I will definitely use RTR again!

The fit is tight but you wouldn't want it any bigger otherwise you'd look like a golden bag. I have bigger arms so it was a super tight fit in the arm shoulder are and the dress cut into me there. Problem solved with a black pashmina. Also the lining in the front does hang down noticeably. And there were several quarter sized holes in lace. No one noticed. I would definitely rent again & will recommend in the future.

So this experience started out a bit rocky as one of the dresses I received was ripped under the arm. But I ended up wearing it anyway and it photographed very well at our annual holiday party. A note for my fellow short ladies, this will hit you below the knees, so it looks best with heels. The other reviews are 100% accurate, the sleeves are EXTREMELY tight, so you should definitely size up just for the arms alone.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Pros: Super easy process! Great fit! Cons: Runs small so be sure to get a size up or two

links_reviews_title: This dress is sparkly and makes you feel all dressed up!
links_reviews_text: This dress was flattering. My one complaint was that it was a little baggy in the midsection. The fabric doesn't have much give to it so I felt like I looked a little thicker around the middle than I would have liked.

links_reviews_title: Eye catching and flattering dress - perfect for a fancy night out!
links_reviews_text: Overall, this was a great rental. I received many compliments on the fit, style and sparkle of this dress. As other reviewers have reported, the color has quite a greenish/brown/black undertone, and there is a distinct floral pattern to the gold overlay. Cut is very flattering, but there is little stretch to this dress and it has very slim arms...although there are zippers along the forearms, it doesn't give much wiggle room. Slim cut skirt as well, with little stride room when walking/upstairs. There are four (!) attachment pieces of ribbon to assist in hanging the dress, which were very short, poorly placed and consistently popped out throughout the course of the night...really a shame for an otherwise flawless dress. I generally run between sizes but read reviews carefully and went with a 6. Glad I did. Don't have large arms but they never would have fit in a 4. Great sparkle and wears easily. I paired with gold and brown jewelry, black tights and heels to wear to the opera.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated dress--perfect for winter cocktail party
links_reviews_text: I would say that this runs a little small. The sleeves were shorter than I would have liked (halfway between 3/4 length and full length). Otherwise it fit beautifully. The lace is a nice quality (not thin) and feels like quality fabric. It came without a wrinkle in it. Height: 5'7" Weight: 130 lbs Bust: 34 or 36B

I rented this dress as a back up after reading the reviews of the first dress I rented. I loved both so much that I wore this one to the church and the other to the reception. The detail in the lace is gorgeous! The hips are a little wide for my build but it still looked good.

links_reviews_title: Rent this dress if you know what's good for you!
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect dress for a wedding in October. The color is bright and the overlay pattern is unique. Easy to wear with a strapless bra or a bra with nude straps. I got a ton of compliments on this dress. In fact, any time I have an event to go to with my boyfriend, he always asks if I can rent "that blue" dress from the October wedding. I felt great in this and you will too! Rent rent rent!!!!

I seriously got so many compliments in this dress! I ended up going with the size 4 slip and dress even though I also rented the size 2 because it was just a bit more comfortable to move around in! The lacy bit has no stretch so I would recommend getting a size larger to make sure your arms can fit and are comfortable to move around!

I love this dress. It is delicate and dainty. This was my first time to order from RTR and I mistakenly assumed I would automatically receive the size I selected as well as my backup size. I only got a size 4 and it was too small to zip up the outer lace shell. There is no give to the lace. I am going to try the 6 because I would like to wear this dress.

links_reviews_title: Comfort and style for a fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and it was easy to wear. I felt it did run a bit short on me (for my age, 59). I would recommend this dress.

This dress is amazing! From the bright color to the intricate lace, you will feel beautiful in this dress and it photographs perfectly. Highly recommend for a fall or winter wedding. Had to wear the smaller backup size because my actual size became unavailable, so the arms were a bit tight. My normal size would have been perfect!

links_reviews_title: I actually wore the size 4 slip and the 6 lace over dress. It was gorgeous! I danced all night!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great as I stated above I wore the size 4 slip and size 6 dress. It was sleek and comfortable and I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and beautiful lace on the dress. Great for a Winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, details and lace were beautiful.
This dress was incredibly flattering and very comfortable! I could move and dance in it all night! Would definitely rent again!!!!
The color was so vivid and beautiful. Felt true to size. Sleeves were a little snug. Lots of compliments, wish I could keep it

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! I was told many times that this was peoples favorite dress at the wedding.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and true to size. The arms are a bit tight because of the detail so you do not have full range of motion, however that was not a big issue!

I wore this for a rehearsal dinner and received many compliments! The blue is beautiful and the lace looks great. I ordered an 8 and the 6 as a back-up size - there was a problem with the 8 so I wore the 6. The fit was okay and everyone told me it looked great, but I thought it was a bit short and a little tighter than I'm usually comfortable with. I may buy this dress!!
This dress made me feel so elegant yet sexy. I also received a ton of compliments. It fit like a glove and I would rent this again!
This dress was perfect!! It was so comfortable to dance in. I recieved so many compliments. I would defenitly rent this again!

This dress was actually my replacement dress, but I could not have been more pleased! It's hard to tell in my pic, but the color is very vibrant. I love the detail of the lace especially around the neck. I received compliments all night! I ended up wearing the 2. The 4 seemed a little too roomy in the stomach area and I wanted a sleek fit. The 2 was still very comfortable. For reference I am 5'3 and 115lbs. I chose not to wear a bra with this and it looked just fine.

The dress can be worn with a regular t-shirt style bra. You definitely want a darker color, or better yet navy. If you are taller, this dress may be too short. At 5'3" I felt like I couldn't raise my arms to dance without the dress being too short.

Loved this dress. I ended up wearing the 6 since it was long sleeve the larger size was more comfortable and still looked good. I got lots of compliments on this dress. It was perfect for the chiller weather. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: elegant Sexy long sleeve blue lace dress.
links_reviews_text: Love the lace and blue color-!!!! Super stunning! Wore with black tights bc it was cold and it looked cuter Im 5â€™4. Curvy. This is such a great dress.

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing something other than black! I received so many compliments! Dainty and beautiful
links_reviews_text: This was for a Christmas Party. Just dressy enough but not over the top. A little short and its a little tight when raisingnyour arms. So no YMCA in this dress. Other than that, super flattering! I loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was very chic and I received lots of compliments. It was a great rehearsal dinner outfit.
links_reviews_text: The fit was definitely true to size or even a little small. I recommend ordering your normal size and sizing up for your backup size. The overlay was a little tight and slip is on the shorter side, and I debated wearing the larger size (6), but ended up wearing my normal size (4) and was happy I did. The downside was there was a big white tag on the lace overlap. I recommend bringing a safety pin so you can roll the tag up and pin it so it's less noticeable.

links_reviews_title: Received so many complements .... but was uncomfortable.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved how the dress looked, I received a lot of complements. The only problem is the dress under the lace was riding up all night. I would wear this again to an event where you are not planning on dancing. I can usually wear a 6 when the dress isn't right around the waist, although this was not right around the waist I would still go up a size.

I LOVED this dress for a fall wedding a few weeks ago. I got the 4 and 6 and could've went with either, but decided on the 6 (though I did wear the 4 slip) just to be a little more comfortable for all the drinks and food that I knew I was going to have at the wedding.

This dress was so cute and incredibly comfortable. The neck really stressed up the whole look and I got a ton of compliments. One thing about this dress is the lace and solid blue are 2 separate pieces which I wasn't expecting but overall happy with the dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detail - worn for cocktail wedding
links_reviews_text: This comes in two pieces which makes it super comfy to have the slip and then overlay separate. Love the color, perfect length, love the high neck and long sleeves but wasn't too heavy or hot. Felt beautiful in this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Unique, Fun Dress Wore as Wedding Guest
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! I got so many compliments. I liked the lace overlay print and the uniqueness of the high neck, which made it feel edgier. As other reviewers noted, it is two separate pieces. I rented a 6 and a 4. The size 6 under slip was actually considerably shorter than the size 4, so I wore the 4 slip under the 6 dress for a perfect fit, so definitely recommend getting the free back up size with this to give you that option. It is a little snug in the upper arms, and the fabric doesn't have much give, but it wasn't an issue and I had no problem dancing the night away. Highly recommend, great for a fall wedding but could see it as working well for a variety of occasions!

links_reviews_title: Great deal! Tons of compliments all night
links_reviews_text: Tight on the arms - otherwise perfect fit.

I was nervous since I tried to order an 8 but only a 6 was available, and when I first tried it on the sleeves were SO tight. After wearing it around my house for a couple hours before the event though they loosened up and I didn't notice the tightness all night. I also liked how the slip and lace overlay were separate pieces.

Dress was a gorgeous lace. Color is beautiful and vibrant. Not a whole lot of movement available in the arms but I didn't find it impossible though either. I think it's just the nature of lace fabric. Totally recommend

So I mixed up the sizes-- wore the 6 slip and 8 dress. The 6 fit perfect but was a bit short for the family-centered parties I was going to attend. The color was PERFECT, the lace was breathable and moveable. I ordered this thinking the weather would be cooler considering we're late in September, but it ended up being almost 90 degrees so sweating was probably the only issue I had. I had a baby shower and an engagement party to go to and this was probably the best middle ground dress I could have chosen.

links_reviews_title: Classy- surprisingly comfy ... just enough sexy :)
links_reviews_text: The slip is separate from the lace overlay. Beautiful piece. Maybe even my favorite rental to date.

I liked this dress but was not my favorite rental. The 6 fit in my arms but looked bigger elsewhere. I did manage to wear the 4 but was tight in the arms. Be careful when sitting as the slip underneath will ride up a bit! I was comfortable for an outdoor wedding during an unseasonably warm September wedding (humid and 80). The color is really pretty!

links_reviews_title: Don't wear this if you need to dance the YMCA LOL
links_reviews_text: LOVE this dress, but super tight around the arms/chest area. I probably should have sized up, but then it would have been baggy around my waist. There is no way I could have zipped this up by myself or done the YMCA as I could not lift my hands over my head LOL

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a July wedding at Arapahoe Ski Resort. Wedding at 4 pm, temperature in the high 60s.
links_reviews_text: I can't tell you how many compliments on I got on this dress. It is so unique and beautiful. I normally would wear a size 10 dress but wore the size 12 as the bust area was too tight on the 10. I am a 36 DD so if you are busty you may need to go up a size. This is perfect for a summer wedding and even into the Fall with the cooler weather, the long sleeves are perfect.

I really loved the way this dress looked on me which surprised me cause I usually don't love lace. This dress fit like a glove! It's more than just a lace dress it has intricate patterns that don't get lost in the fabric they truly stand out. Not tons of room in the bust. Can be worn with any undergarments.
This dress was classy, sexy, and surprisingly comfortable! Was out of my norm of black...and loved it!

This was my first RTR experience and I will definitely be back. I LOVED this dress and felt great in it all night. I wore my usual dress size 6 which worked well because the backup slip (size 8) was ripped upon arrival.
Perfect for an outdoor spring wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved the detail of the dress; it was sexy while still classy for a formal wedding. The fit was fairly true to size. I rented a 10 and 12, both fit, but the 12 had more room in the arms to move.

I've received more compliments on this dress than any other RTR item I've rented. I wore it to a gala and I couldn't have loved it more. I felt confident and comfortable throughout he night. This dress stands out in just the right way - several people stopped me to ask where i got it. I would highly recommend and look forward to renting again. I'm currently between sizes 4 and 6 and while I won't say this ran small, I did find the sleeves on the 4 to be too tight. It doesn't have a lot of stretch and the 6 was a perfect fit. If you're unsure, size up. You're going to love it!

Overall the dress is cute and did do the job. I am 5'7 typically wearing a medium (155lbs and 34b) but ended up wearing the large back up size. If you have a pear shape body type like I do, and smaller chest- the dress sorta falls a bit tighter on the hips and leaves a bit more fabric around the stomach than originally preferred. The zipper is cute extra touch in the back but just heads up it does tend to weigh on the back lifting the dress up a bit closer to your neck than I prefer...making the dress a bit shorter for us taller girls. Overall it's a cute dress that you can dress up or dress down depending on the event. I did have to wait to put it on right before I got to the event because the fabric does wrinkle very easily.
I rented this for a work charity dinner and loved wearing it! The color is beautiful!! It does run a tad small around the hips but overall it's pretty true to size.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color - great dress for a work event!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a client event at work. The fit was great - relaxed enough to feel comfortable throughout the day, and long enough to feel appropriate for work. The dress could be a little tight in the midsection for those that are pregnant, or with wider hips. The COLOR was by far the best part about this dress - everyone loved it. I was able to wear a regular bra, and the dip in the back was a great addition! I paired this with strappy nude heels and fun gold earrings. Definitely would rent again!
Wore this to my bfâ€™s graduation, itâ€™s classy and super comfortableâ€” exactly like the picture. Went with my regular size M for a more professional look (sizing down makes it tighter & shorter)
Ran a little large. Comfy shift very pretty color, looks great paired w gold accessories.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit great and the color was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I chose not to wear a necklace and went with gold hoop earrings paired with gold rings and bracelets! And the beige/tan heels were a perfect match with the color of the dress!
Wore this dress for a bridal shower, was perfect and exactly what I was looking for!
I really liked the color, and the dress is super comfy! I wore it to my work holiday party....not a super flattering fit as it's a bit boxy

links_reviews_title: A little short but gorgeous material, hangs well
links_reviews_text: Love this style and fabric! Nice muted color

links_reviews_title: Cute sleeves and low back add flavor to simple dress
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress and considered buying it. The color is cute and feminine, with flared sleeve that make it more than a shift dress. Perhaps one of my favorited things I've rented from RTR

I wore this to a work event, where I had to sit in a hotel conference room all day, listen to lecture, as well as give a short presentation. I felt comfortable, stylist and professional. I'm petite, so the dress was a perfect length on me while wearing 3 in. wedges. I received many compliments on the dress. The color is perfect for summer, and you really stand out in a sea of darker suits/dresses.

I was really surprised by how well this dress fit - definitely a good choice for petites, but would probably be quite short on someone taller. I was worried that the dress would make me look boxy, as this style often does, but it skimmed my curves nicely. I wore it to a pre-wedding cocktail party, so the color was appropriately festive! Definitely would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. Very classy, very cute. Comfortable too.
links_reviews_text: The typical shift dress with added flare in the arms and zipper down the back. Great color for spring or summer. Pairs well with nude heals and gold jewelry. I have a petite build - 5'3, 130 lbs. I typically wear a size 4 dress, 6 jeans and 34 B bust. The medium fit perfectly. The only reason I didn't give this a 5 star is because it came with a little snag near the lower hem. Not too noticeable but definitely worn - likely well loved.

I wore this to a spring wedding and the fit, color and length were all perfect! This dress is flattering and shows your shape without being tight or form fitting. The only issue I ran into was the shoulder/sleeves falling forward because of the high neck and low back, but I would still give this dress 5 stars!

This dress was great! It looked much better in person than in this picture. I loved the color and fit. While loose fitting, it was still figure flattering. Great length and I liked the full length zipper detail in the back. It runs small so size up.

I rented this for my birthday dinner date with my husband at a very upscale restaurant. It was just ok. It didn't really do anything for me and I felt it was kind of boxy and boring. It could be ok for work, but it does run on the shorter side. Definitely one of my least favorite rentals.

I liked wearing this -- it was comfortable and forgiving. The zipper worked well and never came undone, which was something I was worried about because, well, RTR's zippers have a reputation. I do wish I ordered an XS, because the top was roomier than expected. Word of caution: I had to wear a slip underneath (and keep my long hair down all day!) to cover up the low cut in the back, which made this dress office appropriate.
Wore to work with tights. Super comfy. Lots of conpliments. Would recommend!
Its cute, comfortable and I recieved many compliments on it.
This dress fits fantastic! It made me stomaxh disappearing and showed off my legs. Perfect day to night look!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering overall, great bump-friendly option!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress--so flattering. It's not tight or clingy, but is definitely cut to flatter through arms and body. There was no bagginess, which makes it a comfortable yet flattering option whether you have a baby bump or not. Was a little worried it would be too short, but I was comfortable all night--felt it was perfect length and didn't ride up. Color was exactly what I expected from seeing it online. Paired this with Kenneth Jay Lane Gold Wrap Drop earrings from RTR and loved the look.

Dressy fabric and a little bit of a low back for a work dress. Would have been perfect for an informal wedding. Perfect length and Iâ€™m very short waisted, but it worked for me. Color was a dark salmon. Would seriously consider purchasing this dress. So many compliments!
The dress is nice. I wore it with black tights because it was a little too short for work - mid thigh length. The color is more of a dark pink...maybe a dark coral than red.

links_reviews_title: Casual wedding. Paired with strappy heels and bold earrings.
links_reviews_text: The fit was loose but still showed off some of my shape. Very flattering.
Love the back, the color and the fabric. Maybe a little short for the office but it made me feel young and fun! Fit great and showed off curves without clinging to bulges.

links_reviews_title: Cute color, but not a flattering fit
links_reviews_text: Loved the beautiful shade of pink, but the M hugged my tummy way too much, and the L felt baggy and ill-fitting so I never wore.
Really feminine and pretty. But extremely short. I'm 5'6".

links_reviews_title: I am 5ft and it fit very well.
links_reviews_text: Fit great and complimented my figure,

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a bridal shower. Totally appropriate for the event. Understated and classy.
links_reviews_text: I'm short, so I had no length issues with this dress. I am also quite busty, and had no problems with the fit. I got many compliments on the color and the fabric is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Adorable, but not for my body type..
links_reviews_text: Adored this little dress! It is simple, but special. Unfortunately, I just cannot wear a sheath dress. I am not pear shaped (2 on top and bottom), but sheath dresses just pull at the hips for me. A size up would have been too big. Color is beautiful, sleeves are fun, and the lower back (but not too low) gives it a fun detail. It is a little short, as many other reviewers have stated.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my goddaughter's baptism. Loved the color and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress has a conservative cut, which was perfect for wearing to my goddaughter's baptism. Although conservative, you could wear this on a night out and still feel cute as it falls above the knee, is open in the back and has a beautiful coral color. I ordered a medium (I'm 5'3", 130 lbs, 36DD) but it fit pretty loosely so if I were to rent again, I'd order a small. The color and shape of the sleeves were my favorite features of this dress. The gold zipper up the back is also nice.
It fit nicely and liked the material. Being taller, it was a little short.

I was a beautiful light fabric with a luxurious satun lining. Felt great. The opening in the bck was sexy in a work appropriate way. A little bit for me at 5'10 but great with tights and booties. The color is actually perfect for fall. Considering buying this.
Tight for those with a butt!

links_reviews_title: Cute color for a work dress
links_reviews_text: The dress had a similar fit to a shift dress. It was super cute but I needed a size Small. Other than it was flattering and perfect for work.

Love this dress and am considering buying it! Fit really well and I received tons of compliments. Wore it to a big Thanksgiving potluck along with some knee-high brown suede boots. Dress would also be suitable for work; very comfortable and nice autumnal color.

Great dress overall--got lots of compliments. The V in the back is lower than expected. Also, it's quite short. Was not a problem for me since I'm 5'3", but would not have been comfortable wearing if I were much taller.

This dress was an absolute win. As a first time RTR'er I wasn't quite sure what to expect. However, this dress made me a believer! Pretty true to size, however it does run a bit on the shorter end. I had planned on wearing the XS, but felt it may be a bit short for a wedding. Went with the S, and felt more comfortable. The fabric feels expensive, and easy to travel with as it doesn't wrinkle easily. The color is gorgeous for a fall outing, and looks good on almost any skin tone. Best thing about it is, you can dress it up or down! I paired it with some black T-strap heels, pretty gold accessories and later in the evening switched into some comfortable booties to dance the night away! I would absolutely consider buying this piece one day- it's versatility makes it a staple in any closet.
I was really excited to wear this but is much more fitted than I expected. Beautiful color and shape. But I didn't feel comfortable with how fitted it was.
Too short for my office, and it runs small. Never wore it.

links_reviews_title: Could be better, could be worse
links_reviews_text: This dress is nice but I think ultimately an expensive rent for the product itself. The top is a thick and stretchy material and on one of my rentals it was very stretched out; so much so it had warped the part where the top met the skirt. The bottom half is very light, fun, and airy. Be aware that it is slightly see-through. I wore nude colored spanx and that seemed to be fine. The pleats were more flattering than I anticipated and I ended up getting a handful of complaints through the night. I usually wear an 18/20/2x but ended up having to size down with this dress.

links_reviews_title: So flattering! I am petite yet slightly curvy and it fit me perfectly!
links_reviews_text: I wore this on a date night in the city to see Hamilton. Received compliments all night and the best part is how comfortable this dress is! It has plenty of room so you may want to size down.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress - Better for Smaller Bustlines
links_reviews_text: Great neckline, easy to wear & beautifully constructed with a gorgeous color palette in the skirt. I would recommend this for women with a C-Cup or less as it looked a little bulky on my 32DDDs. Also the skirt might have hung closer to my body if I had a smaller chest. Still a great dress for a summer day at the office.

Bummer. This dress had promise, but the waist is just way too high! It's not flattering on people with a longer torso and curves. The dress seems super petite. This 5'7" curvy girl could not carry it off. Tiny ladies may be able to give it a try.
I really enjoyed this adorable, easy-to-wear dress.

I wore this to a friend's birthday dinner at a newer hotspot restaurant and it was perfect. The waist is a little higher so I felt like it was very forgiving. Only negative was the zipper is a struggle to get up but I would totally get this again.
Comfortable to run around in, sit in, light fabric. Would rent this again in a second!

Rented this for a wedding and loved it! Great for dancing with the pleated skirt and the cut of the top makes it very elegant. I'm pear shaped and run between medium and small. Because this is an a-line, the small worked very well for me.
The fit is true to size, but the pleats sit high on the waist and create a balloon effect, which is not flattering. It was not flattering and I did not wear it.
This dress is very comfortable. The material for the bodice is soft and stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Runs big. I had to pin everywhere. Could have been lovely if sized down...maybe even two sizes down.
links_reviews_text: Shoulder strap was long and waist was big and stretchy. Skirt was lovely so maybe would have looked better with a good fit. I should have rented the XS not the M.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't as pretty in person as in photos
links_reviews_text: I was pretty disappointed in this rental. It ran REALLY large and the material on the bottom of the dress seemed cheap compared to the nice material at the bust. Wouldn't recommend.

Pretty much always a 12, a 10 on a good day I tried the XL but it was too big. The L I ordered was better but still a little baggy but the waistline now sat too high - more empireline - which didn't really flatter. Overall the skirt fabric and zip didn't feel very premium and it was all a bit meh
I ordered the recommended size and it was just too big and frumpy on me so I did not wear it as intended.
This dress was great! It's always a bit chilly for this party so the heavier fabric was perfect. Overall fit was great. The pockets were an added bonus. Would rent this again for sure!
Fit great! Pleats stick out a lot, so beware of that, but it lays nicely.
Very pretty silhouette with plush, thick fabric.
Love this dress! So many compliments, fits true to size. Comfortable.

This dress was a little more formal than I had anticipated mostly due to the structure of the skirt and the thick, high quality fabric. The pleats on the side of the skirt were really flattering and unique. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Careful about size!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! But be careful about the size, it doesn't say the size on the tag and the 40 (aka 4) didn't fit me and the 42 (aka 6) was a bit snug on me. I'm not sure what size I tried on at the shop, but definitely ask because it doesn't say on the tag.

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautiful, seemed a little worn (or well loved rather)
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress, and the pattern was beautiful. However, there were some areas the fabric looked a little pulled (this was a size 48) like a thread had pulled loose in key areas. It wasn't super obvious and probably not obvious at all to the casual observer (a very nit picky observation) and I decided to wear the dress despite this. It photographed very well despite this.

This dress was cool and comfortable for an evening wedding. The skirt is voluminous, which helps hide a tummy or booty, but maybe adds so much volume to the point that it is not very slimming. I loved the thick fabric and the pockets, and the v-neck was great, not too low for a full bust. I am 5'8, about 155 pounds, 32D.

Wore this to a wedding in Italy. The fabric and cut were both gorgeous. True to size and flattering. Also pockets!!! <3 I felt like I stepped out straight from one of the Renaissance paintings. Added bonus: didn't wrinkle in my luggage.

True to size, fitted on top and flared out skirt, which can either hide a heavier bottom or give the illusion of curvier hips. I got lots of compliments on the fabric and brilliant color/pattern. The base color of the dress is actually navy blue, even though it looks black in the photos. The pockets were a great little bonus. Very comfortable, but I would say that you need a lower cut (like demi-cup) bra, or else it'll show in the deep V neck. Great dress!
Very well made dress, fabric is very thick and high quality
Fits really well! A little low cut but fit well around the bust. Loved the pockets, very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Cute but awkward fit at the bottom
links_reviews_text: The pockets/layering of fabric at the bottom makes it look unflattering in pictures. Cute material otherwise

It was the perfect pattern to be a little different than other guests at the wedding. The extra fabric in the flare accentuated my waist. I wore the 6 because it fit nicely around my waist, but next time I would go a size up so I have more room to breathe in the chest - it flattened my our a little bit :/
I wore this for a work holiday party and it fit like a glove! Not only was it a festive style but it also was incredibly flattering!

I felt so cute wearing this. I wore it with a navy blazer for work, then took the jacket off to go to a charity benefit event in the evening, and got compliments at both. The floral is amazing, and the fabric is beautiful. I usually wear a 12 (which correlates to a 48), but felt just fine in the 46 in this -- my hips are usually what drives the size that I need, and the skirt on this dress is very full, so just need to fit waist and bust, in which I'm more of a 10.

I love this dress! I wore it to a wedding in September and I was so happy with it. First of all, it has pockets, who doesn't love a dress with pockets. Second, I received a lot of compliments on it. I feel like it was super comfortable, I wasn't worried about it being too short, easy to move around in. I would say it's true to size, I'm in between sizes right now and the smaller one was just a little too tight in the chest area. I would highly recommend this dress, it's been on my "maybe" list for a while now and I wish I had rented it even sooner. I don't know what I would do without RTR, it's been such a great experience to wear different dresses to weddings and events without having to repeat dresses or wearing the same old thing that's been in my closet for years. Can't wait for my next rental in a couple weeks!
Beautiful dress with great colors. Great thick texture too.
It was a great dress with a funky shape! It was a body con dress with added pleats for visual interest, which included pockets. The fabric was embroidered as well. Pattern is bold and beautiful.
Great dress and one of my favorite rentals to date. Fit TTS and was very comfortable. Wore to a Kentucky Derby Party (in DC).

I'm usually a size 14 but was able to fit into this dress due to the full skirt which I loved. The structure of the dress was amazing and material was perfect for a spring party with the weather still on the cooler side. The only issue I had was the top being a little too low cut and tight for me.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved this dress, even the lady at Taco Bell drive thru!
links_reviews_text: Fit great! I am between a 6 and an 8, I wore the 8 for a comfy fit. Loved the colors to this dress and that I got to pull out the red lipstick!

links_reviews_title: This was my first RTR, and I was very pleased with the entire process!
links_reviews_text: Overall, this was a great dress. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is it ended up being a *bit* tight. The next size up would have been too large, so there wasn't anything I could do about that. The fabric is lovely and very sturdy. The pleats on the side will accentuate your hips, so if that's not appealing to you, I'd skip this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great print but beware the double pleats!
links_reviews_text: This dress feels very luxurious and has a very unique and unforgettable look. That being said, I agree with other reviews in that the skirt adds a lot of bulk to your lower half.

links_reviews_title: This was such a perfect dress for our special Valentines Day announcement!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly! I loved the roses, they were so much more beautiful in person than I could have imagined. It truly made our Valentines Day announcement more festive! The bottom half of the dress is sort of odd. It definitely flares out, which can make you look wider than you are. It was such a unique skirt style!

Great for any occasion! This dress runs true to size and we recommend going on size up for your back-up. The fabric has no stretch to it and it is fitted throughout the waist area. This dress would work great for cup sizes A-C. Fuller skirt allows comfortable room for fuller hips. At 5'4" this style hits at the knee on me. This dress is great for any occasion and would pair with nude color strappy heels.

I wore this to a party - where it was the most expressive as it has a fun two side flare. The color and quality were so nice though with champagne hues that help the red pop. I wanted to try it for work too...So I added a silk champagne cami to reduce cleavage and a navy cardigan. I loved that too but the cardigan reduced the flare look. Careful of the flare. It can make you look hippy if you don't have a tiny waist with this one because it only flares to the sides. Not a full skirt to create waist.
The fabric is nice, the colors are bright and fun. I rented this for a Kentucky Derby themed fundraiser, and it was perfect. It's great for us pear-shaped girls!
Fits well, though it is very low in bust. Cute skirt that flares out.

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner. It fit great and was fun with the fuller skirt. I loved the pockets and the c neck line gave me just enough cleavage to keep it classy. Im short waisted and sometimes the waist of a dress ends up being very unflattering on me, because it falls too low for my short waist, but this dress fit well. It made my waist seem small and the full skirt created just enough curve to be feminine. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Back up this time, but will rent in the future!
links_reviews_text: Great silhouette. Pockets. The bold flower pattern is absolutely gorgeous!! Beware, your spouse may think it reminds them of grandma's curtains, but it's because the dress is a thick/textured material. I loved it anyway!
Na
Cute

Runs small - couldn't zip it. Size up for sure. The shoulders are also very wide strapped. My shoulders are narrow to average width, and the fabric came over the edges of my shoulders which isn't all that flattering. The neck is high, so the effect would be pretty matronly.

I rented this dress because a coworker had recently rented it, and it was beautiful. I fund it to be very versatile. It can be worn for work, as well as a special occasion. It was true to size, and I highly recommend it!
Loved this dress. Super comfortable with pockets! Got a ton of compliments from my coworkers. Could be great for a wedding too!
This dress is beautiful but was a bit too tight, making it hard to breath. I would go a size up next time. The pattern, color and fabric are beautiful.
Way too tight in the bust.
This dress is comfortable and functional. Would love to add this piece to my closet, will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit, shape and material - had so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Ran a little small and not stretch fabric, but the shape was gorgeous. No bra needed.

links_reviews_title: Amazing quality and it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for my daughters homecoming dance. Gorgeous!
The colors and fabric on this dress are beautiful. Love the pockets! True to size but the top is snug.
Runs a bit small. I'm usually a 6 but the 8 fit perfectly. The structure to the bodice combined with the full skirt makes for a very flattering fit! Plus it has pockets!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, loved the pockets
links_reviews_text: Great dress, great length, great fit. I received lots of compliments and felt great. Quality material. Pockets were helpful since my phone didnâ€™t fit in my clutch.

links_reviews_title: Tight, and so hard to get on by yourself.
links_reviews_text: I had such a hard time with this dress. It has a corset like lining, with rigid boning all around the rib cage. The zipper was ungodly. I took the dress off, and still had the worst time trying to get it zipped even with it off my body. There are five hooks involved in putting the dress on. It's just not an easy, slip on and go dress. Once I finally got it on, I was incredibly uncomfortable within five minutes, and decided it just wasn't worth it. The fabric is beautiful, and the colors and pattern bold. The 14 runs more like a 10.
Didn't wear as I could not zip up all the way. I think I'd really like it in the next size up.

The dress was beautiful and I was very happy, I wore the 6, but for some reason the 8 seemed smaller, the boning in the 8 was also very uncomfortable when I tried it on. It showed a lot of wear, also Iâ€™m fairly small chested, so I had to wear a strapless push-up bra to fill the top. But overall just comfortable fun dress ! I would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Dress for very well and has POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit beautifully and I got tons of compliments! Perfect for an afternoon/evening wedding. The zipper is a little tough to get zipped over the seam. It is lined and fitted up top so I didn't have to wear a bra (always a plus)!

links_reviews_title: Best wedding dress ever. It was perfect.
links_reviews_text: True to size. Perfect fit.
Got this as a backup dress for a holiday cocktail party. I loved it, but ended up going with another, bolder option. It fit great, the fit and flare style works well for my wider hips.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, and comfortable to wear
links_reviews_text: This dress I beautiful. It definitely runs small. I normally wear a 12, and ended up wearing a 14 in this dress. It was TIGHT on the top, but it flares out at the waist, so that's a plus. And it has pockets! The lining of the dress has a bit of tulle to make it puff out, and the one side was missing a layer of tulle, but it didn't effect the look of the dress. I'd rent it again!

Ordered this for my daughter's senior year homecoming. Was nervous about it being strapless, but she said there was no problems with sizing (pulling up, slipping, etc.). She considered wearing one size up but the tighter fit helped keep everything in place. She looked gorgeous and had a fabulous time! ps We were charged a $150 late fee despite shipping on time, but when I called, they refunded it without protest.

links_reviews_title: We didn't have shopping time so saved time and money.
links_reviews_text: She danced the night away! Our first time with RTR and dress was great, camr on time, great fit and quality and easy return!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Great color & nice fit. Got a lot of compliments on it! And... it has POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress except for the fact that the boning in the bodice area stabbed me in the stomach a bit when I sat down. Other than that (or maybe just after I got used to that??), it was a beautiful color & style and I loved the pockets. Was very happy with it, especially for the price! Would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Had to wear the backup size which was a little large but adding a strapless bra made the fit work
links_reviews_text: Love the structured top and pockets! I have a difficult body type to dress, but this was a home run! Second time renting this garment and will likely rent a third time (can this go on sale for purchase yet please?!?)

links_reviews_title: Overall great dress and I got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress was fantastic! Love the pockets! The zipper is really tough... youâ€™ll need help. Built in bra kept everything in place all night. The boning did get uncomfortable after a few hours... but not unbearable.

links_reviews_title: Fun cocktail dress for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved the colors and pattern of this dress and also the high-lo of the skirt. The bodice was tight and pretty structured but for me it sat low on my ribs and chest which resulted in some extra cleavage. Even if I pulled it up, that was where it wanted to settle. There wasn't a fear of it falling down at all but it made me a little nervous.

links_reviews_title: One word ladies....POCKETS!! Pockets make any dress complete:)
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress!! I always get worried when I wear strapless dresses but it was very comfortable to wear! Unfortunately the zipper was broken but I used safety pins and RTR gave me a refund for the zipper. RTR is always very good about making sure you get what you paid for:)

I loved the silhouette of this high-low dress. I wore it to a gala, and received tons of compliments. The 10 fit me perfectly (5'7", 150 lbs, 36B) and was comfortable to sit and dance in. This is one of my favorite RTR rentals and I'll be looking for similar styles in the future!

links_reviews_title: The pattern is really pretty and I got a lot of compliments. Loved pockets.
links_reviews_text: It was a really great dress to hide a tummy, but if you have large breasts like I do (36DDD), then order a size up. I was constantly having to pull it up, not because it was too big, but because it was extra snug and eventually it just had a hard time staying up where I wanted it to because of the size of my chest.

links_reviews_title: The pockets made it perfect for an all night event!
links_reviews_text: The fit was amazing, the top stayed in place all night, the pockets made it perfect for a wedding. I could carry all my goodies without having to worry to keeping track of everything. The fabric was gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments with this dress! It fit beautifully! Its easy to accessorize this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit great! Highly recommend!
It fit true to size and flowed easily
I loved this dress. I didnt even need a purse with this one - just put keys, phone and lupstick in the pockets and danced all night.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Wish I owned it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a bit of a challenge to zip up but once in is perfection. I love the fabric and the cut. And it has pockets. I also like that it didn't slip down at all. I will definitely rent this again.
Love the color, well-constructed and has POCKETS (so convenient!!). Wore this dress to my company's holiday party and received so many compliments. Does run slightly small. Would love to wear again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my cousins wedding and got tons of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 6 and the 8 and ended up wearing the 8 as the top is very tight. Per the comments, I needed a second set of hands to zip the top up. I am a 34DD and the top fit perfect. I did end up bruising a bit from the boning after wearing it for ~12 hours. But it looked fabulous!

links_reviews_title: We attended a cocktail event/awards banquet.
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable and fit perfectly. Definitely runs TTS. Plus, pockets! My one complaint is that the specific dress I rented had definitely seen better days â€“ the sticky part on the inside of the bodice that helps hold the dress up was very worn, and the zipper had very little black paint left on it. I would say the dress I was sent probably needs to be retired. I have not had this problem with other RtR dresses I've rented.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely amazing and princess feel - little trouble in the back
links_reviews_text: If you are looking for a strapless dress that won't let your ladies down this one is for you. First of all it was over the top comfortable and not to mention IT HAD POCKETS. This was my first time using rtr so I was a little wary of the whole experience but it was so easy I will 100% use it again. The dress was comfortable and for a 34B it only slipped a teeny tiny bit. It was great for dancing and for my first Homecoming I constantly was complimented on the color and the overall style. The back was a challenging to zip up, so my mom had to do it but the fabric held the whole night. The dress has an interior support bra to keep the dress from slipping which helped a lot. Stop now, rent it!

This dress was beautiful. It was very thick material but perfect for the chilly evening. The only negative was the wires kept poking through the fitted part of the dress. It hit at the top of my ribcage. I have a rather large rib cage area and don't have a full bust. If I had a full bust I would not have been able to wear the dress. Pretty true to size. Pockets were a major perk! I forgot to order this dress in a timely fashion so I was a little stressed about it arriving on time. It arrived on time!

links_reviews_title: The color is amazing and it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments in this dress! The top does run small so order the larger size for your backup. I recommend this dress!!

Rented this for a good friend's wedding. Love. Love. Love. Couple things do know before renting, however. The zipper is weird. I had to get resourceful to get it up by myself. Also the chest is snug, which is ok for me but might not be for some girls. Aside from that, this dress is extremely flattering and fun to wear. So many compliments!
Fit is great, dress was comfortable. I love dresses with pockets so this was an awesome find. Minus one star cos it was very hard to zip up....and not because of size.

The dress fit perfect, it was made well and nice material. The material was thick but in a good way. I wouldn't say this dress is to die for but it was a good wedding guest dress and I got many compliments throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blue dress for a Fall Wedding!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful blue dress and fits true to size. You definitely need someone to help you with the buttons and zipper in the back. Best part of the dress are the deep pockets. I carried my iPhone in one pocket and my sunglasses in the other. Win Win!

links_reviews_title: The structured bodice makes it figure-flattering, and crinoline under-layer makes it fun!
links_reviews_text: Since the fabric is stiff and many-layered at the waist band, you MUST have someone strong to help you zipper it. The waist determines the size - this is a size up for me. You don't need a bra due to the boning, but it looks better with one. The elastic band at the top was worn on the dress I received; if the bust wasn't tight fitting, I would have been uncomfortable.
This dress fit snug but the size 0 worked great. I am very petite so overall the dress felt like I was getting eaten as it had a fuller skirt. It was cute but not something I was used to

links_reviews_title: An amazing dress and an even more amazing customer experience!
links_reviews_text: Before I get to the gorgeous dress, I want to first thank my stylist, Devin. Last week I was expecting my original rental to arrive in Houston on 8/31 for a wedding I was attending in Denver, CO on 9/2 but due to Hurricane Harvey, the package didn't get to me in time. I called RTR and connected with Devin and she went above and beyond to get me a couple of dresses to choose from to be sent overnight to San Antonio since the hurricane brought me there. We spoke at length about the style(s) I tended to gravitate towards as well as what was available in the short time frame. I went with the first dress that she suggested, this Monique Lhullier, and I couldn't be any happier with the dress and with my experience with RTR, specifically Devin. It was quite possibly the one thing that went right amongst all that went wrong in the past 2 weeks. They take the utmost care of their customers and did everything they could to alleviate any stress I had about the rental and the wedding. Thank you to Devin and to RTR for everything!! I am a loyal customer for life!!!!

I LOVED this dress! Wore it to a wedding and felt so classy and elegant, I did not want to send it back! I usually wear a 6/8 and the 6 ended up fitting me perfectly. I received so many compliments! The boning in the bodice did start to get a little bit uncomfortable towards the end of the night, but nothing too unbearable. This was my first RTR experience and definitely not my last!

The color of the dress and the material made it great for a winter wedding. It was perfect with a cardigan for the ceremony and dinner and then the strapless helped once I was on the dance floor. It was a bit tight in the waist on me but nothing I couldn't deal with. I don't know if going up a size would have helped as I think the next size up would be too big in the chest since I'm small chested. The length and fullness of the skirt was great for me being tall with wide hips.

Fantastic dress, yielded tons of compliments plus I was comfortable all night. Requires a strapless bra but no other spanx etc. Rent it, you will love it! (Def needed the 8 bc it is fitted at the waist, it's true to size but remember it's fitted).

This was the perfect LBD for my company holiday party. The fabric of the dress is nice and heavy feeling. The pockets are awesome! I felt great in the dress. My only complaint was that one of my sizes had small holes in the lace. I didn't notice them when I tried it on, but when I put it on for the event, I noticed several, even one in the front. I had to switch to the smaller size, which was a bit snug but still doable. I think this style is a little too delicate (and the material of the bottom of the dress too heavy) to be hung on the thin hanger that RTR uses, and the dress was clearly showing its wear (lots of happy ladies have worn this dress, apparently!).
