My other complaint is that even though the dresses have clearly been dry cleaned, they still smell a little gross! All in all, very happy with the final outcome, and RTR handled it well. Just beware and be prepared that sometimes the dresses show wear when you get them.
I wore this a Halloween wedding and it was perfect! Comfortable, true to size and had pockets!

Classic little black dress. This dress was perfectly structured with the stretch to let you dance all night long. I really liked the lace detail to soften the look of the outfit. I would absolutely recommend.
This dress is absolutely beautiful! Fits true to size and you will get complements all night! I wish it was mine to keep!
Very comfortable flattering and pockets!
Rented for my birthday night out on the town. It fit a little tight but I was a little between sizes at the time due to baby weight I was still trying to lose. I loved this dress and I'd rent again!
Loved this dress. Perfect for a cocktail attire dinner. I wore a size 6 in the dress and it fit great! The pockets were a plus too. Love dresses with pockets!
Especially if you want to hide your belly and hips and booty :) The lace is lovely and the dress is well made!

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD for Vegas birthday night out.
links_reviews_text: This dress is all that! Great shape and feel. Looks like sparkly leather, ,but has nice soft non stiff texture that moves really well. Nice material, not too heavy, with light structure to give a little flair. The lace was pretty and delicate. The flare on bottom works well for my pear shape. And who doesnâ€™t love pockets?! Paired with pink platform shoes for a bit of color, and for my goofy birthday hat. Would definitely rent again. Another hit from #RTR. Love, love, love!! Loved that it gave me a little cleavage which I never seem to have. I ordered size 4 & 6, and went with 4. True to size. The fit and flare works well for my pear shape. Canâ€™t forget the pockets.. AWESOME!! Sexy, fun, flattering LBD! My favorite rental so far. Thanks as always #RTR for making me look and feel like a million bucks on my working girls budget!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and Feminine Dress with Pockets
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my husband's officer commissioning and it was perfect! Comfortable with pockets and a zipper up the back. I adored the pockets. The length was perfect for the event as well. Would definitely rent this again!
I rented this for work - lovely dress, great fit and super comfortable. I wore a strapless bra with it. Would definitely rent again - i wore to work then out to drinks and dinner.
I love the fit. I got a 0 and 2 and both fit but went with the 0. I love the cinched waist and the skirt with pockets! The lace is delicate and pretty.

links_reviews_title: This is a great, comfortable dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is classy and easy to wear. I loved the pockets. The shear portion on top is very delicate...it had a few minor flaws...perhaps from the hanger, so that's why I'm giving this 4 stars instead of 5. I would love to own this one! It's a great LBD.

This was actually a replacement dress after my first two choices for New Years became unavailable. As disappointed as I was to not have my other options, I was very happy with this dress! I can usually wear a 6 in this brand, but the 8 fit like a glove! I'm a 32DD and there was comfortable room for my bust and the waist was the perfect size. The fabric is soft and the dress has pockets! You definitely need a strapless bra as the lace on the top is very sheer. A beautiful dress all around! I was able to dance in the New Year in style and comfort.
The dress fit great. It wasn't too short but the lace could be a little annoying at times.
Material had give. I wasnâ€™t able to get my back up size. Once I put on spanx & my strapless bra I had some extra room. Would have preferred the smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Classy classy and fun!! Pockets are a bonus!!
links_reviews_text: MFit great! Good material. Could have used the 4 but 8 weeks post baby I was t sure what my real size was.

Loved this dress! The lace is the perfect and makes this LBD into something special. The material is a bit thicker than most dresses but I was fine with that because the night of the wedding was flippin freezing! While I believe the dress runs true to size, I would be curious to see how this dress fit me in the next size down (an 8) because I had a little extra fabric around my waist. This was the back up style I chose so I only had one size. Also, POCKETS! Who doesn't love a dress with pockets?! I didn't have to worry about my cell phone falling out because the pockets were deep. As someone who never knows what to do with her hands while talking to people, the pockets made me very happy! I highly recommend this dress for any event--especially if you're not sure how fancy it is!
Love the dress. No too long and not too short. IT HAS POCKETS! Wore this to a banquet and loved it. Super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I received compliment after compliment on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Stunning! This dress is very true to size. It fit perfectly! Super comfortable for being ultra fancy and it even has pockets!!

This dress was sent as a backup and it ended up being a winner! The fit was fantastic and true to size. The lace along the shoulders was delicate and lovely and the pleating added some interest to the lower part of the dress. Also, any dress with pockets is always a win!

I felt wonderful in this dress. It fit my frame perfectly. There weren't any tight areas that made me feel restricted during the night (which is rare), and the style enhanced my hour glass shape. It wasn't revealing at all, but the sheer top still made it feel sexy. Even though the top was sheer, I was able to wear a thin strap lace bra that was hardly noticeable behind the sheer part of the dress. Overall, everything about this dress made me feel great, so much so I wish I could buy it! It's the perfect LBD. When you feel pretty and comfortable, it's a win!

I wore this to a charity fundraiser where the dress code was "black tie optional." Dress was super easy to wear. The lace detail was beautiful. I wore a strapless bra with the dress (to make me a little less flat) but you could probably go with out... the fabric is thick and the fit would keep the girls in place. I loved the pockets. Got compliments all night. Would definitely rent again.
Loved this dress. Very classic and easy to move in.

links_reviews_title: My date loved it on me
links_reviews_text: Fits so well and felt good on! Such a great dress!
The dress was beautiful, and classy. It fit like a glove and was super comfy for dancing
Fit like a glove. I just had a baby so the flare was perfect. .the pockets a plus. I ddnt need a necklace bc of the beautiful lace detail.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great fit and the material was of excellent quality! I wore this on a HOT, June day for a wedding, and it was so comfortable. I just had my second baby in May, and this dress made me feel pretty at my brother-in-law's wedding. I received so many compliments and people were so intrigued by the "renting l concept.

I didn't end up wearing this dress even though I absolutely love it because I didn't have the correct undergarments with me. I will most definitely rent this dress for another event because it is comfortable, slimming and super cute! I was sad to send it back. Can't wait to wear it in the future!
This dress was super comfortable and I loved that it had pockets!
Loved the pockets and fit. There was a small hole in the lace but not noticable. I had to get a black strapless bra since due to how the top layed. I got a black lace one and you could never tell.

This is a beautiful dress. Perfect for a wedding or formal event. The lace top makes this little black dress pop! And it has pockets! The size 4 fit perfectly. The 6 was a little roomier but not that much bigger. I love the ease of RTR...I'm hooked!

The dress was a perfect fit! It's simple yet eye-catching design is perfect for any event. I paired the dress with big earrings, no necklace and a simple bracelet. The bodice doesn't have much give in the material so be sure to include a back-up size. I didn't wear a bra and felt completely comfortable all day. The skirt is full and quite flattering! The lace on the top is stunning! The dress is overall quite simple, extremely flattering and just gorgeous. I got so many compliments on it! My husband wanted me to keep it. I highly recommend this dress and look forward to renting it again.
Dress felt a bit casual so I had to dress it up with gold shoes.
I got so many complements on this dress. It was very flattering and comfortable. The pockets were awesome so I didn't have to keep my purse on me the whole night. Loved it!

Loved this dress, it's not overly heavy, but the em weight of the fabric was perfect for still masking imperfections. The sheer top was fantastic for heat management. Did I mention the pockets? Their awesome as well. I'm 5'2, between 113-118 and fairly athletic but petite. This dress fit perfectly and if I had a purpose to own it, then it would be my #1. Only complaint, wish it was a bit shorter, like 2-3 inches. But it fell at my knees And still looked great.

links_reviews_title: This was an eye-catcher at a country club summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress gets 5 stars! Better than your average LBD. The pockets were an added bonus. It fit perfectly in all the right places. This dress got me compliments all night long! The detailed mesh chest/neckline gives it a beautiful some special. Rent this baby - you can't go wrong!
I usually wear a size 6, but the 4 fit perfectly. It was very comfortable. No complaints. I would definitely recommend!

Not the most exciting design, but a great dress for dinner out with the parents. Nice thick fabric made it comfortable for early spring weather and forgiving on bumps. No sneaky tight skirt lining. Easy to wear, classy look, just add pumps!

Dress fit perfect! Wore it for a 30th wedding celebration and got compliments all night on the dress! The detail on the dress was gorgeous and gave in that something extra. Wish I didn't have to send it back
So cute! Loved that the fabric was a bit thicker and the detail on it because it helped hide imperfections. It fit like a glove and was comfortable to wear all night, even with lots of dancing!

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my husbandâ€™s birthday weekend...Received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It was true to size...Loved how it looked on me!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress and very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR rental. I was apprehensive about renting a dress without knowing how it fit, but everyone in the reviews looked good and said it fit well. I'm glad I chose this dress as my first rental. I probably could have worn either the 4 or the 6 for this dress. I typically wear size 6 but the 6 became unavailable right before the wedding. The fabric has a lot of give, and the 4 worked very well. I was glad the dress was a bit thicker since it ended up being a cool fall day on a mountain. It was so comfortable for dancing in all night, I didn't even want to take it off by the end of the night. Overall, the dress was so much fun, and I was very happy with it! I really didn't experience any downsides. I'd be tempted to buy it if I had the chance.

links_reviews_title: It was so easy and convenient!
links_reviews_text: The dress was comfortable and fit great! I'm 5'3 and 130 lbs and a size 4 was perfect. I got many compliments!
Dress was true to size and flattering.
Very comfy perfect fit
Great fit! Wore this for a nye party. Fit to size and length was just right. Nice fabric and comfortable.

I'm pretty large chested (34F) and have trouble finding something that fits both upstairs and everywhere else. Well, this was the dress. Compliments all night and for days after. Very comfortable and concealed bulges well. I didn't even wear spanx! I did wear a convertible bra with one strap to help hold the girls up. Would LOVE to rent this one again.
This dress was perfect . The material was a littler heavier than expected but overall easy to move around in. I had a work event followed by a birthday party and this dress was perfect for both.

I was worried about renting while 5 months pregnant but this dress was so comfortable and had plenty of room for my bump! I felt classy and comfortable all night and got tons of compliments many people said they couldn't even tell I was pregnant lol! I rented the 6 and 4 and ended up wearing the 4! Great dress definitely rent if you want to feel great all night! The only negative was the side with the sipper bunched a little but I am not sure if that was due to my bump or the dress!
Recommend for wedding. I'm 5'0 and wasn't too long. Just the right size. 110lbs small boobs and. 5'0. Wore size 0

This dress fit great! I wish there wasn't a snow storm on the east coast causing shipping delays, as this dress arrived 3 days after it was expected and I didn't get to wear it to my dear friend's wedding. But, I did get a chance to try it on before sending it back and I have told my husband that he needs to find somewhere to take me so I rent this dress again!
Loved this dress! I'm 5'3' and this fell right below my knees. The top was a little big but overall the dress was comfortable. It had a nice comfortable stretch in it. I didn't wear a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for the Navy Ball.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable dress. Lots of compliments.

This dress was actually my backup after the original dress I had selected was damaged by the previous renter. That said, this dress was perfect! At the very last minute, I was shipped a size 16 dress. I'm 5'10, 38D, normally wear a size 14 dress, so I was nervous about the reviews that it runs large, and it does - i had plenty of room in the hips and waist. I could have worn the 14 and it would have been a more fitted dress, but honestly it was still great. Great length, nice weight to dress, lots of room to move, sit, and dance. I absolutely love this dress, and if I get the change to purchase it (in the right size) I wouldn't hesitate to do it!

links_reviews_title: First time user of RTR and am so happy!
links_reviews_text: I had two dresses delivered sizes 4 & 6. Oddly enough the size 6 was more of a snug fit (particularly around the bust) than the size 4. It has two linings in the dress so it felt good and covered up the little lump and bumps. It did sit very strangely at the bottom of the zip leaving a bulging look. This was the same on both of the dresses so I'd say it has something to do with the fabric. I enjoyed wearing this frock and I loved how easy it is to use RTR! Can't wait to hire my next dress! Thankyou Team RTR.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a friend's wedding and got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was my first delivery from RTR. The dress was beautiful and elegant and I loved the style and fit. I originally planned on wearing the sz. 6, but the sz. 4 fit perfectly (the material had a little stretch which was great)!

The 8 was a little too snug in the stomach area but the 10 was a little loose in the bust. I liked it and it was comfortable but I seemed to be between sizes. Overall it was flattering and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Comfy dress for a formal affair!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I wore it for a black tie wedding in the fall and it was the perfect choice. I got compliments all night and with the stretchy fabric was really comfortable dancing through the night! The fabric was VERY stretchy, I ordered the 4 and 6 and even the 4 was a little loose so keep that in mind. The flutter on the sleeve was as pictured and added a nice flair to the dress. Don't hesitate to rent it!

Overall, the dress was terrific! The dress is well-made and feels great on the body--flattering and comfortable. I received a lot of compliments and really felt amazing wearing it. It fits fairly true to size (I wear a 6 or an 8 depending). I ended up wearing the six even though it was a tad more snug because the 8 was just a teeny bit loose in the bust. Some reviews mentioned the lace was a (little) bit worn and that was true of the 6--especially along the bottom. But only noticeable because I was looking for it. The fabric near the zipper's bottom is just a teeny bit thick, so it will bunch a bit right at that spot--but once I was in the dress and moving around, it never bothered me. The dress came a day later than promised but I wasn't worried since I had read the reviews and felt confident one of the two sizes I ordered would fit. I don't think you'll regret renting this one--seriously a comfortable flattering fit.

links_reviews_title: If unsure of size, order down. Great thick quality, perfect for colder weather event.
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress, just wish I would have ordered a 12 instead of 14. Thick material. Great little black dress. I'm contemplating buying this one. Wasn't my first choice, which I received and didn't like. The stylist at RTR was super helpful and sent two dresses to pick from. Great experience, as always!
The fabric was so comfortable, stretch yet let me breath...and eat. Classy but not stiff. The burn out added a modern touch to the classic silhouette.

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and I absolutely loved it! It was stretchy but I did feel like it ran a little big in the waist. It fit perfectly in the chest and hips though. It has a lot of give so if you're going to an event with good food...eat up! :) You need to rent this!

links_reviews_title: Felt fancy enough for a VERY nice rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: This was a last minute save that worked out so well! I would say the dress is probably 2 sizes larger, but it didn't ruin the styling. Even though it ran large it still looked very nice. It was also UNBELIEVABLY comfortable. Once again so appreciative of the customer service at RTR, simply perfect!

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on this dress. I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great- the material was super cozy and stretchy. I am always between sizes because my top is small. The six was too big around my chest but the four was perfect. I was able to feel comfortable all night long.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for the Bat Mitzvah . I got a lots of complements about the dress .
links_reviews_text: Pros. Very sliming dress. Comfortable . I got size 4&6 but 4 was little big on me. Longer than I expected. But still I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect wedding dress-trendy design, quality fabric, great overall fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress came in place of a dress I chose that was no longer available. I'm so glad my original pick was unavailable! The fabric in this dress is rich with a nice stretch to it. Off the shoulder was trendy, but not too revealing, perfect dress for my cousin's wedding. The 6 was only available, it was a bit big, but not too noticeable. 4 would have been a bit better fit, but overall it looked fab and I received numerous compliments throughout the night- even from the bride!

links_reviews_title: This was a super fun, unique dress. Nothing else like it.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is fairly stretchy, which is nice. The shoulder really is BIG, but it fit my personality, which people were sure to point out. I may have been a bit overdressed for the casual wedding, but I had a great time wearing such a unique dress. The white underneath will show through once you put it on.

links_reviews_title: I felt gorgeous in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I should've gotten a size 10 as back up because the 12 fit me a bit big (or it could be that my daily workout is finally showing haha). The dress is extremely comfortable to be in.and the length is exactly like in the picture, I got lots of compliments and really felt sexy in the dress.

This dress was pretty and detailed. It was great for a cocktail style wedding. The white lining did show from time to time but I stopped worrying about it after a while. The dress was comfortable for dancing all night long. Don't fear this dress if you have curves! It definitely has some stretch. :)

The dress had beautiful laser cut lace detailing and the one shoulder detail was fun without overdoing it. The dress hugs your curves but artfully hides any problem area. I put on the size 10 first and it fit in the hips, but was very billowing up to (and I'm a D cup!). The size 8 was a tad more snug in the hips, but the fabric is thick and since it looked much better up top, I went with it and received LOTS of compliments. I highly recommend this dress for more formal affairs!

I got soooo many compliments on this dress!! I wanted a dress that I was going to be able to move and be comfortable as I anticipated dancing all night. I read all the reviews and was not disappointed. I wore the dress for almost 10 hours straight and there was not one uncomfortable moment. I usually wear a size 14 and the dress was big on me. One of the reasons I decided to belt it. The fabric does have give, so go down a size. Loved it so much, renting it for a different wedding this weekend!
Best dress I have rented this far with RTR! I hated to return it! Very comfortable and easy to move in! I received compliments all night long about how great the dress was and how good I looked!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a GLOVE! Loved, loved, it! I received compliments all night long=)
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. The dress did not ride up but rather stayed put for the entire night.

links_reviews_title: An underestimated gem of a dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so far my most favorite dress that I have rented. It's stretchy, so I could wear the 4 versus the 6. The material is really great thick quality that smoothes your figure. It's so comfortable and fun to dance in- and I didn't need a bra. I normally don't review dresses, but this dress was so great that I felt like I should say it since there are so little reviews about it! I wish I could rent it over and over again. Got so many compliments, and really loved the sleeve on the right side. Definitely a good one.

links_reviews_title: This dress gave me the confidence to thoroughly enjoy night without worrying how I looked!
links_reviews_text: I was thrilled with this dress! It felt great on, hugged my body and made me look and feel amazing. I am about 5'7" and it came to my knees. I was able to move around and dance and eat and drink comfortably without feeling confined. This was for a formal dinner and I received so many compliments on the dress. I highly recommend renting this for any special occasion. I have NO complaints!

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on the dress, was perfect for corporate black tie occasion.
links_reviews_text: I am normally a 4, but I was choosing a gown off the rack in the Georgetown location so my only option was a size 6. The 6 was a bit large on me but not noticeably so. No one could tell. It's such a comfortable dress, very stretchy throughout. I would definitely recommend it, and I didn't even wear the correct size.

links_reviews_title: Ruffles perfect for Havana themed charity gala
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a black tie charity event and it was perfect for the Cuban theme. The ruffle adds that extra something and the cutouts in the bodice are more subtle than they appear on the website. I am only 5"1" at best so the hem was a bit lower than it is intended, but it made the dress seem more formal than a knee length would. There was a bit of a lump where the zipper ended at my hip, so watch out for that. I wore a 0, which is my standard size, and had plenty of wiggle room. I got tons of compliments on it, so if you are looking for a LBD thats just a bit different, go for it!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress with soft material and stretch to make dancing a blast!
links_reviews_text: The dress was comfortable! Soft inner layer with stretch so it conformed to my shape and made dancing easy and fun! I received so many compliments! The material was a few layers thick so it was good for this winter weather formal party!

links_reviews_title: This was my very first rent the runway dress. I was extremely impressed.
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel like a movie star. It was my first rent the runway and I was blown away. It hugged my curves perfect the material was thick and perfect for a winter wedding. I would highly recommend renting this stunning dress.
Wore this to my husband's holiday party & received many compliments. This dress fit perfectly and was very comfortable to wear. It was sexy without being too much. Would def recommend!

This was a fun dress to rent, but not my favorite. I was able to pull off wearing my usual size, but it was a little too snug for my preference and I felt like I needed to suck in my "gut" all evening. I think the next size up would've been better (they weren't able to ship it to me), but another issue was the proportions of the dress overall felt slightly off for my height/shape. I'd definitely rent one size up for your backup.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments!! I felt like a movie star.
links_reviews_text: I was told several times i wore the best dress at the event!! I felt like a movie star. It really shows off your curves!!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This was my first time renting a dress and Iâ€™m so glad I did! This dress was stunning and I got so many compliments! Dress is very true to size but I was nice to have a backup size

This dress was sexy with the open back, low cut front, and slit, while not being over-the-top revealing! The gown length with long sleeves made it perfect for winter events. I ordered a 4R and 6R, and wore the 6R. Ideally I would have ordered a 6L and 8R, but those sizes/lengths were not available. 6R was just slightly too tight where the clasp meets on the back; needed help zipping and clasping. But it wasn't too uncomfortably tight that I couldn't stand it throughout the evening. Sleeves are slightly tight but doable. 6R length was a little shorter than I would have liked but definitely not too short! Highly recommend! My friend saw pictures of me wearing the dress and immediately turned around and rented for her upcoming winter wedding event!

links_reviews_title: More raspberry pink than the pic.
links_reviews_text: Great for my 5â€™11 height and long arms in the L fit perfectly. No bra needed.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful gown for a Debutante Ball!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and fit of the dress! I normally wear a 4 so I was glad I got the 6 as a backup because the 4 was just a little bit too tight. I was worried about the plunging neckline so I used body tape and a special backless, low scoop bra so I felt comfortable all evening.
Fit like a glove! Definitely hugs the curves. The material felt expensive and was pretty comfortable the whole night!

I wore this dress to a Novemeber wedding with a black tie optional attire and it was perfect. I received so many compliments and the long sleeves made it perfect for the fall weather. Being 5â€™10â€ the long size allowed me to wear heels. Would highly recommend for winter/ fall event.

links_reviews_title: It was very flattering, I would definitely rent again ! :)
links_reviews_text: Dress is tight-fitting but true to size. This dress is very flattering and very comfortable. The open back is also a really nice surprise, it looks great with hair up or down. The slit is a little high, just had to be careful getting in and out of cars, but overall I LOVED it and would rent it again ! :-)

Wore this to a formal wedding in October. This dress is stunning and received lots of compliments the whole night. Loved the long sleeves as the weather was chilly, and it was easy to dance in all night!

I loved this dress. I did feel a little over dressed for just a regular cocktail wedding but still loved it. It was super flattering and it was very warm, I didn't need a coat or jacket. It was a nice thick forgiving fabric and the color was great.

This dress was a show stopper! It was very snug at a 4L and I'm typically a size 2. The dress was missing a few rhinestones, and for that reason it gets four stars. I received tons of compliments in this dress

This dress was incredible and I actually did rent it twice. The material is thick so it holds you in where you need it, but it flaunts your cubes. I didn't wear a bra-just the sticky pads. It's a deep v and you definitely need a lot of confidence to pull this look off. Also it's not good for eating a big meal. But otherwise I loved it.
I felt amazing in this dress! I got so many compliments on it that night. The jeweled belt was the thing that made it run a little smaller. I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: The dress arrived on time and it fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: The two dresses arrived as expected. One was slightly messed up. It needed to be sewn in a few places. The other one was perfect. I received many compliments. Thanks for making me shine like a diamond!!

This dress was so fun/easy to wear! Was a little low cut in the front but still kept everything in place. The back cut out detail was another fun aspect. As a taller woman, one con is the length (especially because I ordered the "long" length. I had to wear heels under 3 inches in order to avoid the high water look. However, I would definitely rent again!

I absolutely loved this dress. The material was thick and stretchy and breathable all at the same time. Perfect for a cold winter day. I was worried I wouldn't be able to fill out the top, but it was cut in just the right way to flatter my smaller bust. I had the sz4 and sz6 and didn't feel much difference between the two sizes, so I wore the 4. The length was perfect for my height with 3" heels. I would highly recommend this dress!
Great dress but I didn't end up wearing to my event. Fit true to size and the color is amazing!

Wore this to a gala and it was perfect! I'm usually cold at this event every year, but the thick material kept me warm all night. It is a little revealing in the chest, but not enough to be uncomfortable or feel like you're going to pop out with any move. I wore a sticky bra and was able to wear spanx, even with the open back. My only complaint is that the seam had a small tear that got bigger with every move. I sewed it up and it was good for the rest of the night but noticed there was another one on the hip by the end of the night. The material is thick, but you could see where its had to be fixed here and there. Other than that - it's an amazing dress!
Loved this dress. I got so many compliments. I am small chested with wide hips and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel stunning
links_reviews_text: This wasn't initial dress I had ordered. UPS failed to deliver my order. I called RTR and there customer service was great even though they couldnt get my dress to me in time for my event. They told me to walk into the RTR store in NYC and they will help me find a dress not to worry. This is the first time I used RTR and i was a bit unhappy. I walked into the store and it was a bit busy. I waited to see someone at the counter to explain my situation and the girl was so understanding and helpful. She asked Andrew to help me look for a dress and they nailed it! I walked in overwhelmed and stressed out it was only 5 hours before the wedding and I left the store extreamly happy at ease and with a stunning dress. The website was disappointing but the store staff in Manhattan flagship store was amazing they provided inpecible customer service. The dress was perfect I received compliments all night.
Wore this to a wine tasting charity event. Definetely a standout dress. Loved the slit!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to the Grammys and felt AMAZING! I was literally upstaging the celebrities!
links_reviews_text: The dress runs true to size but if you're like me and are less than comfortable in a skin-tight dress this MIGHT not be the ideal dress for you. I threw on a pair of Spanx to tuck and smooth out my midsection and it worked out great!

links_reviews_title: Great color! Appropriate for formal event
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and would rent again! Like other reviews mention, the arms and belt are tight. I am 5'9 and normally wear a 4/6, but went with the 8L. It gave a little more room in the belt and 1-2 inches in length compared to the 6L, but either would have been fine

I love the color of this dress. Its so rich and gorgeous! The shape is really flattering and comfortable. The top half was a bit baggy on me as i am small chested, but it prevented the look from being as polished as it should have been.

This dress was stunning. Fabric was thick so great for a winter event. The neck line was low but still classy. No way you could wear a bra with this dress. The only down side for me was that the back was more open than I would have thought. But loved the color and the material. Very form fitting and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a winter occasion!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a showstopper! I wore it to my boyfriend's Air Force Ball. It was the perfect combination of sexy, yet classy. It was perfect for a cold, winter night. The sleeves definitely help keep me warm. Also, the sleeves were long! Which is usually surprising for my height. The length of the dress was perfect. I was able to wear flats and it skimmed the ground perfectly. I would definitely suggest this dress!!
See other post with picture of front of dress
Perfect for a gala
This dress is true to size, however, even the long size is a bit short. I loved this dress, its sexy, and elegant. I would totally recommend this dress for a fun black tie wedding.

links_reviews_title: This is an amazing dress and service! Felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful berry color, although it fit a little big. I normally wear a size 5, but had to go up in size as it didnt come in a 6R. Still fit beautifully, (I am not gifted in the breast department-which is where it was bigger). I loved it! It is a simple, yet elegant dress. It was missing a few rhinestones from the waist area, but at a distance-you coulnt notice. The dress does have a slight stretch to the material-which after 3 kids and age 45, I appteciated! Definite thumbs up, and would reccommend!

I have to say i think this is my favorite RTR rental to date! The color was perfect for my husbands work Christmas party. The open back and slit were what totally made the dress for me. I have to say though that I was so disappointed when i tried on the 0 regular. It wasnt fitted, the waist and sleeves hung off of me and there was no support in the bust either. Overall unflattering. Must have been super stretched out by other renters who probably should have sized up. The 0 long fit like a glove and i had enough support in the bust that no bra was necessary. Im only 5'4" but i wore 4" heels and the length ended up being perfect! Overall this was a stunner... loved it so much!!!

Color is rich berry pink. Nice material that doesn't wrinkle. Fit me comfortably (I have a small rib cage so the tight belt thing didn't bother me as it did other reviewers). Length worked well and I'm short (5'2). It's obviously low cut in the chest. Back is open so can't wear traditional bra

Channeled my inner Angelina Jolie in this dress for our company holiday party (the other girl is also wearing an RTR dress). So many people complimented me and I felt sexy but it was not too revealing for a work-related event. The sleeves were a little long on me but I just tucked them under and you couldn't tell at all. I was afraid the torso would be too long on me since no petites were available, but it was just fine as well! The fabric was a medium thickness and didn't show everything, but light enough that the dress wasn't heavy. I definitely made the right decision on this one!
I thought this dress was so fun, festive, sexy & shockingly comfortable. Plenty of stretch. Easy to dance in... no complaints here.

links_reviews_title: Simple yet elegant! The color of this dress is beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Rented this for the #dallasmillenialgala and received so many compliments! I wore a bra with an extender but you can totally go braless with this dress. I was worried that it would be too long but the length was perfect with my 3 1/4" heels.

links_reviews_title: It was my bridesmaid dress, arrived with more than enough time, no stress
links_reviews_text: Back is more uncovered than I'd expected but comfortable dress nonetheless. Wore it from 2:30pm-1am without a problem

links_reviews_title: I've never worn a plunging neckline before but wanted something stunning and warm.
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a size 4 but the sleeves were so tight I'm glad I ordered the size 6. The length was perfect with heels and kept me warm during a outdoor November wedding. It was beautiful!
The top of this dress fits tight around the rib cage. Definitely size up. The shirt flairs out nicely making it very comfortable to move and dance in.
Didn't appear as well constructed as I'm used to with RTR quality. Fabric was itchy and neck line bubbled not laying flat.

Wore this to brunch with my family and it is one of my favorite rentals yet! It's very light without being see through. Although low cut, it's roomy for busty gals. The flared skirt is flattering on larger hips too! I cannot say enough good things about this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my Tea Party Bridal Shower
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the theme of my bridal shower, I usually wear a 2 but I ended up having to go down to a 0 because the two was too large in the chest area. Overall all it looked great and I got lots of compliments on the dress.

The fit, material, and style were all solid, but at the same time nothing really stood out to be about the dress. True to size. Neutral dress for those days when you want to look good for pictures but don't need to stand out too much.

The pattern is very pretty and it looks better in person. The dress is great for summer. Is true to size. The only downside is that the shoulder straps despite being quite big don't stay in place and tend to fall off and material can feel itchy at the seams.

This was my backup dress sent by RTR and I ended up liking it more than my original choice, so I wore it! The dress was very cute and flirty. Of course I received compliments. I love the colors and pattern. The straps fit, but for some reason kept falling down. It would have been perfect if it had the little strings with snaps to secure it to my bra strap. Great save RTR since my original choice wasn't available in my size.
Beautiful dress. Took it down to four stars due to it being super tight across chest. I wore without a bra but no ideal.

This dress was perfect for my Disneyland bachelorette party! It fit the fun princessy theme very well. It did fit me slightly tighter than I expected it to but I do have bit larger of a rib cage and bust. Overall, it is a great dress!
Beautiful fabric and print. Would be great for a garden party. Fits snug.

Rented this for my high tea bridal shower and it fit the vibe perfectly. Perfect dress if you're going for a "white, but not" look. The fabric is flowy and interesting and the dress overall is ever-so-slightly sheer. I got lots of compliments! Taking off a star because it doesn't really seem like it's made for larger-chested women - the fabric was stretched pretty taut across my bust and the girls definitely felt a little squished. I don't think it was noticeable to anyone but me, but the tightness in that area kept the dress from being as comfortable as it could have been had it been cut just a touch more generously up there. Otherwise, it fit well.
This dress was just ok. It was a back up style from my original choice. Fit was a tad awkard as the "waist" really sat at my ribs.
Wore this as the bride for a bridal shower. Absolutely perfect! The details are even more beautiful in person.

I wore this to my spring bridal shower. The dress was perfect. You are able to wear a bra and it is not see through and the perfect modest length even for petite ladies. The only negative I have was that it ended up being 80 degrees that day so we spent most of the day outside and the dress isn't very breathable. One of the more expensive rentals I've done, but it was totally worth it when my future SIL saw me and teared up because I looked "so much like a bride" :)
I rented this for my tea party themed bridal shower and it was just perfect!
Fit was good, dress was comfortable, good rental

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress for my engagement party!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, a little on the poufy side, very pretty fabric, good length (not too short), not too sheer, can wear a normal bra, a little itchy near the arms but it didn't bother me too much. It's a beautiful, classy dress and I got lots of compliments!

This was a backup dress for my original order and I was a little skeptical a first. However, this dress fit almost perfectly and I received so many complements that day! I normally wear a size 4, but this dress ran a little big on me. I ended up wearing the size 2 with the waist being just a bit tight. You could tell this dress had been worn many times by other women bustier than me because the fabric of the collar was a little stretched out, but it wasn't anything a few pieces of fabric tape couldn't fix! Overall this dress was a pleasant surprise, a huge success, and fit really well!

links_reviews_title: So pretty... so tight at the waist!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Perfect for an outdoor party I attended on a hot and humid summer day. Size UP if you do not have an hourglass figure. The waist is tight and without stretch. I wore a size 4 in another Erin Erin Featherstone dress and in this style I could not breathe in the 4 once zipped! The 6 was slightly loose in the chest but I'm small chested and just wore a padded bra to fill it out. Good for fancier but not formal events. Pockets a nice bonus!q
I wore this dress at my bridal shower and received so many compliments. It a floral, summery dream. The look was perfect for my monograms and mimosas brunch shower and it fit true to size. Loved it!

Love the color and it was very light however size 4 was tight I was able to zip it up but it was hard to breath there was no stretch on the waist I should've gone size 6. I still recommend the dress perfect for spring or summer.

Wore this dress for my bridal shower and got tons of compliments. It was garden-themed and I couldn't have found a more perfect dress. Roomy enough in the chest and fitted at the waist, but the best part was I could wear a real bra! Loved this dress.

I rented this dress for Mother's Day brunch & for work. The dress was very tight in the chest so I wore a cardigan to coverup how tight it was. It was a beautiful dress but it didn't fit me comfortably. I had some issues with the zipper as well even while on the hanger.

I was very happy with the shape of the dress and the length. I'm short (5' 2") and it still hit right at/slightly above my knee so it didn't look too frumpy. It was a chilly weekend so I wore with a cardigan but the back V is beautiful. It seems low cut in the front to me, but I didn't feel it was too low. Depending on the occasion, that may be something to consider when renting.

I got this dress as a back up dress for a school brunch event and it was a little tight on the top half of my body (I'm a 38D) and the horizontal stripes made my already wide hips look wider. If it was slightly bigger on top, I would've totally worn it for another event with a jean jacket. Some reviews said it was itchy and it was tolerable in my opinion and the material didn't bother me too much.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but had some issues
links_reviews_text: The dress was adorable and I got comments on it all night! I did have a couple issues with it though. I wore the 0 and the top of the dress was still pretty large on me. I also disagree with those who said it's not sheer. I had to wear a second slip under the one on the dress (there's only one layer under the sheer overlay) and had to go buy a new bra because all of mine were showing through. Cute dress though with the right undergarments!i

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a nice dinner!
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was very flattering and provided curves, which I have little of. I think it would also work quite well on someone with curves as well. The fresh colors and hint of silver shimmer were just right. It was a great choice for dinner at an upscale restaurant. I would consider renting this again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Super fun without being over the top!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner bbq. The length was perfect and I paired it with a jean shirt to make it a little more casual. The top was a little scratchy and a little tight but after wearing it for a little bit it was fine. The other guests at the bbq wanted to know where I got such a beautiful dress. So overall it was a good choice.

Dress runs true to size (I'm between an 8 and a 10). 10 fit well in the bust with room to breathe, so I'm glad I went with that size. Tall girls note: dress is rather short-waisted. Otherwise, no complaints!

links_reviews_title: Skirt was a little longer and puffier than I prefer, but still cute
links_reviews_text: I wish I had gone with the 8, but the 10 fit OK. The skirt of the dress was a little longer and puffier than I prefer, but it was still cute.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for a shower, christening or other day-time event.
links_reviews_text: This dress looked nicer in person than it did in photos. It's a nice crisp white and it has a nice sheer overlay with watercolor looking flowers on the top layer. The check pattern also adds an interesting element. Nice, quality dress. Doesn't photograph great.
Fit true to size, a little snug in the chest.

Don't let my solemn face fool you- I felt like a princess in this springy style! This dress made me feel so girly and I loved the pattern on it. It reminded me of a Sunday Brunch or a an Easter dress due to the color pattern, and I would definitely keep this style in mind for future family events that are more conservative. Fit and flare is always my favorite dress style, and since the fabric on this dress was a little bit more stiff, it really held the shape of the skirt and made it that much more feminine. I would recommend sizing up if you are busty, since there is no stretch and you may have more cleavage showing. The hips are not fitted which is great for hourglass or pear shaped figures. Love this dress so much!

links_reviews_title: I wore it for a bridal shower at a flower shop. It was perfect for the bride. Classic dress!
links_reviews_text: Its a classic fit dress and very appropriate for showers, teas, brunches, and daytime parties. The dress itself runs a little small at the waist. I recommend that you order 1 size up. The fabric has two layers, the top is a window pane sheer with floral print and the bottom is white opaque. It cute how the two play off each other.

I rented this dress for a baptism and it was beautiful! It was the perfect length for a classy spring/summer event. It's nicely fitted at the waist and the pockets add so much to the dress! I also have to add the customer service at RTR was phenomenal. They overnighted this dress (along with another of my choosing) because the dress I requested was unavailable. Such an awesome service- I can't wait to rent again!

A super springy number that's perfect for a date/an outdoor event! I love the breathable fabric that kept me cool all day. The dress is fully lined, so although it's mainly white, it's not see-through at all! The waist is very fitted. If you have a wider ribcage, I recommend sizing up for this style.

links_reviews_title: True to other reviews this dress way too tight across my 34DD bust
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress but not flattering on my hourglass figure. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, was not really as great as photo
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this dress as it did not look like I expected.

I wore to my nephew's baptism. This dress was so pretty, but I'm a little disappointed with the fit. I can sway between a 0 or 2 depending on designer, but I'm mostly a 0. The 0 on this dress was very tight at the waist seam and caused the skirt to bunch out. Luckily I ordered the 2 as a backup, but then the straps were too long (typical with my 5'1" height). I was able to fashion tape the front and hold it in place, but you could still tell from the back the straps were too long. I know this stuff can happen with renting, but it rarely happens with the experiences I've had, so I was a bit disappointed. That said, it all worked out and I got so many compliments- the detail and color is gorgeous!
I just didn't really love this dress. It was more casual than what I was going for and I didn't find it very flattering or comfortable. The fit was ok but the material was scratchy. Did not wear.
Not flattering. Did not wear. Unfortunately not cute.
This fit nice and snug up top (you can adjust that with the wrap) but was flowy on the bottom half. I wore it to a casual rehearsal dinner in hot weather and it was perfect.
I wore this dress for a horse race! Super cute, and comfortable! I would definitely rent again!

Love this mint color wrap dress Got compliments from strangers Wore it everywhere out and about Fits true to size very flattering I wore a bandeau to have some modesty with the girls it's a little low cut for me Light weight perfect for summer So feminine and girly The sleeves are darling

links_reviews_title: On-trend, light green, floral wrap dress
links_reviews_text: The small was a perfect fit (I usually wear size small and size 2-4). It was a pretty, pale shade of green. The ruffle details were cute. Wore in LA and one more time when I got home before sending back. Forgot to take a full pic. Fit comfortably. You do not need a cami underneath. I guess the print did not blow me away so I probably won't rent again. There are just too many other fun options on RTR...
This dress fits true to size and is fitted at the natural waist. There is comfortable room for your hips, which is great.
This dress is even prettier in person, a really nice mint green color. It has cap sleeves and is just plunging enough without having to wear a cami or anything underneath. Fits true to size.
cute, sexy, and understated. loved it.
This dress fit nicely, it was an appropriate length, cute and fun. I wore it for a summer work event, got lots of compliments.
Fit tts, light weight, breezy. Perfect for a casual summer date!
I like the style of the dress, but definitely size down. Gaping chest area and overall large. Pattern is cute in person

links_reviews_title: Perfect for day to night. Wore several times. Loved it.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit
I wore this to a work dinner and got so many compliments! Super summery, cute and flattering. 10/10
Fits pretty much true to size but if you don't have an hourglass figure you might get away with a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: The fist delivery came late, 4 days late. That was unacceptable.
links_reviews_text: It was lined, easily wrinkled and super low cut.

The dress is adorable, my boyfriend thought it was cute. I dressed it down with white sneakers. I just dont think it is memorable or worthy of RTR kind of like an H&M or F21 dress. Definitely a easy comfortable dress though!
The dress looks super cute online, but the fabric wrinkled very easy. Not a flattering dress. The ruffles on the sleeve were too big.
Waist is adjustable. Cute. Was too big and long on me.
Fun, flowy, professional. Wore it for summer orientation for students.
This dress fit nicely in the waist but was a little too long for me.
I accidentally ordered an XL, it was way to big.

I got this dress as an everyday summer dress. It fit, and it was comfortable, but the top was really frumpy. The ruffles just fell toward the center rather that toward the shoulders as shown in the model's photo. I wore it, but returned it right away.

This dress has a nice print and fit well but he fluttery sleeve started in the middle of my chest and looked really odd. The color was also a little more green tinted than I thought from the photos. I didn't wear this
Beware that it is not a good dress to travel with, wrinkles very easily!

links_reviews_title: The dress was very comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: The large was not in stock so I went with the XL and it was a little big. However, you could make the work since it was a wrap.

I usually wear a 2 and the xs fit vey nicely. It was very pretty but did show a lot of cleavage on me even though it fit well on top. It was fine for a date, maybe not church? I will definitely wear it again before I return it.

links_reviews_title: larger busts... may not be for you
links_reviews_text: cute. short. fun and flirty. forgiving in the midsection. top of dress (around the shoulders) roomy. bust. (fully exposed)... I'm 36. 5'5. 180ish. 38D.

First of all, this is more green than it appears on my screen - it's very springy and feminine and lovely without being too floral or fussy or looking like an elderly person's sofa. This wasn't available in my preferred size (L) so I tried XL hoping it would work since wrap dresses can be so flexible. Unfortunately, I couldn't make the bust work; I'm small chested to begin with so stepping up a size was too much. That said, despite it being too big overall, it was also quite short and the fluttery part of the sleeves hung strangely - almost abrupt rather than flowy. I'm not sure there are many people for whom this will be a good fit.
Perfect for my pear shape!!! A bit short on me (I'm 6' tall)... but I made it work and loved it.

Cute Spring Dress! Received lots of compliments, sad I forgot to take a picture. The dress looks creme in the pictures but it's a pretty light green. I wore all day on Easter. Added a tank top underneath while wearing it at church. The Medium fit well but I probably could have worn the Large also and would have been comfortable.
The color is a standout! True to size. The back is low cut- I ended up not wearing a bra- it is a little loose in front. Some compliments - not as many as usual. Great dress for a day time wedding
Love this dress! Great fit and great color!

links_reviews_title: This stunning lace dress was beautiful in person and perfect for my social event.
links_reviews_text: I really loved this lace dress. It fit although was a little snug around the bust. I mainly wear size 4 but I would say I'm a size 4+. I'm too small for size 6 but I need a size 4 with a little forgiveness. This dress is very delicate so keep that in mind. Overall, I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful vivid royal blue dress. Very comfortable. Need to wear a breast only support .
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Just wear earrings and a bracelet. Wore pink-beige tone pumps.
Loved this dress for a wedding I went to. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fits right. Only if you have a big breast you might want to do 1 size up I am B cup and it was just right I usually wear size 6 and I rented a 6

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect and was comfortable!
Wore this to a cocktail party and received so many compliments! Beautiful blue color and lace is very flattering. Ended up wearing the 14 because of my chest size - 38DD.
Wore this dress for our local Chamber of Commerce banquet and it was a huge hit!
Nice dress, true to size and comfortable

I loved this dress, and I received so many compliments on it! The lace detail at the top and in the back is beautiful. I rented a 4 and a 6. I'm smaller on top than the hips and being a sheath dress, I had to wear the 6 to be comfortable in the hips even though it was just a tiny bit too big up top. Because it has the high neck it wasn't a problem at all.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit so nice in the stomach, kept me together in the right places. I loved the color too!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a wedding in September. I rented a size 6 and felt comfortable. Hugged me in just the right spots. I might have gotten a size up which would have been an 8 but it may have been just a little to big. I am 5'4" , weigh 130lbs. I loved it and would recommend if you are thinking of renting.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I got several compliments!
links_reviews_text: I was between the 4 and 6. I chose the 6 mostly because of mobility. The top was a bit loose, but not noticeable. Loved the dress! I wish I could've kept it! My only concern, which had nothing to do with the dress, was that the hangers were broken upon arrival. I'm not sure if it occurred during shipping or what. But, overall, a great experience!
Some of the lace was frayed on one of the dresses I received, but RTR sent a replacement overnight and it was stunning! The color is amazing & I got rave reviews all night.

Fit very well, loved the low back and the bright color. I received a lot of compliments on the dress. I chose to go braless since it showed a little but was tight enough to hold everything together. Came right to the knee, which was perfect for the Indian wedding I attended. Definitely recommend!

Absolutely loved this dress! Fit like a glove. I got the dress for the Autism Shines Gala, so the color was perfect! My blonde friend is also wearing a RTR dress! I got so many compliments on my dress! Will definitely rent from RTR again!
I loved the color, the style and the fit of this dress. It felt s little snug at times but overall it fit me perfect and i felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! The color is beautiful and it was very comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: My only complaint is that it showed just a little bit of wear. Otherwise I was very happy. Rental and return process was very easy and the dress arrived early. I wore this dress without a bra because the back of my strapless kept showing.

I ordered a 4 and 6 because I wasn't too sure, but the 4 was perfect! It slipped right on and hugged all the right curves. I got so many compliments at the wedding and was able to compliment my boyfriend who was the best man. I loved the small opening in the back, it gave it up enough appeal without being too conservative or too revealing. I wish I had this in my closet for all events honestly!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a relaxed outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: It was a little smaller than I was expecting, but fit me perfectly (I had ordered another dress in a 2, which ended up being far too big so it's possible I just don't know my own size). The blue is very beautiful and eye catching in person. I had purchased some Spanx for the occasion since it is kind of a clingy fit, but it didn't end up working out because the back bottom slit exposed it whenever I walked. However it didn't end up being necessary at all because the dress is flattering enough that it looked great without any shapewear. I would recommend.
Wore this to a wedding! Sooo many compliments! I coukd have worn the 2 but the 4 just gave a little extra breathing room!

links_reviews_title: Get the larger size if you are pear shaped.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2", 130, with a pear shape. The dress was definitely fitted and I probably would have been more comfortable in a 4, but the 2 fit like a glove. The lace is very worn on the edges of the sleeves and the bottom and the liner showed when I sat down. But, all in all the dress photographed well and worked out for the evening.

The color of this dress is amazing. So brilliantly blue! As with other lacy-type dresses I've rented from RTR, I found that some parts of the dress look a little more worn or frayed around the edges -- of course you have to look pretty close to see that, but just something worth mentioning. I did not wear a bra with this because of the low back. The waist/middle- section was fairly snug, and the fabric does not really have much give to it. For this reason, I would recommend sizing up just in case. I received quite a few compliments on the look. This dress made me feel very sophisticated and classy, yet still quite sexy with the low back.

I rented this for a Kentucky Derby Party but didn't find a hat I liked to wear with it. So, I wore it to church and brunch instead. I wore it with a black cardigan because of the open back. The color is gorgeous, it's a classy dress with a little sass! Fits true to size to a bit small, if you have a larger chest or broad shoulders. I'm 5'5" and it hit me right at the knees.
The rubbing detail and back detail in this dress are very nice.

Beautiful dress that I received many compliments on for a fall wedding! The dress was super comfortable and I was able to dance the night away! I absolutely loved the back. The lace is a bit shorter than the sheath underneath at the hem of the dress and can look strange if you are really paying attention. But overall, lovely dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was overall amazing! Super comfortable and fun to dance in. Highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'8" and 125 lbs. I wore the size 0, and it fit perfectly. It hugged my body in all the right spots. The only issue was the lining underneath seemed too long in the front, but that could be fixed if it was resewn. As mentioned in other reviews, the clasps were fixed and they were not loose at all. I had no problems with them. I noticed in other reviews there were comments about wear and tear on the dress and that it looked worn at the armpits, however the dress I wore looked brand new.

links_reviews_title: Easy to rent and love the dress selections
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a holiday party and received many compliments! Loved the fit of the dress. It's conservative yet sexy with an open back. It's pretty true to size & color is amazing. My arms are short so needed help to buckle the top in the back. Also had to wear an adhesive backless bra (something like a nubra but got a no brand somewhere for cheaper). My regular strapless bras still wasnt low enough for this dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I got so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly and I felt pretty the whole time wearing it!

The dress was a beautiful color and I loved the lace but that was about the only good thing about it. The dress was large on me and I had a size 2. The top half was meant more for a bustier women not for a small chested women so I was very uncomfortable in it the whole time I wore it.

links_reviews_title: Wedding for a friend of my husband.
links_reviews_text: I read so many reviews of ladies receiving compliments on many RTR dresses. Same held true for this, being my first. Wore my backup size because it fit tight in the tummy (3 kids later, but I haven't had that issue with other dresses). The quality wasn't as great as I was hoping for. There were snags and the color was fading in some areas, but wasn't noticeable to others- just me. Great dress, color, style with minor hiccups.

I wore the size 4, it was comfortable enough to go braless in without worrying about not having the support (I am a 32B). It was an outdoor wedding with an indoor reception on a pretty warm day. Comfortable yes but if it's summer the dress would get a little warm I would say perfect for indoor weddings or early fall. Lace on top you could tell had wear to it but overall beautiful dress
Great dress, very pretty! This particular dress was falling apart a little bit. But I called RtR and they gave me a partial refund, no questions asked. Such great customer service, as always!!

I absolutely loved this dress! The fit was perfect and it looked exactly like I expected it to. I got a 2 and 4, and I wore the 2 (which is my normal size). It's worth noting that the 4 was actually a different shade - more of a dark periwinkle as opposed to a true royal blue - but they were both gorgeous. I only noticed when they were side by side. It did feel a little worn, but because of the lace overlay, any fraying wasn't noticeable because the pattern is very busy anyway. But it was super comfortable and not tight in any spots, it fit wonderfully (and I truly mean that, I won't wear anything if it's the slightest bit too tight or uncomfortable).

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my sister-in-laws wedding and received several complements.
links_reviews_text: My orignal size (2) was slightly snug in waste but the backup fit great. Slightly longer than what I wanted but over all loved the color and fit. I was actually glad the back up fit better because the 2 was very faded and worn looking.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove, like it was made for me. I would have loved to keep it!!
links_reviews_text: Was still able to move, dance and even sit!! What a great thing. I rented sizes 2 & 4 and wore size 2.

links_reviews_title: Had a beautiful summer wedding in a barn.
links_reviews_text: Overall beautiful dress! The fit was perfect for 4, I felt very slim but not to the point where I felt like I had to suck it in my stomach. The cut underneath the lace would sometimes create a crease in front (see the pics) but nothing too distracting.

This dress stole my heart. The color was so pretty! I did notice that the color on my backup size was kind of faded and not as nice--the lace overlay on the one I wore was gorgeous, though. It was comfortable throughout, and I could easily move my shoulders and arms for dancing. I was sad to send this one back.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous open back dress, received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color, loved this dress. Very comfy and stretchy. Can't wear a bra because of the open back but the top is tight enough that it's no worry.

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress for this formal wedding
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and was extremely comfortable. I loved the color and the open back

links_reviews_title: Nice twist on simple red dress
links_reviews_text: It fit nicely but I think it would have been more flattering in the smaller size. Nice thick material. Wore something else instead.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! Great color and super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Dress fits true to size. Form fitting but pulls you in. Not too short and super flattering!

One of my fav's by Amanda Uprichard! It runs true to size, with a stretchy fabric. I would recommend sizing up for backup. It's a fitted style, but has comfortable room throughout the midsection and for fuller hips. It's great for any cup size, and can be worn with any standard bra. The perfect style for a night out!

The color / material are rich and very complimentary. The size does run a bit big. I usually wear a 0-2 and wore an XS here. The neck line is low and the straps are long (forcing you to wear it low unless you pin up the straps).

Rented this for a Valentine's Day date and I received many compliments, not just from my date. Interesting strap details. Very sexy and low cut for my height. If I owned it I would probably have the straps shortened just a tad.
fits perfect

links_reviews_title: I was worried that it'd be too revealing since I'm small but have thick thighs, but mom loved it!
links_reviews_text: Loved it! I looked like a different person with the dress, hair, and makeup. Definitely a stand out color and stand out dress. Nice fit, movie star feeling.

links_reviews_title: So flattering for curves. only tight dress I've felt sexy in.
links_reviews_text: I'm very self conscious about my mid section but gave this a go for a holiday party. LOVED IT! Fabric was thick and forgiving. Material is more casual and I was easy to dress it down with flats (but I think it could easily be dressed up for more formal affairs). I wore no underwear or bra and was comfortable - straps were weird with a bra.
Rented for my Christmas party but didn't wear it because it ran so big... def size down

The first dress I ordered was too small, & the customer service agent I discussed this with was fantastic in helping me to select an available replacement. I felt beautiful and just the right amount of sexy for my boyfriend's company Christmas party in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great classic but sexy dress, however I was unable to wear because the straps were too long.
links_reviews_text: The straps are long so if your bust is perky this may not be a good fit.
This dress can only be described as sex kitten on a stick!
Wore it to a daytime work Christmas party.
The dress fit true to size and is absolutely gorgeous in person. It was comfortable to wear and the pockets were an added bonus. #nye

I usually wear anything between a 2-6, depending on the brand and the piece. The 2 would've worked but having a shorter torso and a little more jelly on my lower abdomen, it made me look a lot chunkier because of where the waist hit, even though it was just as comfortable. I would have been tugging on the waistline all night and it made my butt look bombastic from behind! Overall, it was super cute and comfy, fancy enough for my work auction even when I switched to flats, and POCKETS! I carried my phone around and it didn't pull anything down. I wore a strapless bra because even though there are strap holders in the sleeves, it didn't keep regular bra straps from showing in the back, and that was my only issue with this dress!

I ordered the 6 and the 8 since I am usually between these two sizes (5'9'', 140 pounds). The 8 was loose and the 6 fit well, except it was a bit short in the waist. I am definitely long in the torso though, and this was just a slight problem. I wore the 6, it had pockets, I could wear my regular bra. The fabric was nice; shiny but not too shiny. Worn to a formal awards banquet. Would recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and perfect length for petites!
links_reviews_text: Runs tts. Prettier in person than in pics
I really liked this dress. It was very comfortable to wear and I loved the shiny material. The pockets were also nice and allowed me to avoid carrying a purse.

links_reviews_title: Perfect sparkly dress for my work holiday party! Has pockets too which was great.
links_reviews_text: Has stretch in the bust area and you don't need any special bras for this. The middle is black in the back and a different material which I didn't know but doesn't show up on pictures.

links_reviews_title: Everyone commented on how sparkly I was.
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure if the dress was going to fit. I waited too long to finalize the order. I rented the 8. I don't really know what size I am any longer, as I have lost between 65-70 lbs over the past 18 months. I am sort, so the dress was just barely above the knee, and it was appropriate for a work event. If this came in purple, I would buy it in an instant. Also...IT HAS POCKETS and didn't look goofy with lipstick in one pocket and my phone in the other.

Such a great dress. Starting with the beautiful blue-jewel tone. the shimmer to it isn't sequins, so no worries it's not flashy at all, just classy. the top was nice and fitted... the back is an elastic material, so you didn't feel like you were in a straight-jacket. the shoulder straps have little loops to hold your bra straps in, so I could just wear my normal favorite bra. the stitching around the waistline gave a little... so again... didn't feel like a straight jacket. and the bottom flared out to cover my mom belly. was a little shorter than I usually go with, but I still felt very covered and it didn't look like i was trying too hard (I'm 5'7"). Material isn't scratchy at all. Can't say enough great things. i'm usually a solid size 8, and the 6 fit great.... probably could've made a 4 work as well, but that's because my weight/size is in my hips... not my bust. would absolutely rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: Great rental especially for the price! Festive but not over the top, and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Chose this dress for an early-fall, semi-formal wedding. It was a great choice and I really enjoyed wearing it. The metallic blue is an elegant shade, and the sparkle is fairly understated, ensuring that the dress is elegant - the sparkle also dresses up a style that could be casual in a different fabric (I also styled with gold heels and bigger jewelry to ensure it would be dressy enough). Dress is super comfortable and has pockets. It does run a bit big - I am normally a 0 or 2 and 2 was way too big. 0 mostly worked, but the bodice could have been a little more fitted, especially on my smaller 32B bust. Also, no need for a strapless bra, so that's a win. Would happily wear again.
Size 0 felt too tight, Size 2 fit perfectly. Very cute dress! However, I did not end up wearing as I wanted something less form fitting for a work party.

links_reviews_title: Perfect cocktail dress for Vegas that was so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This dress is one of my favorite RTR dresses I've ever worn! It was insanely comfortable, a great length, and allowed me to wear a normal bra. The "sparkly" sheen to it wasn't too much either so don't worry about that. The black panels were stretchy too so that allowed for some flexibility. I definitely recommend this dress for anyone! And the price point is awesome too!

Loved really everything about this dress. It was a very pretty navy that looked great with gold wedges and a gold clutch. I go back and forth between a 2 and a 4. I wore the 4, but if I would have had the 2 (I have unlimited so no extra size) I would have gone with the 2. The 4 still looked fine though! It was super comfortable all evening and I didn't have to worry about a thing,...including my bra straps because the were securely fastened to the dress. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. Should really fit any body shape! PS- it has pockets :)

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and fun dress perfect for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved wearing this dress. I've been between a size 6-8 and the 6 fit perfectly with a little room to spare, making it extremely comfortable and flattering to wear. It also has pockets which were wonderful! All in all I would highly recommend this dress. I ended up adding a cardigan only because the night of the wedding but was 50 degrees in May!
Rented the dress for a work holiday party. It was really pretty and I even considered keeping it except I don't have many occasions to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an evening event
links_reviews_text: First, this was a backup dress. It ended up being a perfect fit for my event. It was very comfortable and fit in all the right places. I thought it looked better with a belt so I decided to wear one with it. I absolutely LOVE pockets in dresses and this one held everything I needed for the evening. The color was perfect and I loved the shine. On that same note, DO NOT FORGET TO EMPTY THE POCKETS BEFORE SENDING IT BACK. I almost left my driver's license and debit card in it. Yikes.
The dress was extremely comfortable and flattering.

I loved the sparkly blue color - perfect for a patriotic event! I wore the dress from 5pm - 1am and it could not have been more comfortable. You can wear a normal bra and it has pockets!!! It does run large - appreciated that other reviews said to order down a size.

I absolutely loved this dress. I got a size 6 and size 8, and wore the 6. It fit like a glove! I wore it to my work's holiday party and 10/10 would recommend and rent again. Also POCKETS! The shimmer adds a bit of pop to the dress, and the back has a stretchy black material. The length is also perfect.

links_reviews_title: Love love love this dress! Would def rent it again. So sparkly and fun. Perfect for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: One word: pockets!!
I wore this dress for NYE. I was a little nervous to wear a short length dress. I was pleasantly surprised by how flattering it was!

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy dress for my holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 8, sometimes a 10, but I ordered both the 8 and the 6 because some reviews said this dress ran big. I fit into both the 8 and the 6 (and I haven't fit into a 6 in years!) but decided to go with the 8 since it was roomier and they looked the same. It was a super cute and comfy dress, perfect for my company holiday party! Would totally love to own it!

I wore this to a winter ball and it was absolutely gorgeous! It fits true to size and there are pockets, which I found convenient because I was able to stash my phone and lipstick in (and therefore did not have to worry about keeping track of a purse!). I got so many compliments and felt absolutely gorgeous.

I wore this dress to a gala. It was perfect & I received a lot of compliments. The size 0 fit well, but the arm holes felt a little restricting, so I wore the 2 which was a little big in the chest and waist, but more comfortable.

Loved this dress! I wore it to an outdoor evening wedding, and received so many compliments on it. It was super comfortable, and had snaps to keep your bra straps hidden as well as pockets, which I haven never had in a dress. Wore the size 2 and it was just right - not too loose or too fitted. Wanted to wear neutral shoes originally, but the black ended up working better. There was a black panel on the back above the waist seam, and with the undertones and shimmer of the dress it just seemed to work better with black. Would DEFINITELY recommend as well as rent again!
Loved this dress. Comfortable, flattering and sparkles. Tons of compliments. I wish I had another occasion to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! The amount of shimmer was perfect! Works for day or night events.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable! Runs small, I normally wear a 4 but the 2 fit me better. I'm 5'4", 125lbs, 32B. The bra strap clips are amazing and I can't believe more dresses don't have them. This dress was a 10/10 for me!

links_reviews_title: Could not have been more pleased with the dress (and its pockets)!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit really well and was very flattering. I appreciated the clasps in the straps to hide bra straps! The color was great and the sparkle really gave it something extra cute.
Fit really well. Lots of compliments. Dress falls right above the knee for someone who's very short (5') which was perfect!

This dress was sooo comfortable! I wore it for a gala that I'm in charge of putting on, which means a solid 10 hours or so of running around, and never felt uncomfortable at all. The back is stretchy, which made a huge difference. Plus - pockets! I got tons of compliments on the dress as well. I would say this dress runs pretty true to size, maybe a tad on the larger side.
Super cute blue dress and it even has pockets! It has a little bit of a shimmer and was super flattering. My husband kept telling me how much he wanted me to keep it permanently lol.
