I loved the way it fit and the elegance and statement the dress made . It's one of the only dresses that fit me that I rented . The tank part was altered for the night but other then that the dress was perfect
I rented this dress for a fornal work event. I tried both the 4 and 6 and the 6 seemed significantly bigger than the 4.... The pockets were a great touch and the dress wear piece for the event!!

I rented this dress for a bechelorette dinner in Las Vegas. It was very comfortable. It had a classy shimmer to it, which is what I wanted for the evening. It had pockets which was fun. The chest area seems to accentuate the size, so I felt bigger than usual. This might be good for someone looking to add some volume. I didn't need added volume, but the dress still looked cute. I did have to wear a shaper underneath to prevent the skirt portion from puffing out too much. I had a baby 4 months ago, so I have some extra fluff there right now. Overall it was a nice dress for a fancy dinner out in Vegas.

This dress fit like a glove! It was extremely flattering in all of the right places. I probably could have gone without a bra, but wanted to give the girls a little boost. The shimmer was understated, which made it even better. I felt secure in the chest but the waist was not too tight where I felt restricted eating or drinking. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Comfy and cute for our "Blue Party"
links_reviews_text: Fit was good & I loved the length. The shine on this dress is so pretty in person!

I loved this dress! I rented it for a work awards banquet and it was perfect. I tried the 4 and the 6 and went with the 4 because the cheat was baggy with the 6 (it actually was with the 4 too but not as bad). The 4 was a bit shorter than I'm used to but because the skirt is rather poofy I didn't mind the shortness. I am not crazy about the black back panel but the blue sparkly material is so, so pretty. And it has pockets! This is such a fun party dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel so comfortable. Was not skin tight and had a flowy feel which was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This was my favorite dress worn, to date. This dress had pockets which made it easy to carry my essentials without being detected. Event he shoulder straps had little hooks on them to hold the bra straps off to the side.
I am very short but also curvy so it can be difficult to find dresses that flatters my figure and fits well. I absolutely loved this dress and got a ton of compliments. I have no complaints!

links_reviews_title: A group of girls complimented me on how well it fit as soon as I walked in!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4 and the 6, but the 4 fit perfectly! I love the material, and it was very comfortable for the 10 hours I wore it. Plus, there are pockets!! My favorite part is that it was flattering but not revealing. I hate super low necklines or high cut dresses, but this was essentially the Goldilocks dress.
I'm usually a size 6/small or medium, and definitely needed the size large at 7 months. I added a ribbon belt to help define the waist. This was perfect, I got a lot of compliments!

I rented this and one other black dress for a formal affair and couldn't have been happier with this one! The sleeves are so charming and flattering. I am 26 weeks pregnant 5'4 and 140 lbs. I do think if I was much further along this wouldn't have fit me as well. No zipper in back so you'll pull this on with slip underneath. Very comfortable!

I rented this in an Xs (my normal maternity size) and couldnt even get it on. Exchanged it for a medium which was snug in some places but baggy in others. The fabric was too stiff for my taste. On a positive note, The tulip sleeves are really pretty. Would not rent again.

I am 5'10", normally size 10 and 33 weeks pregnant. I could not even get this dress over the top of my bump let alone slide it down over my hips. I have also not gained an obscene amount of weight (currently at +32 lbs) so I will chalk it up to this dress just not being cut at all for the 3rd trimester. I would have been able to wear it comfortably probably up to 24 weeks or 26 at best without my bump being encased like a sausage. Disappointing, bc it is very cute!
Was comfortable but still felt put together

I was hoping this would be a good dress for holiday parties. I'm 29 weeks, but my bump is still fairly small. The dress fit everywhere except around the belly where it was really baggy. Returning unworn.

links_reviews_title: A little tight for third trimester
links_reviews_text: I tried this for a wedding I have in a month and it was already a little tight at 27 weeks pregnant. I also didn't like the tulip sleeves. The fabric just sits atop your arms and doesn't connect under your arm.

links_reviews_title: This is NOT a maternity dress!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to XS sizing around arms, chest, length. However, at 30 weeks pregnant, I could barely squeeze this over my belly. There was no stretch in it either. When I would sit down it rode way up. I had no back up dress, so I wore it anyway, but it was very tight, and I haven't gained much pregnancy weight.

links_reviews_title: This fit fine, but I wound up not wearing it because it was too loose in the top
links_reviews_text: I also didn't realize the sleeves weren't really sleeves. They're sort of flaps that cover the top of your arms but don't connect underneath. Wasn't wild about the look, so I went with a different option.
This is a great dress to go over the bump! The material stretches and just goes right over. I received many compliments on this. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Classic look, comfortable at 7 months pregnant. True to size.
links_reviews_text: Classic look, comfortable at 7 months pregnant. True to size.

links_reviews_title: very comfy and suitable for the occasion
links_reviews_text: It's great!

links_reviews_title: It was ok, good for a conservative event
links_reviews_text: This dress fit well (I sized up from a M to XL based on other reviewers' feedback). Overall it was just OK. It was pretty conservative with the color, lace, length of sleeves, and length of them hem. I might have worn to an evening wedding or other more formal event but it didn't work for the nice dinner party I was attending so did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: I rented this to wear to work.
links_reviews_text: The dress is really pretty, but there's no stretch in it - I found the arms to be a little too small for comfort.
The dress is very flattening and covers are the maternity curves, plus it was very comfortable
Cute dress, form fitted, and non-forgiving. Wore my spanx with this dress. Got some compliments.

This dress runs REALLY small. I couldn't get the L or the XL over my chest, much less my belly. I am usually a size L in maternity. The lace is really pretty, and the sleeves are different enough to make the dress interesting, but it wasn't even close to fitting. I'm 31 weeks pregnant now. I think it might not have fit me NOT pregnant, that's how narrow it was!

links_reviews_title: Runs a little small in my opinion
links_reviews_text: I'm currently ~32 weeks with twins and definitely have a bump that's more like a full term pregnancy at this point, however I sized up from a small which is my usual maternity size to a medium. It was a fight to get it over my belly and just wasn't flattering once on because it was so tight. The dress isn't meant to be tight so I thought sizing up to a medium would more than compensate but it still didn't work. It fit well in the chest, arms and shoulders so I feel like a large may look too baggy up top on me. If you're second trimester and not carrying twins this probably will work for you in your regular size, but be mindful that you may need to size up if you're later in pregnancy and have multiples!
This dress is just like all of the reviews said! Fit true to size, and was super flattering. I am larger chested and still needed to wear a bra with it.

I sized up based on reviews but should have stuck with my usual size. It ended up being a little loose, but otherwise great! I am 5'2" and this came about an inch below my knees, so I recommend heels for sure! Extremely comfortable dress that held up well for dancing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: A little loose in some parts but also helpful with spanx to smooth it out. Could size down with spanx.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding in San Francisco!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Fit true to size, and the length was surprisingly great (I am 5'10"). Form fitting but not tacky looking, and I was able to comfortably wear a strapless bra as well. The sleeves are a tad tight, but not uncomfortable to the point of being distracting. Would buy this dress in multiple colors as a wardrobe staple, if possible!
I loved this dress! I wore it for an event for work and it was perfect. It fit well and was so flattering. I love the blue! Fit true to size and was comfortable to move around in all night.
Fit very well and got many compliments, could have been tighter in the torso

Danced the night away at a beautiful evening Spring wedding! I felt confident all night!!! No bra needed and I wore spanx to smooth everything out. Stunning color, true to size, and sexy but still acceptable for a wedding guest. I love this dress and would absolutely rent it again. Great for curvy gals!

links_reviews_title: Great wedding with dancing all night long ... and the blue of this dress really was a hit!
links_reviews_text: Well made and fit well but the top gapped when I moved my arms so have double sided tape ready and you will be fine. I got a ton of compliments all night long!!

I rented this dress for a formal fundraiser. I generally wear a 6 or 8, depending on the dress. I worse the 6 and probably could have even rented a 4, although the shoulders might have been a bit tight. It was very comfortable and felt beautiful. There is no lining in the dress and the fabric is a bit thin and stretchy, so you might want to plan on spanx.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress and felt beautiful all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits great, is well made, and super flattering. You won't be able to lift your arms very high, which isn't a problem unless you're trying to get down on the dance floor. The length was a bit longer than I'm used to but looked classy as hell. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: Fit was great and accurate to size. The material is very stretchy, so extremely bump-friendly (I was 22 weeks pregnant when worn) - I went a size up from usual to play it safe, however an 8 probably would have been just fine, too. Length was great as well and perfect for fellow tall people (iâ€™m 6â€™0).

This dress is a pretty color and a really cute style, but not very flattering. The dress bunched up a lot at the waist. Not super comfortable if you wanted to dance etc. Was fine for a rehearsal dinner but not my favorite.
I love a good royal blue dress and this one takes the cake. Obsessed with it and received so many compliments. It's rather comfortable to wear too.

The dress was a great length and very comfortable. It was a little loose in the abdomen area so it may run a little big. Lots of compliments and a great color! I rented long gold earrings to pair with it and dress it up.

links_reviews_title: Dress was amazing color and fit
links_reviews_text: Not super fitted, comfortable. Sleeves stay put which was really nice and the color is on point!

I loved this dress so much I rented it twice! The color of the dress is beautiful, I got so many compliments, & really looked great with my dark hair. It hugs your body but is still comfortable. I like the off-the-shoulder look and the bell sleeves, a nice change from the usual dress. I paired this with nude open-toed heels, Kendra Scott earrings and a dainty necklace.

links_reviews_title: A color and style that stands out
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for a work-awards night dinner and received a million compliments. Perfect fit, true to size. Great neckline and the sleeve length is perfect. Wore with a strappy nude shoe and gold earrings and a accent purse. In a sea of black dresses, the color really pops!

I really loved the dress. The 2 was wayyyy too right and looked like a stuffed sausage. The 4 fit like a dream. Very comfortable. The color was vibrant. I received lots of compliments. I had to pull down the liner a few times to prevent the rubber strip on neckline from showing- but with a neckline like this, it was expected. I would rent again!
Could dance all night! Comfortable and fun!
The dress fit great! I will say my particular dress may be ready to retire soon as it is beginning to look a tad bit worn. Overall I loved it!

The dress fit really well and the color was beautiful. I do have 2 complaints. The fit on the arms was very tight and the inside liner constantly was riding up, especially when I was dancing. Overall I was very happy with the dress.

Loved this dress! Fits true to size. The sleeves were a fun flair and I had no issues with the off shoulder staying in place. It is a thick, stretchy material with a lining. I did notice a few wrinkles in the liner that I had to adjust after dancing (you can see a slight wrinkle right at my waist in this picture) but for the most part it held up quite well.

I normally wear size 6 but from reading they reviews I also received a size 8 in case the dress was too tight. I ended up wearing the size 6. It is form fitting but the dress does not show bra/panty lines. It was comfortable and the color is beautiful. I had several compliments!
I was nervous it would be too tight but a 4 was the only size available so I didn't get a backup size. Luckily it fit perfectly! Super comfortable and the color really popped.
Great dress! Very comfortable. Iâ€™m 5â€™8â€ about 170lbs.. wore size 12

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for my wedding rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: The color is beautiful. The fit is very flattering. I'm normally an 8 in RTR but the 10 fit great. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Loved the color. I got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great Dress! I usually wear a 10. I wore the 12 because I was more comfortable with a looser fit in the front and for the junk in the trunk! I have a wedding next year and may just order it again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress so much I wanted to keep it
links_reviews_text: This was actually my backup choice and I'm so glad I picked this second style. The color was gorgeous and it fit like a glove. Would definitely recommend getting this dress.

links_reviews_title: Many compliments. The color is brilliant!
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove

I loved this dress! It was the perfect amount of formal and fun. I felt very comfortable in it as it had a slight stretch to it. The top part was the only part a little loose. I did not find the sleeves to be that tight since it has to stay in place.

Got so many compliments on this dress. The color was perfect and the fit was great. I couldâ€™ve sized down to a 12 but I didnâ€™t want anything super tight. It was secure on my arms and I didnâ€™t have to keep pulling it up. I wish I owned it!!!

I really liked this dress, especially the color and fit. The top felt stretched out so the necklace felt a little baggy but luckily I filled out the chest area. It's hard to lift your arms in this dress but I didn't really have trouble moving or dancing

Great dress for fall wedding, perfect color and love the off the shoulder and sleeves look. Dress is fitted so size up for back up, I ended up wearing the bigger size and felt great in the dress and got lots of compliments!

This dress fit like a GLOVE. It was just a hair too large around the collar but I think I forgot to hook the dress so that may have been the cause. I haven't felt so elegant in such a long time, I was completely in love! I got a ton of compliments and honestly I'm starting to save up so I can buy it for real!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Color is beautiful and fit was great!
links_reviews_text: Material has some stretch so it was comfortable and flattering!
Fit perfect and stayed in place. Photos very nicely and very comfortable.

The color was perfect for a summer wedding . The material is thick and forgiving. Length was perfect. Only thing was I shouldâ€™ve rented size 4 so it was a little loose. Lots of compliments all night long :)

Color is great, the material has some stretch so super comfortable for a fitted off the shoulder dress. It stays up remarkably well too. I'm just shy of 5'7", around 127 pounds with a B cup. I needed to wear a padded bra to really fill the size 4 but it worked out perfectly. I wore this to an evening wedding and it was just right.

This dress was perfect! It gave my curves so much detail! I loved the ruffled sleeves. I got so many compliments. It's not easy to dress for a thick woman like myself but I felt very confident with this dress. Thanks RTR!!
Ran true to size, it was flattering and comfortable. The arms are snug but not uncomfortable. The fabric is thicker so it is flattering!
Basic but gorgeous! The cut is flattering and slots made it easy to move.

I loved the fabric and fit of this dress! The dress is long enough to wear high heels with, but it won't trail the floor. But definitely needed heels for this size. I was also able to wear a strapless bra with it! Very comfortable, and no shapewear needed due to the thickness of the knit fabric.

I ended up not going with this dress though it was my "primary" choice for my event. I could not even zip up the 4R and the 6R was quite tight for me. You can see I am spilling out of the skirt a little. Overall, it was just too uncomfortable to wear all night long, which is why I decided against wearing it. I suggest sizing up from what you think you should order as your backup at least. The material is very thick and I had concerns about dancing all night (and sweating profusely) as well. Length was good though - I have on 2.5" heels in the photos.

Very snug! Was afraid I would not get the zip up. Had to take off my bra, lie on the bed and have my friend zip me up. Once it was on, it looked great. The fabric is quite thick which is a plus as it holds you in.
Loved this dress. The fabric was thicker which was helpful for a fall wedding semi-outdoors. My only struggle was it was too long, even with heels. I'm 5'0-5'1.
This is a cute dress with nice subtle cutouts. Works well for a formal wedding. Runs very small, I barely fit into my normal size. Size up if you want to be able to dance/eat comfortably
Fit is tight but the slits near the bottom make it easy to move around (especially on the dance floor!).

I rented this for a formal event the orchestra was putting on. I was worried being a pear-shaped woman that this wouldn't be flattering, but it fit like a glove (be it a very, very tight glove). It was a backup option for my original dress selections, and I was *this* close to wearing it, but I chose another backup option that was a bit lighter of fabric and more flowy. I didn't want to give this back though! I felt so sexy in it and it perfectly accentuated my curves! If I had the money, I'd buy it so I could have it forever. Pear-shaped babes, jump on this! Note though: the chest is very small, which worked for my body shape but probably wouldn't be good for women with larger than a B cup unless they wanted to size up.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful in this dress and received several compliments.
links_reviews_text: I ordered an 8L and 10L. It runs smaller so I wore the 10. It is a slim fit and the pro is it held everything in. I have a smaller chest so I would consider a bigger size if bigger chested. It is breathable and light weight and fun to wear!

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated and fun. Great for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a bridesmaid dress. It was comfortable, easy to dance in, and flattering. I was a little nervous about the cut outs but I received compliments all night! I did not wear a bra with it as the fit was snug enough to not need one. The material is thicker which can feel a little hot at first, but the slits up the side help with that. I loved the detail straps on the back.
This dress was a 5-star fit!! Comfortable and sexy. It was PERFECT for the formal wedding I attended. Sexy and tasteful.
Loved this dress. Hugged in all the right places and was a very flattering material.
Loved the fit. Got tons of compliments. Fit true to size!

I loved this dress! I was looking for a dress with conservative cutouts that was form fitting for a winter gala and this dress was all of that and more! I typically go between a 4 and 6 in gowns. Based on the reviews about the dress leaning tight, I went with the 6R (as the 4 was unavailable) and it fit perfectly! I never found the dress to be too tight, even after eating and drinking. I found the cutouts very flattering and that, combined with the high slit, very sexy. The dress was comfortable and I could dance throughout the night! Additional bonus- the cutouts were low enough on my build that I could wear a strapless bra. The dress is constructed well enough that you don't need to wear Spanx, but I did just for the seamless lines. I'm 5'3 and wore 3 inch heels and the dress grazed the ground. I would rent this dress again in a heart beat!

I had the appropriate jaw-to-floor response when my boyfriend picked me up for the evening. This dress is classy and sophisticated while the side slots give a sexy appeal. I normally wear a 6, and rented a 6R and 10R because there weren't any 8s left. I ultimately decided on the 10R because it gave me enough room through the back. I'm a crossfit coach, so I have a wide upper back and chest. The length was a perfect fit for my 5'3" height while wearing 4" heels. I was able to dance and move around comfortably all night.

This dress was perfection - fit like a glove, perfect length, and I liked the material (thick enough to hide any bloat but not too thick). I received so many compliments. It will be hard not to rent again (can't justify that when this site has so many other options! ). :-)

I wore this dress to a black tie ball in DC in January. The fit was excellent. I am 5'5 and slender and this was nice and snug on me, but not uncomfortable at all. I wore a sticky bra, but you could probably wear a strapless bra if it is low enough in the back. The fabric is thick and the dress feels well made. I wore 3.5 inch silver heels and the height was perfect, didn't drag at all. I would rent this again in other colors for sure!
I'm 5'8" and wore with 3" heels and it was perfect. The fit is true to size.

links_reviews_title: So comfy and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was PERFECT for a wedding in Nashville where the temps reached between 40-50 degrees. It hugged all the right areas and the color looked beautiful. Similar to other reviews though, it's a tad snug on the stomach area.

I wore this to a work holiday party and it was amazing! The fabric is so comfortable, the fit was perfect and so flattering! I usually am a 4 or 6 and I went with the 6L. I am 5'8" and I wore flat shoes, I probably could of worn a regular length but I didn't feel like it was too long. Absolutely loved this dress and would definitely rent again!!
Fit perfectly. I'm 6'0" and I definitely recommend for taller ladies to get the long. I received many compliments. Perfect for the Marine Core Ball, which the attire has to be modest & appropriate.

I loved this dress! The material was pretty thick, so it covered any undergarment lines or cellulite ;) I rated this true to size, however I'd say the middle waist ran a bit small and the length was a bit long. I'm 5'2", 110lbs, 34A and the 2R was too tight to zip all the way up the back. The 4R fit perfectly on top, but was longer than I would've liked even with 3inch heels on. I wish I would've gotten the 4S for comparison!

This dress was sent as a last minute replacement because my original dress was too large- so my main concern was that it fit. For some context, I am 5'2", 120 pounds with a booty. It was for a black tie wedding. I had scrolled past this dress on RTR a few times because it seemed so simple. But the second I put it on, I felt as if it fit me so perfectly, it actually made me look and feel 10 pounds lighter! I was amazed! The material is thick with some stretch. I wore 3.5" heels and it just touched the floor. I wore a 4R. I danced all night long without a hitch. I would definitely wear this dress again. As an FYI- I tried it with spanx but ended up not needing them- but it was just as comfy and you couldn't tell i had spanx on underneath (if anyone is curious). I received compliments all evening long. Rent this dress- you will not regret it!

Rented for a military ball. Very comfortable, thick material. Got the 4R and 6R, the 4 fit but the 6 looked just a bit better- definitely size up for backup especially because of the cutouts! I am 5'3", length was perfect with 4" heels. Wore it with a strapless bra, but no bra would have worked as well. I'd wear it again for sure!

links_reviews_title: It has such a flattering fit. It was great for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I think it fit true to size, but if anything it may fit a little smaller than other dresses because it's such a tight fit
Dress fit great and I received a lot of compliments on it! I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so flattering - not too fancy and not too casual.
links_reviews_text: I use RTR for almost every wedding I attend and this was my favorite dress by far. It was so comfortable, flattering and as a mom who needs the support - I was able to wear a bra! I first had it on with spanx, but it actually looked better without, so I took them off. Highly suggest for a wedding that is fancy or casual. I received so many compliments but still felt comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the occasion great dancing dress
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove!
I do not have enough great things to say. I'm 5' so I had to wear heels but they just completed the outfit. I felt like a million bucks and like

links_reviews_title: Fun wedding with friends at a downtown Milwaukee hotel
links_reviews_text: Classy enough to wear to the church ceremony; fun enough to dance the night away in. Fit is true to size. Material is somewhat heavy, may not recommend if the event is outside on a hot summer day. Overall loved the dress and received lots of compliments ðŸ˜Š
Length was perfect with heels. Straps were a bit too long but overall great fit. Comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Throw your insecurities out the window
links_reviews_text: It's a beautifully constructed dress, but I did not find it very forgiving. Despite not being able to hide my flaws, I must say I felt more beautiful in it than I did in the other two backup dresses I bought. Loved the slits on the side and I think the color was gorgeous. Biggest flaw, I wasn't able to eat as much at the wedding but maybe that was a blessing in disguise. Go large and then go a size up for a backup.

links_reviews_title: I didn't want to take it off!
links_reviews_text: After not fitting into a sinilar dress on RTR I was hesitant about giving this a try. However, I took everyone's advice and sized up (usually a 4, got a 6) and it fit great. It was super flattering, I got a bunch of compliments and now I really want to buy it.

I rented this for a black-tie optional wedding. Typically I wear size 0, but I felt like my sides squished out of the cutouts so I wore the back up size 2R. At 5'3" with 4" heels the dress was a perfect length, my toes just peeked out and it didn't drag at all. It was extremely comfortable to wear all night and I received soooo many compliments. Though it is tight on your thighs, the slits on each side make it easy to dance the night away. One detail that surprised me was that it's made out of a canvas like fabric and the color looked slightly faded on the straps. I think that's just the style because both the sizes I ordered appeared that way. Though I wore my hair down so that wasn't a big issue.
This dress was very flattering and comfortable!! It does run small and was a little tight so I would definitely recommend sizing up!

links_reviews_title: I had a great time in this dress
links_reviews_text: I am a UK 10,and the US size 6. I felt the fit was great and would describe the fit as true to size bearing in mind I am a 36B and don't have much in the way of hips. I did not need the long size (I'm 172 cm). I had a good time in the dress, I would describe it as classic with modern details.

This dress is an absolute show stopper. It's a gorgeous color and cut, and I felt lovely in it. But there are a few drawbacks. The material is incredibly heavy, so if you're a fan of dancing at weddings, be prepared to sweat. Additionally, the cut outs on the side hit in a weird place, and I was always self conscious that it would make it look like I have fat rolls. The dress also runs a little short, so if you're 5'8" and up, the L might not be long enough. Overall, if you rent it, definitely size up. I normally wear a 4-6 and was so thankful to have ordered the 8L backup.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a formal summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful shape and color. The side vents and straps are a nice touch. The fabric is stretchy but has some hold and thickness to it so it doesnâ€™t show too much. Can wear a strapless bra underneath. The length was a bit long for me but fine with 4 inch heels otherwise could have taped up the hem. Could have work either 0 or 2, but ended up going with size 2 because I didnâ€™t want too much spillage in the side vents when sitting down.
Fit true to size. Comfortable to wear. Beautiful details.

Here's the thing: this dress is very sexy, so if you're not comfortable with showing off the WHOLE thing (it does not leave much to the imagination), then you should go with something else. It's a show-stopper - tons of compliments all night. It was comfortable, easy to wear, but it's not for someone who needs a lot of bust support - I don't know how a strapless bra would work with this. It was easy to sit down and eat during the wedding, and it was so much fun to dance in it! The slits make it easy to walk and move. The dress I got was a bit worn out and clearly had been worn one too many times, but it's a gorgeous color and hugs every curve. For someone like me with minimal curves, it showed off what little I had and made me feel like a total babe. Great dress.

I wanted to love this dress, however, I'm between a 2 & 4 but this dress in a size small was still big. The biggest part of me is my waist, which is where the dress is the tightest. I'm guessing this dress is just stretched out. The color doesn't appear to be over worn though.
I had to wear a tank top underneath. The back was to open for my liking

Everyone kept complimenting me on my dress at the wedding! This dress is very high quality and is a great dress for a wedding! It was a little tight on the chest and a little bit heavy. Besides those two things the dress was perfect for a winter wedding!

Great dress for a Christmas party. Only thing I didn't like about it was how the back didn't lay down correctly because my torso is so short. Ended up not bothering me because I couldn't actually see it.
Love this red lace dress. The open back adds a bit sexy feel. Just sad that the fit was a bit too big.

I rented a medium, but I think the small would have been better. It looked fine, but the back is open and the opening juts out. It didn't lay flat on my back. The material is beautiful and the color really stands out in pictures.

I am in love with this style by Saylor! I'm not sure if I love the front or open-back more! It runs true to size, and I would recommend sizing up for backup. It's a fitted style, but the material does have some stretch to it. There's comfortable room throughout the midsection and hips. It's also great for any cup size- I would recommend using a Nubra or no bra. The perfect style for the holiday celebrations coming up!

Dress is fun and festive and has a great fit. I'm 5'4" 145 pounds and apple shaped. The length for the dress and sleeves was great. The back is very cool, but it gaped a bit - probably because I'm fairly short waisted. Would totally recommend this dress - I received tons of compliments on it!
Beautiful dress with great detailing. Fun open back!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress. It is a show stopper.
links_reviews_text: I am usually between a S and M and the M fit perfectly (I have larger shoulders / back from lifting weights). Not much stretch at all so would size up if you're on the fence.

Loved this dress. It was great for dancing and fairly comfortable. I got lots of compliments on the cut out on the back. The dress was slightly short when I raised my arms up and the neck button once popped open too. Otherwise, it was great!

This dress is absolutely stunning. It was perfect for my anniversary dinner! The material is so high quality and the lace is actually very comfortable. I am obsessed with the back! The only thing is that is runs very large. I am normally a 4/6 and I got the S but I could have used the XS. I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: I had a good but uncomfortable time.
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress and how it looked on me! But if you have sensitive skin like I do this dress is not for you. The sleeves are not lined and normally that doesn't bother me but this dress fabric was so rough and irritating it gave me a rashes on the inside of my arms, which has never happen to me before. The dress is beautiful and if you don't have sensitive skin I 100% would recommend this dress but if you do have sensitive skin then I would go with a smoother material.

links_reviews_title: I had to use a lot of fashion tape in the back. Beautiful dressâ€¦ Got compliments
links_reviews_text: Love the dressâ€¦ But, I had to use too much fashion tape. I was pulling out it all night to adjust.
This dress just didn't work - the arms were too tight. This is an area I generally don't have any issues with so I don't think this was well designed.

The detail on this dress was beautiful and I wish I was able to wear it. The sleeves came to my knuckles, the length was longer than expected, and the back was too loose that it sort of flapped open. Maybe it's not meant for petite women, but a beautiful dress nonetheless!

I absolutely loved this dress! It is so high quality with thick fabric, a beautiful red color, AND true to size. HOWEVER, the lace was so terribly itchy I just could not wear it. The second it touched my skin I found myself scratching like crazy. I do have sensitive skin but have worn other garments from Rent the Runway with no problem so I doubt it was any cleaning agent they used. So if you have sensitive skin this might not be the dress for you!
The dress fit really well, but the lace in the back kept sticking up and made me look like I had wings. I was going to wear this to a holiday party but because of the back, I chose not to.

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful dress, but the back would not sit flat.
links_reviews_text: I tried to hold the back flat with fashion tape, but it kept coming off as I moved. I did not wear the dress. I'm 5'4", 125 lbs; the medium was too large. Maybe a small would have fit better.

links_reviews_title: Didnâ€™t end up wearing loose back
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress. Unfortunately, there were other issues that were addressed with staff - who made it right. Back very loose. Looks cute from the front.

links_reviews_title: I was disappointed I didn't get to wear it
links_reviews_text: The Med fit was a 4 throughout the arms but a 6/8 is the waist making such a gap between that I couldn't wear it....material could get scratchy....dress was stunning for the right body type, I was disappointed I didn't get to wear it

I'm a huge fan of lace and was super excited about this dress, but I ended up severely disappointed. I tried on the XS & it gaped in the back. It also made me look very box-y and completely flat chested. The lace and color are beautiful, but it did not work for me. I had to return it without wearing it to my function. I think it might work better for someone with a larger chest.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress with a great back. I was supposed to be Mrs. Claus for a party and accessorized with belt
links_reviews_text: I have muscular back and arms and needed to go up a size to make sure I could get the top button fastened.

links_reviews_title: You need to be at least 5'5 for this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was not made for shorter people. The torso part on a small bunched up all over and the back didn't lay flat. I'm 5'3. I wish I was a few inches taller because it is a beautiful dress and the bottom half was amazing.

links_reviews_title: Ugh so sad this dress didn't work :(
links_reviews_text: Wow, this dress is stunning in person. The quality is incredible. But, sadly neither size worked for me. I have a pretty athletic build, and the arms were SO tight. The waist and everything else on the dress we're fine, but the arms/shoulders were terrible on me. If you have slender arms without much muscle, this dress would be fantastic on you!
Loved this dress. It's the second time that I rented it. I felt super sexy and got many compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Too tight and runs VERY small
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 0 sometimes a 2. This dress was very tight at a size 2. I wouldnt have been comfortable wearing it out; and thereâ€™s no way I could have been able to sit down. It might have been fine at a 4. Luckily it was my backup dress so I wasnâ€™t banking on wearing it. Itâ€™s a nice looking dress, Iâ€™d just recommend ordering a size or two up.
This dress was beautiful! I received lots of compliments! It runs very small though. I normally wear a 6. Got an 8 but prob would have been more comfortable in a 10.

I am happy I read the reviews to size up but I could have sized up 2 sizes instead of 1. I'm 5'2" 122 lbs athletic build, typically wear a size 2-4 and the 6 was snug at the hips. But the dress is beautiful so just size up at least one for first size and then go up again for back up size!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This wasn't my first choice for a dress, but my original pick was unavailable a few days before my event. It worked out though because this dress is awesome! I got so many compliments and it is a total figure flatterer! Definitely a fun spin on the LBD. Definitely size up, I usually wear a 2 but the 4 ended up fitting me exactly how it needed to! You won't regret this dress, I wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect little black dress for a wedding! The dress was super comfy and easy to dance in.
links_reviews_text: I am petite and it does run small. I normally wear a 0 and the 2 fit me way better.
Tight lace dress with no stretch so a little hard to walk. Sexy and simple. Sometimes the nude slip underneath would show below the dress. Overall worked great for my event (a fundraising gala).

links_reviews_title: Great dress but very form fitting
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, so simple and fun for a work party. My only complaint would be that the black lace was about an inch and a half shorter than the slip under, not a big deal but a little weird It runs true to size for the most part, but if you're on the fence, go up a size. I'm normally a 2/4 and ordered a 4 for this dress, it fit perfectly, but a 2 would have been too small for sure. Doesn't hide any body imperfections, so if your belly is a problem area, be aware it is form fitting and won't hide it. If you're happy rocking a form fitting adorable dress, rent this one! :)
Loved the dress but runs very small! Wore on a night out in Vegas.

I loved wearing this dress but definitely could have gone up a size - I typically wear a four and the six was a bit snugger than I wanted - not much give at all. Very flattering shape, love the cut out side detail. Simple but sexy!

I wore this dress to a black tie event and got so many compliments on it! I got both a 4 and a 6 (I'm usually a 4) and I felt more comfortable in the 6 because it fit a little looser and was a little longer. Super comfortable and flattering dress! I wish I owned it!
So happy I listened to the reviews and majorly sized up! Loved the silhouette of the dress and very comfortable to wear.

The dress is definitely form fitting. I could have used a little more room in the bust. I'm only 5'4 and the dress was a little short for me at times for a wedding. Overall though, I loved the dress and the quality of the material.

links_reviews_title: Definitely takes the LBD up a notch!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting, flattering style. I got a lot of compliments in this dress and felt great about it all night! Only con would be the nude slip/lining occasionally slipped out at the bottom. Not very noticeable though!

This dress is VERY small (consistent with most of the reviews already posted). I've worn a 4 in all of the dresses that I've rented, but I barely could pull the 6 over my hips. I went out and got Spanx, which helped. I definitely should've gotten an 8. Anyone with more of a curvy body (which I don't consider myself to be one of those gals) will definitely want to size up. Even though I was self conscious about it, no one at my birthday party noticed. I got a ton of compliments and everyone loved it!

I wore this for my Bachelorette Party at a casino. It was comfortable for a night of dancing and fun. I'm short, so everything looks long on me, but this hit mid thigh and looked great. My style is not too adventurous, so this was just the right amount of sexy.

links_reviews_title: Comes on time and returns quickly
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size I wear a size zero normally in dresses and I wore a zero.

links_reviews_title: Order a size up - cute (but small) little black dress
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a wedding, ended up wearing it to a derby party. I fit in both the 0 and the 2, but I definitely recommend ordering a size up so you can breathe! Dress photographs very well, I received a ton of complements.

This dress was super cute! As others have mentioned, it definitely runs small. I normally wear a 2/4 and wore a 6- probably could have worn an 8 if that size was available. Perfect for a bachelorette party! Would rent again.

Runs short and small! I should've sized up but I did manage to fit into the size 2. The lace was a bit frayed and the lace layer rode up a tiny bit. I'm still happy I rented it and would rent it again.

Definitely listen to the reviews and size up!! I am usually a 2 in dresses and could have fit in the 4 but it was super tight around the legs. The fabric doesn't give much either. The 6 was easier to walk in and fit pretty much the same as the 4 everywhere else. Got many compliments on the dress and this was my first rent the runway experience and overall a very good one!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress it's perfect for any occasion.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a size 4 in dresses. I definitely would suggest ordering a size up from what you usually wear for this dress. I ordered a size 4 and 6 based off of the reviews I read. When I tried on the size 4 it was tight in the legs... It would have been a little annoying walking in it. The size 6 fit better in the legs. I really loved this dress. It was super cute and I would have loved to keep it.

links_reviews_title: First time renting- very impressed with the accuracy of the fit and customer service.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a nice dinner and it was the perfect near-LBD. This is a great fit if you have a small frame because it is very fitted (that being said if you don't want a tight dress I wouldn't recommend it!).

links_reviews_title: This dress was sexy but classy. The personal reviews and opportunity to get 2 sizes saved the day.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a size 4 (Ann Taylor, Banana Republic styles). Luckily, a size 6 was not available so I got an 8 which ended up being almost too snug around my hips and thighs. It definitely runs small. Chest and arm holes were fine. It hit 2 or 3 inches above my knees but, since it was tight, it rode up when I sat down. I will absolutely rent again. The experience was wonderful, hassle-free, and the dress was great. Both dresses were in excellent condition and I dropped it in my local UPS box when it was time to return.

links_reviews_title: Dress shipped to home and I returned via UPS drop box in another state. Easy to carry dress carrier
links_reviews_text: Smaller fit. I wore the 4 as 6 not available as backup. I think I may have been more comfortable in the 6.

Wow this dress is tight - I do feel like it runs true to size though because it fit me perfectly on top - I didn't feel like I was restricted with my breathing or eating - but on the bottom WOW - it's basically hard to really function in this dress - it's hard to sit or walk (I can't imagine dancing). Thankfully I wore this dress for a birthday dinner with the hubby, so we only walked a few steps, in and out of cabs, and I sat for the entirety of the meal. The dress is so tight though, it's hard to find a comfortable position and my leg fell asleep! Also I don't think going to the bathroom was an option in this dress, since I don't think I could've lifted the dress above my hips :-S I would NOT recommend this dress unless you plan on standing motionless for an entire event. I had the size 2 as a backup, but the reason I wore the 0 anyway, was 1) The 2 still had the same problem on the bottom of the dress, it was just looser on top, and 2) it was clearly extremely worn, and the lace felt a little torn up in areas - I think RTR should retire that specific size that I received. Another last note - everyone is right about the lining, it does hang below the lace on top but I honestly fixed that so easily by tucking it under - the dress is so tight it didn't move or roll down.
I wore this dress to a wedding in Mississippi. The overall fit was snug. I ordered the 4 (my usual size) and the 6 and ended up feeling more comfortable in the 6. Very beautiful and classy dress.

links_reviews_title: It was easy and I had a great selection. I went safe this time! Excited to be more adventurous next
links_reviews_text: It fit a little tight but still comfortable. I am 5'9 and a 34dd so it's hard for a dress to fit right in all areas. I wore it for an evening wedding.

links_reviews_title: I love the new carrying bag! So easy to take to the hotel to get ready before the wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small! I rented another lace dress a few months ago and wore a 6, so I figured I would be fine in the 8. It fit but it was tighter than I would have liked. I think I would have preferred to order the 8 and 10 to be sure. Other than that the dress is beautiful, I received compliments all night and ended up getting a few people looking at RTR!
This was literally my favorite dress I have ever worn. It was absolutely stunning and fit like it was made for me. I will never buy new again! Rent the Runway is AMAZING!

Pros: really great quality, pretty detail, flattering on your body Cons: runs one size small, tight on hips but loose in waist, nude underlay tends to show on the bottom so you have to keep the black lace tugged down Kind of plain, but it was perfect for the little black dress bachelorette party I attended

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Classic but sexy at the same time!
links_reviews_text: This dress does run small, I am usually a size 6 and ended up wearing a 10 in this, I am 5'10" so it was a little short but not too bad! I would definitely wear this dress again, I got a ton of compliments and felt fantastic in it.
My typical dress size is a four, but on this dress I needed the six. It was a beautiful dress and very flattering. I loved the lace on it and the overall fit of the dress.

links_reviews_title: I got this dress for a wedding and loved it!! #thankssisinlaw
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress. At the wedding and from pictures. The dress runs true to size, but I guess could be on the small side. I'm usually a 2 or 4, and after reading the reviews ordered a 4 and a 6. The 4 fit great, but bc it was a wedding, I went with the 6 bc it had a little more length and the fit was overall the same. Loved this dress!!

This dress is TINY. I can't remember the last time I wore a size 2. The zero had no chance and the 2 was super tight and short. May have been better suited for a night out rather than a formal dinner party. Regardless, the lace accents were very pretty and definitely stepped it up. If I rent again I definitely will be ordering a size 4.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for the Nutcracker!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear to the Houston Nutcracker. It was absolutely perfect for the occasion. Not too much and not too little. It was just perfect! I am usually a "0" in size, so I rented both a "0" and a "2". I fit in a "0", but felt more comfortable in a "2". The lace seemed to fit this time of the year and the gold zipper added. I wore a little beige bag and black pumps. I would definitely recommend this dress!

This dress fit great and I really liked it, especially for a November wedding. However, it was more fitted/tight around your hips and thighs so it made it a little difficult to sit, get in and out of cars, etc. You really had to be careful and could not take big steps. Nevertheless, it was still a great dress and I felt very confident and sexy in it all night!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for My 30th Bday Party. My 3rd outfit for the night. No room to dance in it though.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. Very tight tho

links_reviews_title: Cute party dress. Didn't love it but it was cute!
links_reviews_text: Order one size up! I usually wear a two and the two was way too small! I could squeeze the two on my body but could not sit down. The four was perfect!

I rented both the x-small and the small but I received two extra-smalls. Luckily the dress was very stretchy and worked out beautifully!! The dress was super comfortable. I have never really worn a bodycon type dress before and I have always been nervous about every flaw being on display, but to my surprise the fabric was thick and very forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Thin material. Right amount of sexy
links_reviews_text: Liked this dress because of the open back. Added a little twist to the plain black dress. It hugged the body perfectly.

Small fit okay but was tight on the neck and underarms so I went with the Medium. Got loads of compliments and felt very sexy in this dress. I was worried I would not be able to wear spanx with the open back (since spanx come up to my bust line) but I was able to wear a black pair and the top of them was just below the fabric of the open back. So even if it slipped down a little it was not noticeable. Such a great dress, wish I OWNED IT!
Could've worn a medium but felt more comfortable in large, very form fitting and clingy. Lots of compliments on the dress

Loved the way this dress fit. Extremely flattering but still stretchy so dancing wasn't a problem! The XS fit really well though I usually am a S. I wore a strapless bra but you could get away with a regular bra since the ruffle in the back opened covered up my bra line.

Wore this dress at 17 weeks pregnant. Very stretchy, but thick for that quality feel. Regular bra was fine! Very comfortable. Hard to see details in pictures so this is the end of the night in good lighting.

I LOVED this dress! It was cotton and very stretchy which makes fit a bit flexible. It accentuates curves beautifully. The only draw back is that the open back is cut so low, itâ€™s hard to find the right bra. I usually wear 8-10, seeing how this dress was skin tight I ordered a M and L, and the M actually fit perfectly. I got compliments on this dress all night - I completely recommend it!
The fit was gorgeous, a little small in the mid section, but overall the small was cute! I'm 5'2 and the length was so cute, I didn't even wear heels!

I had been eyeing this dress for over a year and finally rented it to wear to my work annual party. I'm 6' tall and the length fit "midi" on me, a few inches below my knee. I wore it with Spanx and a black racer back bra and these worked perfectly for undergarments. I absolutely adored this dress and would buy it in a heart beat if I could. It's very versatile in terms of how you could accessorize it. The fabric was a good thickness, so even though it hugged the body, it still felt classy.

links_reviews_title: Snug fit. Wore spanx (who doesn't) so comfortable! Looked great!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Hugged my curves perfectly!
links_reviews_text: True to size. Form fitting but not constricting. I would definitely order this dress again.

links_reviews_title: I loved that two sizes were provided.
links_reviews_text: I'm 4"11, I'm about 130 lbs currently. I just had a baby three months ago so I was worried my still wide hips would look off in this. I wore the XS and while the length was probably a little longer than attended it worked for the black tie wedding I needed it for. I felt comfortable in the style, black is very forgiving. I will definitely order from this site again!!
This dress was perfect! Snug but super comfortable. The fabric is thick and great quality. I would definitely recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my family photo shoot and ended up getting engaged in it!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfect. I did not have to wear a bra with it. It was very easy to get in and out of it.

links_reviews_title: Danced the night away in this salsa stunner
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress I worse to a Latin nights themed wedding reception party. I am usually M/L and typically closer to L on the bottom (pear) but the M was the best fit. Extremely flattering on my curves! Slightly thin fabric but was fine. Recommend!

I wore this dress to a black tie work event. As I'm short, I knew it would be longer on me than on the model, and I liked that for my event. The open back was a nice touch, and not too revealing (since again, work event). The fit was true to size, and even a touch stretchy which was nice. About me: - 5'3" - 147 - Size M / 8-10

links_reviews_title: Everybody loved my dress! It was perfect for this wedding!
links_reviews_text: While the dress runs true to size, the material is very tight! It hugs every curve but also every imperfection, so I opted to size up! Other than that it was a great dress and really comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress so much I didn't want to give it back! It was perfect for an early summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress was made me feel incredibly sexy. It is form fitting and stretchy, so it hugs all the right curves! The material is almost like a thicker tee shit, very comfortable. I was unable to get a full body picture because i was having too much fun at the wedding! The length of the dress hit me at mid-calf, and I am quite tall. The high neckline and thicker strap leaves the ability to wear a cross back strap bra, so no strapless bra needed! The lower back cut out gives an extra bit of sexy - it was a hot day for the wedding so this helped me get some air too!

My title says it all. Rented this dress for a work event and received so many compliments. It's classy with just the right touch of sass. The fabric is perfect for warm Florida weather. The best part had to be the nice silhouette it gave me without wearing any body shaping under garments.

The dress fit so well. The XS would have worked but I preferred the length of the S and that it allowed for some give around my neck. I didn't wear a bra and it was fine. I did buy "muffin tamer" underwear because the dress is very form fitting. Overall I loved it! It was so comfortable.

The dress came 4 days early! I contacted customer service to make sure I would not be charged for the extra days, I did not. What a plus to know my dress was here and ready to go! I got a ton of compliments and SO COMFORTABLE you can wear a normal bra too.

links_reviews_title: Great little black dress for formal company party at an Art Gallery!
links_reviews_text: I read in another's review that you could still wear a strapless bra; however, I felt like I was constantly tugging down the back ruffle to make sure the strap was covered. I wish the size when up to an XL. The material of the dress is very stretchy and the shape is flattering for all heights. It was just tighter than I thought it might be but overall I loved it.

This dress was a fun twist on a LBD for a wedding in the AZ Desert! I thought the slim skirt on the dress would be restricting but it, along with the rest of the dress, is a comfortable, stretchy material. I was able to wear Spanx with it, but if you want the full dramatic look of the low back with the ruffle, it may be a tad more difficult! All in all, it was a fun dress to wear for a semi-formal wedding!
Fabric was nice but stretchy! Dress was fitting and sleek, got many compliments on being beauitful and classy. Great dress to dance in and enjoy a night of being fancy or could be less formal, too!
Awesome stretch. I wear a large/xl and wore a medium for a tight look .

I wore this at 22 weeks for a formal wedding. The length was fun and I got a ton of compliments. I wore my pre-pregnancy size and the dress easily fit my little baby bump. If you tighten the straps of your bra so the band sits higher you can wear a normal bra even with the fun back which was a big plus.

links_reviews_title: Oh how comfortable the dress was!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. The material was quality and the laid on every curve.

links_reviews_title: Loved how the dress showed off my curves.
links_reviews_text: Was a little worried about the dress being too tight as i typically like to hide my problem areas but it was perfect. It hugged everything in and showed off my curves and kept everything in nice and tight and as always black helps. Everyone kept asking where i got my dress, i love the open area in the back and the length was perfect. I was able to wear a bar which was nice since I am a DD. I would rent again!

Super comfy dress, it's stretchy so very comfortable and it helps to shape a bit but definitely shows your silhouette as is. I rented it because it looked like a dress that couldn't go wrong, but it made such an impact in person - it looks way better ! Loved the ruffle details on the bottom and back. I would seriously consider keeping this dress!

I paired this with low top white sneakers for a casual look and wore it to a brunch. It's tailored in the breast area but for me was a little baggy. Wasn't a huge deal but if I owned it I would definitely get it tailored.
Great dress. Fabric is super stretchy and easy to wear. Really flattering on hourglass silhouettes with the flare at the bottom but definitely shows any imperfections

links_reviews_title: Dress is super comfortable and fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Pros: - super comfortable dress - fit perfectly - easy to move in - felt sexy :) The dress does fit very snug so make sure you are comfortable in your own skin b/c all curves will be on display. At first I was a little uncomfortable b/c I'm recently lost weight due to being on a medication and felt too tiny but two drinks in and I was good to go :)

I absolutely loved this dress. I want to live in it. It's so comfy. The material is almost like yoga or sweat pants. I had to wear a bra with it, but any kind of underwear was noticeable (TMI but I hate lines!). I highly recommend this dress. The only downfall is it is hard to zip up and down if you don't have someone to help you. Overall though, this dress was pretty perfect.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for wedding in the city.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs true to size and is form fitting! The cute cut out in the back is high enough that you can still wear spanx. Received tons of compliments and perfect dress for a city wedding or just a night out.

links_reviews_title: Professional in the front, party in the back!
links_reviews_text: I felt so great in this dress. The material surprised me but had a great stretch and was so comfortable (i even bowled in it). I wore this dress as the officiant of my best friend's wedding. It was perfect for a hot New Orleans afternoon. It was lightweight, conservative in the front, while adding some flare and personality in the back. I received lots of compliments.

I rented this dress for a black tie optional wedding I attended in mid-October. This dress is a jersey material that definitely clings to your body, so I wore a pair of spanx. Also, the dress has an open back, so I wore a sticky back-less bra to avoid having to adjust the dress all night. It's very stretchy and comfortable. I typically wear a size 8 in dresses, and the medium was perfect.

The small fit great, so I didn't even bother trying on the medium. I was worried about the length since I'm pretty short (5'1") but I feel like it looked really good. I chose a nude heel in order to avoid cutting myself up and accentuating my height. The ruffles were a fun touch. The material is thick, but not constricting thick, and depending on what undies you wear, you'll be able to see them. I wore pasties and a no-show thong and was okay. I'd definitely recommend this dress, but do think the length would be better on someone a few inches taller.
I wore this dress to a red carpet work event. Got lots of compliments (even one from a guy!) and would definitely recommend!

Really enjoyed wearing this dress! I ordered a S and M, somehow was delivered an XS & M, but RTR customer service was great and had the S delivered to me the next day. I'm glad they did since the S fit best. The dress is really comfortable and has a lot of stretch, so while form-fitting I was able to dance all night and walk (including taking the stairs) without feeling constricted. The ruffles and length are v trendy, and I was shocked that with my 5'2 frame the dress didn't hit me at a weird spot! If I had a real critique I kind of wish it was a different color than black. I also wish I could've worn a bra with this, but feel like it would've been seen with the ruffle back. Nonetheless, I really loved this dress, got plenty of compliments, and would prob rent again!

links_reviews_title: Weather was perfect for this dress. High 70's.
links_reviews_text: Dress is very comfortable. Very clingy but, the jersey material had no wrinkles.

links_reviews_title: I was a guest at a wedding and I felt so comfortable in this dress. Loved the color.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. I would definitely rent again.

I wore this to a charity fundraiser for work and got compliments all night. It fits very tight but was flattering as well. The color is beautiful! I would recommend going a size up. I normally wear a 4 and wore a 6. The sleeves are kind of odd and I kept messing with them because they would ride up and I'd push them back down. But overall I felt great in this dress and it's very flattering! Love RTR!!

I liked this dress but agree with some reviewers that the fabric is asymmetrical which is a bit odd. You can only tell if you look closely at it. It didn't stop me from wearing it to my company party and I got lots of compliments on it.

Loved this dress! It made me feel like a million bucks, and I received many complements on how I looked. It is a thick, stretch material which made it comfortable to wear and dance in all night long. I had no issues with wearing the straps off the shoulders, and it actually made me look like I had a butt with the ruching of the fabric ;) The only critique (as someone else mentioned) is the zipper is extremely hard to zip up on this dress and it takes another person to help you.
It was a little too tight around the midsection, but it wasn't too uncomfortable. Very easy to wear otherwise.

links_reviews_title: Looking great for my awards dinner!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfect and it was comfortable to wear.
This is a great dress! True to its size and fits like a glove. I will definitely rent this again.
It was hot pink, not the color shown in the photo. It was also very old and worn looking - I could not wear this at all.
Not a fan of wear the ruffles hit on my body, made me look disproportioned.

I rented this for my daughter's rehearsal dinner. I usually wear a size 4, therefore ordered the size 4 with a size 6 as the backup. I couldn't even zip the size 6 up. The dress was very nice with a heavy fabric that would have been perfect for the cool night. It looked very sexy, off the shoulder and ruched front and back. I was sad I didn't get to wear it.

links_reviews_title: I wasnâ€™t able to wear the dress. It was too long in the torso.
links_reviews_text: It didnâ€™t fit me.

The fabric, cut and style is incredibly forgiving. Love the color. I'm a size 8 pretty consistently but In this dress, although I could zip it up, a size 10 would have been better. This was obscenely tight! I ended up not wearing it since it was for a work event and didn't have time to return for a larger size. However, maybe next time for a date night!

links_reviews_title: This dress runs small... prettier in the pic than in person
links_reviews_text: This one runs small! Go a size up. Little to no stretch. Tried it on an felt like I couldn't breathe. The material is thick. The color is somewhere between a red and a pink...not a true red. I didn't like how the fold down at the neckline laid. It wasn't consistent on both sides. Sorry, no pic because it was so tight that it was uncomfortable.
I loved the fit. The zipper was hard to zip. Ended up not wearing it.

I felt great in this dress and received so many compliments. Great color and fit. The thick material and ruching flawlessly hides lumps and bumps. I'm very busty and often have trouble finding cocktail dresses; I was a bit tentative because the description said the dress is best for A-C cup sizes but I had a hunch it would work, and it did. The neckline was really flattering, no cleavage pouring out on top or my underarms. I wore a longline bra (the only way I can do strapless actually have chest support), and the ruching hid the boning/seams very well. The straps shifted on the shoulders a bit over the course of the night and needed to be adjusted but that didn't bother me too much. My only complaint is that the zipper was totally stuck. I couldn't get it back up after trying it on. My husband was finally able to zip it (with a lot of difficulty) and I was afraid if I unzipped it I'd never get it up again. Luckily I was able to step into it because of the stretch and cut of the dress. Just a heads up for you size 10s!

I have unlimited and rented 3 dress options to wear to a formal party. This one fit well, but I couldn't get the sleeves to look right. I had to place them asymmetrically on my shoulders or the fabric would fold and look wrong. I ended up choosing a different dress for the party.
I was 26 weeks pregnant when I wore this dress, and it was perfect! Very flattering and received many compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Incredible dress that hides any flaws and makes your booty pop!
links_reviews_text: This dress was incredible! I rented this for a back up dress and would have easily worn this, but it was just a tad longer than what I wanted. I will definitely be renting this dress again for a formal affair or wedding. If you're a little curvier and want a dress to WOW, this is it! It has some stretch to it and rouching to hide any flaws... Plus, it made my butt looked incredible! Truly, my only complaint was the length... I'm 5' 6" and it went past my knee.

links_reviews_title: Royal blue halter top with off shoulder sleeves
links_reviews_text: Light silky rayon fabric. Arms were a little tight on me but not uncomfortably. Pretty moveable. Halter neck. Requires strapless bra. Two layers on sides. I went down a size and it fit comfortably.

links_reviews_title: Love getting dressed up for a day out!
links_reviews_text: Love the color and the style. Fit better than expected with the criss cross being the right length somehow- at times had to pull it down a bit. The label stuck out in the back for some reason/ wish I could have cut it off. Would consider buying, very cute.
Rented this for a vacation in Charleston and loved it! It was comfortable, bright, and had just enough detail to be different.
Wore this in Vegas. It was perfect for the 80 degree weather! It was comfortable, but fashionable!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shirt for a fun night out
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a fun night out in Brooklyn NY- I wanted to look my best amongst the trendy locals there and I felt amazing in it. The XL was very flattering and just the right length. Luckily I had a strapless bra that worked perfectly with it. I paired it with jeans and hoop earrings. You don't really need a necklace with it because of the neck straps. My only issue was that the tag in the bag kept showing but not a big deal as I just kept my hair down.
Nice color. It was a little tight on my 38DD's I think an XL would have been fine.

Loved the off shoulder detail. This style runs true to size and is very comfortable worn with a strapless bra. The fabric offers no stretch and is best paired with a pair of fitted pants, skirt or even shorts. The cold shoulder detail offers a sexy touch. This can be worn to a date night or dinner with friends.
Easy to wear casual or dress up. Comfy and flows. Paired with white jeans but could easily dress up for a more formal occasion.
Wore this out with white jeans and gold sandals, love the bright color. Fit great
I loved the rich blue color of this blouse. I just don't think it looks good on women w a big bust. But it's probably more about my body shape than the shirt not fitting.
Very comfortable
Looked nicer in pics, was too tight in the halter strap area and armpit area (rest of shirt fit was ok)so I couldn't wear it. Wouldn't rent again
Comfortable and on trend.
I loved the color but the sleeves are a bit snug so it wasn't my fav.

I wore this to a sportsgame with white jeans and loved the color - it definitely stands out. The style is nice but not anything special. The sleeves didn't dip on me like they do on the model (they sit straight across like typical off the shoulders), but perhaps a size larger and they would've. Overall recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfortable, airy for the sumemrtime
links_reviews_text: Wore the XS which is on the shorter side for my height. Worked well with white shorts
Comfortable, fashionable, beautiful color.
Tight in the chest so didn't wear. Color is beautiful and vibrant, though!

links_reviews_title: Very cute and fits well. Looks great with white jeans.
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a date night. Got lots of compliments.
Bright color, comfortable. I felt amazing in it.
fit perfect, comfortable and flattering. great color

I'm large busted and have thick arms. The XL fit perfectly. It didn't pinch my arms, was long enough to cover mid-butt. Was super cute. I wore it to a casual work party and then to work a week later when I had to go out and see customers.
flattering stylish

links_reviews_title: If you are busty, go for a larger size.
links_reviews_text: The material has zero give -- so if you are in-between in sizes, go up and you'll be happy you did.
Wore this out with shorts on a warm day and my sweat showed through the back. It's really not breathable fabric so it made me sweat more. Not a fan
Beautiful
Fits true to size, comfortable and cute but not my style.
This is the second time I have rented this top, my husband LOVES it. It is very comfortable and vibrantly colored. Flowy but still gives your shape. Will likely rent a 3rd time at some point :)
This was slightly small on me. Need a small instead of xs next time but it's basically true to size.
Fits true to size. Cute with white shorts for summer.
Fit true to size, great color.

Beautiful rich color, awesome material, the design has a nice detail I didn't notice from the picture - the shirt sort of has several layers of fabric that create a beautiful silhouette. I would buy this top!
Fun blouse ~ I thought the straps were a little odd but I got a lot of compliments. Seems to fit true to size and color is really nice. A fun rental :)
Classy and casual! It fits just right. It's a little longer than I expected, but it wasn't a problem.

I didn't love this shirt, I didn't end up wearing it. I usually like the off the shoulder because it covers my arms but something about having the loose sleeves and the shirt itself also bing loose wasn't very flattering. The color was pretty plain as well. I guess if you just want something subtle it could definitely work but I just don't think it was fun enough to wear out as a party top.
The color is very pretty but I didn't like the overall fit of this top. Just not the right style for me

links_reviews_title: loved the color, great everyday wear
links_reviews_text: came brand new, fun to wear

links_reviews_title: I would have liked it if I ordered the correct size
links_reviews_text: I did not wear this because I ordered the wrong size. I am always a size 0 and xs. The xxs was the only size available and I was hoping I could get away with it. Nope. Too tight and short. Ho hum. I'll try the correct size once it available.

links_reviews_title: This is a very pretty layered top and the color is perfect for spring/summer.
links_reviews_text: I liked the loose fit of this top and the layers fall nicely. The cold shoulder look is great to show off your shoulders.
Love this top. Cute fit and is flattering for most body types. I normally wear a small but got an XS and it's perfect

links_reviews_title: Lovely burgundy lace dress for a formal work event!
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed wearing this dress! It was perfect for a work event that was happening right around the holidays. I'm pretty short (5 ft) and the dress hit a few inches above my knees, which is awesome, because usually dresses that are meant to be a bit shorter are nearly floor length on me (haha). It's nice to balance a conservative top with a shorter length, so I'm glad it wasn't too long on me. I ordered a size 2 and a size 4, I went with the 2 and found that it fit me perfectly, not too snug, not too loose. I wore this with some tights and black booties to give it a little bit more of a festive holiday look. The only major downside with this dress was that it is two pieces, a slip, and then the lace dress that goes over the slip. I found that the slip kept awkwardly shifting throughout the night, and I didn't really notice until I would go look in a mirror and see that it wasn't centered on my body any more... it just kind of moved however it wanted to. Nothing too bad, just made for a little bit of an "uneven" look if I wasn't paying attention to it. Other than the slip shifting, there were a few (very minor) flaws in the dress. The lace had a tiny hole in the front, and some areas were unraveling, just very minor though. Someone else on here mentioned that the arms were snug... I would definitely keep that in mind, this lace is not very stretchy at all. However, if you have smaller arms, you'll be fine. Overall, I enjoyed this dress, I thought it was a perfect winter dress for a formal event!

I LOVED this dress and would definitely rent again! The sleeves make this a pretty and comfortable winter option, without being TOO covered up. Perfect for weddings and formal affairs. Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€ 135 lbs and I felt the size 6 fit nicely. Even though it hangs straight, I felt slimmer (and sexy!) in this dress. I wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: True to size! Sexy but not to revealing.
links_reviews_text: Dress is true to size. Only thing is the lace is stiff so not much give in that. Broad arms you may need to size up. Dress was very flattering and i received a lot of compliments.

This dress was so beautiful and the fabric was very rich. It was so forgiving and the lines laid perfectly on places I wanted to hide, but was so flattering to my long legs. I ordered the size 6 and 8 after reading the reviews that recommended sizing up and I'm glad I did. The size 6 was too tight on my arms. The size 8 was perfect and fit loosely around my mid-section so I didn't have to worry about hiding anything. I got tons of compliments on how gorgeous it was. It was soft and warm on a cold night. I highly recommend this dress and I'll probably rent it again. Get $30 off your first order and I'll get $30 when it ships, if you use my referral code: https://rtr.app.link/e/DTWp2fxmbU.

This was my first time using Rent The Runway and it was a great experience. I loved this dress! I wore it to a wedding and it made me feel great. I normally wear a 2 but wanted a slightly tighter fit, so I went with the size 0. The slip for the 0 was too short so I actually wore the size 2 slip with the 0 dress and it worked out really well. The sleeves felt snug at first but I got used to them quickly and they weren't uncomfortable. Overall, great dress and great experience.
I have rented this for a wedding and then rented it a second time for a work Christmas party! I usually wear a 0 or 2 and I went with the 0 because it was a little more flattering. I love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress for a winter wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress worked perfectly for a winter wedding! It was a little loose on me, which I didn't mind for the most part, but the arms could have been a little tighter. The length was perfect and I loved the fabric and design. I would definitely rent it again!
Fit comfortably

I wore this to my office holiday party with nude hose and burgundy heels. I got a lot of compliments. Great for an office environment as it is conservative up top which balances out the slightly shorter hemline. It was very comfortable. The sleeves are a little snug but didn't bother me. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Easy to use app, dress was lovely, easy return!
links_reviews_text: Color was great for after thanksgiving wedding. Loved the long sleeves. The fit was nice, I ordered a 4 and a 6, but was sent 2 size 6. It actually fit nicely and gave me a little room to move in on the dance floor!

Dress fit true to size-I usually wear a 0. However the 0 was too short for my liking so I ended up wearing the 2 which wasn't as snug and added just the right amount of length. Dress is two pieces (a slip and the lace overlay) but it didn't cause much of a problem for me but I think the looser fit helped with that as well. Overall perfect for a fall/winter party.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a work gala. Fit great and was warm on a cold night.
links_reviews_text: Thick material made dress classy. Short, but not too short. Only negative... was a bit hard to get hands thru dress sleeves at wrist.

links_reviews_title: I am 5'6, 148 lbs. Size six. Large bust, small hips. Fit beautifully.
