links_reviews_text: I paid $35 for this rental, had I paid the listed price of $75 I would have been disappointed.
I'm glad I got both sizes so I wore a 2 for the slip and a 4 for the lace part as I wanted it a little loose so I could move and dance. The lace overlay was a bit stiff.

links_reviews_title: Great quality and fit! Beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 2 and 4 and was concerned because the reviews talked about the tight fitting arms but the 2 fit perfectly with no problems! The lace is a high quality thicker detail than other more delicate lace fabrics. Great dress!

I really liked the color and design of this dress. Itâ€™s great for a fall or winter wedding. It runs a bit short for my liking though and if I wasnâ€™t wearing tights I probably wouldnâ€™t have worn it. Itâ€™s also tight in the arms with no give. The neckline of the dress rubs up against your collarbone and there is no way of pulling the dress down to stop it from rubbing. The size 4 was a bit better in the arms and neckline but it hung too lose on my body and it gave me no shape so I went with the 2

links_reviews_title: Many compliments! Great for fall wedding
links_reviews_text: The fit was ok, a little baggy in the elbows and tight in the wrists. It is not 100% form fitting, so be prepared for that. Also, it is 2 pieces: a slip and the lace dress. I got a ton of compliments, and it looked great however it was not exactly what I was envisioning.

I wore this dress for my engagement photos and it was beautiful! I ordered both the 0 and the 2. While the 0 fit, I wanted the dress to be a bit roomier for the occasion, so I ended up wearing the 2. The dress photographs so well. I just wish I could have kept it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a gala for my grad school! Was a ton of fun and had lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little loose in the stomach, but with it being lace, only I noticed. I ordered the 2, which was too big, and wore the 0 (my back up) which fit great! the sleeve and hem length were perfect. The color looked just like the picture and my boyfriend I got lots of compliments on the color scheme we picked. For sizing reference: I am 5'2, 115lbs, with a muscular body type, and A cup bust.
Great fit and received lots of compliments
Loved the color! I rented this as a backup dress for a winter wedding but ended up wearing it as it was so comfortable but still dressy and classy. True to size.

The slio underneath and long sleeves made this dress tasteful and felt appropriate for a colder climate. As other reviewers have noted, the waist is not very fitted, which meant it looked a little baggier than I would have preferred. The lace was snug around my shoulders and arms, but not uncomfortable. The color is more cranberry than true red.
It fit
This dress fit really well and was flattering. I reveived conpliments all night long.
Loved the dress it hid all my flaws very nicely. Lots of compliments and a very solid high quality fabric. Def would rent again!! Its easily very versatile for a party or a wedding

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but not so comfortable
links_reviews_text: I loved this color, I loved the scalloping along the hem. It was the perfect NYE dress. But the fit across the shoulders was a little tight: there's not a lot of give to this fabric and it was a little rough along my collarbone. This was my first RTR dress and I think it was a good pick!
Beautiful dress, wore it for a NYE wedding and got so many compliments. Only con was sleeves were a little snug, other than that super comfortable and fun to dance in!

Rented this for my office Christmas party. The attire was cocktail, but it was at a boss' house. This dress was dressy enough but also super comfy and not tight in the stomach so no pooch after eating and drinking all night. It was short, but not inappropriate, and the long sleeves balanced out the length. Great dress!

I ordered this dress in a size 4 and size 6. The overall shape of the dress is kind of boxy and not form fitting. I wanted something kinda loose in the midsection because I'm self-conscious of my stomach so I was ok with this. The 6 was too big and too boxy and the sleeves were kind of long. The 4 fit better without it being too tight, the dress is 2 pieces; a slip and the "lace" overylay. Only its not lace; it's more of a crochet material and has NO give. My biggest complaint about this dress is the neckline. It came up pretty high to my neck and since the material is kind of rough and doesn't move much, I actually had two red, chafed spots on my neck. 4 days later I can still see where it rubbed and its not because it was too tight! Overall, cute and I got a lot of compliments.
Dress fit perfect for my petite body type. Was warm enough for a winter wedding.
Beautiful dress that fit perfectly. Comfortable and easy to wear. Lots of compliments om it during a december wedding.

I am usually a size 10 in dresses, so usually order a 10 and 12 on RTR to be safe, as I have a larger bust. The 10 fit perfectly! It was not too tight in any area. It was comfortable and I received compliments all night!

Super happy with the condition of the dress I received. I'm a tall chic (5'10" 135-140lbs) so it's hard to find a good fit. I wanted the dress to be a little more form fitting but in the end I was happy for the extra wiggle room.
This fit perfect and got many compliments! So comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a company holiday party. I ordered a 4 & 6 as I seem to go in between the two sizes a lot in several different brands. I am 5'2", 34B, 27" waist, 36" hips, and the 4 fit me perfectly. Unfortunately it came with a hole/tear on the stomach that was very obvious when I had the dress on. I opted wearing the 6 (pictured) because of this. It was loose in the waist and made me look bigger than I am, however it is a very pretty dress. Just disappointed my true size wasn't in perfect condition upon arrival.

I wore this to an outdoor fall wedding in NY, and it kept me pretty warm even with dancing. It fits true to size (I got a 6) although the neck can rub and feel a bit uncomfortable, and its difficult to raise your arms... the size 8 was too big and looked boxy. Neither thing ruined the night, but I thought it was worth mentioning. I have athletic arms & was worried the sleeves would be too tight but they were great! The reason for 4 stars is because the dress really had no shape. It was pretty and served it's purpose, but for my body type, I would probably not rent again.
Rich color. Perfect size 4. Very comfortable and fabulous!
This dress I received as a free item. I loved the fit and the long sleeves. Felt sexy even though I was covered up. Nice quality of material.

I loved this dress so much I didn't want to send it back. I ordered the 0 and 2 and the 0 fit perfectly, so I would say it runs true to size. It was a little uncomfortable around my armpits at first, but I got used to it pretty quickly. I was surprised that it was separate pieces- the slip and cover. Definitely on the warmer side, so it's great for a fall or winter event. A beautiful dress I would highly recommend!!
Fit well. Could have gone down a size if the arms were larger/stretchy. Was a bit loose in the torso and waist but tight in the arms, not much give. Pretty dress! Great first rental experience!
A little on the short side, loved he sleeves, no complaints, easy, comfortable wear yet stylish

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, unique, it stood out. I got lots of compliments and I just felt beautiful in this dress.
links_reviews_text: Iâ€™m 5â€™9 and 165 lb and I ordered size 48 which was perfect.(had extra room in the tummy area and the perfect sleeves to cover my unflattering arms). I wish I could just keep the dress. My husband kept saying that I look gorgeous and thatâ€™s how I felt in that dress. I took a risk and ordered the dress to arrive on the day of my event ( it was not available the day before) but it paid off...the dress arrived by noon and my event was at 7pm just blocks blocks away from where I live. This was my first time experience and Iâ€™m happy I gave a try. I canâ€™t wait to order again.

links_reviews_title: GNO is always a good time!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 8 and this dress swallowed me up. Super cute but had a musty smell as well.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful May wedding in Maine!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great! Ran a bit large. Had to size down. The sleeves were beautiful! Very elegant!
Love love love this dress! So unique and fun! Super comfortable and easy to dance in. I wish I owned it.

Loved this dress! The only con for me was that it was on the shorter side. Next time o rent dress trough my RTR Unlimited Subscription I will order a size up. Do not rent this dress if you have a full chest bc it will pull across the breast area and make your boobs look squished! I am a 34 D and had to change my bra & wear a bra that wasn't padded & it fit just fine. Also, do not rent this dress if you have wide huge hips /large bottom area because the pockets on the side of dress will stick out and it will not look right. I feel this dress will look best on someone who has a straight and narrow body. I could see bump on my lower belly area and did not care, I should have wore spanks but dress was too short so in winter I will rent this dress with control top black tights. Over all I loved the dress and received many many Compliments

I've been eyeing this dress for a while on RTR and I'm so glad I finally rented it. It was very expensive looking and definitely stood out amongst a bunch of black dresses. The bell sleeves added a cool element to the whole thing. Some words of caution however: the fabric does not have any stretch to it so perhaps go up in size. Also it is very short so be mindful if you are tall. Overall gorgeous dress and a lot of fun to wear!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a night out!
links_reviews_text: This was my back up rental for a date night at the theatre. Was a little skeptical when I first put it on, but it quickly grew on me. Incredibly comfortable and good quality material. My boyfriend loved it and I got rave reviews from friends. My only concern was that it was quite short, not good for activities that involve bending over! Overall, a great rental for a night out.
Fabric is thick and beautiful and the sleeves really make the dress. Classy and fun at the same time and super comfortable. Would definitely rent again.

I wore this in Vegas- heads turned. The material is high quality and the design is high fashion. It is extremely comfortable- and I am a jeans and button down person. It has deep pockets! It is quite short so either be okay with that or wear tights. I am already looking to rent this again. I probably could have worn the next size down, but I like a roomy fit. Great for all figures.

This dress was absolutely perfect for a wedding rehearsal dinner. The sleeves are fun, flirty and unique. I received tons of compliments. The brocade fabric on the front of the dress has a thick, luxurious feel. The back of the dress is a thick stretch material, the added stretch allows the dress to fit different body types. Pockets are the best; enough said. I will be renting this one again.
I wore this to a dinner, and I really stood out. It's fun and memorable. I would definitely wear it again. Be careful, it's a little on the short side.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a bridal tea party and it was EPIC!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs pretty true to size, the back is a black stretchy fabric with the front being a stiffer fabric. It is a great way to hide a bit of a tummy in the front if you needed to. The sleeves are big but in a great way!

links_reviews_title: EVERYONE commented on the print, the fabric, the sleeves. This is a one of a kind dress & it shows!
links_reviews_text: With a 32DDD chest I had to size up. Plenty of room everywhere else.

I ordered the 6 (44) and the 4 was not available for back up and so I thought there was no way I could wear the 2. I really wish I had ordered it now bc the 6 was HUGE on me. I almost didn't wear it because it looked like a sack. I was so excited about this dress and since we had to be downtown for a day party on Mardi Gras I had no time to exchange it. I would recommend going one size down to rent and another size down for back up. I got a lot of compliments but still felt like I looked like a football player :-(

links_reviews_title: Unique Shape for an Arts Charity Event
links_reviews_text: I wore the dress to a winter charity event and styled with black tights and high-heeled mary janes. The sleeves are huge - which I thought made the dress really fun and different. I'm a pretty true 10 right now and I wore the 46. The 48 still had the pockets sewn shut, which led to a better overall silhouette, but it was just too big with too much bulky fabric. Overall, a unique dress at a good rental price.

I've been wanting to rent this dress ever since this came out, but it was always unavailable. So, I was excited when I was able to rent it for a 50th Wedding Anniversary event. I ordered the size 42, with the size 44 as backup. RTR informed me a few days prior to delivery that there was an issue with the size 42, so they sent me a back up dress just in case the size 44 didn't work. The size 44 was slightly big, but it didn't deter me from wearing it for the event I was attending. The only issue is that the lining kept coming down past the hemline of the dress. I used some double stick tape to fix it and it held up very well. Received a lot of compliments on the uniqueness of the dress. My favorite part was the sleeves and the pockets!
Warning - it's short. Otherwise, it's very comfortable, easy to move in, etc.
Definitely runs short. My only complaint would be that the pockets stick out a little on each side.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! So unique and beautifully made. And flattering!
links_reviews_text: Wore it to a NYE party. It was comfortable and a standout. And it helped hide those extra holiday pounds!

I rented this for a cocktail party that got cancelled last minute, but with a great dress on hand I wore it to work anyway. Its thick fabric and fit makes it "forgiving" so it's not too tight. It's modest enough for the office, but the silver sheen and pattern make it a good dress up option. I also liked the non-traditional style that made it feel young, cute and fun, without having to be tight and plunging at the neckline.

My size that I wanted in my back upsize were not available so I opted for the smallest one that was available. I made it work by adding a black belt to define my waist. The sleeves held up even though I had to wear a jacket to commute into the city - the sleeves still held their shape. Anything with pockets and big sleeves in my opinion is the score the dress was beautiful and perfect for a holiday company party! Even though it's on the shorter side I wore tights and it was fine I would Definitely recommend!!!

links_reviews_title: 3rd time renting this dress!!! It's beautiful,elegant,chic and unique.
links_reviews_text: 44(6) and 42(4) fit very similarly. The 42 is significantly shorter so I chose the 44.

links_reviews_title: Rocked the repeat and loved it again!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a wedding earlier in September, so when I was struggling with what to wear in November, I thought I would rent this dress again. It's so unique and different. I absolutely love this dress so much! It allows you to be comfortable all night long with no pulling around the waist. It's short and the sleeves do not lend to wearing a coat, but a shawl will definitely pair well!

links_reviews_title: Would buy this dress if I could
links_reviews_text: I borrowed sizes 44 and 46. Although the 44 fit me, it made my tummy look a bit big. I think it was the shape of the chest area, the design flattened the chest and the overall dress shape looked like a pear. The 46 was loose and I looked thinner, if that made any sense, which meant the dress was longer on me. Although the dress did not look like how it is on the model, I thought it was still rich-looking. The material is definitely thick. It was perfect for a lunch wedding in cool weather. I think because of the material, it would be too hot for summer. I wore the dress with black tights and platform sandals and brought a shawl instead of a coat because of the bell sleeves. I think the sleeves added drama to the dress. Love it! I am contemplating on borrowing it again for a holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Stood out in a sea of black dresses
links_reviews_text: I was hesitant to rent this dress but I am glad I did. It is quality material and very unique. It runs true to size but was slightly tight around my shoulders. It's does a great job if you want to camouflage a tummy and accent legs. It is short, but I am a very petite girl so that worked for me.

It was comfortable, chic and the quality is amazing. The only problem is that the slip shows, but I pinned it. I'm so glad I read all the reviews before purchase- they were so helpful and I knew the slip might be a problem before hand.
This was a perfect dress to attend a wedding rehearsal dinner. I received tons of compliments. The dress is extremely comfortable. Loved the pockets too! Cannot wait to rent this one again!!!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a casual fall wedding in New Hampshire.
links_reviews_text: This dress is lovely, flattering, and just right for a fall event. The length is fun. The sleeves are just puffy enough. And it has pockets! I would rent it again, and just might :)

I wore this for an indoor day time bridal shower and I received alot of compliments. The dress has a beautiful sheen to it with the red, silver and black color combo. It has a modern shape with puffy sleeves and pockets so I loved that. I rented a size 8 (46) and a size 10 (48), and the size 8 (46) fit me with no issues. The sleeves weren't tight and had enough room to easily get in and out of. I am 5'4 and the dress stopped a few inches above my knees. The chest area did fit a little snug so keep that in mind if you have a bigger chest. The black lining of the dress wasn't sewn down to the dress hem so it would sometimes slip out when I walked but I used some safety pins to help keep it in place. The dress material is thick so I wouldn't recommend wearing this for an outdoor event in the summer because you will be hot in it. Overall this was a nice dress and I would consider renting it again for an event!

Amazing dress, would absolutely recommend it! I wore this to a cocktail party and received so many compliments. The dress was very unique, the bell sleeves were a fun part of the dress. Personally I didn't think the fabric was heavy or too warm, was just right, also, it had pockets! If you want to stand out in a crowd and wear a dress that is super comfortable this is it!

links_reviews_title: Uptown glam on the family farm
links_reviews_text: PROS: Lots of compliments; no one else had anything like it; festive CONS: heavy fabric was a bit too much for a summer wedding; for my long legs, the length was a teeny bit short (had to be vigilant on the dance floor not to dance too wildly); also, it WORKED for a May wedding, but the look was overall wintry/holiday
I loved that the dress has two pockets. I was very comfortable in the dress. I paired it with fancy accessories in black, silver and a touch of gold.

This dress was perfect for Thanksgiving! It was fashion forward and fitted so well. It had some room so I was able to eat a nice meal :) I am petite and felt comfortable in it- even in oxfords! Definitely recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Flaunt your stems and cover your tummy.
links_reviews_text: The fabric doesn't breathe well. Great for holiday party but uncomfortable for garden weddings or any other party in direct sunlight.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy. I love the look of this dress. Wore it to a party and had tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress overall. It's super comfortable and has large pockets that was so useful. I got tons of compliments from friends and family. I normally wear a size 10 and so I got a size 48. Unfortunately the back up size (46 or 8 US) was not available. I would have fit the smaller size better, but I had to deal with what I had. I had a small belt to wrap around my waist and it worked well (I'd also recommend a decorative cinch fit clip/back dress clip if you run into this problem.) It does run on the shorter side than what I usually wear, so I wore short length slip shorts over my stockings just in case. Overall, love it and nothing I couldn't solve. :)

links_reviews_title: Worn to my husband's EOY Gala
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. It was roomy enough to move in and has pockets - and it got compliments all night. The structure of the dress was definitely a luxury statement and it even though it seemed boxy when it arrived it wasn't at all and was very flattering once on! I wore it with tights so the shortness of it wasn't an issue but if wearing with bare legs just know that you only have about five fingers of fabric before stuff starts showing...

The absolutely most beautiful dress I've ever rented from RTR! Super comfortable and flattering, I received so many compliments. This dress stood out in a room full of sequined, long, bling-y gowns. I'm only 5'0 tall but it was actually almost too short on me, so taller girls beware! It went down to about 4 inches above my knees and good thing I LOVE short dresses! Definitely not for a warm day as the material is thick. The front is a brocade-like heavy material and the back has a nice stretch to it. The pockets are EVERYTHING! (I attempted to download a pic but somehow I couldn't get it small enough for RTR standards). I cannot wait to rent this beauty again!

This was my 2nd choice, I'm glad it worked out. It definitely is on the bigger side (not huge), so it's comfortable, but not super flattering. I did get several compliments because the colors & details are unusual. It's not what I would call formal but worked great for the auction event we went to. It's definitely more of a fall/winter dress. I wore it with opaque black tights & cute black booties. Another success, even though not my first choice!
I was unable to wear this dress because it was TOO short. I ordered a size up for some extra length, but even with black tights it was really short.

links_reviews_title: Wore for funeral during second trimester
links_reviews_text: A little looser than expected and a little lower cut so I kept it up with a belt which worked well. Stretchy cotton material
This dress fits very loosely so definitely order your size. I am typically a small but the M was available and I think it would have been more flattering if tighter.
Great maternity dress! Very comfortable and good fit at 31 weeks, especially length which can be an issue at my height (5'3"). Easy to dress this up or down with accessories.

links_reviews_title: It was a nice summer date night with friends - weather was HOT but this dress was flowy & cool.
links_reviews_text: Stretchy but a bit tight which was ok... had a nice flow to the skirt and overall comfortable.

I loved this dress! I never wanted to give it back. It's super comfortable and light weight. Great with sandals or white booties! I wore it out and during every day. I usually wear a size 2 or 4 and it definitely doesn't run small, but runs more true to size. I got the SM but returned for the Medium and it fit perfectly!

Cute summer dress and easy to wear. I thought the chest was a little tight compared to the waist, but it still worked. I didn't let the slit in the top bother me - I situated the ties so they hung down over the slit and if you looked hard you could probably see my nude strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Texas Summer Day
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to happy hour with girl friends on South Congress in Austin, TX. It's seriously the perfect outfit for a casual brunch or dinner. Super breezy for a hot summer day. Fits true to size.
This dress is flattering! Very fitted compared to other dresses by this designer, loved the dress!
This dress runs small and the material is very thin. Not for women with large chests or wide hips

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear it.
links_reviews_text: The top was way too small for me. I'm busty and I overfilled it.
small chest area, fit small overall, a little but see through

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but a bit short on one side
links_reviews_text: Cute and breezy summer dress! No issues with fabric being see-through, and fits true-to-size to slightly small. XS fit me well in the bust and waist, but was a bit short on one side at my height (5'6").

links_reviews_title: Great for dinner out in the summer.
links_reviews_text: Snug fit, good for hot weather.

I got the M and L. The M fit, but ended up wearing the L for a little bit of extra length on the short side of the skirt. That even made me comfortable wearing it to church the next morning! The fabric is super lightweight and very comfortable for a hot summer. There's a keyhole opening in the front of the dress - I don't think it would have been a problem anyway, but I ended up wearing a lacy white bandeau bra that showed through but just looked like part of the dress - it was great! Could wear with heels and with flats - both looked good and gave it a slightly different look.

links_reviews_title: NICE OFF THE SHOULDER DRESS TO SHOW OFF MY TAN
links_reviews_text: BEAUTIFUL COLOR
The dress was extremely thin and light weight. It also fit awkwardly. I thought I would have been able to wear it to an event at work but it wasn't appropriate. Overall pretty disappointed.
Loved the looks of the dress but was small in the chest. Unable to wear it

If you are more than a B small C cup either size up or have some safety pins ready. The keyhole in the front just seems unnecessary and shows some serious cleavage. It fit everywhere but the top and even with safety pins to keep the ruffle together I felt uncomfortable
Would have loved it if it fit but it runs small. I couldn't zip up the back.

links_reviews_title: didn't know there was a gap in the chest
links_reviews_text: i'm typically a 4 or a small and this fit fine BUT there is a gap in the chest area. the fabric wasn't large enough to cover my boobs and looks indecent. wish i knew there was a gap! i wldn't sized up or not even tried this dress.

This dress' color and pattern are gorgeous. The fabric is lightweight and perfect for summer or a warm-weather vacation. You don't need to wear a bra with the dress, but know that this dress is definitely best for smaller bust sizes since it cuts inwards between the armpits and bust, so if you aren't wearing it at the right place on your shoulder, you can pop out!

links_reviews_title: Not flattering, but two stars for the print
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear this dress. It was uncomfortably short on me (I'm 5'8") and I would've been wearing it around family so it just didn't work. Might fit better on shorter girls. The hole at the top of the bust was also awkward and made it hard to wear a bra. I'm leaving two stars only because the print was so cute. Bummed I couldn't wear it!
Super fun dress. I had a hard time not popping the sleeves up off my arms but the dress has a great feel and is fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear as was tight and not flattering
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this as the small was too tight in the chest. I'm not really a huge fan of asymmetrical hems either so it just want going to work.

I wore this to a cocktail party at work and received a lot of compliments. One thing to keep in mind is that this dress (unlike other Shoshanna dresses I've borrowed from RTR) doesn't have much give because of the bodice. Overall I was happy with it.

links_reviews_title: Great customer service and great fit!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was my backup that I ordered last minute when my original dress I wanted wasn't available in my size- while this could have been a nightmare I'm extremely pleased to report that everyone at RTR was wonderful about helping me get another dress in time!!! The dress itself was GORGEOUS and loved the bright color/ lace flower design. It was perfect for the outdoor September wedding I went to. Only thing to note is that it was on the tighter side- just to be prepared. Otherwise LOVED IT!!

This dress was very comfortable, but hot. I wore it to a wedding ceremony in June. It's pretty heavy. I wore with a regular strapless bra - you could probably get away with just petals or nothing if you're bigger on top. I got lots of compliments and I loved the color. The shape wasn't super flattering on me - I think it looked a little boxy, but overall I liked the look.
Absolutely loved this dress. It fit so pretty. Compliments all night. The lace is prettier in person.

Loved wearing this dress and got to wear it to two events in the 8 day window. I normally wear a 2 but this one was way too tight in the hips to zip -- so glad my backup was the size 4. Great fit, really nice lace. Loved the high neck (I wore dangly earrings and no necklace). The green was perfect for a holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a charity gala around the holiday season. Color worked great with the festive event.
links_reviews_text: Fit great! Very comfortable. I'm tall and the length was perfect. I thought chunky earrings worked best instead of a necklace with this neckline.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for homecoming award presentation. LOVED this dress and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small - glad I sized up like the other reviewers suggested. LOVED the lace and the color was just beautiful. Would definitely rent again if I need a semi-formal green dress!

Unfortunately this dress didnâ€™t work for me. The lining was pulled tightly across my thighs (pear shaped) and this in turn made it bunch up around my mid-section and it did not look good under the lace. The top was corseted which helped it have shape and keep from looking too droopy since it was too big up there. It was a very pretty dress, and I had to wear it with no other options, but I did not feel good in it :/
I absolutely loved this dress! The color was so pretty in person. It was comfortable too. It wasn't too tight. The sleeves were a little loose around my shoulders but it wasn't that noticeable.

So Iâ€™m 5â€™0â€ 120lbs and wore the size 2. It was a bit large but I ordered the 4 as my backup size so I was stuck with the 2. You need a low back strapless bra or it will show. My regular strapless showed in the back, so I went braless. Surprisingly you couldnâ€™t even notice as itâ€™s very structured. Iâ€™m not a huge fan of the fit. I think it adds volume even if you were a very skinny person bc of some awkward pleating around the waist...since I have more of an athletic figure it just wasnâ€™t the most flattering. That being said, it didnâ€™t look bad. I got a few compliments on it but nothing compared to the rest of my RTR dresses.

Loved this dress! Fit was good, I'm in between sizes so it's hard for me to say exactly though. I got so many compliments, people I didn't know were coming up to me just to tell me it looked amazing! Will definitely rent again. Only issue was there was a small tear in the lace top part, but because of the design it was hardly noticeable-my husband didn't notice at all.

I loved the color of the dress, so pretty!! I normally wear a 12, but sometimes a 14. I wish there was a 14 in this one because I felt like it ran a little small. It was tight at my armpits and my hips. I'm rather busty and loved not having to wear a bra because of the way the bodice was built. The lace was very pretty too! I got lots of compliments, especially wearing it with my cowboy boots (for a barn wedding). Overall, a great dress, just wish I could have sized up.

links_reviews_title: Walking with my son as he prepares to make his vows to his beautiful wife!
links_reviews_text: This beautiful dress (and well made!) is a little tight with its boning in the bodice. I was a little worried since I'm often a size 6. But it looks fabulous. Loved the shorter length! And the rich color was great with son's black tux and bride's white lace. A fun sexy little dress for mother of the bride- and I'm nearly 67! My first RTR.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a wedding in May. Loved the dress and got so many compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: I would definitely order a size up. I am normally a 10/12 the 12 would be perfect in this dress since it was lace there was not a lot of give in the chest and arms.

links_reviews_title: Surprised how much I loved this green!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress and was glad to wear it to my friends rehearsal. When I rested my arms to my sides I noticed the dress relaxed in the back and fit loosely, however, everywhere else fit perfectly!

Loved this dress. It was absolutely beautiful and made me feel wonderful. Especially since this dress was my replacement dress as the original one was a little too worse for wear. However, there was a mixup with this dress size as I requested size 10 and 12 and they only sent the 10. It was tight but thanks to spanx I was able to make it work. I still loved it and received many compliments through my husband's law graduation. Would definitely rent again.

Elegant and simple. Perfect guest of wedding dress. Runs small and is short. I'm pear shaped and the 2 (my typical size) was way too tight in the thigh area and too short. I wore the 4 even though it was slightly too big on top. Was very comfortable and the built in bra was great. Would definitely rent this dress again. The color was perfect and I received tons of compliments.

This dress is a beautiful emerald green, I had originally rented it for a wedding in Ireland but thought the green may be too cliche :) So I saved it for my birthday dinner in late March in Texas. The dress is not stretchy at all, so it fit like a glove, and be aware that you can wear it without a bra (probably preferred, as the top is very corset-like). The skirt was a bit short and bunched up around my waist when I sat down, so just be aware that you may want to wear tights with it or just be prepared to show off some leg.

links_reviews_title: Great color and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a St Patricks Day/spring wedding. The 8 was a bit tight but the 10 was too loose around the shoulders, the neckline was falling over, so I wound up wearing the 8 and overall it worked out, it was just a bit snug.
Great color, great back and fit comfortably! Will absolutley rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'11" and about 140 lbs, and a size 6 was a perfect fit. Due to my height the dress was a little shorter on me, but not noticeably short. I loved the style and color and got so many compliments!! It's a beautiful dress, and the color really pops! It was perfect for a more formal holiday parrty. Highly recommend!

The color of this dress is really beautiful. The length is really good as well for petites. The only negative thing is that it didn't really accentuate my waist. It made my figure look even more straight. Maybe a belt would help.
This dress was great for an early fall wedding. The color is a nice deep green that the pictures really don't do justice. The dress was easy to wear and I would highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautifully made, but a little snug! Wish it had come in a 14!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little small, probably more my fault than the dress's. I wish it would have come in a 14. There was a small tear in the lace, but it was barely noticeable. Overall, beautiful dress and will rent again!

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for a semi casual wedding at a brewery!
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size. I ended up wearing a strapless bra and it worked.

links_reviews_title: Super fun dress, beautiful color! Received compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning. It fit well, left all the right places with a little bit of room so I could dance! The color was STUNNING! I love emerald green! The lace work was beautiful too! Highly recommend!

I wore this dress for an early September wedding, and it was perfect! I was worried that green was going to be a deep/winter color, but the reviews were spot on; it was bright/vibrant/rich! I loved the low-scooped back, and was able to get away with not wearing a bra. I was on the dance floor all night, and it was comfortable. The only con would have to be where the dress tightened, in the stomach/high hip area, which made it a little awkward when sitting. BUT!! Other than that, I got compliments on the dress all night, and even days to follow on all the photos!

Wore this to an evening wedding. I wear a 36DDD , so I was nervous about renting a dress, but this fit fine without a bra. Was very secure even when dancing. Very well made dress. Comfortable fit through arms. I am so happy to have found RTR. Great service!

I wore this dress for my sister's "Lucky in Love" Bridal shower and received many compliments! I was able to wear with a strapless bra which helped because the top part was a bit big at first without it. The two side pleats felt like pockets which would have been cool if they were! Overall, GREAT dress, received many compliments and the color is stunning!

I loved this dress! The color in person was so beautiful, a very rich green! The fit was great, with the exception of the top part. It seemed as if someone had either stretched the top part of the dress out, or that it was meant for someone who was 2-3 inches taller than me at 5'1"! It kind of sagged in the shoulders, but with two safety pins in the back that problem was solved! I loved how the length fell a few inches above my knee, perfect length for my height!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! The color is so vibrant - perfect for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! The 0 fit me perfectly (I am usually a size 0 in dresses and a size 2 in jeans); it was fitted up top, but not too snug, though I am small up-top (34A), so it might be too snug for top-heavy body types. It wasn't tight on my stomach, even after a big dinner and a few cocktails! It was perfectly comfortable for dancing the night away! I got so many compliments on the color and the style! I would highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Making everyday life a little more special
links_reviews_text: The built in bra support was excellent, but I would suggest sizing up if you are larger than a B cup. The cap sleeves were not a problem for my broad shoulders. I have athletic legs and usually narrow skirts are a problem, often resulting in limited mobility, but this has just enough space to have unrestricted walking.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and it was a flattering fit. Got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a friend's wedding and got a lot of complements. I ordered a 0 &2 based on the other reviews. The 0 was a bit snug at the hips but the 2 was too loose up top so I ended up going with the 0. I was able to sit comfortably and dance the evening away. Only thing preventing me from giving it a 5 is that my arms were sore by the end of the evening where the edges of the lace cap sleeves ended. Overall a great dress and would definitely rent again!

I wore this dress for an outdoor wedding and it was perfect! The color is a nice, vibrant green. The 2 and the 4 both fit, but I went with the 4 since the 2 was a little tight on my thighs. The only con was that dresses were a bit baggy on the stomach area but the 4 wasn't as noticeable, probably since it was looser on my thighs. My friends also loved the dress. I'd totally rent it again.

Such a gorgeous dress! I wore it to a wedding and I received many compliments throughout the night. I absolutely love the color and the lace gives it both a classy and sexy effect. It was pretty true to size, but it was a little snug since it is more form-fitting. I'm not a fan of Spanx, but I'm sure it would have fit perfectly if I had worn them underneath. I would definitely rent this dress again!

I wore this dress for a fancy wedding in Nashville and received so many compliments! It was really comfortable and the best part was that I didn't have to wear a bra because the bodice had boning and was a think material. I ended up wearing the bigger size of the two dresses that I ordered and it fit like a glove!
Beautiful color and well-made. On the shorter side, runs slightly small.

This dress was so flattering and the color was beautiful, and so unique. I loved the lace detail, and the length was perfect for a wedding. It fits against the body, but not too form-fitting. I still felt comfortable dancing and eating. I wish I could have kept it!

This dress was gorgeous! After reading reviews, I went with a size down from my typical size (4). It fit like a glove and was not too tight through the hips. The dress did ride up a bit when I sat, but otherwise was perfect! The color was beautiful and I paired it with a pair of nude/gold shoes.

This was a great rental. Color was perfect and stood out. Very classy dress but still fun. I was concerned it would be too green and Christmasy, but it definitely wasn't. Another concern was what bra to wear with it. There is a built in bra that helps with support. Personally didn't feel it was enough. I was able to wear regular nude bra. It was low enough at the back that it didn't show. Straps were not visible through the lace. I felt great in it and highly recommend!

The color is stunning, the cut is forgiving yet short and sassy. And the little cut outs on the shoulder front are adorable and not overly distracting. I did wear a slip with this one (not in the picture) because the fabric shows lingerie lines (as you can see in the pic). Color would be stunning on any skin tone!!

This dress was very comfortable and fit well. Always cool to have pockets in a dress but where they sat on my hips wasn't super flattering. The color is amazing and got lots of compliments. Material was stretchy so fit well up top. Good length.

links_reviews_title: I love so much, I am buying.
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress. The color was bright and fun and the fit was comfortable. It was a thick fabric so it didn't wrinkle easy and it had pockets which is a plus for any dress.

Rented this as my birthday dress for an outdoor rooftop party. While the color is much brighter (like electric pink!) in person than the photo on the website, it was really cute and I got a ton of compliments. The length was a bit shorter than I typically wear (because I chose to wear the 4 instead of the 6), but it worked out fine and I was comfortable the whole night.
Hard to see in the picture but it's a beautiful neon coral. This dress is very comfortable and great fit. I normally would have done a size 4 but I wanted the extra room.

This dress is fun to wear with high heels and is perfect for a rental. Makes such a splash you wouldn't want to wear it more than once. It also should be labeled neon pink, not coral. So be prepared. But it's really fun and looks great with blonde hair.

I was surprised by the bright color of this dress (it is NEON pink), but it was perfect for an early summer wedding! Loads of compliments! I also love that it has pockets and that it hid my "extra padding" around my middle. I didn't want to send it back!!!
This dress is adorable. Fits well, and is classy. Love the peek-a-boo where the sleeves meet the dress. Just sweet. Was perfect for me to direct a dance recital.
Loved the fit and pockets! I received so many compliments on the this dress and the color.

This dress was perfect for a bachelorette in Florida! That color was a bright coral, dress was light, airy, a little stretchy and very comfortable, but looked beautiful on! I would recommend wearing with a strapless bra because of the peep holes on the front of the dress. I recently just had a baby and this dress fit perfectly, while also hiding some of my problem areas. Would rent this dress again!
I've rented this dress twice now. It's comfortable, bold, and flattering. It's a nice super stretchy thick fabric that holds it's ground near curvy areas, and the color is to die for. Love!

I recently went up in size, and was very nervous about finding something to wear to my best friends bridal shower. This dress was so comfortable, I could wear it to every occasion. I received so many compliments on it. It was bright, comfy, and flattering. Plus it has POCKETS.

links_reviews_title: This beautiful colored dress was a hit!!
links_reviews_text: This dress got me unexpected compliments all day long at work it's comfortable, cute, sassy and absolutely adorable!

I am a between a size 2 and 4 but this fits just alright. If I wore size 4 it would've fit perfect. The fabric is a little heavy but I it's still comfortable. Make sure you wear a nude bra as the slits on the shoulders will show the straps.

links_reviews_title: First time renting, loved the experience and loved the dress.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for an engagement party. The dress was perfect for the occasion. I am 5'2" the lenght what's perfect just above my knees. It runs true to size. The color is even more beautiful in person. The dress was comfortable and the pockets are a great perk.

links_reviews_title: A great dress for a daytime event
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a first communion. It was very comfortable--as other reviewers mentioned you can see the bra straps if you turn a certain way, but it didn't bother me. The dress is a bit boxy, so I would recommend that you size down for the backup size.

We took our annual trip to the horse races and this dress fit the ticket! It was light and BRIGHT on the warm spring day. I accessorized with gold jewelry and it was a great accent on the neon orange.

The dress itself is beautiful and well made with thick material. Like many other reviewers have noted, it's a boxy fit that runs really large. I recently had surgery and was trying to hide my still swollen abdomen, which this definitely did. Unfortunately I can't wear it, because at 5'7, it's barely covering anything while standing. I wouldn't be able to wear this out and easily sit or move around without worrying about flashing everyone. I'd recommend it for more petite ladies.

This was a back up to the back up dress I originally ordered. But I'm glad I got it. It was very comfortable and hid all the "wobbly bits". No spanx needed! I wore it to brunch and then walked around the city that afternoon. The fabric is on the thicker side so probably not a good idea on a hot day. (Today's weather was perfect 70's). I LOVED the pockets!! Only issue was the color. It is a lot brighter in person vs pictures.
Easter

links_reviews_title: Great Pop of Color, Wore to Work and Dressed up for the Evening!
links_reviews_text: I wanted a cute dress to wear to work for my birthday. This dress was great. Not tight fitting so I felt comfortable and appropriate at work. But the color was so gorgeous I got compliments all day. I changed my shoes and necklace and wore out to dinner and a wine tasting that evening. Dress could be considered "boxy" so if you want form fitting, this ain't it.
This dress is bright but a beautiful shade of hot pink. The dress runs a little large but it is super comfortable. I love the slits at the top and gold zipper in the back. I wish I owned this dress!

Wore this for an honor society induction on a gloomy spring day... and I got so many compliments from men and women! From my cohort-mates and random people on the street... people loved the color (as did I) and the length was perfect. It does run a bit large but that made it more comfortable. The little cut it detail was great too.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: I received a lot of compliments on this dress. The color was much more neon pink than it appeared online but everyone loved the color and so did I! This is winner and I would probably rent it again!
Loved the fit and material. Only slight complaint is the dress lifted when I lifted my arms... not a problem since I'm short but might not work for taller people

Surprisingly this dress is flattering. It did wonders for my hourglass figure and hid my recent belly weight gain. I lost count of the number of people that complemented the color and style of the dress. I will definitely rent again!

Overall I LOVED this dress!! As mentioned above it was incredibly comfortable and did a great job hiding my tummy. The only con I can come up with is that it was brighter than I expected. Like almost fluorescent! I still loved it, but this is def better for a daytime affair rather than a night one.

links_reviews_title: Cute and bright t shirt dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was a fun choice for vacation. The color is more of a fluorescent coral. The fit was pretty casual, like a typical t shirt dress, and the material was thick enough to be forgiving. I would rent again for vacation but not for a formal event.

This dress is very easy and comfortable, while still looking put-together and flattering. I paired it with black tights, boots, and cardi for a holiday party. It's very forgiving, and the material is somewhat stretchy. Just a note that the sluts in the shoulders will show your bra straps - might want to go strapless.

Loved loved this dress. Rented for an outdoor wedding in early September and it was perfect. The color made my fading summer tan pop and the pockets were fun. It's an appropriate length, forgiving in the middle, lightweight, you need to wear a flesh colored bra or a strapless bc you can see your bra straps in the little slits. I went strapless and it worked.

I wore this dress to my cousins outdoor wedding. It was hot and humid but I was comfy all night. The material is thick but has a little stretch and didn't feel too heavy/hot. I felt like the dress was very flattering and I was sad to have to send it back. Paired it with tan shoes and a tan clutch with some gold jewelry. Would definitely rent again!

This dress is the most comfortable thing ever! I've now rented it twice because it fits so well, is comfortable in hot weather, has pockets (!!), and the color is so incredible. The arms fit, which is always my biggest struggle, and it doesn't look like a sac, it is just so great! I would say everyone should get this dress but then I might be worried I couldn't rent it again.

Color (as noted by others) is more coral. Very cute dress. My sister was excited about the pockets, but I didn't care one way or the other. Wore to the theater with wedge sandals. Not sure I'd wear it past August/September as the color to me is really more Spring-time. I wore a bra with nude straps - it wasn't too noticeable. I recommend you wear a strapless.

links_reviews_title: Great bump dress for baby shower
links_reviews_text: After much worrying, I rented this dress in a 4 and a 6 for my baby shower. Normally I am a 4 but being 6 months pregnant I wanted something with a little give. The 6 was a perfect bump dress for me. The length looked great with (nude) heels. I'm 5'5" though so taller girls might have trouble with this one. The color is truly bright pink so be ready! Looks awesome with a tan.
Pretty dress. Comfortable. Love the pockets. Hit right above my knee. A little boxy but easy for my post pardom body. Shows off my new tan with the color.

I loved the cutouts, pockets, and color of the dress. It's definitely more of a hot pink than coral. It is boxy but great for covering flaws. The material is a little warm for summer but I loved this dress.

This dress was a great color and really great dreas to wear to work. Any dress with pockets makes me happy, and the slits on the top added flare. The butt was a littkr tight, but everywhere else fit perfectly.

The color of this dress is amazing. I got soo many compliments on it and everyone was asking where I got it. I wore a bra with a clear strap - regular straps looked bad in the front slits. My only complaint is that RTR's dry cleaning did not totally erase the body odor of whoever rented it before me. It was really strong even after I sprayed the dress with perfume and aired it out for a day. If it wasn't for that this dress would have been my favorite rental yet.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite dresses rented from RTR!
links_reviews_text: This dress was extremely comfortable, and I LOVED the pockets! I rented this for my birthday celebration, which was at a very casual wine bar, and it was perfect for the occassion. It was definitely not as coral as the picture makes it look, but wasn't necessarily highlighter pink - it was a happy medium. The slits at the top were not too much, and I was able to wear a regular nude bra, and you couldn't tell. I wore the same kind of shoes as shown in the picture, but you could easily pair it with wedges, or even flats, and it would work great for a wedding, party, anything! Would definitely rent again, or even buy.
Fit great. Thicker material so has some structure to it. Loved the pockets and cut out detail. More of a bright pink than coral. Looks best with a tan
Rented this for my 13yo daughter and it fit perfectly. The material is soft and appropriate. Very classy and the soft baby blue looks stunning in every light.
I am typically a 4-6 and in order for this to fit properly I had to size up to a 10. Overall, the dress was super comfortable and wore with a strapless bra and spanx.

One of the main reason I rent Elizabeth and James dresses is because they tend to run on the smaller side- which is great for my height and weight. However, I felt that this particular style ran more "true to size" than other E&J styles. Usually I advise people to order 1 size (or 2 sizes) up, but for this particular dress, I don't think its necessary (its also possible that the dress had been stretched out a bit from other renters) And while most E&J dresses allow me to go bra-less, this color made it a little too obvious...and with the unique neck/shoulder line, a strapless or NuBra will do the trick. Still a great dress & received lots of compliments...especially on the color.
Perfect for the Derby. Ran true to size and even though I have a full chest, I had no issues with my normal size.

I rented this as a back up dress for my birthday that I didn't end up wearing, but wish I could have had another party to wear it! Fit absolutely perfectly. Gorgeous color to highlight a tan. A little shorter than I expected, so longer legged girls may find it a bit short. I will definitely be renting this one again.

This dress is gorgeous! I wore it to my boyfriend's graduation. It is the perfect length for a formal occasion - not too short. The dress fit like a glove and I felt very comfortable in it. I wore it with an adhesive strapless bra because the material seemed slightly too thin to go braless in. The color of the dress is much more blue in real life than it appears in photos. I received many compliments for the dress - strangers even stopped in the street to tell me how beautiful it looked. Would definitely rent again!

I liked this dress very pretty color and fabric. Its tight in the bust and you don't necessarily need a bra but I felt more comfortable with a strapless. It was really a feminine, springtime color that made feel very pretty. The fabric is heavy which may be an issue for a summer occasion.

The original dress I ordered was not delivered but the back up size was and unfortunately was too big. To my surprise, a second dress was in the bag in both my size, a 0, and a backup size, a 2. The size 0 second dress was beautiful and fit great however was the palest pink and we were going to a wedding. RTR customer service is awesome! They were so understanding, helped me pick out this dress and overnighted the delivery to me just in time for the wedding!!!!

links_reviews_title: my dd wore this for homecoming.
links_reviews_text: she is 5', 124 lbs, petite, 34 bust, and normally wears a 2 or 4.

Loved the soft color & fit. Perfect for a warm outdoor Texas wedding in September! I'm 5' 7' , 130 lbs and the size 2 & size 4 both fit. I went with the 4 for the extra length though as the 2 was a little shorter than I was comfortable with.

links_reviews_title: How adorable and girly! LOVE Elizabeth and James!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely adorable! Super sexy, but classy with the little skirt! Definitely a little short if you've got a butt! I like showing off the legs so it worked! All the reviews are correct with it running small so I ordered a 10 as my back up(usual 6-8).. and it was perfect!!!! so glad I did because I was pouring out of the 8. I'm muscular with a wide upper body and a 34 D. This dress might not work for larger chested woman! Thank god most of this designers dresses come in a 10 because this is my go to designer!
I always love this brand. The dress was very comfortable and it was the right amount of sexy. I loved being covered up on top but showing off my legs!
Very flattering. Loved it.

Fits really nice could have went a size down but it worked! Super thick material but still breathed well and didn't have to wear a bra which was really nice! Would rent again for sure great experience.

I absolutely loved this dress! I wore it to my nursing Pinning Ceremony. I am 5'4" , 115 lbs, and a 32 D and the size 2 fit perfectly. It was a little on the short side so I chose to wear 3 inch heels for the occasion. The racerback style was super flattering and made the classic fit and flare feel updated. The material was thick and draped perfectly. The powdery blue was even prettier in person. I received so many compliments and will definitely rent this dress again!

This dress fit perfectly! I wore it for a rehearsal dinner for a friends wedding. I am 5'2" with an athletic build and it fit like a glove. I loved the fit and flare as it made it fun and flirty. Would rent again or buy!

Love the light blue/turquoise color, and a perfect dress for graduation. I had to be careful with the skirt when it got windy but it was super flattering (even after a late evening Italian dinner) and I got lots of compliments throughout our events!
Thick body con dress that was somewhat forgiving
Wore this for an outdoor wedding in Florida...it was cool and comfortable! The color is stunning in person and the cut is superb unique

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a fun indoor/outdoor early summer wedding, lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit was so comfortable! Quality material but not hot at all. It was a bit loose around my waist but I have a child size waist with bigger hips/booty, so that's a common problem for me. Otherwise it fit perfect and was very flattering. I had so much fun dancing in it, I got tons of compliments, I wanted to keep it!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a spring wedding. Comfortable yet eye-catching!
links_reviews_text: This dress is super comfortable thanks to the stretchy fabric. The fitted bodice and full skirt create the appearance of a very narrow waist. If you stand up straight and keep your shoulders back the neckline is flattering, but as soon as you slouch you'll see those pesky rolls near the outer armpit/upper front bra area.

This is a perfect spring/summer dress. I love how fun this dress is. It's tight fitting up top and loose and flowy through the bottom. Being bigger chested I did not wear a bra with it. I wore this dress to my sisters outside graduation on a hot 97 degree day. The material is on the thicker side, but it did show where I was sweating under my boobs. Slightly embarrassing. I would recommend wearing a bra with it if you're going to be in an outside environment.

Not a great photo...sorry didn't get a good full body shot. I wore this to a very hot indoor/outdoor wedding in Texas and it was perfect. Light weight but heavy enough material to be covering and comfortable. Somewhat loose up top on the 10 so I went with the 8 and was able to go braless, which was great. Loved the unique neckline - got lots of compliments! It was pretty short, but I was prepared for that from other reviews. Overall was a great dress!
This dress was perfect for me! I am 5"4 and 130lbs, size 32DD. I wore a size 4 and it fit perfect. I would recommend this dress for sure, I love all Elizabeth and James quality and fit!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an athletic body type.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and my accessories. I am 5ft, 125 lbs and have an athletic body. This dress fit me perfect. I got so many compliments and already ordered my next dress!

Loved this dress!!! I'm usually a 0-2 in fit and flare dress styles, depending on the dress. I took a gamble and went with a 0 because the 2 was out of stock. It was a little snug for my liking, I honestly would have preferred a 2, but I still ended up wearing it and I'm glad I did! This dress was perfect and I received lots of compliments!

This was such a pretty dress. I rented it for a rehearsal dinner in Miami. The cut is very flattering for hourglass shapes and really accentuates your waist. I loved the unique shape of the top. It is prettyyy short however, but it was no big deal for this event. Would rent again!
Loved this dress- fun, fit well, and great for a summer wedding! The material is thick and high quality. I'd recommend this to anyone!!

This was my second E&J rental and the dress fit just as well as my other one. It's a pretty, light blue dress that was perfect for the occasion. The straps/top of the dress make it not so plain. Being short, I'm always conscious of where dresses hit me because it can make me look shorter; this dress hit nicely above the knee while not being short enough to be worrisome of it flying up or anything when dancing. I would rent another E&J dress again in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: Perfect color and fit for a bridal shower
links_reviews_text: I love the cut of this dress and the material is beautiful. The neckline and fit and flare style are very flattering. This does run quite small though. I ordered a 0 and a 2; I wore the 2 but I would have been better off in a 4.

I rented this for a bachelorette party in Nashville and LOVED it. Fit was awesome and the sleeve/neckline was fun and different. The color popped as well. Super happy with this pick and got lots of compliments.

I loved this dress! The fit was flattering and the material was thick. I loved the color and think it's a really great dress for a spring wedding or party! I ended up not wearing it because it was a little cold on the day I wanted to wear it, but I will definitely rent again.
Wore the 2 but would have been more comfortable in the 4 for sure!

This dress was wonderful! The color is such a nice baby blue and the length is short enough to show some skin, yet still modest. The neckline is high, but not tight around the me know, it's a very soft fabric that's easy to move around in and keeps you cool. My one complaint is that it's a little tight around the bust, but overall a great experience and a great dress.

I ordered the 2 with a 4 as my backup size as I read from previous reviews that it runs small, and I am rather busty for a petite woman. However, I think I could have probably gone for the 0 as the 2 was a little loose but not visibly so. The dress is lined so it's a little on the thicker side, giving it some weight (no need to worry about gusts of wind) and it definitely looked formal enough for such a simple dress. Overall it was very comfortable, and I don't really have anything to complain about.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a beautiful & classy barn wedding that I attended in Charlevoix, MI.
links_reviews_text: The dress is extremely comfortable - you won't have to make wardrobe adjustments all night. It's a simple design, but very easy to dress up with a necklace and looked great with a nude pair of shoes. I was able to walk around all day and night with ease. I am 5'3", 130 lbs with a larger bust and straight/narrow body type.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a horse race!
links_reviews_text: Dress definitely runs true to size. I have always rented Elizabeth and James dresses before so I had a feeling the 4 would be similar to their other dresses. I love this dress! The material was a little thicker, but not too bad for being in the sun at a horse race for most of the day. I didn't need to wear a bra either!

I ordered this dress in a 2 and a 4, as I was anxious about how it would fit based on all the reviews. I am normally a 0 or 2 depending on the brand. The night before my delivery I got an email that the 4 I was expecting wouldn't be coming with my order because it was returned damaged by the previous renter and was SO nervous. Turns out, the 2 fit perfectly! The cut was SO flattering; I loved the color. And the dress was SO COMFORTABLE. the dress is thick enough to hold you in place but has decent stretch, so after a couple drinks and a meal I didn't feel like it was too tight. I couldn't be happier with the whole experience. I'm very short, so didn't find length to be an issue (tho the skirt does fly up a little if you spin while dancing) ...and it did show some sweat after a night on the dance floor (at an outdoor wedding in August) I wish I could've kept this dress forever and I will definitely rent another Elizabeth& James dress soon!
Loved the fit and color.

I rented this dress for a rehearsal dinner that was half-inside and half-outside. I absolutely loved this dress and have tried to rent it a couple of afters my first time and it's always sold out in all sizes. The dress is a great color that is slightly out of the norm, but is not too in your face. The neckline and cuts around the arms are sooo flattering! The material is great for a outdoor summer event!

links_reviews_title: Stand out in this royal blue
links_reviews_text: Dress is simple but it definitely accentuates your curbs and the color pops. Received many compliments

I just had a baby 4 months ago and still feeling in between sizes. This rental was perfect! The material is thicker and the ribbed fabric makes it very flattering. I loved that it hit under the knee which For me, worked well for a winter wedding and getting away without wearing tights! The dress does run small so I'd suggest going up one size for the back up. All in all, I highly recommend this dress!

For reference, I'm 5 feet, 115 pounds, and just had a baby less than 1 year ago. Loved the way this dress fitted my body like a structured glove. The strategic ruching worked well and hid my postpartum belly while the material hugged my every curve like a gentle hug. It was comfy and I was able to walk, eat and dance at my company holiday party. Highly recommend for those looking for a form fitting dress with a little give!

Loved the stretch in this dress. It was very form fitting but stretchy so very comfortable. The color is an amazing, vibrant royal blue. The shoulders had to be tugged down a bit to remain off the shoulder throughout the night but it was fine for me. Easy to sit and dance in. I loved it!

This dress is made for curves!! Sucks you in at all the right places. Color is gorgeous. Many compliments. I do feel like the one I got though must have been worn by a woman with a "baby bump" as I think the middle was slightly more stretched than it should have been. Still looked great but would have looked better if worn less.

links_reviews_title: The color is stunning! So many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. Even hid my Squeam (all ladies need this especially if you want that hourglass shape!)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blue for an outdoor Florida wedding
links_reviews_text: Form fitting, beautiful color. Overall, a beautiful dress, no complaints :)

links_reviews_title: Should have paid attention to the instructions
links_reviews_text: I should have paid attention on how to wear this dress as I wore it incorrectly the whole time. It left me wondering why one shoulder kept rising up. User error. The dress showed signs of being well worn, which was a bit of a bummer, but no one else seemed to notice.
I wore this to a work winter ball. I plan to keep it for another month and wear it on a cruise.
I wore this dress to a Policeman's Ball and I received many compliments on it! It was stretchy and forgiving. The fabric was great.

Pros: This dress was a great color, and had a thickness to it that made it dressier than your average cocktail dress. Worked well for this event (charity dinner and auction). I liked the off the shoulder look, and the length was fine. It hit me a little above the knee, and I'm 5'11. The material is structured but had a lot of stretch. Cons: I noticed before putting it on that the seam on both sizes was coming apart. One size it was down the middle, and on the other size it was on the side. Being 32 weeks pregnant, it was noticeable that the seam was open once I put the dress on. I used fashion tape and was able to hide it pretty well. The sizing was a little annoying. I specifically searched using the "maternity" and "third trimester" filter, and found this one. I went up several sizes but it still was pretty tight, I would've liked to go up one more. The order arrived after the return window so they couldn't send a new one. So that was a bummer. I still made the dress work, and it was fine, but definitely tight by the end of the night. I didn't even take a picture in it, just got out of that thing as quick as possible. I do have a picture from when I was trying it on though. If pregnant, this dress will work but make sure to go up SEVERAL sizes. I am usually a 0 or 2, and wore a 6. I would've liked to have had an 8, just for some extra belly space.
Great color, great fit! I was also able to shimmy out of this when my husband wasn't there to help me with the zipper!

links_reviews_title: Bump was on display, in a comfortable way!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great -- sized up because of my 4-month baby bump. Zipper was a little tough to get up, but not because of fit. Dress was SO comfortable, color was true to website, and overall I loved the dress and the comfortable level for a day-long wedding! The only con I have is that the seam down the middle tended to stray, making my baby bump look at bit odd, but that was the only issue with this dress!
Great fit.... stretchy and forgiving. Gives you curves in all the right places! Length hit just below my knee. Very comfortable too... I would rent again

Perfect fit for hourglass shape. Dress had great structure and yet it was breathable and light. Easy to move around in. If you want to look classic and sophisticated, but still feel sexy this dress is great for you.

links_reviews_title: The color is perfect for an outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear an 8 or a 10 but I chose the 10. The material is very heavy and stretchy. Literally fits like a glove. This dress hides all your flaws but shows off your good curves.

Dress fits true to size; although, I liked the 6 over the 4 because the zipper layed a little flatter. The shoulders stayed put and the dress was comfortable. Hugs all the right spots to show off curves without showing bulges. Loved the dress and would rent it again!
Very figure flattering, easy to wear, comfortable. Got tons of compliments.

I loved this dress and the fabric was so stretchy that I was able to fit a 6 (never even bothered trying on the 8). I received tons of compliments and was able to dance the night away. The straps did ride up a little bit, but nothing too annoying. I paired them with pointy nude pumps and the RTR Lele Sadoughi Striped Hinged Slider Bracelet, which I loved too! I wore a pair of RTR Kate Spade studs, but you can't see them in the picture. Would definitely rent again.

The dress fit amazing! The fit was flattering and snug, and the color was very vibrant, more like a purplish-blue instead of blue. Like other reviewers have mentioned I had to keep adjusting the shoulder straps. Even so I received a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Wore with Lulu Frost Satine bracelet and earrings.
links_reviews_text: Tried on size 4 in the store and it fit, but opted to wear the size 6 as more comfortable and allowed room to eat wedding food! I'm 5'9 , normally wear size 4, 139 lbs., 27" waist, size D bust.
The straps were a little annoying and it was pretty loose around my knees but tight everywhere else. I could have worn the smaller size but was too lazy to change again. Would recommend.

The fit is true to size and hugs all your curves. Spanx would be good cuz it shows everything! I also did not wear a bra and I'm a 36 DD. The shoulders do come up a bit at times but it's not bad. I got a ton of compliments! I felt soooo sexy!!

I loved this dress. I'm 5'8", 170 lbs, 36A cup, athletic build. The fabric is forgiving and is a great weight so it sits perfectly and keeps your tucked in- hides flaws and is so slenderizing! I felt beautiful and lean. I was worried about being able to lift my arms to hug and dance, but it wasn't a problem at all because of the give in the fabric. It also stayed perfectly put all night- the fabric never slouches or sags. I danced all night long, gave a million hugs, and was all over the place and it was terrific. A great choice for an active evening.

links_reviews_title: The dress was very form fitting and comfortable to wear. The fabric does stretch a little.
links_reviews_text: Only con was that the dress came in with a small hole on the side. The hole was not very noticeable. Also, the shoulder straps did tend to roll up every once in a while.
Super comfortable dress! The rouching gave the illusion of curves (I'm an athletic build) and I got tons of compliments. I would totally buy this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect cocktail dress for an elegant wedding
links_reviews_text: My first time getting a RTR dress. I will definitely rent a dress again. Received many compliments. The color and fit were perfect.

I loved this dress! At first I didn't think I'd be able to fit into it but it fit like a glove and so comfortable. I decided to wear the 6 instead of 4 so I had more room, the 4 was a little snug. Like I read in other reviews, I had to keep fixing the shoulders but otherwise it was great. Very flattering for all body types.

Perfect for my cousin's summer wedding. Material is thick & comfortable, & it clung to my body in all the right places. Great for dancing as well. Received tons of compliments. I will be renting this one again!

This dress hugged my minimal curves in all the right ways and was a gorgeous shade of pure blue. It worked very well for my skin tone and was just bright enough for the night cruise wedding we attended. I'm 5'1" and a 32C, and the size 4 fit perfectly and at the ideal length. Sorry I don't have a full-length picture, I guess I was enjoying the event too much to remember to take one for the RTR community!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments! The color is very vibrant!
links_reviews_text: The structure of the dress is very flattering. A lot of people went out of their way to compliment this dress! I wore it with spanx and had a great time. While I danced, though, the sleeves did pop up a lot.

I have put on weight recently, and I was feeling self conscious leading up to my husband's holiday party. But this dress has a lot of structure and the material is a good weight. It does a good job of hiding all the lumps and bumps. I ordered a 8, which is my current size, and a 10 as the backup. The 10 was unavailable, but the 8 ended up fitting just fine. It was snug, but not uncomfortable. The sleeves/straps did tend to ride up, but I wasn't dancing or anything, so it wasn't a huge deal.
It fit just right. Though the off the shoulder sleeve were a tad big but I have that problem with a lot clothes because of my small frame. But it was a beautiful dress and I loved it!
This dress was so pretty the color was great and I got several compliments. The straps were a little uncomfortable and it's hard to raise your arms but overall great dress!

I rented both the 0 and a 2. The 2 was much more comfortable and the one I wore. The dress was very snug, but in a way that you could move and eat without it feeling too tight. The arms came up a little throughout the night, but it wasn't annoying at all. The color is beautiful.

Comfortable, well-made wrinkle free dress! Ideal for the Fall outdoor evening wedding! So appreciated the stylist, Char ensuring all the details were covered! Great not to have to pack a dress for the occasion!

This review is actually for my beautiful mother, who wore this dress in a size 4 which fit true to size. She absolutely loved this dress and she is now HOOKED on renting! The off the shoulder look is totally flattering and she had no issues (even when dancing up a storm) keeping the straps pulled down. There wasn't an issue of them rising up at all. She is a bit bustier but felt completely comfortable in this dress. She is about 5'2" with a shorter torso and the dress hit at about her knees. Even being a bit longer, it still looked fabulous. The color is absolutely stunning. What else can I say? This dress will not disappoint.

I was so tired of buying dresses I would never wear again. I saw an ad on Facebook and tried it out. The dresses came by UPS when they were supposed to. The color, fit and material were amazing. This is the only way I'm doing it for now on.

This dress is absolutely stunning and I received compliments all night! When the dress first arrived it looked TINY so I was really worried. But, it fit like a glove and shows off your curves in all the right ways! My only complaint is the straps would not stay down on my shoulders so I was pulling them down all night. The color is also slightly more purple than the royal blue I was expecting but it matched my dates tie perfectly! I felt like a million bucks in this dress and would definitely recommend it!

First getting into the dress it felt snug and hard to zip, but it was actually very comfortable and pretty forgiving. This is not a great dress for lots of movement and dancing - the right off-the-shoulder strap kept wandering up, the center seam tended to migrate, and the sheath wasn't stretchy enough to allow for energetic dancing, but it was very pretty and I liked the way it felt.

links_reviews_title: I wish I could've given this 5 stars, but....Read my Details Review.
links_reviews_text: I quickly found this LBD in store, and it wasn't until I tried it on, did I fall in love with the design details (this is why couture reigns supreme): it has a peek-a-boo neckline, side slits on both legs, an open back portal cut, and it has a drawstring at the base of the portal cut, that you can tie into a bow, to tighten the torso and back, which I thought was another darling touch. It fit my body like a glove. Not once did I have to adjust the hemline! It was only when, a few hours later, I changed into this dress, did I discover the zipper had come off the track midway at the bust line seam, and there was no fixing it.
