The takeaway: It's a fresh design on the classic LBD, and has the versatility to be your OOTD/IRL, for your date night or a dress you'd wear to a special event. I absolutely loved this dress: it's a bummer about the zipper issue.

First off, this dress fit but size up. Even when I was pregnant I never wore a size 16! But a 16 fit well in this line (currently a 10/12). The upper back gaps so you can see the tag. And you can see bra straps through the arm openings so wear no bra, strapless or at least a nude bra. Fabric is cool- sturdy but flexible. Also my dress didn't have the strings hanging down the front. I liked the look of that in front and back and for whatever reason mine didn't have that detail in the front. Regretted wearing this dress to my event like 5 mins after putting it on. It worked out okay but would never get this again.

I loved wearing this dress. The front tire in the picture was not on the dress that I had - and it was fine the way it was. The back tie I ended up tucking into the dress but I could've gone either way with that. Overall, I felt great in the dress and got lots of compliments. The size I wore was a UK 14 or US 10

links_reviews_title: Pictures don't do this dress justice!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress and super flattering. I popped the tags and it looked WAY BETTER in person than on the site. Pros: stretch caddy fabric flatters all the curves and fits like a glove Cons: only one- the top droops a bit on the keyhole back with drawstring. I covered easily with my hair but it would be visible if you wear you hair up completely. Styled for an opening night show with white booties, a white statement necklace and a full length red plaid wool coat (RTR).
fit well, though my regular size is a 10 and this was 14R -

links_reviews_title: Wore this to me senior thesis show and everyone loved it!
links_reviews_text: The only change i would make is that the chest feels a little big. I'm a 34a --otherwise i felt fabulous!
Perfect fit and the bow on the back was an amazing touch!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Got tons of compliments. No bra needed. Would rent this again. 34d
links_reviews_text: True to size. Great dress

links_reviews_title: The second dress I ordered didn't fit so I got to pick two more and they overnightted them to me!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful! The only issue I had was the back zipper was a bit to long for my torso, so we used a safety pin to pull tighter. Pockets were awesome!

This dress was amazing! I am so glad I rented it. I was the best man's date (had to be since I'm married to him) and all night people complimented this dress! The groom told my husband I looked like a WW2 pin up girl! Hahah! :-) I originally ordered the 2, when it didn't fit, I called and they immediately shipped one to Arkansas where the wedding was. I am so happy with my experience!

This dress was adorable, I loved the back so much but unfortunately didn't wear it. I could zip it up but it was so tight at the waist that I would not have been comfortable eating and drinking. I would rent again in the next size up as it was very flattering, had pockets and the material was lovely!
I LOVE this dress - the only thing I didn't love was that I had to get a different backless bra because it stuck out on the sides of this. But with the new bra it fit like a charm!

links_reviews_title: I loves this dress. It was perfect for a summer wedding outside. Easy to move in very flattering.
links_reviews_text: This was a great fit for me. Higher waist and flared skirt are flattering for my body type since I carry more weight on the bottom :)

links_reviews_title: Perfect for dancing at a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a summer wedding. I wanted something that would show off my back and arms, and I loved the fit! I wore it braless, since I am small-chested. Loved the back, and the POCKETS. I got so many compliments, and was able to comfortably dance the night away.

Like other reviews said, this dress is EXTREMELY tight in the rib cage area. I simply could not eat at the wedding. The bigger size fit better, but the bust area was just so large that you could see everything. The side boob area is not very forgiving. Overall, I received a ton of compliments on this dress and I loved how it made me feel. The skirt is very full and princessy and I absolutely adored the bow detail in the back, so I had a ton of fun wearing it (while standing up). Sitting down in this dress was another story. If you are bigger chested, I would encourage ordering a size up. As much as I loved this dress, I probably would not order it again simply because it was either entirely too small in the rib cage area or entirely too large in the bust area.

links_reviews_title: Perfect match for Chile and American flags for the 60th Anniversary Gala of the Tempel Lippizans.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. I'm very color coordinated conscious. Wanted a formal yet casual classic chic dress for the 60th Anniversary Gala of the Tempel Lippizans. Riders from Chile's Classical Riding School flew in. I wanted to represent both American and Chile flags with a navy blue, plus the Tempel rider's uniforms are a dark royal blue. Unfortunately it was 63Â° and raining for part, so I was quite cold. Loved the pockets. Very well constructed of heavy material. Great lining. I am a 32 A/AA with a 24" waist and very small ribcage. Wore the 2 as the 0 wasn't available. Still very roomy in the bust and under the arms and upper ribcage. (Was going to have my mom do a slipsitch to tuck the excess fabric but wound up not.) I wore a super padded VS Add 2 Cups Bombshell bra just to barely fill it out. Not a dress for A or B cup women!!! Don't know why people say you can't wear a bra as a strapless is easily hidden. Could even wear a T-back bra. Would definitely buy. Want to ask RTR if they'd sell it to me as I can't find it online anywhere to purchase.
Great dress & high quality. Perfect for a golf club 60's party.

This dress was the best. Got so many compliments. The pockets were the highlight for me. Pockets were similar to Mary Poppin's purse. I probably could've stored umbrellas and puppies in there if I needed to.

The diress fit me just right way. The shape is great and hugs your body in all the right places. I felt very comfortable through the day and the open back was great to stay cool wile dancing. I personally did not even need a bra but if needed, a sticky or tape would work fine. I received many many compliments :)

Lots of compliments for a June formal wedding and lots of dancing. It was my back up but ended up being a perfect dress! Pockets, cute bow on the back, fun cut. Problems: The zipper was a bit of a struggle (potentially due to my horrible posture) but easy to correct! The waist was very tight but I could breathe and I also have no boobs so the rest fit very nicely.

links_reviews_title: This Back up option fit better......
links_reviews_text: Luckily I picked this as alternative option. So many compliments and very comfortable. Loved the pockets.

I wore this for a wedding and it was so fun to dance in! The flowy skirt was great! Love that I could wear a bra with it and the pockets are an added bonus. The top is a little loose if you are small chested but other than that no complaints. The bow in the back is a fun added detail!
This dress was PERFECT! From the halter top cut, to the pockets and overall fit! Such a fun dress to dance the night away in!!! I LOVE this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect. Love the pockets, fit and flare, bow in backso hair up is strongly recommend
links_reviews_text: Glamorous fun cute bow in back

I wore this to perform at a Studio Recital. It has the perfect balance of modesty and class I needed, w/o sacrificing looking cute. I normally wear a 6 but ended up fitting in the 4 better - it fit my waist area very nicely. I received compliments all evening. And there are pockets!

This dress is amazing! I'm usually an 8 and this 8 fit perfectly. I also ordered the 6, which fit as well, but was more comfortable in the 8. I am rather busty (32DDD) and this dress had plenty of room for me. A little bit of side boob, but nothing indecent. The fabric is thick and feels luxurious. I felt so pretty in this dress and really wish I could have bought it. Lots of compliments. Also, pockets!

Received this dress as an emergency back up (my original dress and size was not available). Did not love at first, but my husband convinced me it was a great dress and it totally was. You can't wear a bra because of the back, but I did not find that to be a problem. The dress does show a little more side boob than I'm used to, but everything stayed in place. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing such a stunning dress. I had a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this for a sorority formal. I got a size two and a size zero for backup. Since the dress fits larger, I ended up wearing the backup dress. I would definitely recommend ordering your normal dress size and then order a size down just in case. For me, I definitely had to go down a size. I absolutely loved this dress and would wear it again! I had a lot of girls compliment me on this dress.

links_reviews_title: Had so much fun wearing this dress!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for a winter cocktail event! The fabric was incredible and i received numerous compliments! The seam at the waist was a bit snug but I felt more supported up top in the 4 than the 6. Oh! And the pockets were amazing! Who doesn't love pockets?!? Would definitely love to rent this one again!

The dress was difficult to zip around the beaded belt. It took a solid 10 minutes and I definitely wouldn't have been able to zip it on my own. Once zipped, it fit like a glove and I felt beautiful! I paired it with a blanket scarf since the party was on a rooftop.

links_reviews_title: "If your wedding dress could be short and blue, this should be it"
links_reviews_text: A coworker said that to me because they said the dress was so stunning! The material was heavy and the dress was well made. I loved the back! You could get away with not wearing a bra with this, but I wore sticky boobs!

links_reviews_title: I never felt more beautiful, the dress fit perfect.
links_reviews_text: My spray tan was the perfect finishing touch to this dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, fancy dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: Love: pockets! I put my iphone 6 in it. YASS! Pockets are everything. color is beautiful! It's a beautiful navy blue fit and flare dress. things to think about: Suggest wearing a stick bra. The back is beautiful and looks gorgeous if you have a back piece. The arm sides cut in a little. I wore a short cardigan to cover that up. I'm 5'2 and this dress did not make me feel short. height-5'2 weight-145 ish bust 36c and I also fit into a 34 size bra hourglass ish figure.

links_reviews_title: The neckline and the back of this dress makes everyone love it! POCKETS! No bra
links_reviews_text: Dress did fit a little tight on my ribcage so I put my spanx on. Even though the dress back is cut out I was still able to wear them. I wore nipple stickies and used fashion tape on the side of the dress so I was able to really boogie without flashing anyone (this isn't necessary). Received compliments all evening. SUPER comfortable and has pockets for your phone and lipstick.

links_reviews_title: Great color Heavy duty material that is good quality
links_reviews_text: Fits snugly in the rib cage. I sized down so that the full skirt wouldn't overwhelm it but I was glad I did. I wasn't uncomfortable I. The size down and it created a better fit up top. If you are busty up top I would recommend doing your true size. Very busty, probably not a good choice for you, unfortunately as I can imagine there would be lots of "side-boob".

links_reviews_title: Not really a good picture, but the one at the right end!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, I am 5'3 125 lbs and it was a perfect size and fit. Got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and flattering, received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wedding and absolutely loved it. It was a pretty formal event and I felt like this dress was formal enough but still fun. I ordered a 10 and 8, but 10 ended up being way too big on top. Be prepared to wear a backless bra since it's pretty open in the back. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! So comfortable and cute.
links_reviews_text: The back of this dress is truly the star or maybe the pockets....Fit was perfect and overall great style for a summer wedding in Texas.
This dress was truly beautiful fit was perfect I received lovely compliments all night

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect fit! Hides flaws in all the right areas
links_reviews_text: No need to wear bra with this (36C worked with the zero) and I usually do so I was a little worried, beautiful color, hit just above the knee (I am 5'2"). Super cute back makes it unique!

Beautiful navy color with fun back. Be prepared to wear backless undergarments/tape as the back was quite low (other reviewers were able to wear a strapless bra so maybe it's a height thing?). Ran a tad small in the waist, even when sizing up. Worn with black minimal sandals and a red lip. Got compliments all night!

Loved this fun dress! Had a great swing that was perfect for dancing. Fabric was thick enough that I didn't have to wear a bra which was good as the back detail would have presented challenges with bra straps/bands. I received a ton of compliments on it! The fit was mostly true to size but, as the top was a little loose, I reinforced with fashion tape on the sides.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress. The classic party dress look from the front and the unique open back AND POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: As other reviewers said, it was a little snug in the waist but not visibly or uncomfortably so. I wore an adhesive bra and felt the top fit well, no issues. Loved the full skirt and pockets make everything better! Highly recommend this rental!
The length was great to dance in all night. The material was thick but flowy and light. The back showed just the right amount of skin to be classy and comfy. It has pockets!!!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress for a cocktail reception
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a winter wedding reception in San Diego. The color is dreamy, and the cut on top was quite flattering â€” I didnâ€™t end up with that pesky armpit fat problem. The shape of the dress was also very forgiving on the belly. The back was really cute, so I wore my hair in a wavy ponytail. Because of the back, I thought Iâ€™d have to wear a Nubra or pasties, but I ended up without a bra at all and the material was thick enough so it was fine. Iâ€™m usually between a 6 and 8, and the two sizes were pretty similar. The 8 was just a bit loose around the collar, the 6 sat flatter. I wish it was a bit shorter, it was a lot of skirt. I wore it with Kate Spadeâ€™s Pick a Pearl Graduated Necklace.
I liked this dress. It's very comfortable and the material is thick enough that I could wear it without a bra. The shoulder straps fell off my shoulders pretty easily but other that that great fit.
Good fit. Has some stretch but the material was soft that the seam on one side came a little undone during wear
Dress was comfortable and had a nice shape. Very unforgiving color. Be prepared to show it all even with spanx. The top of the neckline kept folding over as well

links_reviews_title: August wedding rental for the win!
links_reviews_text: The dress was well made and fit perfectly over my baby bump. #8months #wedding

links_reviews_title: I loved the bright color & the simplicity of the lines of the dress! I felt sexy & fun.
links_reviews_text: I danced for HOURS in this dress and it held up the whole time. It hugged my curves beautifully-- though the bust was too large for me as a 36B. In the end though that didn't matter too much thanks to the neck tie. Very fun dress!
This dress was a hit! I was a bridesmaid and felt so pretty! Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Fit perfect and is pretty, just didn't go with this one!
links_reviews_text: This was one of my two backups, as my original dress didn't fit at all. This fit like a glove and looked great on, although the pictures aren't the most flattering lol I would definitely rent again though, knowing exactly how it looks. Maybe for another spring/summer wedding, and with more of a tan!
Beautiful color! The fabric has stretch but the fit is slightly small. I am typically a size 0/2 and the size small fit perfectly. Comfortable and absolutely perfect for a wedding or special event!

The fabric had a great stretch and the dress itself was very comfortable. At 5'3" I personally wouldn't wear it with flat shoes because of the cocktail length but with my heels, it was extremely flattering. I usually avoid cleavage at all costs (with 36DD it personally makes me uncomfortable) but this dress was just the right amount of classy in that area with a basic strapless bra. I did have to wear spandex because without it, you could see the indent of my belly button and I absolutely hate that, but with the spandex, that was not an issue at all. Compliments all night on this dress!
The dress is very comfortable and stretchy. Loved the fit and flexibility of the dress.

This dress is super tight. I love the way it looked when I tried it on, but I knew it wouldn't be comfortable for a long event. It would be perfect for a special dinner or date, but not a long event like a wedding or a dance. I went with my backup style.

This dress is definitely form fitting but I loved how it hugged my curves and the fabric is very stretchy and thick enough that undergarments are hidden. I used a stick on bra for extra support but it isn't necessary. I loved the color - it is melon, not pink and it is very flattering!

Showed off my curves in all the right places, made me feel sexy and confident without being too revealing. The material is thicker than may be expected but still soft and comfortable. Not the most widely applicable, but I had gotten knee surgery a couple months before and the dress covered my brace perfectly and the flowy bottom gave me plenty of space to move around and be comfortable. Due to the surgery heels and thus long gowns were out of the question but this dress blended in beautifully with everyone's black tie optional attire.

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful and will rent again!
links_reviews_text: I was so happy in this dress overall. The color was lovely. The fabric is thick, high quality, and very comfortable. It hugged my curves, but didn't show too much skin. I walked around in this dress all afternoon. I wore it for the daytime portion of my bachelorette party, and I felt special.
Tight around stomach

links_reviews_title: Attended a beautiful outdoor wedding. Dress fit the occasion perfectly
links_reviews_text: The material is thick and smoothed out my waistline. I am 5'4", size 6 and felt the regular length was a bit long in the body for me. The straps that did not adjust gaped in the back, the bustline rolled at the top. If you are kind of in between regular and short build, maybe order 2 different lengths!

I rented this as a back up for a beach wedding in June and I am so glad I decided to go with my first pick. The fabric was incredibly heavy and almost made it hard to move around in comfortably. It was also a bit too big on me. I felt like I was playing dress up with this one!
I wanted this dress work! The color is beautiful, but the fit is odd and the fabric bunches in a funny way. I think it may look better on a taller girl?
Very unflattering. Seams are heavy and thick.

links_reviews_title: Didnâ€™t wear for my event but will definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: I couldnâ€™t decide between two dresses when looking online, so I rented this and another. I loved the fit of this dress, it was form fitting but not so much that I felt uncomfortable. It didnâ€™t work out for me to wear this to the wedding I went to, but I have 3 more coming up soon and will definitely rent it again!
This dress fits so well and I got so many compliments. I felt amazing wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and sexy, but odd fitting torso
links_reviews_text: Strange fit through the torso so I had to keep tugging at it throughout the evening. That said, it is a beautiful dress made with thick comfortable, yet supportive material. No bra needed.
Easy black shirt to wear, Work appropriate, worn at 28 weeks with plenty of room to wear further along in the pregnancy !

links_reviews_title: This is for an early 2nd trimester bump
links_reviews_text: The overall fabric did not have any give and wasnâ€™t very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Looks nice, thick fabric, not stretchy
links_reviews_text: I liked the shirt, it fit nicely on my 19 week bump. I ordered a small and it fit really well (I'm 5'4" 140lbs currently) The fabric is a little firm and and little heavy. Not a shirt I would want to own, and ultimately I wasn't really crazy about it. But it did look nice and fit well. Just not my personal style.
This was a gorgeous top, but it ran wayyy too small to fit over my chest. I haven't had any issues with Luther maternity tops in this size.

Fits true to size - I ordered my pre-pregnancy size and it fit great at 29-30 weeks. For reference, I am 5'3 and was 130 lbs pre-pregnancy, and have gained about 16 lbs so far. The shirt was flattering and not too boxy like a lot of other maternity shirts are.
Very cute shirt, pretty lace, fits well. However, very stiff and uncomfortable-- especially for the third trimester of pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: Nice top, no need to size up
links_reviews_text: This is a nice quality shirt. It doesn't have stretch (which is a pleasant change in my maternity wardrobe) so I ordered a medium to accommodate my 30 week pregnant belly. I'm usually a small and this shirt was too big, I think my regular size would have been fine.

This is a beautiful top, very classic. Transitions from work to dinner, and not too tight on my second trimester bump! There is no stretch, but it lays really well. I have strong arms and this top just accommodates... if you have larger arms you might feel a bit tight in it.

links_reviews_title: Bold color and shows off the curves
links_reviews_text: Fits beautifully with great comfort and an incredible silhouette. Got tons of compliments all day long.
If your boobs are bigger than a B cup, this is not for you. Major side boob in a not so chic way.

links_reviews_title: Must wear a shirt under this otherwise fun dress
links_reviews_text: If you are completely flat chested maybe, possibly you could wear this dress with no shirt under it. I'm a 34C and the dress was cut so it only covered the center of my chest. Not just a tiny bit of side-boob, but full on "half-boob". I put a black t-shirt under it, but then the lines were kinda weird. So I put a cardigan over. That solved the problem and I got a few complements on it. It's a fun dress. Lots of give and also hugs curves. But be prepared to deal with the weird incredibly narrow cut of the top and very long arm holes.
I had to wear a T-shirt under it

I got the medium and large but ended up wearing the large. While they both fit, it's a very clingy dress and I felt like the large clung to every lump and bump slightly less. It's a cute dress but it's actually kind of plain despite the bronze print. The material is also a little scratchy, but that didn't bother me too much. I expected it to me nicer than it was, so I didn't love it.
It looked great, but the elasticity of the material made the overall dress not stay in place. Also, I got the size SP instead of S. I went out latin dancing with this dress.
Stretchy, comfortable, festive, fun - perfect!

links_reviews_title: easy, comfortable winning black and gold dress! perfect for your cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: perfect, comfortable and easy black and gold dress. elegant and fun to wear. the gold add fun to it but its the perfect balance between traditional and edgy.
Surprisingly comfy and so flattering!
Fit was easy and flattering on the stomach but the dress as a whole didn't blow me away. Sparkle was faint
This is a form fitting dress. I ended up not wearing it because it felt more bodycon than elegant affair, but it's quite pretty. Hit just above my knees and the sleeves went to mid-arm.

I ended up wearing the large because the medium tended to ride up. I recommend sizing up if your normal size is curve-hugging already. The fabric has plenty of stretch so the large looked about the same, but didn't ride up. Wore this to my spouse's holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Sparkly gold effect dresses up a simple dress
links_reviews_text: Good fit at 7months pregnant

links_reviews_title: Perfect with high knee black boots in the winter time!
links_reviews_text: Great, thick material which is perfect for winter time. Very sparkly gold features. It is long! I'm 5'6" and it reached my knees.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Has some stretch which is PERFECT
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately they didn't have the size 6 available and I think that would have fit best. Both the 4 and 8 fit but the 8 was just more comfortable, and who doesn't prefer comfort? Great dress, has some stretch and was great for a winter wedding.

I rented this dress for my husband's company holiday party so I wanted to look nice but "conservative". This dress fit perfectly. It wasn't too tight, felt more like a shift dress, the fabric was very comfortable. It was the perfect length and I wasn't pulling at my dress all night. If there was dancing I'm sure I would've been comfortable (but alas no dancing at this event). I only wish that I had paired it with a large colorful necklace (which I unfortunately don't have) but I made it work with other accessories. I would highly recommend renting this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for company holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress as a backup for my company's holiday party -- and it turned out to be the winner! It fit great. Wasn't too tight in any areas, had a lot of stretch to it and was very forgiving in not hugging areas too tight. The lace sleeves were comfy and stretchy -- not scratchy at all. My only complaint was it was a little short and tight at the bottom, and I felt like it kept riding up especially when I sat down. Tights are basically a must...or just be very careful.

LOVE this dress. Super flirty. It fits like a glove and the lace has a little bit of stretch. Wearing to my 30th bday dinner and wanted to make sure I wore something comfortable that I could actually eat in. It's short but not too short and you could wear this literally anywhere - except church maybe.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for a formal fundraising event with colleagues.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly, it was comfortable, and the sleeves had some stretch to the lace.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a dream and was the perfect mix of sexy and appropriate!
links_reviews_text: At 5â€™2, I was concerned about the length, but it was absolutely perfect!!I loved that I could wear a regular bra, and was able to move comfortably all night. I have muscular arms that I wanted to cover, so the lace sleeves were exactly what I needed. The neckline was also flattering, and I didnâ€™t feel like I needed too much jewelry. Overall, I loved this dress and hated to return it!

links_reviews_title: Felt great in this dress for a work event of my husband's.
links_reviews_text: Size is true to form. Was really comfortable and received a lot of compliments. I wore blue shoes to give it a little color pop.

Wore this dress to a gala and it was perfect! It was fairly true to size. I usually wear a 4 or 2 and ended up wearing the 4. I think the 2 would have been way too tight. Very comfortable! It was a bit short but it worked out well.

If you have a more straight up and down build, you will love this dress. I'm curvy/athletic so I found it somewhat ill fitting. I didn't feel that it was flattering, but I received lots of compliments.

Wore this for our holiday office party/dinner. The size 2 fit perfect (didn't try on the 4). The lace had some stretch to it. Was super comfortable & could wear a regular bra. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress and super easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Great dress and easy to wear. Super comfortable. I could have worn the 2 but the 4 fit better in the bust.
Absolutely great dress- soft lace, very comfortable. Warning: I'm 5'4" and I found it to be short! Between the 6 and the 8 i choose the 8 for a bit more room. Will definitely rent again!
I usually wear a 10 but that size became unavailable so I got an 8 delivered and it got great. The dress is very stretchy and forgiving!

links_reviews_title: The overall experience was great, the dress was not in excellent condition.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little loose on the waistline (I am 4'11"and 100 lbs) but the overall look was perfect for the occasion. The dress was not in mint condition, there were a few signs of being worn a lot of times but the overall experience was easy and great.
- not too short or long - very classy and would rent 1000 times more!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night or with the girls
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my friends bachelorette party. I'm a huge lace fan and this dress was perfect. The lace was stretchy where I was able to dance and have fun. I usually wear a four but opted for the 6 because it was a little short. This is about my 8th RTR experience and I never have an issue. Loveeeee RTR !

I used this dress for my holiday party last year and needed a dress that was comfortable, yet simple and elegant and I got this exactly with this dress. I would say it fits true to size, I ordered both 0 and 2, and I could have gotten away with wearing either size, 0 seemed to fit better.

I ended up liking this dress a lot more than I thought I would! It was very flattering without being super form fitting. It looked sexy while still being classy since I wore it for a work holiday party. It fit true to size. I definitely recommend!
Hugs curves and is classy but fun....very short but high neck balances things out.

This dress was a lot prettier in person than on the website. It's all lace, but sheer on your arms. The dress is fairly short, but the high neckline makes up for that. I felt very bloated this day, but the dress hid that very well while still looking tailored. I want to own this dress. Thank you RTR!
Little stretchy- which made it comfortable. Easy to move around in- made dancing easy!! Such a fun dress.

Got several dresses for lake front Florida wedding. This dress fit amazing!! It fit true to size and was kinda stretchy. I'm petite so the length wasn't an issue but I wore tights with it because it was cold out. Friends at wedding loved it.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the perfect LBD!
links_reviews_text: The dress was fitted but not so fitted that I felt restricted. It was made of a great material. It was very comfortable for hours of dancing, but it was a little shorter than I expected when I was sitting. Overall, I'd recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a Christmas party and I wore to to work.
links_reviews_text: It's conservative, but also short and fun! It's a cute little black dress that looked great with my loubs, but it is not something I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Short but conservative at the same time. Super comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I wore the 10 because of length. I honestly didn't even try the 8 on because I figured it would be way too short. It is a super forgiving dress that's so comfortable. I wore it to a symphony and then holiday party later that night. It's short when you sit but the neckline and sleeves balance it out.

links_reviews_title: Love Love Love this dress. It fit perfectly and I received a ton of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: True to size. Rent this dress, you will thank me later. Perfect LBD
I normally wear a 6, rented a 4

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Perfect for the Holiday Party!
links_reviews_text: Great fit! Not too tight but still a flattering fitted look! I'm pretty short, so the length worked well (wasn't too short). Loved the sleeve length and the high neckline!
This dress fit perfectly! Shipping was also great and was on time. The collar fits snug so if that would be annoying to you all night, I wouldn't recommend this dress.
This is seriously the cutest LBD. It's true to size -- runs really short! I danced all night and never felt uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: My favorite RTR dress so far!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a fundraiser. I got the 8 and 10. I usually wear 8 in designer dresses and if I had been planning to wear this dress out with the girls or similar I would have worn the 8. However, I wore the 10 for the length as I was trying to be somewhat classy for this fundraiser, and this dress is quite short. I am definitely larger on the bottom of my body than the top and this dress had more than enough room. The arms were also super flattering and not too tight. I was super sad to send this one back. I wish I could buy it! If this ever hits the RTR clearance sale I'm scooping it up!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments! Wear stockings with this! It rides up
links_reviews_text: Wear stockings but overall amazing dress and so comfy

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I got so many compliments... great for a cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and super comfortable. It is a little short, but I preferred that since I am only 5'4. It made my legs look longer. I highly recommend!

This dress fit like a dream. I actually never would have picked it on my own, but stylist Stephen B. sent it as a replacement for another dress that didn't fit. I adored it: it was flattering and so comfortable. The high neck was perfectly balanced by the short skirt. I wish there was an option to buy, because this is THE perfect little black dress!!

This dress was stunning. I usually wear a 6 but I went with the 8 because this dress runs small. The dress is very short! I am 5'2" so it worked perfect for me! The 6 was more form fitting and much shorter, which wasn't appropriate for this occasion. Overall, loved this dress, I was comfortable and felt elegant in it. I would definitely recommend this dress if you are petite.
Conservative and flattering
Fit great and was comfortable even on my curvy frame.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR experience and it was great. The dress fit me like a glove. The lace had just the right amount of stretch. I was concerned that it would be tight in the arms but it was just right. The length was great, coming right above the knee. The lace was really pretty and is difficult to see in the photo. My only suggestion is to go with a bracelet (if you wear one) that is smooth. The ones that I wore got caught a few times over the course of the night and it was annoying (though it didn't damage the dress thankfully). I felt the dress was elegant yet fun and comfortable. Extra plus - you can wear a regular bra which in my book is super!

I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner. I rented a 4&6 and ended up wearing the 6. It fits tight, but I think that is how it is supposed to fit. Definitely had to wear spanx! It's also a little shorter than I was expecting. Overall, I was very pleased. It was beautiful and I got many compliments.
Went with the 0 because it fit a little better. Really comfy and not itchy at all. A little short, but I'm short so it was the perfect length for me!

I sent this back and wore something else to the party. The arm holes are very large and the dress was much larger than anticipated. Probably could have sized down, but that probably would have been too tight. Just no shape in this one!

I was very pleased with this dress. I had picked a different dress that unfortunately not able to be shipped. I was VERY happy with this replacement. It was comfy. Made me look thin. The color is beautiful. A little lighter than in pictures. Super classy and perfect for a wedding or formal event!
I rented this dress for my mom for formal night on a cruise. This dress, that I'm wearing, is a size 16. I wear a size 2. Is this a joke?
I wore this to a summer rehearsal dinner in a barn and it was perfect for the occasion. The dress was the perfect combination of flirty, fun, and elegant. The fit is true to size everywhere.
Very flattering dress and I love the navy!

links_reviews_title: A dressed up shift with lovely material - classy and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I like a navy shift dress but navy can be too serious (like a work dress). This has the ruffles on the arm and it was a little short- that gave it more of a feminine, fun l feel. I wore this for my son's high school graduation and for the party afterward. It was perfect for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: Very loose fitting but elegant enough for work holiday party.
I wore this to a wedding. The size 8 was good, a little short but still wearable. I wore a stick on bra because the back and side are low. I'm 5'7, 155.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Short Dress for Summer Wedding!!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!! It was perfect for a summer wedding in the sun! Great length, beautiful color, and a very flattering halter type cut. Easily worn with a strapless bra, which a bra is a requirement for my chest size! I got so many compliments at the wedding I wore this to. There is no stretch so definitely order true to size and if you are on the cusp order the size up as your backup! Would recommend!
Great fit, color, and style

Wore this to a rehearsal dinner. I received so many compliments on this dress, and would definitely wear it again. It's got a bit of a stretch, so I didn't have to worry about it being tight in the bust. I would definitely suggest a strapless bra since the halter cuts a bit low at the arm.

This dress was simultaneously very easy to wear and also very flattering. If you're a fan of the shift cut, this is a dependable go-to. The neckline and bottom trim added a little interest to an otherwise classic cut. Would consider buying this dress!
Great fit. Loved the color!!!
Great dress. Needed to get a bigger size so it fit better around the bust. Length was great also
Fit like a glove and received compliments all night! Absolutely loved this dress!

Who knows why a simple blue dress with a ruffle is just so flattering! This is a fantastic summer rental. This dress is great. The neckline highlights the shoulders and the crepe fabric drapes in a lovely way. It was a little hard to find a bra to wear because the arm holes were so low. They showed every strapless one I own. I opted for a black sports bra with thin straps. The only thing that kept me from keeping this in my closet was the sizing. It felt more like a 14 than a 12. I think I should have sized down given the volume of fabric, but worry about the length and neck size. I wore it casually, but people kept asking me why I was dressed up. I guess it just has that vibe.
If you let your arms hang normally, it doesn't present the most flattering pic, but if you go for the arm bend - all looks great!

Super comfortable! Its a form fitting dress, but not too tight in the midsection. For curvier women the hips can be tight, so I recommend sizing up. Fabric is not to thick, so perfect for day time events this season!
Delivered new with tags. Beautiful dress. Perfect fit for me. Has some stretch in fabric. No bra. Some side boob does show.

I rented this for a wedding and I really loved it! It was true to size for me and was very comfortable. I'm almost 5'7" and I had to be mindful to pull it down a little when I sat down (it hiked up just a little bit when sitting). Also the arm holes were a little big/low, but not a deal breaker. The dress is very well made and I loved the back detail! Very happy with the rental and got several compliments. Great, classic dress!

wore to cocktail reception in May. Great length (I'm tall) and easy to wear. Fits straight through, no special undergarments needed. easy to zipper on your own, ruffles make it less "plain". I'm into the little NAVY BLUE dress over the LBD vibe.
I loved this dress so much! It is very comfortable and I received a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! It was classic, simple and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs big so I was thankful that I had ordered a 4 and a 6. It was perfect for the wedding!

links_reviews_title: Very form fitting. I didnâ€™t wear it!
links_reviews_text: Very tight in the stomach area.

links_reviews_title: It was my backup style for a wedding that I didn't end up needing but it fit wonderfully.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, such a dark navy color that is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: This dress was actually my backup dress and it worked perfectly. I'd say it runs pretty true to size
links_reviews_text: Fun and Flirty!

links_reviews_title: Dancing in a dressing that was freeing
links_reviews_text: Not skin tight, flows nicely and true to size
This dress fit well in the hips but was large on top. I couldn't wear this with a bra which makes me uncomfortable. I've decided not to wear it.
I ended up not wearing this. I find Trina Turk runs small especially if you have a booty.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an early summer bridal shower
links_reviews_text: So cute and easy to wear! A little short on me, so I had to be careful with sitting and moving around, but not so much that I wouldn't wear again. The fabric is a crepe and on the heavier side but still okay for an early summer event. Easy to style with shoes and jewelry too.
I am usually a 14 or 16. I went with the 16. It was a tiny bit big, but still look great. perfect for the Sept wedding in Boston.

I liked this dress a lot. The cut and color was great. I wore it for a casual rehearsal dinner the night before my brother in laws wedding, and paired it with nude wedges. My only complaint is that it runs huge! I'm usually a 2/4. I could have easily done a 0. Unfortunately that wasn't one of my options. So i was stuck in a too big dress. So huge heads up ladies, size down!

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this, glad to have a backup.
links_reviews_text: Pro: nice style Cons: too small
The dress was a bit boxy for my taste/body. I ended up wearing a large belt and cardigan with it. It worked because it was a backyard wedding to dress it down. Would not work for a fancy occasion.
Fit very nicely

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to work and to a professional networking event.
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress with a comfortable fit. The bottom flounce makes it really cute. The only slight drawback is that the armholes are cut very deep. I wore a strapless bra and had to pull it way down for it not to show on the sides.

links_reviews_title: A little short for a work event but it was perfect for a poolside party. Chic and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Ran true to size. Fits well and flattering!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, could be used as a bridesmaid dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this out to dinner but when I put it on, I immediately thought 'would make a nice bridesmaid' dress. It's very simple and straightforward. Fit a bit large. I paired it with some flashy Gucci pumps to give it some flair ;)

links_reviews_title: Great with or without a blazer
links_reviews_text: Ruffles and lovely fabric make this simple cut elegant enough for a date or a wedding or the office. Good with or without a blazer.
Sooooo comfy! A little cleavage won't hurt but you will def have some in this dress! The most comfy fabric and got a ton of compliments. It's so perfect for baby shower! Rent it! The best!!!!

I wore this at 31 weeks pregnant for our baby shower. It was very comfortable fabric which didn't make me feel too hot on a 70 degree day! I'm typically a size 12 and the M fit great. You need a low cut bra for this dress!

I wore this for my baby shower and loved it! The cotton-like material was stretchy and super breathable. I got lots of compliments on it too. The length is something that could be changed depending on how you ruched the sides. I felt it looked matronly hanging down below my knees too far so I pulled up the ruching on the sides a bit to shorten it.

I rented this dress to wear for my birthday dinner when I was ~5 months pregnant with twins. Both sizes showed up with tags still on, which was amazing! I felt like the skirt was a bit clingy so I went with the XL instead of the L for a little bit of extra room. I paired it with a tank top to keep things reigned in, and added navy tieks because none of my other shoes fit by then.... Got so many compliments and really wished I didn't have to send the dress back, even though it was much fancier than I would wear regularly. Definitely made this very pregnant mommy feel pretty for once!
This was a beautiful dress that I wore at 33 weeks pregnant for my baby shower! Got so many compliments and felt super comfortable all day! Would recommend 100%

Pattern was very pretty and material was super soft. Wore all day without any hesitation - wish every dress was made of this material! I used double sided tape at the bust line and was just fine the whole day. I was concerned that this dress was too fitted as my belly at 35 weeks was huge! (165lbs, 5'7"), but I embraced it and was surprised that everyone loved it!

I wore this to a sprinkle at 24 weeks. The dress is very comfortable. The fabric is very soft and stretchy, so if you were bigger/smaller this dress would still work well. As other reviews said it is a bit low cut. I would rent this again.
Would have been good for a spring shower, but I decided on another option.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to my baby shower (28 weeks preg) and felt amazing! Received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove! Hugged every spot just right and was not the least bit see-through. Being that my shower was in December the dress kept me warm enough but, breathed enough that I wasnâ€™t overheating with all the attention!

Wore this to my baby shower and received many compliments! As other reviewers have noted, it is fairly low cut. I wore a higher cut bra under and it worked out well (looked like part of the dress). Would highly recommend for pregnant ladies hoping to feel good on their shower day!

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful and comfortable
links_reviews_text: #beautiful #babyshower

links_reviews_title: I got many compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: I ordered the XL since I wear a size 14 but the L fit just fine! I did have to add a pin in the back to pull up the neckline since the fabric was a little loose. It never rode up and was very comfortable.
This dress is already pilling up quite a bit, I think they probably need to retire it. But I loved it! So comfortable and got plenty of compliments.
Wore this to my baby shower @ 28 weeks. It was super comfy and flattering !

links_reviews_title: I simply LOVE this dress. I wore it on my honeymoon and I felt absolutely sexy and beautiful in it.
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect for any body type esp. for a curvy woman. It's comfortable and perfect for almost ANY occasion.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress. I felt beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and comfortable!

Fit was fantastic everywhere except the chest. I kept having to make sure my bra wasn't showing. I think the small might have fit better but since this was my first time renting, I wanted to air on the side of bigger since I am 5 months/22 weeks pregnant. Great color and so soft!

links_reviews_title: Super cute for pregnant sister of the groom
links_reviews_text: Wore to my brother's rehearsal dinner. I felt pretty even though I was 7 months pregnant. The bust area was a little large -- surprising since I'm a DDD right now -- so I pinned it shut. The dress was also long enough for my almost 6 foot frame, which was nice!
Soft cotton, stretchy, comfortable dress. Low neckline so I wore it with a pregnancy support tank. Great for spring.

links_reviews_title: @ 34 weeks I felt amazing in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Super soft material, fit is perfect, soft color palette that you dress up or down. Fashion tape a must if your pregnant boobs are slightly busty. Really a great dress that could make any pregnant woman feel pretty.
This dress is so flattering and so comfortable! It definitely runs true to size, and I would recommend renting your pre-pregnancy size. Loved it!
I wore the small 37 weeks pregnant for Easter and loved it! It was very comfortable and fit me very well. Colors were also beautiful.

This dress was a beautiful color and pattern for a baby shower. I felt comfortable in the small at 32 weeks pregnant. The only issue I had was that the top was wayyy too low cut for my pregnant breasts and would not stay closed. I tried using garment tape to keep it contained but it didn't work and I had to resort to a cami underneath, which didn't look bad but wasn't my first choice. Would still recommend!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing but beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this as an option for my baby shower. I didn't end up wearing it because the weather was warmer than I expected and I didn't want long sleeves. It's a beautiful dress and really shows off the bump. It would be perfect for a spring shower.
Very low cut for my petite frame of 5'3". Love the color and patern. Comfortable except for the fact that I kept having to pull it up.
Great fit. Might be too low cut if you are trying to wear it to work.

Perfect for maternity - I am currently 6 months pregnant. The dress is tremendous for a comfortable work dress that is also professional! The cotton isn't very thick so keep in mind that it isn't intended to hold anything in!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, and so comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress in an XL to my baby shower at 33 weeks pregnant. I am normally curvy with a larger bust (36G) but at 33 weeks pregnant I was predictably larger at 5'4", ~180 pounds, and a 36H. The large fit, but a little awkwardly around the bust. The XL was perfect. The sleeves were a little long, so I folded them in and you couldn't even notice. I did wear a white cami underneath, but I've always had to do this with most tops/dresses with my bust size so it was nothing unusual. The dress is so soft and comfortable with a nice amount of stretch while still fitting closely around your bump to show it off. This would be appropriate for work, as well as a daytime wedding or event.

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments. The colors are very lively
links_reviews_text: Current weight 130lbs and 34D bust size. The small fit just great. Has a good stretch.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! It is very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I wore it for my maternity photoshoot. I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Too tight and clingy for work, neckline too low
links_reviews_text: May be good for going out, not work
didn't fit in the hips

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, lightweight dress for 2nd trimester bump!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous and bright light blues. Dress was ever-so-slightly small (with pre-preg size), but still fit and still received tons of compliments. Husband loved this one. There is no lining though, and the material is very thin, so my nude bra and underwear lines showed through because the dress was tight. Flattering ruching (could sometimes hide underwear line), and hugged my 4 month belly in a gorgeous way. Dress came to just below my knees. Sleeves were a little long so I folded them to be Â¾ sleeves. Bust was tight and gave my 34Bs quite a bit of cleavage at times.
It was too form fitting for work but a lovely dress for a party no less.
Beautiful color and print. Normal size 4 and at 16 weeks size S was too snug it showed any combo of undergarment lines. Also pretty low cut. Didn't wear it but a size M probably would have worked.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it! Was too warm weather.
links_reviews_text: The weather got really warm and the long sleeves were too much!

Wore this to work but it would have been perfect for a baby shower, weekend event, or even to attend a wedding! It is made with a silky fabric that is so soft and easy to wear. Caution to busty girls! The top is not sized for pregnant boobs, so it will be very va-va-voom if you catch my drift. Safety pins don't work that great but tape would be fine.
This dress fit perfect in all the right places. It wasn't too long and I didn't have to make any adjustments throughout the night. So many compliments and it photographs amazing!

There is a bit of give in the top, especially for size B bust, but it was still quite flattering. I'm 5'1 and was wearing a 3 inch heel. That was about perfect, but still it was a bit long. The slit really helped! You can tell it runs a little long because the bottom of the dress was a bit tattered. The silvery skirt of the dress was beautiful, but it'll definitely show your gut if you have one! So suck it in for photos. The side of the skirt where the zipper was did sort of pucker up, which compromised the silhouette a little. Nevertheless, I got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit great and moved with me every step. The RTR app was great to use, affordable, and quic
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was perfect. I looked for a dress where I wouldnâ€™t need to purchase special undergarments and this was great. It was completely comfortable the entire evening.

Really enjoyed wearing this dress! Comfortable to wear and dance in all evening, and I was able to wear a regular bra with it. It does run short, so flats were a must and I ended up wearing the larger size to get a little more length.

links_reviews_title: Easy, inexpensive gown for black tie event.
links_reviews_text: Great dress for big busted ladies! Like the other reviews say, the dress runs short. I am 5'3" and rented the 6L so I could wear heels.

links_reviews_title: I got several compliments on this dress, and it looked amazing!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the black tie event I was attending! I got several compliments on it, and it fit very well! To be a size "2 Regular," it was very short. But it worked out in my favor, as I'm short, and the "2 Short" was out of stock. It was almost too short with my heels on. Great dress! Highly recommend.
Dress fit very nicely even though I'm short, it is a good length. I ended up wearing a knee length dress at hubby's request but plan to rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but not flattering for me
links_reviews_text: Pretty dress, but not flattering for my body style. Not forgiving around waistline and hips if you have pooch :) . Top has plenty of stretch to fit bustier physique. Dress is short.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress, perfect for the hospital benefit we attended.
links_reviews_text: Ok, when the other reviewers said the Regular was short...they were RIGHT! I am 5'6" & 61 years old & wearing 4" heels is not what I want to do. I ordered the 6R & the 4L. The 6R was short, too short for flats & at the bottom of the side zipper was a fabric bulge, not a good place for a bulge! The 4L fortunately fit & no bulge...just long! So I put on my highest heels & put in a 1 1/2" hem & good to go! The skirt part is actually flat silver sequins, very elegant. Comfortable to sit in, eat & dance! I highly recommend this dress, rent it for your special event!

links_reviews_title: EVERYONE COMMENTED ON HOW SKINNY I LOOKED ! I think this dress slims you up. Also I felt elegant.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, but when dancing the liner underneath the skirt started shifting and showing through the slit that goes up your leg. I tried pulling it back to the right position several times but it kept shifting.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel glamorous! Perfect for a black tie wedding. I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little snug in the hip area but otherwise it fit great and was easy to move around in. I have long legs so Iâ€™m glad I had the long fit otherwise the regular fit would have been too short.

links_reviews_title: This was a backup dress that I did not end up wearing.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable. Peakaboo back means your shapewear cannot come up super high. Was not floor length even though it was a long (12L). (I'm 5'10"). It was still an ok look and a flattering fit, but not like the model.
Fit was perfect; went with long as other reviews indicated dress runs short.
I am about 135 lbs and 5'8" with a 32b cup. This dress received many compliments and was perfect for black tie.

This was for a winter wedding in Seattle. I have historically gotten dresses that are super lowcut and I have to constantly worry about falling out of and wanted to go the opposite direction. This dress was classy and comfortable and flattering and I loved the lower back cutout that made up for the conservative nature of the rest of the dress. I could even wear a normal bra!!

links_reviews_title: Flattering and formal with a sexy spin
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a Christmas symphony. It was formal and flattering, with a slit that edged it up just enough to make me feel pretty.

links_reviews_title: Slender with chic, shinny sequins made me stand out! Made me feel unique and distinguished in all.
links_reviews_text: Although this dress is a 4R, it ran true to its size with the fact that it was super long in length. No for a petite woman like me. I fixed it up by folding in and up one inch of the dress at my bust and held it up in with clothing tape and a black elastic sash. Over it, I dressed pair it up conservatively with a long sleeve black cashmere sweater and a grey headscarf (Muslim woman's modest headcovering) to complete the look. I had a lot of compliments that night at the charity formal event for social work.

This dress is form-fitting but still flattering. I didn't get to wear it out because my husband pulled his back right before the event, but I liked it so much I still put it on and took pictures. It has a high slit and is slightly short, so it is ideal for black tie optional events.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for an annual black tie gala, which had a theme of "Sparkle and Shine."
links_reviews_text: This was an incredibly flattering dress - a little bit of give which made it comfortable while be form fitting and the sequins were very fluid. I wore the 4R and it was perfect with 3 inch heels. Highly recommend - I don't think I would have normally picked it and am so glad I did. Was perfect for a black tie event.

links_reviews_title: This dress was fabulous! Got 1000 compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was actually the back up style but I loved it so much I chose it over the original dress I ordered (which was also fabulous). The fit is perfect - it fits like a glove but is very comfortable. There's no need to wear spandex as the dress is made to "keep it all in". The beading on it is exquisite, you really can't tell from the picture how pretty it is. It is perfect for a formal affair or fun cocktail party.

links_reviews_title: This was for a Christmas Gala with the theme, A Night In Paris
links_reviews_text: The fit was fine, although small...I'm normally a 6 but the 6 was very tight on my rib cage so opted for the 8 so I could be more comfortable. I didn't really notice much difference between the 6 and 8 in the skirt.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! A bit short though
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this dress! The only thing is that when I tried it on, it barely passed my ankles! I ended up wearing the 4, though i tried the 6 to see if it was longer (it wasn't). I am 5'4" so I suggest that if you are close to that or taller, get the long! You won't regret it!

Made me look bustier than I am - more material up top than expected, kind of billowing, but showed cleavage . Got a lot of compliments, but I was self conscious that i was trying to be bigger in the chest

I loved the fit of this dress! It was comfortable for dancing and for wearing the whole night. I did fidget with the top quite a bit because it felt a little more open than I liked, but other than that it was fabulous!

The fit was perfect! The length was spot on for my 6 in heels. I felt amazing in the dress and had people stopping me to compliment me on the dress. It was so incredibly comfortable that I was able to go braless which is something I never do.
Wore this for a winter wedding. Classy and comfortable.
This dress fits true to size and like a glove. The slit on the side makes dancing easy and the decorative silver bottom has a Great Gatsby/Old Hollywood vibe. A very fun and sexy dress!
Perfect length for my height. Easy to move and dance. Couldn't have asked for a better dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. ALOT of compliments. Fabric pulled and caught on things. Fit nicely. Draped nicely.
links_reviews_text: I am 5ft 4 and weigh 112. Wore a 3 inch heel with the dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect to add a little style amongst all the solid colored dark dresses.
links_reviews_text: I wore a size 6, it was very firm fitting. But once I got in and zipped I felt very happy about my selection. Nice length with 3 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: The regular was the perfect length! Bra friendly!
links_reviews_text: I was worried that there were no petite sizes because I am 5'. However, I read the reviews that many were surprised at how "short" the regular sizes were. So, I rented the 4R and 6R. The 4R was a little tight in the side zipper, so I chose 6R to be more comfortable for dancing. And the other reviews were right! The regular length was perfect for someone petite! I work 4" heels and did not have to worry about the dress dragging on the floor or tripping on my dress.

This dress is absolutely stunning and so comfortable! The pictures of the dress are pretty misleading and the bottom is actually sequins and a liner. I was worried at first about it being uncomfortable or itchy because of that but didn't have any problems. I'm 5'7" and rented a long with 4" heels - perfect length.

The dress fit me like a glove, and I had many compliments. I have longish legs and a short torso. I thought the 2L would be a better fit, but it felt too wide at the hips. The 2R just fit perfectly. I wore 3" open-toe heels, and the dress fell right on the top of my foot. The slit was not too high, and the plunge was appropriate for a family wedding (you could make it go lower). I was able to dance all night with my nieces and nephews.

links_reviews_title: Rent the Runway Rocks! The details and level of service is awesome! Love the communication! So EASY
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for a formal wedding! I ended up wearing the back up size 4L. My usual dress size is a 6 but after reading some of the reviews I ordered a 4L & 6L and the 6L was too long and the top was a little too big. The 4L fit me like a glove. It was very sexy and comfortable. The material has a little give so it was comfortable to sit in. I would definitely use Rent the Runway again - they make it so easy for you!

Fit great! I'm so happy I had 2 sizes to choose from. I'm usually a size 2 but I went with the four because the size 2 was going to be just uncomfortable and too short for how tall I am. But overall I was very happy for the first time I ever ordered off rent the runway.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this gorgeous and comfortable
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress and I am so glad I chose it because I absolutely loved it. The fabric has stretch to it making it super comfortable. The top is great as you can wear a regular bra and would most likely work for both small and large chested women. The back has a fun little peep hole as well. I am 5"3 and the regular length was perfect for me. I received so many compliments on this dress. Can't say enough positive things about it.

I ordered this dress for a formal wedding in sizes 0 and 2. I was worried the 0 would be to small, so I tried on the 2 first. It was so short and hit above my ankles!!! I compared the two dresses, and the 2 was at least 3 inches shorter than the 0, even though both were ordered in regular length. The 0 fit like a glove, and was the perfect length. It was an absolutely stunning dress, and perfect for the occasion. I received so many compliments, and felt gorgeous wearing this!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress, just sexy enough, runs short
links_reviews_text: The dress was stunning and really flattering once I put it on. I have a smaller waist and a larger chest, and this dress hit at the smallest point of my torso, and I was able to wear a bra, which is a concern for me. The cutout in the back and slit made the dress just sexy enough, and it was easy to move in. Not nearly as heavy as you would expect. I am a size 6 and 5'4", but after reading reviews I ordered a 6 Long. It was the perfect length with 3" heels, but if you're taller than 5'4" and/or want to wear heels, definitely get the long. Awesome awesome dress, and another woman at the event was wearing the exact same one, so it's definitely popular!
The lining was a little stretched out and was longer than the dress fabric. I'm 5'7" and was glad I got the long!! It was still not long enough to cover my shoes.

links_reviews_title: Omg!!! AMAZING dress!! I was comfortable and felt amazing and got SO MANY COMPLIMENTS!!! Thanks #RTR
links_reviews_text: For true to size, comfortable and good for any bust size.
Rented for cinco de Mayo party - super cute shirt & great quality. Only complaint was the shirt doesn't really need the ties over the shoulder so they kept falling down
Very pretty! Loved the sleeve details

Super cute and comfortable! Received lots of compliments. Could easily be dressed up or down. Size down, it's super big, and for that reason I did feel a little shapeless in it. Would rent again in a smaller size for sure!
N/a
The fit was flowy & Chic. Comfy fit. I'm 5'3 and 138pds. I tucked in sleeve strings , those weren't flattering !
Love this top
Fits well, easy to throw on. I didn't need a bra with this which is always a plus! Looks good with jeans or shorts.
Absolutely loved this top. It was a little short in length, which worked for me because I have a short torso. Cute color scheme and love the off the shoulder details.
Pretty and flowy top. No bra needed. More orange than red in my opinion. I wore this twice, tucked the front center in both times to avoid looking like I was wearing a maternity top.

links_reviews_title: Have Someone Else Tie Up the Shoulders
links_reviews_text: The only way to keep the ties up was to have my daughter tie them at the perfect spot for me. Almost impossible to hit this on your own, in my opinion. Once I got that dealt with, it was a cute every-day type of top. Got a compliment from someone right away upon wearing it.
Fit nice but I didn't love it. Sent back for somthing else.
I loved the color, it was really bright and fun. Only downside was the straps would loosen up and fall down. But maybe I just needed to double knot.
So comfortable and stylish. Almost didn't want to send back. Definitely will be renting this again

I found the top and the shoulders to be quite large but the shirt is not long enough for someone with a long torso. I have large shoulders but still needed the ties to hold the top up as the elastic that goes around the shoulders is very relaxed. The ties holding it up didn't stay on my shoulders well and I was in constant fear that this was just going to fall off of me.

links_reviews_title: pretty blouse. wore it for weekend brunch but it would be dressed up for dinner out.
links_reviews_text: TTS. I think overall it fit well. Because if the looseness of the top though and extra fabric, may not look good on bigger chests.

I rented the small and got the medium as my backup. I wasnâ€™t sure what would work best being 7 months pregnant and 15-20 lbs heavier than usual. When I put on the small, it fit perfectly! This dress is so comfortable and easy to wear. Plenty of room for a growing bump. Iâ€™m 5â€™8 and wore sandals with this dress. The length was perfect. If youâ€™re shorter, youâ€™ll likely need to wear heals to prevent the dress from dragging on the ground. Would highly recommend!
Comfortable thick fabric, an easy dress for every day.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my baby shower at 32 weeks! It was so comfy and I got lots of compliments. Love!
links_reviews_text: I am 5â€™5â€ and the hem was just above the floor while I was wearing flats.
it was a bit faded from previously being used by other renters but nothing that showed from further away. incredibly soft and comfortable. worked great for my 23 week bump with twins! #maternity

I rented this dress for my baby shower at 32 weeks pregnant. It's very comfortable (no zippers digging in!) and stretchy. I wore this in a small. I could tell the dress had been worn/washed a bunch - it looked old. Luckily the dress still photographed well! It's also very, very long. I'm 5'2" and wore 3.5" wedges with the dress, but it still dragged about an inch on the ground.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for anniversary date and maternity shoot!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was so comfortable and soft. It had plenty of room for my belly bump. The material was light and flowy. Totally wished I owned the dress!!!

I LOVED this dress! The material was so soft and didn't make me too hot on a hot summer night. I also am always skeptical of off the shoulder because sometimes you are always adjusting, but not with this dress. I was able to move around, hug lots of people and open gifts at my baby shower without ever having to readjust! I also got lots of compliments on it and loved how it photographed!

At 32 weeks pregnant what I loved most about this dress was how comfortable it was. Very soft and stretchy . I felt a little casual at the wedding I attended, but you can get away with these things when you're expecting :) overall, loved it

So cute! i actually did not wear this for a maternity dress and it is still perfect. It is the kind of dress that's flowy, comfy and stretchy so it would work either way. The off the shoulder look was perfect. I wore it right under my shoulders, but you could just adjust it farther down for a more skin baring look as you want! Or the opposite for a more conservative look. Wore this for my cousin's grad party and got lots of compliments! I do wish it came in long because it just skimmed above my feet. I could not have worn it with heels. Almost debated on keeping it but figured I'm a one wear and done girl with my dresses.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and ideal for baby shower!
links_reviews_text: Everyone loved my dress! Super comfy too. Perfect for summer.
I rented this dress for my baby shower at 32 weeks pregnant, and it fit perfectly. I'm 5'9" and the medium was a little short for my liking so I wore the large. It was super soft and comfy!

I'm 35 weeks pregnant, have gained 23 lbs and felt this is a true to size for maternity sizing. Lots of room in bust and belly. Can be pulled up above shoulders or below shoulders. I wore size M but would have fit better in S.

links_reviews_title: Showed all the right parts and hid the less-than-stellar ones
links_reviews_text: Super lightweight, nice material. It was breezy but definitely worked for my event. Could have fone with either the large or extra large but as I was two months postpartum I wanted a little extra room.

I am 28 weeks pregnant with twins and wore this to my shower. I would normally wear a small but seeing that it's twins the medium felt better around my belly. I felt beautiful and the fabric is unbelievably comfy and soft. Very flattering and would highly recommend for any mommy to be
This was a fantastic travel dress! It was comfortable, grown up, and didn't wrinkle. I'm not pregnant but I rented it anyways. Go for it!
Very very comfortable dress. Ordered medium and large and fit in both but ultimately decided liked the extra fabric on the top of the large dress

LOVED this dress. I'm 33 weeks pregnant and it was soft and comfortable with plenty of room for my belly. The small and medium are the same length and seemed to fit about the same, so I wore the medium. Lots of compliments!! Thick enough to not show panty lines but not too hot in the Savannah heat. I'm 5'7" and if I was taller it may have been too short, but length was perfect for me.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a casual barn wedding!
links_reviews_text: Iâ€™m 4 months pregnant and this was a great dress to wear to a casual barn wedding. Fit was awesome. I could have gone medium or large but liked large was a little more flowy. Even though itâ€™s cotton, the pattern dresses it up.

links_reviews_title: A casual but great maternity dress!
links_reviews_text: As other reviewers said, this dress would be perfect for a baby shower! It is your standard cotton maxi, so maybe a little casual for a wedding (although I lucked out in that the wedding I attended was pretty casual). Fit great, was comfortable & flowy, and was very flattering on a 7 month pregnant body!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my baby shower. Super cute!
links_reviews_text: This is the perfect maternity dress! It's so comfortable, hugs in the right places without making you feel matronly. I got a lot of compliments and would definitely order it again!

I wore this dress for my Baby Sprinkle. It was extremely comfortable, stretchy, and cute. I received many compliments. The material was a bit more casual than I was expecting, but it was soft and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable during my third trimester.
links_reviews_text: Fit well over my 6 month pregnant belly. I ordered a size SR, only sad thing was it was very faded!

links_reviews_title: Rented this for one of my baby showers and it was perfect! Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" and the length was great with some wedges.
Too long for someone 5'1, like myself, but very comfortable and looked great with my 31 week baby bump.

Great dress for baby shower! The empire waist accentuated all the places and it was easy to move in. The length was a little on the longer side, I'm 5'4 - so I just held it up slightly if I was walking far, which wasn't much because we were indoors for most of the party. Would rent again and would highly recommend for friends!

I loved wearing this dress so much. Wore it at 25 weeks pregnant. So flattering, comfortable, and pretty. I got many compliments on it. I'm 5'4" and wore it with tall wedges and it was fine. Would definitely rent again.

This dress was extremely comfortable and soft! I found that the small and medium were the exact same length, but that the medium had more room up top for a fuller bust (if needed- I didn't need it). I normally wear a size small, am 5'4", pre-pregnancy 130/currently 160 lbs. and was 33 weeks when I wore this. I wore the small and had no problems with discomfort, falling, down, stepping on it, etc.
I love these dresses! They're so comfy and work well at any stage in pregnancy or after. So pretty!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a casual bbq
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute, drags if flat footed but with a wedge it was perfect. I loved it

I am 5'7" (normal weight 120 lb, pregnancy weight 150 lb) I wore the size small, the medium felt a little big around the arms and chest Pros: comfortable, love the sleeves, thick jersey cotton fabric good quality Cons: length is too short (I like long maxi dresses and this one was too short for me - I could not wear heels), material on my rental was very faded (in both sizes)

Did not end up wearing this dress (ordered 2 different dresses), felt it was too casual for the event. Dress extremely comfortable and soft, would have been great for casual or garden party. Material is jersey/cotton. Fit well, I was 36w pregnant.

links_reviews_title: Felt pretty but most importantly felt comfortable
links_reviews_text: The fabric is super soft and the fit is true to size. At 33 weeks pregnant I felt comfortable but pretty in this dress. Loved it for a date night but you can totally wear this dress to a casual event too.
super comfy!
I love this dress! I wore it both off the shoulder and over my shoulders and both styles looked great. The fabric is soft and comfortable.
Fun neoprene fabric, nice pattern, GREAT pockets. Fun to dance in and made my legs look a thousand miles long!

This dress was perfect for a chilly wedding with its thick and stretchy fabric. The best part is the pockets. They are huge and the way the dress falls hides them pretty perfectly. The part around my ribs got a little tight towards the end of the night but otherwise it was incredibly comfortable.

I originally rented this for a wedding but I found a more fitting dress for the occasion. I loved this dress so much that I wore it out for the day. It works well as a casual dress too. The fit is spot on and flattering and the colors are beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! I want to own it!
links_reviews_text: The fit was good but a little big for me. If I purchased it, I would take it in at the shoulders and middle. But this was perfect for a wedding because it was comfortable the whole night.

I loved this dress! The fabric was fantastic for an October wedding. I was able to wear a regular bra with a racer back which made it every more enjoyable. My husband loved it too and couldn't keep his hands off me. Overall it was a great dress I would definitely rent again.
I loved everything about this dress. Was flattering and flared in the right spots, was breezy and kept me cool and the pockets. Perfect for my Italian honeymoon.

Wore this for a fall wedding with "cocktail" dress code. Loved the pockets, dress was super comfortable and kept the tummy in but plenty of room to eat and drink. Only complaint I had was the cut of the top wasn't the best for those with a larger bust, but otherwise cute dress. I'm 5'7 140lbs 32DD

Armpits looked a LITTLE awkward from the side, but this dress was so comfortable and HAD POCKETS!!! Win win! Did not notice any stretching in the fabric like other reviewers have said, so maybe I just got a good one.

This dress has great bold colors and pockets! The fabric is thick, but it moves well and when you sweat out on the dance floor no one can tell. The overall length is short for my liking, so I wore compressions shorts - no big deal!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and super comfortable. The fabric is forgiving and holds your shape.
links_reviews_text: One thing to note is that it is an unfinished hem at the bottom of the skirt.

I wore this to a friends wedding and it was perfect. It's incredibly comfortable and HAS POCKETS! I loved the cut of the top both at the shoulders and the neckline. Fit true to size. Would definitely recommend this one!
