Easy and comfortable to wear. I love that it had pockets! Very flattering style
Very flattering a easy cut, with just a little stretch. Not too low cut, but still sexy and fun. Not fussy but perfectly flouncy. I danced all night!

Cute dress - received a lot of compliments on it! The material is very thick; I wore it in 90 degree DC heat & humidity and was fine, but definitely not a lightweight dress if that's what you're going for. I have a smaller waist and 36C chest & the dress fit very snug in those areas. But the pleated material make the skirt fuller and that might've been too full if I sized up. And there's pockets!! I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great color, POCKETS (!!), and very comfy
links_reviews_text: The dark green with blue was vibrant and great colors that would work for summer or fall. The cut was very flattering. The dress was stretchy and comfy. The pockets are always a bonus! The only thing what that the material was a little thicker than I expected so it was a little warm outside in the 90* weather. Loved this dress!
Comfortable, fits loose and stretches. Has pockets. Great for hot days/ outdoor activities.
Loved the fit, it was very flattering on me. Worn for a wedding in June, but I'd also love this dress for the fall/winter with black tights. Well made, fit well, and pockets def a plus.
Let me just say... I wish I owned this dress! I got got so many compliments and it was by far the most comfortable dress I've ever worn to a wedding

links_reviews_title: This was a comfortable cute dress, with pockets!
links_reviews_text: The material of this dress had a lot of give and stretch, the pockets were a huge plus, and the pattern was so cute! I received many compliments and felt totally comfortable moving about in this dress. The color was greener than I expected but still beautiful.
I wore this dress on vacation to Churchill downs. It was true to size. The material is very nice and silky.

Last minute rental with delivery to FL for my Grandmothers funeral. RTR was a success! As I traveled, I picked a dress and it met me next day at location. This dress has enough stretch to be flattering (a true size 6) and accommodate various body shapes. Flared skirt hit just above my knee (5'2) and fabric is thick (but not hot).

Dress fit great and I recieved tons of compliments! Unfortunately, it was very obvious that the dress had been worn to death. The material showed signs of wear on the edges (pilling) and in the waist (stretched). I loved the dress but would've loved it a lot more if it looked less used.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, though had a couple issues
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got tons of compliments on it. Loved that the color was something you don't see a lot and that the material's a little stretchy, so it felt like it was holding me in a bit. However, I did have some issues with the the way the top of the bodice is cut. Every bra I tried on with it, ended up showing on the side of the dress. It could have been because I have a short torso, but I ended up having to make do without a bra. The other thing that was odd was that there was almost no difference in size between the 4 and the 6, other than the 6 had slightly more room in the chest. I ended up wearing the 4, but if I had worn the 6, it would have looked pretty much the same on me.

I wore this dress to a wedding. It was very comfortable and it had pockets!! The only down side was that the way the dress went out from my waist, it made my butt look huge! Otherwise, i loved it and would recommend anyone use it!
Rented this to go out but actually ended up wearing to work. Its a great dress - excellent fit and would suit a multitude of occasions. I wore a racer back bra with it. Will definitely rent again.
Really nice dress for a fall wedding. It was chilly so I paired it with a jean jacket. Dress ran true to size but seemed a bit poofy in the skirt, not bad though!

This dress fit great in the 2 and the 4. The 2 was a bit tighter in the back (I have a wider back) so I wore the 4 to feel a little bit more comfortable. Either would have been great though. I felt so comfortable and confident the whole night in this dress.

I wore this to a fall wedding and it was super comfortable. The fabric is sort of like a scuba fabric so I wouldn't suggest for a summer wedding but it's perfect for fall. It fit like a glove! Plus the color is gorgeous.
Ran true to size as it was a little roomy. I wore a strapless bra as others have mentioned. The color was beautiful and it was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Dress was lovely, besides the pilling
links_reviews_text: Super comfy dress with pockets! I was not satisfied with the pilling on the front & back of dress. Luckily no one said anything. I've used RTR 2x and both times there was a stain or pilling on the dress, not cool.

The shape of this dress is adorable and it is 1000% comfortable. The fabric is very unique, though just a bit hot for an 85 degree outside wedding. I didn't even think about how I looked, or make any adjustments to this dress all night, which is sometimes just what you need to dance the night away!

links_reviews_title: This dress has a special place in my heart. Will flatter any body type!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a friendâ€™s wedding and I couldnâ€™t be happier with my choice. Itâ€™s a thicker material so itâ€™s really flattering and perfect for those cooler months. I usually have problems with a larger bust size and dresses, but the V cut was appropriate without being too conservative. The dark green color was perfect for an Oct wedding. The dress has pockets that are perfect for holding big phones (I have an iPhone 7 Plus). I miss this dress already, and may even rent it again! The only thing I didn't like as much was the cut is a bit weird where your arm and shoulder meet - but I was still able to wear a normal black bra with this dress (I used a bra clip so that you couldn't see straps though)

I wore this dress for a friend's rehearsal dinner. It was super comfortable! It was dressy enough without being too much. I ordered the 4 and the 6. I wore the 4 and it fit like a glove. I am 5'8 and I did not find that it was too short especially when sitting which can typically be a problem with dresses for me. I would definitely rent this dress again!

The fabric was soft and high quality. The dress fit really well at the waist and was a good length - not too short that I had to worry but not to long to make my body look shorter than it already is. It was a little big in the chest but not dramatically so, and it fit so well everywhere else that it didn't matter. I wore this to my cousin's wedding
Fit was right on, great for a wedding! Be careful if it's a windy day. Ordered a size 4 as backup, but the 6 fit great and that's what I usually wear. Love RTR

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to one of my friends weddings and everyone kept complimenting it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a wedding; super comfortable and easy to move around in. I picked this dress because I've worn similar styles before so I knew I'd luck out. I loved the colors as well. I ordered the size 2 and size 4 and wore the size 2 because the top fit better. I contemplated not wearing a bra because the top has a different cut to it, but ended up criss-crossing my straps in the back and it worked out perfectly! This is my first time using RTR and it did not disappoint.
Fit well, definitely needed to wear a sticky bra though, because the dress shows a lot of side boob in the front. Happy I rented it!

Rented this dress for a wedding and it was so great - super comfy and no digging seams. I would say it runs a little big - I very consistently wear an 8 in dresses and the 8 of this dress was just a little bit baggy in the top. Pockets = everything, got tons of compliments, also I'm pretty tall (5'10") and this wasn't too short at all (always my fear with dresses). Would definitely recommend and even rent again, would just get a smaller size next time! (also, sorry for this weird photo, it's literally the only one I have from the night).

Great dress - the fit and stretch were perfect - nice heavy fabric. Only thing I found odd (which is just the style that I didn't see before ordering) is the straps are cut very square (instead of round between your boob and armpit) so you can see your bra on the side, but isn't a big deal as long as you're not wearing a hot pink bra.

I wore this dress to an outdoor July wedding, and it was incredibly comfortable. I wore a strapless bra because the neckline is a little weird, but I didn't have to adjust much at all. Added a belt since I like my waist well defined, and got lots of compliments. The dress is made of neoprene aka scuba material which threw me off at first but ended up totally great. And the pockets were a great bonus :)

I love this dress and the pockets were a bonus! The only issue: it's almost like a wetsuit material! After running from registration for the event to the stage to run the raffle, and then dancing, I was sweating like I ran a marathon! The fabric in the bodice retained all of that moisture, and it was still damp the next morning! It was super fun to wear and I would rent it again!

I love this dress! Very comfortable and mostly true to size. I'm normally a 4/6 and wore a 6. The waist has no stretch so be aware of that, but generous in the hips and chest. I did have to wear a racerback bra, which worked perfectly. The details of the skirt were so fun and different, plus the pockets are an awesome addition. I felt the length was good for me, but I'm only around 5'3" so be aware of this if you are super tall. I would definitely rent this again!

This dress was very comfortable and had pockets! Decent length for short girls, when standing it hit right at the knee. There were a few pieces of fabric that seemed to be loose but I assume that's because it's a popular dress. It wasn't super noticeable so I still wore it.
Absolutely loved this dress.. It was a little short..but besides that it was a great dress. Super comfortable!
I wish there was an in between size. It was cool enough for a late august Texas wedding. Loved the dress though!

links_reviews_title: It made me look really wide
links_reviews_text: The dress had a stretchy top which is great for those with large to larger chests. The torso was super short though so that didnâ€™t work for me. I needed a dress with a much lower waist line. I tried both the 14W and the 16W and both fit okay, but I had slightly more room in the 16.

I rented this dress for NYE, and while I loved it (especially the fact that it had pockets), the zipper was ROUGH to zip up. It took my boyfriend about 10 minutes to get it up. The dress wasn't too small (the size 8 had the same problem), but it was just hard to get the zipper over the skirt of the dress. Don't rent the dress unless you have someone to help you get into it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a great winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: Zipper was a bit tricky, needed help. Had a few snags in the dress but overall beautiful.

Wore this to fall wedding in TX (so not fall weather lol) I went with my true size and it fit perfect. The zipper was super worn from previous renters and was at first stuck and impossible to unzip to put on. My date and I had to lube it up with vaseline to get it going, and it took messing with it for a couple hours. My hands were all scratched up from trying, but it ended up working and was worth it.

links_reviews_title: It was so comfy! And has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Pros: comfy, could wear with normal bra, pockets Cons: a little short but when you raised your arms it did not move up so that was a bonus

This dress is awesome! The other reviews rate this as a bit short, so I was expecting that. My only issue with the dress is it was hard to find a good jacket/sweater to wear with it due to the shape. This would be best as a summer dress vs something where you need some extra coverage. Overall, comfortable and convenient.
I wore this to a friend's wedding and loved it! I got so many compliments on it all night. And POCKETS!? Amazing! This dress was comfortable and it looked just like it was advertised.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a fancy french restaurant (Michelin star!) for an anniversary date with my hubs.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits great. Very comfortable and you can wear a racerback bra. It was a little shorter than I expected and is a littler higher up on the waistline which is why I decided to wear a belt. If you carry all your weight in your tummy, as I do, you'll prob want a belt otherwise it's a little less flattering. the pockets are a huge plus and the dress looks gorgeous in person. The necklace was a RTR too and I loved it.

Since most of the reviews said the fit was small I tried on the 8 first (i had gotten a 6 and an 8). After several attempts by both myslef and my husband we finally got the zipper up. The fit was ok but it hung low under the arm pits and was bunchy in the waist. I tried on the 6 and I could tell the fit would be much better but we could NOT get the zipper over the seam!! The night of the Christmas party I had planned to wear it to i had my zipper give the zipper a try and after several attempts she got it up!! I got tons of compliments, it was super comfortable, but it couldve been a disaster rental if the zipper didnt eventually go over the seam. So rent with caution- make sure you have someone to help you with the zipper!! I would rent this again except for that.
Fit like a glove and comfortable. No Spanx or special bra needed! And pockets....need I say more!!!! #rtr #livinlavidalopez #anothergreatexperience

This dress was really cute. I believe the backup size of 10 would have probably fit me better but it did not come. There is no give in the waistband so just keep that in mind. Also this dress has some scuffs on the back which I was able to clean off and the skirt has a few large, noticeable picks in the shiny fabric. Overall really nice dress though and I'd order it again in a larger size.

links_reviews_title: I love how confident this dress made me feel!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a perfect fit! I got so many compliments!!! LOVED the pockets!!!

This dress was very comfortable. It hides problem spots so I felt great all night. Pretty true to size, but I went with the size up (14) for bust coverage. I wore it with my bra straps crossed in the back. The pockets were perfect, and I even liked it with my flats!
Adorable & fun! Perfect for a wedding. Paired with chunky necklace that I also rented and strappy black heels. Side note, it was a St. Patrick's Day wedding so I'm pale....

I ordered this last minute so my size wasn't available. I ordered a larger one and with a belt it looked fine. I knew it was big but no one could tell. This dress is super comfortable and super flattering. I would definitely rent it again.

This dress is the perfect mix of laid back and dressy. Got lots of compliments on the racerback style. Has pockets!! Very flattering, even without a bra (and I almost never not wear a bra). Will rent again!

The original dress I ordered was too large so RTR sent me a replacement. The dress was perfect! I'm actually really glad I got to wear this dress instead of the original one I selected. The fabric is luscious with a little bit of sparkle perfect for an evening wedding. I got tons of compliments on it! Kudos to Devon from RTR for helping me with the entire process of getting a different dress. She was amazing. They sent the dress directly to my hotel (it was an out of town wedding) and it arrived just in time!
I wore this to my friends wedding and felt really comfortable in it. The skirt is so pretty , the pictures do not do it justice!. Perfect dress to hide my 2 yr post baby pouch :-)

I wore this dress to a surprise 60th birthday party for my mother in law. The dress was fun, sophisticated and classy perfect representation of me and my personality. It's a little short, but perfect for a night of dancing.

OMG this dress was beyond amazing. I wore it to an out door wedding in North Carolina in early September. I received so many compliments. I am always a little cautious of wearing dresses like this because I'm afraid that it will make "The Girls" look bigger than they already are (42DDD) but this dress didn't do that. It runs try to size. The skirt was a good length. I'm on the tall side (5'8") so I did have to be careful with the back but it was totally worth it. AND IT HAS POCKETS WHILE I LOVE. The only con I would say is the zipper at fabric change. I had to have help getting it zipped up and zipped down.

links_reviews_title: First a million compliments!It was super comfortable w/ pockets & I danced all night and felt great.
links_reviews_text: Con was that the top was HUGE and my bra size is 38G. Had to put a simple stitch to snitch in the top. You can see the stitches( darts) in the pic. Pros: super comfortable with pockets, I'm 5ft tall so it hit me above my knee so I could wear my spanx without it peeking it out, it was a gorgeous puffy skirt so it was very forgiving whenever I was dancing silly. I completely recommend this dress to all!

links_reviews_title: Can't be Blue wearing this Blue
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a planned sit down dinner for my bosses birthday at a restaurant. It was a great little dress for a dinner party and I didn't feel over it under dressed even on Sunset Blvd in LA. Plus anything with pockets is pretty much a guaranteed rental for me!

I picked three different dresses and ultimately chose this one to wear. These were the things I liked about it; 1- true to size and did not require shape-wear! 2- pockets!!! 3- length was appropriate and since the neckline was high I didn't have to worry about cleavage. What I didn't like about it was the metallic blue color in a few stripes in the skirt. I always feel like metallic threads give a cheap "night club" feel to otherwise cute dresses. I was able to dress it down a little with some simple wedges. The wedding was not formal so I felt a tiny bit over dressed... but I felt cute and was so comfortable in it that I didn't care.

This dress was great - the skirt is definitely full but I really liked it! I would definitely pair this with a necklace (silver, if I were you)! All around - such a fun dress - got a ton of compliments.

Pictures don't give this dress justice and the skirt is absolutely gorgeous in person. It was actually my back up dress and I'm so glad I got it. The racer back top was wicked comfy and flattering and the skirt has just enough pouf. The pockets were also fantastic. I wear a 36DD and it fit the bust perfectly. I wore it to a semi-formal event at my college reunion and was complimented non-stop!

links_reviews_title: Dress was super cute, but the skirt is puffier than I expected, loved it though!
links_reviews_text: It was very comfortable, the top was stretchier that I thought. The skirt was full and fun and the band around the waist was snug.

When I first got this dress I wanted to return it because the bottom half was so poofy. I felt silly in it. My husband convinced me it looked nice so I kept it. In the end, I'm glad I did! It was very comfortable, had pockets and fit wonderfully on the top. It was a little short in the back. Cute dress and easy to dress up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. A little boxy on the bottom if you're full-figured
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for a winter wedding. The skirt was beautiful but a little boxy if you're full-figured. I paired it with black tights and ankle boots and it looked great. Perfect dark colors for a winter wedding.
I thought this dress fit true-to-size. It felt very flattering. I would totally wear this dress again. In fact I'm even considering buying it.

This dress is very comfortable and the bodice is stretchy. I LOVED the high neck and it didn't bother me at all. I was able to wear a normal, supportive bra. It was cold so I did wear a black cardigan. I got tons of compliments and felt good about the dress. I'm a pear shape and rented a 22 and a 20. The 22 puckered at the armpits so I was glad I got the backup size. I am really glad I rented this dress....So much better than anything I'd have bought. The poofy skirt helped disguise my giant bottom. Cons: I still rated this dress high, but here are the cons. I'm not tall at all. Usually dresses in my size (20-22) are too long so when I saw people comment that this dress was short, I thought it would be perfect. It was in fact TOO short for me. I have bad legs and would have liked the dress to be 2-3 inches longer. I felt a bit self conscious about my exposed pudgey knees, so I did not dance at this wedding. Both dresses had some snags in the skirt which didn't bother me really. The zipper was difficult to get past the seam at the waist. My husband had a hard time with it but I have narrow shoulders so I just zipped it past that and put it over my head.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the occasion and comfy!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and had pockets! I was even able to wear a sports bra due to the neckline and thick top material. I got so many compliments and felt incredibly confident!

Sooo love this dress! I wore it for my company Christmas party and was dancing the entire night without any discomfort. The material felt great and the pockets were perfect to carry my big phone so I can take pics anytime.

links_reviews_title: My dress arrived within 24 hours. The backup size was truly helpful.
links_reviews_text: This dress is short. If you are self conscious about your legs this dress may not work. I paired it with tights and felt like a princess on my birthday. The accessories were perfect.

I originally ordered another dress (only available in one size) that would not close over my rib cage. In typically awesome RTR fashion, they overnighted me a replacement of my choosing. This dress was so fun! I received tons of compliments, SO comfortable and very forgiving on my postpartum body! You can enjoy a full meal and dance in total comfort. I wish I owned it.

I ordered this as a replacement as my first choice did not match the photo and was not what I expected. I was very happy with this replacement dress and wish I had ordered it first! Comfy, bright (perfect for the holidays!) and has POCKETS!!
I loved this dress! Super comfortable and received a tone of compliments. True to size!

The color is really vibrant, which is great for a fun, colorful party. The pockets were great, though they did gape a little, especially with my phone in there. I'm 5'1, and the length was perfect. Not too short for this work party, but short enough to be flattering on a short frame. With a size B bust, the neckline was also flattering but not too low cut for work. You could totally wear a bra underneath, and you couldn't see it because of the nice thick straps. But I decided not to wear a bra and felt really supported and comfortable without one.

I'm currently nursing so my bust size is more like a 34C-D, which meant my normal size 0 didn't fit and I had to wear the 2, which was a bit big at the top. If you're busty I would size up. Otherwise I felt like the 0 would've fit perfectly. I was worried about how the pockets would make the waist look but they fell perfectly, nice and flat! Loved the color and got compliments on it.

This bold and bright dress fits true to size and is perfect for a summer wedding. I paired it with nude heels and a statement piece necklace. The fabric is thick, has a unique texture, AND the dress has pockets!
Awesome fit. So flattering. Received so many compliments. Wasn't too short either. Felt comfortable and confident. I'm a 4/6 in dresses and 4 was true to size.
This was a comfortable dress with great pockets in a snappy color. If you are small chested make sure to size down. Great dress, would rent again
Very comfortable dress. Wore it to a cocktail party- love the pockets!
This dress fit great and true to size. The pockets are the best part! Great color, comfortable, and light enough fabric for a summer wedding.
Fit well and has pockets which came in handy! Plus it's a standout!
If you are tall and slender this actually might be a fun, structured-but-feminine dress for you. If you are not tall and slender this dress is all hips.
Perfect for date out a party or anything really. Loved the material and color so much I bought it. Couldn't pass up the fabulous deal offered

links_reviews_title: Fun dress to dance in! Comfortable and easy to wear, but runs small
links_reviews_text: This dress was a little tight in my chest but was a flattering cut. Iâ€™m only 5ft 5in so the length wasnâ€™t a problem, but if youâ€™re taller with long legs I can definitely see this dress being a bit short. The pockets were great and the color is perfect?

Wore this for my grad school graduation. Color was a vibrant red, true to the color shown in pictures. Ordered a 2 & 4 and ended up wearing the 2. Straps on size 4 were a bit large and fabric popped out in the chest area. Fabric is extremely stretchy and top part of dress fit snug but comfortably. Would highly recommend this piece!!
I'm small chested so it was a little big on top but not bad! Perfect party dress! I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Pop of color in a sea of LBD's + POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: LOVED the pockets! This 8 fits true to size and fell about 3 in. above my knees on my 5'3 frame. Definitely more of a poppy red, and a show stopper in a room full of LBD's. Worn to a work holiday cocktail party.
It fit perfectly! Fitted up top and the flare was great!

The dress fit nicely. I was very happy that I did not have to carry a purse because I was able to put my lipstick and phone in the pockets. The color was a bit more orange than I thought it was going to be but this didn't bother me at all. I stood out in a good way at the holiday party that I attended and I received many compliments.

Loved this dress! I'm normally a 12 but after reading reviews I got the 10 as a backup and glad I did. The 10 was not as big on top and was perfect. The only downside was that it was a November wedding so I was a little cold. So this great for the warmer months the. The material is stretchy and comfy. And it has pockets!! The style of the dress is very flattering.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect! It fit my waste at the perfect spot and the pockets were amazing.
links_reviews_text: I am normally a size 10, but this dress ran a little small. The material was thicker and I didnâ€™t even have to wear a bra. It photographed very well and was the perfect pop of color.

This dress was amazingly comfortable. The pockets were GREAT! The length was exactly right for my petite height of 5'1". I wore a regular bra with straps and had no problem. Highly recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect! I wore it with black tights and black booties!
links_reviews_text: I am a 36DD, 5'6" and weigh 180

Loved the material which had texture and structure without being heavy. The dress fit well in shoulders and armpits, fitting snugly but not too tight. I also liked the length and the pockets were helpful too.

I rented this for a wedding and absolutely loved this dress! It was comfortable, flattering, you could wear a regular bra with it, AND it has pockets!! The only problem with this dress is the zipper gets stuck super easy so it takes a while to get it zipped. This was my first experience with RTR and I would 100% do it again!

Loved this dress!! It was fun and lightweight. The pockets were awesome! Didnâ€™t need a purse as my lipgloss and phone fit without being noticeable. Only notice that the dress had been worn (quite a bit) was the paint was worn off of the zipper. Though Iâ€™m sure no one noticed but me!

I wore this to a casual rehearsal dinner and it was perfect for the occasion! The pockets were very handy and I didn't need a purse. The color was more of a tangerine which was a little unexpected but I loved it nonetheless!

I loved wearing this dress and got quite a few compliments. I only gave it four stars because the pockets sag in a way that make your hips look wider than they should. This is pretty easy to fix with a couple of safety pins, though, which is why this dress is a winner in my book! Perfect for an early September wedding.
Perfect for a wedding. Also lover the color.

I have broad shoulders, thick waist and narrow hips and I think that this dress shape might be the most flattering. I felt pretty and comfortable all night. I never know what to do with my hands while wearing dresses so the pockets were a godsend. I would definitely rent this dress again.
Comfortable dress but I just didn't love it, it wasn't a stand out for me
Nice easy dress. Regular bar and underwear fine. Pockets! Can be dressed up or down. Great for travel. Ran true to size and very forgiving with some stretch

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a garden wedding that started late afternoon and went into the night.
links_reviews_text: I wore this with a padded push-up bra as I have a small chest on a small frame. The extra padding and lift was needed to fill out the top. I still had a little gap, but that was only noticeable from certain angles. The V in the front is pretty high, so pushing up the girls still won't give you a lot of visible cleavage. The waist fit perfectly and the dress was great for the warmer weather (80s). The material is solid and not light and flimsy, but I still stayed cool.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, pockets and the perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! And it made me feel so beautiful. I received so many compliments. And get this.... it had pockets! What more could you ask for.
It's flattering for women with wider hips since it conceals them. The material was very soft. Also, it was 97 degrees at an outdoor wedding and no sweat marks!!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved the color of this dress, it was bright and perfect for a summer wedding. The material was thick, but not too heavy. It ran a little small in the bust, so I would suggest ordering one size up as a back up. Otherwise, it fit as expected and was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for work dinner gala!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and will definitely be renting again. I work in nonprofit events and wore this for a formal dinner/gala. I loved the pockets!! It was super comfy and flattering. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I wanna buy this dress and have it forever!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a very casual wedding reception and absolutely fell in love with it. The jacquard fabric dresses it up and the pockets are amazing! I am 5'2" and about 130 pounds and the 6 fit like a glove. Shows enough cleavage but not too much so it's perfect for any type of event. The color is like an orange-red and seemed to complement my skin (very fair). Hem hit right above the knee so it was a perfect length for a classy event. If your looking for a mini, you either need to be super tall or find another dress. Overall, I want this dress in my life for good!!

This dress was a great choice for an early summer wedding. I got a spray tan, so I was a bit darker than my normal pasty-white. That was a good thing for this dress, as my skin has pink undertones and did not look great pre-spray tan. I'm a size 10-12 in most tops and bottoms, sometimes in 14 in dresses with no stretch, 38C. I wore the 10 in this dress and it was snug, but not too tight. There is a good amount of stretch to this thing. It. Is. Short. I'm 5'3" and if I was any taller I would have felt uncomfortable in his dress. Overall great rental. 100% recommend.
Loved this cute dress, very flattering and, as a bonus, has pockets. Perfect for a dinner, a date, a party, or a night out.

links_reviews_title: First experience with RTR and I would rent again for sure!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable. Loved the color style and shape. Very flattering. I got lots of compliments through out the night at my 20 year high school reunion! Would recommend this dress!!

I chose to share a picture of the back of the dress because I didn't see any when I was looking through pictures. The back really steals the show, but the entire dress is beautiful. Extremely comfortable, the pockets were a plus. I wore this for a semi-formal awards dinner for work.

This dress is fun to wear! Sleeves are itchy. There was a small rip in the right sleeve. It accentuated my hips a little more than I was hoping. Still a good dress for winter but glad I don't own it because I probably wouldn't wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Tight on ribs, but very comfy otherwise!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my work's annual gala and it was an excellent choice. I normally wear an 8 and ordered a 10 as a back up, but didn't need it. As I think others have mentioned, this dress was very snug around the ribs for me. However, the rest of the dress fit perfectly so I went with the 8. I absolutely loved the pockets! The back was just sexy enough for an upscale work event and the sleeves covered my arms nicely. Would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect lace navy dress with pockets!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. I was a bridesmaid and we were instructed to fid a navy lace dress. Fit great, has pockets, very flattering and comfy. I wore a sticky bra with ur fur yo the open back.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a destination Quinceanera. The dress traveled well.
links_reviews_text: Loved the pockets and the full A-line. I'm a small bust -wide hips (pair shape). The top half was slightly loose so it shifted a bit. The open back worked OK with a traditional strapless bra. Overall I was comfortable wearing it for a long event.

Wore this for a holiday party and it was so fancy and festive, I really loved it. The fit was great (even the sleeves) and the open back looked really pretty. The only downside is you cant wear a traditional bra, but I felt like the cups in the front gave enough coverage/support for me so I was fine. I'm on the shorter side and the skirt was a little long, so I wore small heels and I felt like it hit a midi-length, which I liked. I would definitely rent this again for a party!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to dance (and eat) in!
links_reviews_text: Normally wear a size 2, but was able to fit into the 0. Zipper is VERY difficult to zip, but otherwise, this dress was perfect. I felt comfortable and fancy all night long!

links_reviews_title: Classy. Great for cool weather wedding.
links_reviews_text: The fit on this dress was pretty TTS. I'm tiny up top but have a bigger bottom end. This dress is very forgiving and flowing past the waist so my 28 jeans size was no issue. At 34AA I didn't need a bra but it's very structured for those that might. There is a layer of netting that I found to be itchy especially around my neck and chest. It wasn't horrible but I didn't forget it was there. The skirt has about four layers so it's good for colder weather. I loved that the back was out. It made me still feel a little sexy but I was completely comfortable at the late evening December wedding.
Beautiful dress! A little long for me at 5â€™3â€ but otherwise a great fit.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. I got so many compliments and I thought it was really flattering. It was perfect for a late fall wedding in Michigan where the temperature was down to the low 30s with snow. Tea length and fullness of the skirt was flattering and fun to dance around in. Enough structure that I felt secure without a bra. Would definitely recommend this dress!

Fit perfectly. Could dance in it without feeling like there would be a mishap. Beautiful blue color and the tutu style bottom was very classy and fun. Open back gave it some slight sexiness. Perfect dress for a wedding guest. Very happy with the product. No issue with zipper or clips!! Would recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: Great for November Wedding, comfortable, tons of compliments, and the pockets were amazing!!!
links_reviews_text: Don't really need a bra, but was able to use the sticky chicken cutlet bra!
This dress fit true to size. It was perfect for wedding I attended and it even had pockets to fit my phone. It was a great material and with the open back you do not need to wear a bra.
I love the way this dress fit. It has beautiful detailing and was very comfortable. I'm a 36D and I didn't have to wear a bra! Love loved this dress!!!

The dress was great for a fall wedding with the sleeves and the overall weight of the dress. However it was a bit more full in the skirt as I would have liked and the waist had zero give. I didn't have to wear a bra with it though, so that's a plus. I got a lot of compliments and was overall happy with this dress.

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing this dress. I felt great and I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. The top has enough structure built in that I was able to wear it comfortably without a bra. The shape is flattering and also really comfortable to move around and dance in. The lace looks so delicate and pretty but the dress was in great shape. I loved the back and I'm bummed I didn't get a good picture of it from the back. I also loved the pockets! They are actually quite big and I was able to fit my stuff in them without causing weird bulges thanks to the full skirt. I had a lipstick and card in one pocket and my phone in the other, and I ended up decided not to carry a bag. I wore it to a charity gala, but it would also be great for a wedding or pretty much any other dressy event, and it'd would work for pretty much any season too. Very versatile!

This was a back up dress but it was perfect for a formal work banquet. Classy in front and sexy back cut out. So can't wear a bra with this one. Has pockets which I love! Hem line was a bit longer than I like but a great dress overall. Lots of compliments all night :)

links_reviews_title: Aww really wanted to wear this!
links_reviews_text: It was just tad too tight around the ribs and I couldn't zip up the last inch! So sad.. the lace part was fitting just right, I'm not sure if size 8 would make the other areas too loose. Will have to try next time! Overall excellent quality material, would have loved to be able to wear it for the event!
Probably one of my favorite rentals by far. It was comfortable, classy and fun ! I received many compliments. Love the sleeves and of course the pockets !!! Wish i owned this dress !!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a 1950s work gala
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty and just so gorgeous! It was perfect for a work event because it was young and fun but still professional. As described in other reviews, it was VERY tight in the waist. But the good news is that it held me in so much i was able to totally skip any sort of bra or cups. Very pretty overall.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my friend's wedding, the dress code was black tie optional.
links_reviews_text: I got sizes 6 & 8 but ended up wearing the 6 to the wedding. It was a little snug but the 8 felt too loose. The arms were a little itchy at first but that didn't last long. The length was perfect as well, which is always a concern for me because I am over 6 foot and my legs alone are three feet long. I would definitely rent this one again!

Fit was pretty good; I could've worn either the 8 or the 10 but picked the 10 as it was slightly more comfortable through the waist. Comfy sleeves, pretty open back. The skirt is fluffy but in a fun way. Great dress for a wedding.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a very cold January night. It was beautiful and unique and very classy.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size. It was a little tight around the waist and I had trouble getting the zipper up because it was so stiff. Even my husband could not pull the zipper up. I had to spin it around and zipper it myself and then turn it around again. I loved the length of the dress and the three quarter lace sleeves. It was a very cold January night and the dress was perfect. I loved the classic lines of the dress and the sexy open back. I did not have to wear a bra and the girls held up very well. I loved the pockets in the dress. I was able to put my cell phone in and you could not tell it was in there. I also loved that the dress hid my tummy area which is my problem spot.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, beautiful fabric, classic with a flirty back! I loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore by true size. I'm 5'8 and 133, size 4 was it for me!

The dress is very comfortable and beautiful. The wedding was in the winter, so the sleeves were perfect for the time of the year. Since the back is open, I used a sticky bra and it worked. I would highly recommend this dress as it would flatter any figure.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a black tie optional event.
links_reviews_text: Great fit! Love the deep pockets. I was worried that the skirt being too full but it wasn't. I received lots of compliments.
Flattering shape. Comfortable for a post partum body. Loved the lace detail.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! I absolutely loved it and wish I didn't have to return it
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect! True to size

I ordered size 0 and 2. I usually wear size 2 but lost some weight recently so fit 0 better. Dress made me feel special. Open back was a wow factor and I got many compliments on it. It was comfortable and flirty. Great rental

I needed a navy bridesmaid dress. This worked perfectly. I'm 5'7 and dress hit me right at the knee. It's a sweet dress but you do get a touch of pizzaz with the open back. NOTE: My only criticism: there is NO BONING in the front of the dress and I definitely need a bra. I ended up with a sticky bra at the last minute.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Wanted to keep it forever!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2, 137 lbs and the size 6 was perrrrfect. The material is great, the skirt is a bit long on me since I'm a bit short, just past the knee, and the color is more a purple-ish blue in the daylight, but still very pretty. The chest had enough support that my 36C self did not need anything underneath the dress which was great because of the keyhole back. The skirt is a bit fuller than I expected, it poofs a bit more right at the hip than I first thought, but it was really beautiful nonetheless. I received lots of compliments and while there isn't a ton of give in the material, it was still super comfortable to sit and dance around in without any worries. I LOVED it. It was so fun to dance in and was the perfect combination of elegant, fun, and comfortable. I wanted to seriously buy this and keep it in my collection forever!

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for my brother's wedding.
links_reviews_text: An excellent dress. Would definitely rent again; as a matter of fact I would love to own this dress. I received lots of compliments. A bit snug around the waistline but very comfortable the entire night, even after a few hours on the dancefloor. Perfect for the occasion and it looks great in the wedding photos!

This was an overall beautiful dress. The back was really pretty and helped me keep cool for an outdoor wedding on a hot day (was in the 90s). My only complaint is that I have fairly wide hips and with the pockets and poof of the dress, I think it made my hips look even bigger, although everyone said it was just the style of the dress and not me. Overall I really liked the dress. It was unique and pretty and the fit and length were great!

I LOVED this dress! So so pretty and I was able to wear a strapless bra with it which I was nervous about because I don't own a backless bra. The only annoyance was that the band was tight around my ribs and the zipper was hard to get up. Have a friend with you when you get dressed! I'm very much pear shaped, 12 on top and 14 on the bottom so the fit and flare is my go to and this was great for that even tho I felt a little like a sausage around the band. But nonetheless I got complements! Bonus - it has pockets!

I actually received this dress as a replacement dress since my original dress would not arrive on time. I absolutely loved the fit! I received so many compliments and it was such a comfortable dress. The back is beautiful too. I would rent this dress again!

The fit was really good - I have a small waist but big up top and bottom. The open back was okay. As you can see in the photo there was some small muffin-mess going on, but my husband LOVED the dress and I got compliments on it so overall it was a success.

links_reviews_title: The pocket option crushed the night!
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size and looked amazing on. This was my first RTR experience and I would totally do it again!

I LOVED this dress! The lace detail neckline was so gorgeous and the back is a subtle statement. I am pear shaped so even though I normally wear a 10 in pants, I wore the 8 and it fit great. (I got the 10 as a backup and it was too big from the waist up) I read a lot of reviews that said they didn't need to wear a bra...that was not the case for me! Ha! So I was worried about my strapless bra showing but all I had to do was pull it down a bit in the back and it was fine. There's no stretch to the fabric but it wasn't too tight. I danced all night in it and it was so comfortable. I got so many compliments on this dress and was thrilled to tell everyone I got it from RTR. It was my first time and I can't wait to use them again!
Wore to a friends wedding- it was perfect. I got so many complements! The back was great for showing off and the full skirt was really flattering for my pear shape.

Pros: no bra needed. Can wear comfy undies. Literally the most comfortable combo. Cons: not really any. While not my favorite RTR, I did really like this dress. Every detail was in place and I felt like a classic girly girl in it. The lace, sweetheart neckline, bodice, open back and skirt were all very nice. I wish I could have worn the 6, but it was all but destroyed when it arrived (beware the size 6) and the 8 was just a little roomy and filled out around my waist more than I would have liked.
The medium was a bit roomy. Was worried about being too hot while dancing, but it was fine. Got compliments. Generally felt good!

Loved this dress. I had a small and xsmall as my backup. I ended up wearing the XS as it seemed to fit better. I wore this for a gala early april. Even though it seemed like I would be warm in it I thought it was great. I wasn't too hot and it kept me warm during the event. Loved the colors and it fit perfectly even though I usually wear petite sizes. It was short in length but I knew that when I rented it. Great dress for all occasions.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Nice and warm for. Winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€ and wore in XS. Snug fit. Good length. Nice and warm.
Fit was perfect and the sleeves made a November bachelorette bar hop bareable!! Loved the design
Love this dress! It's very comfortable, a good length but on the short side... would look good with heels or boots. It's stretchy material and very flattering. True to size.
This was great for a party in the winter time, it was warm, and had a bit of stretch, I usually can't fit into a XS.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and kept me warm on a cold New York evening
links_reviews_text: Elegant and stretchy! Fun birthday dress! Felt sophisticated and sexy at the same time.

links_reviews_title: Dress was warm, loved the long sleeves for winter holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Fit ok, not my favorite RTR dress.

Fit very well, it is a really really warm dress. I thought it would be a bit colder in November but didn't need to carry around a jacket all night so that was easy! Love that it is simple to accessorize! Very flattering and fit is true to size.

links_reviews_title: My favorite Clover Canyon dress ever!
links_reviews_text: Truly, I'm not sure anyone could look bad in this dress. It is very slimming (def size up if in between sizes). Only drawback is that it is short. Not quite a mini, but it crept up a bit when I was walking back to the train station.
This dress was perfect for a winter night out. The material is on the heavier side but it stretches so it's very comfortable!
The material is durable and very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Great dress that is comfortable and shows off your curves!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my birthday dinner as well as my high school reunion. The scuba material is super flattering and the dress fit like a glove! I got so many compliments on it and the blue pattern photographs really well. My only complaint is that the dress kept riding up and I constantly found myself having to pull it down.. that may be because I wore tights with it (this was in the winter). But overall, love this dress!

I rented this for NYE and it was PERFECT! It was a very cold night, and I didn't even need coat! We weren't outside long, but the dress kept me perfectly warm for walking between doors and cars. It was also so comfortable and didn't ever ride up even with dancing. I got compliments all night and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: The blue design screamed winter formal.
links_reviews_text: A beautiful dress to wear in the winter months, and a comfortable dress to dance in. Hugs in all the right places, but do beware of occasionally pulling it down, as it does tend to ride up a bit.

Wore this for a formal affair and it worked perfectly. Normally a size 2/4 (depending) and wore an XS. It rode up a little bit with walking and dancing (would've been better if I wore the S but I liked the fit of the XS), but other than that, the fabric was perfect for the winter! Would definitely rent again.
Very flattering dress.. perfect for cold weather. I did not need to wear spanx or a bra. This dress really holds you in. I wish I didn't have to return it!

links_reviews_title: Great for a winter Holiday Party
links_reviews_text: Love love love this dress. Great for a winter holiday party when it's about 30 degrees outside I was warm. The dress felt like a wetsuit but it was not a snug fit. It was a little baggie in the upper chest area, the sleeves were long, had to roll them up inside the dress which it was not noticeable. The length was good, but road up if you were bending over. Thank you for another beautiful dress whereas I got tons of compliments.
Perfect fit and the scuba material makes the mini dress warm. A little tight in the chest area, so may be worth sizing up with your full chested (34DDD).

links_reviews_title: The beautiful detailing helped the dress stand out.
links_reviews_text: Fit is very flattering, but still leaves you room to move around. Perfect for formal occasions and drinks after at a more casual spot.

This dress was perfect for my 30th bday. I usually dont like very fitted dress because of my post baby belly but this one killed it. Material was very flattering, its short which offsets the long sleeves nicely. Get this one!!

This is a perfect dress to wear in colder weather. It fits amazingly and creates a stunning silhouette. When I walked in wearing this dress, literally everyone stopped and stared--even strangers. I got so many compliments--from all ages. I love clover canyon! Plus, this fabric is ridiculously forgiving. You can wear a regular bra and ditch the spanx because this puppy sucks you in all on its own without feeling restrictive.

links_reviews_title: This dress was fun & perfect for the Lupus Fundraising event.
links_reviews_text: I wore a large & it fit like a glove. I'm large breasted so I was worried that it would press my chest down but it was great. It was a little shorter than I normally wear but I'm glad I looked good in it & I got plenty of complements. There is lots of stretch in this dress too. I'd highly recommend wearing some kind of shape wear with this dress. I'd definitely get this item again.

I wore this RTR dress to a concert, the fit is amazing....definitely shows off your curves....the skirt length was perfect, although a little hard to zip by myself, it was perfect once I got it on. Love the royal blue/black combination, I received compliments on my dress all night long, probably because I was the only chick in a dress at a rock concert LOL

A ton of compliments on this form fitting beautiful dress. The bright blue embroidery is gorgeous I'm 5 foot two and petite so the arms were a little long I just tucked the sleeves underneath to make the length appropriate to my wrist. The length of the dress was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! Easy to wear and the blue is very vibrant. Got lots of compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: The sizing would be very forgiving on most body types. I'm busty so it was nice to have something clingy but not so much that I felt the need to wear spanx. I didn't wear a bra and felt like I got great support. I thought it was a great length (hit mid thigh). Only con I can think of is that it is slightly bulky and I would have liked to try a size smaller. My back up was larger just in case. I wore this on a cool vegas night and stayed fairly warm.
Very stretchy material
The fit was a bit larger depending on how tight you want your dress. I could have worn the xs but wanted it to be a bit looser.

links_reviews_title: Nicely made, stretchy material, love the vibrant blue detailing.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress, got lots of compliments. I am only 5'1, and my only complaint would be that it was short and I had to keep pulling it down all night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect For A Cold ATL Night!
links_reviews_text: Got this for my daughter to wear.....she is 5'3 & 100 lbs....she wore the XS & it fit perfectly! It was comfortable and kept her warm. Very happy with it!

I rented this dress for a work event and loved it! It's a great cut for work - flattering without being revealing. Got lots of compliments on it. And it was super comfortable! The material was kind of thick, almost like a wet suit, but didn't get hot or itchy at all. I was completely unaware of it all night, no tugging or pulling. Would love to own it. (Forgive the busted hair and makeup in the photo - this was at home after the event - but the dress was still going strong.)

Loved this dress! The material is unexpected--my husband said I was wearing a scuba dress :) it kept me nice and warm for a chilly New York night out. I received a handful of compliments from strangers...a true test of cuteness!

links_reviews_title: Great material, great fit, great color!
links_reviews_text: I rented a S and an XS and the S fit perfectly! I didn't even try on the XS. The material is awesome (feels like a scuba suit!) and the blue textured pattern is very vibrant and beautiful. The sleeves were a tad long but it didn't bother me. The length of the dress was perfect. It does ride up if you're moving around in it a lot but nothing a little pull down can't fix! I would recommend this dress for a party, a birthday, NYE. I loved it!

I was worried it would run large on me, most dresses do. It fit well other then a little big around the stomach area. Which you didn't really notice because of it being black and the thick fabric. The length was great along with the length of the arms. Loved the thicker material. It was very comfortable to wear.
I wear size 2 and XS fitted perfectly. This dress is beautiful and the material is tight and flattering.
This dress is made with a thick material that is perfect for cold weather or cold restaurant. I paired black tights and black heels and it was great.
This dress fit like a glove! The scuba material helped suck everything in and added to a very flattering silhouette. It was also very comfortable to wear. It was perfect for a cool December evening.

I wore the dress to my cousins wedding and got so many compliments. This dress allowed me to be comfortable all night and still look amazing. The only downside was that it kept riding up on the dance floor, but I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for a masquerade party
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Carnevale masquerade party. The pattern matched my mask style & color, so at first I was worried that the dress might not fit well because those were my only parameters for deciding to rent it. Luckily I ended up really loving the dress's fit too. It's definitely very thick and "wetsuit" like, so I would not recommend wearing it if you are going to be outside or in a humid/hot climate, as the dress is not breathable. However, my party was in February in the northeast, so it was quite cold. Despite the dress's material, I was able to dance and moved around very easily. If you are particularly curvy, be warned that the dress will not hide it well, but if like me, you like showing off what few curves you do have because it is still fairly stretch and uber-secure (I'm more of an hourglass, but a smaller size), this dress is awesome for showcasing a feminine form.

I rented this dress for a birthday party. The blue print was very pretty and photographed well. Like others have said, the fabric is very warm (good for winter) and a tad unforgiving (Spanx suggested.) While I liked this dress, I was moving around a lot through the night and never really felt comfortable. I constantly felt like I had to adjust it. It might work better on a more tall and thin figure. Overall, a solid rental. Not one of my favorites, but I think it could be great on the right body type and at the right event.

I am 5'7" 115lb and wore 0R. The length was perfect with 2" heels. Closely fitted around the middle and through the hips with a slight flair starting about mid-thigh. You can't tell from the photo, but the lace top was beautiful, flattering without being too revealing. I noticed a couple tiny tears in the lace mesh, but they wouldn't have been visible to anyone else. Very comfortable, easy to move in, didn't need a bra. Fully lined. I wore this to my company's holiday party and it was perfect.
Very comfortable despite being form-fitting. The details on the chest are lovely. Would rent again!

Loved this dress! Favorite one I've rented from RTR so far. I rented the 10L because I'm 5'6" most dresses are just slightly too short with heels. This one was slightly too long, but I think the regular would have been too short. I rented the 8L and 10L as backup, and glad I did because the 8 was a little too snug. It would have been fine, but showed my curves more than I'd like. Overall, I'm super happy with this dress and almost wished I owned it so I could wear it again!

Fit perfectly up top and was very comfortable and great for dancing. I did not wear a bra and was totally fine. This is a very flattering dress and I would definitely rent again!! I wore the long with 3 inch heels and length was perfect

This dress was perfect for the black tie gala that I attended. It was very flattering, and the lace at the neckline was a beautiful, subtle detail that kept it modest. I was able to wear a strapless bra which was necessary since the fabric isn't thick and structured enough to go without one. Being 5'2" I sometimes have trouble with the length of dresses, but this one ended up being perfect with heels on. Both the 2 and 4 fit, but I ended up wearing the 4 because I had a bit of extra room (I didn't want it too tight considering the nature of the gala I was attending). I would definitely rent this again in the future.

links_reviews_title: Dress to impress for Hope and Will Ball.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It was perfect for the Hope and Will Ball benefitting the local children's hospital. This dress was form fitting without being too constricting. Loved the lace detail around the neck line and upper back. I felt like a million bucks wearing it!

I loved the way this dress felt immediately! I also loved that I didn't have to wear a bra with it, bonus! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is it bunched up a little bit on the backside funny if it wasn't pulled up in the front correctly which wasn't very often. I noticed it more when I sat down and it shifted a little and bunched when I got up. It may have been better with the size 2 with this, but I felt like the size 2 restricted my legs too much as it was a little bit of a mermaid style on the bottom which I wasn't expecting. Still loved it though and got lots of compliments on it! I also loved the lace detail and felt like i didn't need a necklace with it. Made it look elegant without having to dress it up any more with additional jewelry. I'll call that a win!

links_reviews_title: This dress way great. So flattering.
links_reviews_text: This dress looked great! Wore it for a black tie ball. It was a little long but I'm pretty short, 5'1. I wore 3 inch heels so it worked. If I owned it I'd have it brought up a little. I was really happy in this dress.

Beautiful dress and it arrived exactly as planned! The dress had some very tiny holes at the top where the lace detail is but you can only see it if you're up close. I ordered the 0P and the 0R because I was not sure of the length. 0P worked perfect with flats and I could've probably done a small heel without it looking too short. There was no need to press it and the return seems simple enough. Looking forward to the next rental!

This dress was overnighted to me when my original dress order was not going to arrive at the scheduled time. This was a back up and I did receive a lot of compliments at the formal affair that I attended. I liked the weight of the dress. It does have a small train that made it seem like it runs a bit long. I had on 3" heels with the gown. The unfortunate part of the gown was that the mesh lace top was torn in the front and back. That made the whole rental experience upsetting. First the gown I wanted to wear was delayed and not going to arrive on time, then the gown that does arrive has holes. After three very successful rentals, this one was very disappointing.
This dress fit perfectly up top, the 8 was too large on top and drooped a little. It was tight around the waist but looked great with spanx! I loved it.
This was actually the backup dress to my rental, but i was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable it was. I'm a little over 5'2" and the petite size was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Backup dress saved me - I danced all night long in it!
links_reviews_text: Personally I think halter dresses are very flattering, especially if you have a larger chest size like me. This one had some nice, lacey detail on top that made it formal, while being SO comfortable to wear and I didn't have to worry about it all night. The material was also elegant and could be worn for black-tie, and also hid any insecurity-areas!!
I'm 5'3" and 117 pounds. This dress fit perfectly. Length was great with 3" heels. I felt like a million bucks in it and had a great evening with no wardrobe issues.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a gala and it was perfectly elegant!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great except for the length. I wore 1in heels and used temporary hem tape to take it up by about 4in.

links_reviews_title: It was at a great location with fun coworkers.
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size and very comfortable. Sometimes being top heavy can make the dress seem so tight near the chest but this dress had plenty of breathing room. I almost didn't want to return it I liked it so much. I do wish they had the petite option that day but it was out of stock so while the regular size dress did hit the floor, it wasn't that big of a deal.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful for a Gala - size down!
links_reviews_text: The pics on RTR don't do justice to the gorgeous lace in both the front and back of the neckline! Also, this gown was super comfy for the entire night - there's just enough stretch in the fabric. I was trying to highlight my shoulders and arms and the halter neck did the trick. I paired with classic black silk evening pumps and a silver bag and felt fab all night!

The fit was perfect for my body type which is petite curvy. The fabric quality was nice and comfortable to wear all day. But I should have order a petite size instead of 4 Regular. It was a little long in length. I'm 5"3 and even when I wore 3 inch heels the dress still drags on the floor.
I am between a size 6p and 8p and busty and 6p was perfect. Very flattering. A little long because Iâ€™m short but 4 inch heels worked perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: It ran a bit small, but the 14L was not available. The long was the perfect length for me with 4 inch heels (I am 5'9'').

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Hugged my curves comfortably and photographed well!
links_reviews_text: Was a little long but otherwise I felt it ran true to size

I wore this dress to a black tie optional wedding and really loved it. It's a minimalist dress, but the lace details on top are beautiful, and it's all about the fit. The fabric felt like it was high quality, but I will say that the dress itself doesn't provide any shaping, so I'd recommend Spanx for smoothing if you think you may feel self conscious. I'm 5'9" and wore the dress with ~3 in heels, and the long size was just a fraction too long on me, so I had to be careful to not step on the edge of the hem in the back.
Was comfortable and fit well.

I needed a long black dress for a formal work-related gala (per invitation). Given that all the ladies would be wearing a long black dress, I wanted something that would be within the requested attire but with a little flare. This dress fit the requirements but had a little detail of see-through lace that made me stand out (in an elegant way). The lace was just the right amount of "pop" that I wanted so I wore with simple pearls and strappy black heels. I didn't even wear much make up! I usually wear a size 4 but tend to go with 6 for most dresses (I prefer a bit more room for comfort). I am on the shorter side (5 ft 2'") and always have issues with length. I wore this with 2 1/2 inch heals and the dress grazed the floor but was never an issue to walk or go up/down stairs. The material was super super comfortable, even after all the hors d'oeuvres and dinner. I was so excited to hear all the compliments on how elegant I looked (especially given all the high-level officials that were in the crowd!) I wore this dress with a black strapless bra and had zero issues. The dress straps did wonders for my arms/shoulders/back (which can look very masculine in strapless dresses). Would highly recommend!!!!

I tend always have the same dilemma. The 4 is always a little snug in the thighs/badonkadonk and the 6 a little big in the boobs. This tends to be my usual problem so therefore this ran "true to size." I went with the 4 and used stick on petals (no bra) so you wouldn't see the bra line. It was a black tie wedding and the dress was very appropriate, classy and comfortable. Good quality with a liner underneath. I would not say it stands out in a crowd, but it is simple and elegant and you can't go wrong with it.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable Dress and lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I did not order this dress, it was sent to me after the dress I wanted was not returned on time and couldnâ€™t be sent out. I was on the fence about wearing it, even though it was the only option that fit me. I had a baby 4 months ago, so I wasnâ€™t looking to wear something so form fitting. However, the material is very soft and comfortable and has a great stretchiness about it. The length was perfect with my heels! Even though it wasnâ€™t my first choice, it ended up working out. The black was very flattering since it was form fitting.

I had ordered a 10R and 12P. Ended up wearing the 12P due to the bust. The 10R was great length for my height and the rest of the dress fit perfectly, but I have a large bust and the 12P just fit that part better. The 12P was a tad long for my height, so I did have to hold up the bottom to go up and down stairs (no biggie). Got tons of compliments on the dress and felt comfortable and beautiful all evening! It was a heavier material than I had originally thought, but didnt feel it while wearing. Was able to dance comfortably in it as well.

links_reviews_title: The event was a blast! My dress was super comfy and fit like a glove :)
links_reviews_text: The fit was slim but stretchy, very flattering. I was up and down and all around all night and I never felt uncomfortable. I was sad to return it :)

links_reviews_title: I went into the RTR store in NYC and the staff was the most helpful and knowledgeable on the pieces.
links_reviews_text: Honestly I have no cons to say about this dress and everything is pros. The material was so stretchy and comfortable and light, the dress never felt heavy or stiff.

This dress was fantastic! It was true to size, the length was perfect with a pair of heels, it hugged all the right places, but never felt uncomfortable. As a 36D, I was able to go braless (with a little help from sticky petals) and feel confident. This was originally my back up dress, but when my primary dress was damaged this was even better than anticipated. This might be my favorite rental ever, I felt gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Loved the way this dress made me feel. It was very classy!!
links_reviews_text: Dress was extremely comfortable. A little long for me but I am only 5'4" and didn't want to take the chance that the 8P would be too short. I would definitely rent this dress again!!

This was my first time renting and I'll definitely be doing it again. The dress for perfect and I ordered a back up size just in case. I'm borderline size 10/12 more on the 12 side and he 12 fit perfect. It was form fitting but not right. The length was great and the dress was so comfy to wear. Loved it

It was really form fitting and made my body look so good!! The only thing is it made me look so flat chested and the long wasn't that long on me. It fit really well though and I got so many compliments
#RonaldHouseRedShoeGala
Formal Anniversary Ball

links_reviews_title: Form fitting but also super comfortable. Perfect for formal affair!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! I found the fit to be true to size and it was super comfortable. I wore the 2P - I'm 5"2' and wore three inch heels and the length was perfect. Got lots of compliments all night - this one was tough to return!!!

Loved this dress! Compliments galore! Great silhouette to flatter shoulders and arms. Small train in the back. No stretch in the dress but forgiving fabric. Still ended up wearing Spanx to keep everything smooth. Sheer neck was my favorite part of the dress but it irritated my neck a bit towards the end of the night

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for an evening wedding. Beautiful and comfortable at the same time!!
links_reviews_text: The RTR stylist that I spoke to was very helpful over the phone to help me find the perfect dress! The length was perfect as well as the coverage at the top for a fuller bust. Loved the lace on top as well

links_reviews_title: The fabric is forgiving and flattering. It was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I checked out other sellers of this dress for comparison on the size chart, the dress does seem to run large. I normally wear a 4 but I wore this in a 2. I received many compliments on it. Great experience.

links_reviews_title: Dress dress for a formal event!
links_reviews_text: I was a little worried when my ideal size (OR) was no longer available, but the 2R I received as my backup size fit me well enough to wear (it was a little long for me, but I simply wore higher heels). The only downside to this dress and the reason for 4 stars is that the lace neckline rubbed my skin and left a dry, red patch on my collarbone. Otherwise, the dress was perfectly for a formal event and received many compliments
Looked great , got a ton of compliments ! Shows off your figure completely ! Loved it !

links_reviews_title: This dress is comfortable and beautiful. Runs very small.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 4 and ordered an 8 as back-up (6 wasnt available). DEFINITELY size up! I couldn't get my arms into the 4 and was so glad the back-up dress was 2 sizes larger. Strapless bra was a must with this dress, shoulders sit low.
It is snug so if you're a full size, go up one size. but it is stretchy and doesn't wrinkle and folds into a small bag.

I normally wear a size 2 in dresses and this definitely runs small. I saw a lot of people review this dress that way so I was glad I ordered a size 4 and a back up size 6 because I ended up wearing the 6! It was a beautiful dress! There were a couple of holes in the sleeves but it was lacy so it hid it well.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detailing makes this dress stand out
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding where the dress was cocktail attire and I fit in perfectly. Itâ€™s a beautiful dress with lace and gold thread interwoven. It does run small but the fabric is stretchy so it makes it makes it okay. Sleeves are tight which makes it hard to lift arms overhead fully but I got used to it. Got lots of compliments.
Felt very elegant and comfy while attending wedding.

Pros: I went with the smaller size which I believe to be my true size. It fell right to my knee and the sleeves didn't fall..as opposed to the larger size. The dress does have some give and is flattering. Cons: The boat neck can make you look a little wide up top though if you already have wide shoulders. I was going to wear a tennis bracelet but it kept getting caught in the dress so I took it off before I left. Too annoying for me. Got tons of compliments! Would recommend!

Consistent with other reviews, this dress runs small! I normally wear a 6 and am so glad I ordered up. The lace doesn't have a lot of give and really shows your shape, so if you have body or confidence issues, this probably isn't the dress for you. Overall the dress is really beautiful and I received so many compliments throughout the night. I would definitely rent again!
Very flattering for curves, formal yet fun. I got lots of compliments, and would definitely wear again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but not for me
links_reviews_text: The dress is a beautiful dark navy with gold thread throughout. I am so glad I read previous reviews and went up in a size. I'm usually between a 4&6, and the 6 was so tight. The 8 fit well but the neckline was stretched out (or maybe it was supposed to fit that way?) and was slightly saggy in the front and droopy in the back. The cut of the dress was flattering but overall I was unhappy with the dress and opted to not even wear it for my event. I felt like it was more matronly than I expected from the picture and previous renters.

I ordered two sizes because i read reviews that the arms were a bit snug and i have muscular arms. I fit the 10 but it felt better in the arms with the 12. I received so many compliments on the dress and i felt gorgeous! It hugs the body well and the cut is very nice.
I wore this to my company's annual party. Pros: dress fit well, comfortable, liked the extra sparkle from the gold thread Cons: had to wear a strapless bra

The fit was perfect! Arms a tad tight at first, but really wasn't noticeable after getting the dress on. The gold threading in the dress is so gorgeous, and the side gathering is a great detail. I received many compliments through the night.

This was my backup dress. I loved it. I did have to go a size bigger than I normally wear, because my arms aren't "skinny" and the lace sleeves wouldn't work on my normal size. This made the dress a little bigger in the chest and the fabric that wraps around the shoulders, but no one could really tell but me. I loved the gold details in the dress and the blue was perfect! The length was great! I'm not normally able to find knee length dresses to fit me because I'm a bit on the tall side, but this dress did the trick. The only complaint I have is that the fabric is starting to look rather worn. I assume just because of how many times it's been worn at this point, which is going to happen. I'm not sure how long they keep dresses in circulation before retiring them. Even with the dress showing some wear, I was still very happy with it.

I usually wear a 6 in RTR dresses (because I mostly get shift dresses) but I needed the 8 on this one for the sleeves, like many others have said. I didn't feel great in the dress when I first put it on but got so many compliments and felt great at the actual event!

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, nice basic party dress
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding. I danced & felt comfortable in it all night. I was at my heaviest weight though & a little self-conscious about my figure so I don't have any better pictures to share.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my 40th birthday party and it was amazing! I got so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: This dress felt like it was made for me- the fit was perfect! It was very fitting, but I was comfortable in it. I did go without a bra because of the shoulders and strapless bras never fit me right.

After reading other reviews, I was prepared to size up from my usual size 4 to a size 6, with a size 8 as a backup. Since both 4 and 6 were unavailable, I took a risk and ordered a size 8, and was glad I did. I think the 6 would have been fine, but the arms would have been snug, as other reviewers have mentioned. The 6 would have fit better in the bust and shoulder area, because when I lifted my arms, I could see a little bit of extra fabric, and the the neckline extended all the way to the edge of my shoulders. I liked this looser fit, but, it's worth noting that someone my size with a larger bust could fit in the size 8 even better. The right arm had a little hole in it, but I just turned it toward the inside and it really wasn't noticeable. I also noticed a snag on the back, but with the dark fabric, again, it really wasn't noticeable when pressed down onto the dress. I appreciated the camouflaging effect of the side-ruching fabric and the way the gold thread dressed it up, making it perfect for an evening event. Overall, I was happy with the size I chose, loved this classically elegant dress and had a positive first-experience with renttherunway.com.

I got so many compliments all night! It was very comfortable, I danced for hours, it is a nice soft material. The neck area is large and came off my shoulder quite a bit, I suggest using fashion tape. I tried safety pins but was worried it would ruin the nice lace. Other then that, loved it !
The dress was gorgeous but definitely runs small. I was grateful for the backup size. There is gold threading that runs through the dress so plan on gold jewelry!

I love this dress but it does run small. I normally wear a 6 but luckily got the back up size of 8. It was still tight. It was a gorgeous dress I would have ordered another size up for backup though since it is stretchy it would have been more comfortable. It was a very pretty dress though!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that is made for curves!
