links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous. The color is so sophisticated (navy with gold fabric running through in a very tasteful way) and perfect for a wedding. The fabric around the body is stretchy, the fabric around the arms is less forgiving but still has some slack to it. I could have worn a 10 if I wanted it to be more close to the body to really hug my curves but this ended up being perfect and comfortable. The zipper is on the side and is hidden, so be careful when pulling down and up as the fabric tends to get a bit stuck. I am 5'5" and the dress went down to my knees exactly. The rouching on the waist gives more of the illusion of curves. The boat neckline is a little annoying for those with larger breasts (I am a 38DD). I do not wear strapless bra so I opted for my regular strapped bra and used tiny pins to keep the strap to the dress near the edges of my shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Wore to hubby's company awards dinner!
links_reviews_text: I tried this on for the hubby after I got it, and got the "sexy momma" compliment so I was sold. It honesty wasn't my first choice, but I'm glad I wore it b/c I got lots of compliments. It was fitted, but comfy. I liked how it was a little gathered across the tummy and how it fit across the shoulders. I wore this with gold strappy shoes and navy nail polish on my finger nails (nude polish on my toes)!

links_reviews_title: Fit great! Wore to college graduation. So many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I thought from the lace it my itch but it was perfect

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress & Perfect for a Cocktail Party
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. The fabric feels very luxurious. It is navy with gold accents that make the dress really stand out. The dress runs small - so thankful I ordered the backup. It drapes very nicely on the body, but recommend spanx for anyone who would feel self-conscious. The dress hit about my knee as it did in the picture of the model. I would recommend ordering one size larger than you normally wear for a better fit. You can't go wrong with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Worn to school fundraiser/auction and was a big hit. Perfect for colder weather event!
links_reviews_text: This was actually a back up dress as the alternative size for the dress I wanted was not available - great customer service experience - and I was so glad to get this dress as I wound up wearing it instead of my original choice. Fit was good - could have gone up a size and I think would still have been good. Awesome first time rental experience.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an evening wedding for an older woman
links_reviews_text: Nice material with gold threads throughout the dark navy fabric. The wide neckline may require a strapless bra. The close fitting dress is stretchy but I had to size up to a 6 from my usual size 4. Wearing Spanx was helpful. The length and 3/4 sleeves are nice for an older woman.
Fit well, very comfortable. Felt glamorous, received several compliments. I

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, very comfortable and flattering!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a winter wedding. The material is stretchy and was easy to move around in.

links_reviews_title: This was my back up dress and I did not wear it to the actual wedding but I LOVED it!
links_reviews_text: The fit was pretty true to size for me. Very comfortable and flattering. It was a difficult choice between the 2 dresses I rented. The navy is a beautiful shade with gold through the lace. I had gold shoes to go with it.

While the color, shimmer, and flattering shape make it stand out, I would not recommend it for ladies who are a bit bigger in the arms, it is not flattering that way. The attached is the best picture of my arms, I would not share the other ones because they are unflattering. I ordered this dress with a 2-day notice so I had to pick from what was available, otherwise I would not have gone for laced sleeves (but they look wonderful on ladies with skinny arms). Also I forgot that this dress would require a special bra because of the open shoulders and had to just push the straps of a regular bra off my shoulders, which might be noticeable in this picture. This dress requires appropriate undergarments to cover imperfections because it is rather thin. Overall, if baring your shoulders is not a problem and you are not concerned about the size of your arms, it is a nice dress.

This dress was absolutely perfect!! So comfortable, the fit was great and I loved the color! I wore this dress to an October wedding and received so many compliments! The gold detail was beautiful yet subtle. You could wear this dress all night at a wedding and dance comfortably. Arms are a bit snug in the beginning but they stretched out as the night went on. I wish I could own this dress!
This dress was a last minute replacement for a dress that didn't fit properly. It was very comfortable and fit true to size. The arms weren't too tight like they often are in other dresses.

The dress hugged my curves without being racy. I felt sexy and elegant the whole night and got lots of compliments on it! I ordered an 8 and a 10, but went with the 10 because my arms are a bit muscular and didn't want the sleeves to be too tight. I was really comfortable in it and didn't have any of that tugging and readjusting nonsense I worry about with other dresses. A perfect 10.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Received many compliments! Would rent this dress again!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and comfortable!

I got this dress when my original dress wasn't available. I was worried that it would be too hot with the sleeves, but it was actually very comfortable. I wore the size 12 and with the dark color, it was very forgiving of my 2-month post-baby body. The gold accent looked great and I wore gold accessories to match. I received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Was comfortable the whole night, really liked this dress.
links_reviews_text: Arms fit fairly tight, but otherwise was very flattering.
Cons - I wasn't totally expecting the asymmetrical bunching of the fabric to one side, but it wasn't a bad touch! I really liked the fabric on the sleeves and received many complements.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on this dress!! It's beautiful and a bit sparkly.
links_reviews_text: The dress itself was stretchy and comfortable from the lining, but the sleeves were a TAD tight -- if I had bigger arms it would have been very uncomfortable. I also couldn't get a backup size, so order early. The lace is a *little* itchy but not so much that I couldn't wear it for one night. Definitely recommended though!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, great fit, great color!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black tie optional dinner and it ended up being perfectly appropriate. The dress fit great, the arms were a little tight but over time I did notice that the sleeves started to stretch out which was ok, just not something I expected. I had a great time and received lots of compliments! I would definitely rent this one again!

I loved this dress. Color was vibrant and beautiful. It was so comfortable ( no spanxs necessary) and it had pockets! I am short and have a short torso so it was a little tricky to balance that look. My solution was to pair it with a form fitting leather jacket that hid how short the torso was on me. Would rent again!

I'm in between size 14 & 16 and although the 14 fit it was a little snug around the waist for me. I ended up wearing the 16 even though there was a little bit of gaping around the arms but it was not a problem since I wore a black bandeau underneath. I receive so many compliments on this dress! The fabric was stunning and the color was vibrant! It even had pockets!! Would definitely rent again!
Was a little big wish i sizes down but it was very comfortable and flattering and great quality

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear it but I'm going to rent it again
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress but found it too causal for the wedding I was attending. It fit perfectly and has pockets! I'm going to find an excuse to wear it somewhere else now.
Great fit with extra room up top for larger busted women. Would absolutely love to have this one!!

I wore this to a fundraising event at work - and paired it with a collar-less blazer. It was perfect! The color of the skirt is wonderful - and it has pockets! It was a little tight through the ribs/waist, but not crazy small. I would definitely rent this one again! (Forgot to take a picture until we were leaving/in the parking garage... Oops!)

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but fit a little odd on top.
links_reviews_text: This was a really cute dress. It ultimately was returned unworn as it was a runner up for a wedding. The top fit me a little funny. It felt like it should have been tighter in the bust, which is an issue I do not usually have. It was a stretchy material but maybe a little stretched out? The fabric and skirt part were beautiful. I think the dress would look best on someone with a more athletic upper body as I kind of felt like it accentuated my arms - not in a good way. I could have totally worn it with a sweater and corrected all of these issues!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous blue silk, should've ordered smaller!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between a 12 and 14 and this was WAY too big on me! You can see the poofiness of the skirt in the photo on the L, which I think was a little beyond what the style was intended to be. The top was a beautifully textured, thick stretchy fabric that was quite loose even for a 36G (wearing a black bra was necessary since the sides showed). Fortunately, people seemed to think it was a skirt paired with a loose, blousy top so it worked out perfectly. Would rent again in a smaller size!
Fit perfect! Just a little long for my liking but still beautiful

I thought this dress was really cute, but it ran very large in the top half. There was some extra material and gaping in the bust, so I had to wear a cardigan to cover until the strange fit. I'm a really busty girl and usually have the opposite problem, so I'm not sure how this works for most. It's a great color though cute cut otherwise!

Wore to a St. Patrick's Day wedding in Boston, hence the boots. I'm in the process of losing some weight so I wasn't sure how the sizing would work out for my first RTR experience. The 16 was just on the edge of being too tight because the waist line (where the black top meets the start of the skirt) has no stretch, despite the rest of the top being very stretchy (and slightly loose around the bust area) and comfortable. I ended up wearing shapewear underneath, but I think that was just because I'm somewhat between sizes right now. I really love the color of the skirt and besides the tightness in the waist it was very comfortable and easy to dance in. The pockets were awesome, I didn't have to bring a clutch or anything! I also rented the necklace seen in the pictures and the ensemble was a hit! I got lots of compliments and had a great night. Hoping I can rent this again in a smaller size down the line! (Note: The blazer is mine, not RTR's)
I loved everything about this dress. Super cute and comfy. Fit like a glove. Pockets!! Got loads of compliments.

I am so happy I wore this dress to a family wedding! It was so comfortable, very flattering, and had the wonderful bonus of pockets! As some others have said, the top was slightly baggy, but everything else was true to size. I threw a black sweater on for the church service, and I felt pretty and appropriately dressed for the whole evening. I would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Gotta love a dress with pockets
links_reviews_text: Loved it! Perfect length but snug at the waist. Full skirt with pockets is a huge plus. Got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Such a great dress! Super comfortable and it even has pockets! Got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: The top is a little baggy/boxy but otherwise the fit was great. It has the snaps to hold your bra in place so I was able to wear a regular black bra underneath. The skirt is super cute and no Spanx needed!! Great for a night of dancing.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color of the skirt!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and flattering, pockets were a huge plus! Wore with nude heels for a late summer wedding, lots of compliments on the colors in the skirt & the cut of the dress.

I choose this dress at first because the first two I wanted were out of stock for the weekend. I ended up loving the dress. The top bust area was a bit big and now wish I had gone down a size instead of up for the backup option, but overall it was a great dress for the occasion. I felt wonderful wearing it which was a big deal for myself.

Fit amazing and very comfortable. Top was a think material but stretchy. Skirt kept its shape the whole night and allowed for an extra cupcake without feeling uncomfortable. Overall, extremely happy with my pick. Husband loved it too!

links_reviews_title: This is a great dress for dancing. Loose enough to not constrict any movement.
links_reviews_text: The zipper goes down past the waist quiet a bit so I could have gone down a size and have it still zip up over my hips. The bodice was a bit loose but still looked and felt great. I would recommend getting a back up size one size smaller.

I loved the blues and greens in this dress's skirt, bold and beautiful. However, the dress fit was weird on me. As other reviewers have noted, the top can be large on small chested women (I am a 34 B cup). I'm usually a size 4-6, and knowing that the top ran big, I sized down to the 4. However, the 4 just fit because where the waist comes in (before puffing out to the full skirt) has absolutely no stretch. This also makes it difficult to zip up if you are a single lady living alone like me. And even though I sized down, the upper part was still too big around the arms and had extra fabric length wise as well. The skirt is exceptionally full, so I have included a second pic with a side view to show that. I am 3 months post abdominal surgery, so this was actually something I wanted in a dress, but I could see it being a surprise to see people just how full the skirt is. All-in-all I liked the dress, but it isn't one that I loved or even one that I am sure I'd rent again. It can be worn with a normal bra, and even has bra snaps to hold your straps in place, which was nice.

The fit in the dress was extremely comfortable. I am on a weight loss journey and feel like I could have likely tried the size 8. The pockets are amazing! The length is great for someone who is about 5'11" and I received many compliments on the dress. Highly recommend!!
Comfortable and fun to wear!

I loved the vibrant color of the skirt portion although it was a little too poofy for my taste. People could spot me from way up in the stands and texted me compliments about the skirt (they thought the dress was 2 separate pieces) & how they loved that it had pockets, something I appreciated as well! Pockets were extremely helpful since I couldn't have my purse on me for this event. You can't really tell from the picture, but the 4 was big on me; I wish I had gone down a size instead of up & gotten a 2 for a tighter top. The hole for the arm part had a gap, so I was re-adjusting to make sure my bra wasn't showing, but the material of the top part was thick and comfortable. Overall, many compliments & very professional for a work event!
As an apple/inverted triangle I sometimes have trouble fitting in the top of a dress. The top was stretchy and very comfortable. Would rent again!
Comfortable dress. Length hit me at about my knees. Nice pockets. Would wear again.

links_reviews_title: Fun to have a special Easter dress for church. Comfortable, appropriate pretty and pockets!
links_reviews_text: Great length. Just a bit of stretch on top. True to size. Wore normal bra. Hated to send it back. Rent this one

links_reviews_title: Great fun dress for Golf Course outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: True to size for me, except very fitted at waist with no give. Would not have been able to go up a size bc top is very stretchy. I'm 5'8 and wished it would have been a bit shorter but still received a ton of compliments! Loved the pockets

Loved the dress! I was planning to wear it with black heels, but the weather took a very cold turn. I dressed it up with black tights and booties. The fit was good except it felt a little big around the underarms. Overall, I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Just a super fun dress to wear
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Loved the pockets! Only complaint was that the zipper was very difficult.
A little loose in the upper part, but super comfy. Pockets were a huge plus!

I got so many compliments and felt great in this dress! The top is nice and stretchy, so it fit my larger bust very comfortably. The skirt is beautiful and attention grabbing, so this dress was perfect for my body 2+ months after baby. I have a short waist, so some of the fabric bunched a little, but it was hard to see and I don't think anyone noticed. Also, gotta love a dress with pockets!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, comfortable fit, effortless class.
links_reviews_text: This dress style is not what I typically go for, but was a huge hit! The top half is stretchy and very comfortable, the bottom half is very forgiving and hides what you may not want shown. Now, although the top and bottom are flexible, the middle area is true to size. The pockets are great for holding you phone and lipstick when you need to get on the dance floor. I'm 5'3 so the hem fell below my knees, but was perfect for the very conservative family members that were in attendance.

links_reviews_title: This dress is both elegant and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I love the pockets in this dress. The top is a stretchy, fitted material -- but nice and thick with a ribbed texture, so doesn't look like spandex. It's flattering to have a fitted, black top with a more generous skirt that his nice wide pleats that lay flat. (I've seen skirts that are gathered and end up "adding" hips or a belly that aren't there). The skirt fabric was also a nice, heavy glossy fabric like satin. The colors were perfect for an evening wedding.

links_reviews_title: Fun, full skirt with vibrant colors and a sleek top. Plus, POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: This dress is super comfy -- stretchy fabric on top and a full skirt. The skirt material feels like that fancy, raw silk. The colors of the skirt were bright and beautiful. The 14 fit great -- the 16 was definitely too big, especially in the arm holes. The skirt was a bit longer than I'd imagined (more like tea length) but it's still really beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful and there was no guilt about buying a dress I wouldn't wear again
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 6 and an 8 the 6 fit perfectly. It was comfortable and very flattering on my "pear" shaped figure. You definitely need a racer back bra so your straps don't show. Loved this dress and will miss it! Lol

links_reviews_title: So great, I wore it twice!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to attend 2 different formal events - a work-related event and an awards dinner. I wore a shawl-type sweater on top because of the cool weather. Loved the fit of this dress and how comfortable it was. Received many compliments!

This wasn't my first choice, but it was definitely top 5. I ordered a 0 even though I normally wear a 2, and it fit perfectly. The top is made of rayon and nylon so it's very stretchy. I felt like I could have filled it out a bit more. The skirt is made of polyester/cotton and felt way poofier than it looks like in pictures. It has pockets, which is a plus! It's a very nice dress, though I may rent it again for a fancier occasion than a friend's wedding.

One word, pockets!!! Running large, we recommend going one size down for back up. I easily could've worn a 4 in this style. This dress is great for any cup size, especially larger busts. There is comfortable room and the fabric at the bust is stretchy. Standard bra can be worn with this dress. The style is fitted at the natural waist. The fuller skirt allows for comfortable room for full hips. At 5'8", the dress hit at my knees. This style is great to wear to a holiday party! Pair with either black or blue heels. Accessorize with gold jewelry.

I rented a size 12 and 14. Both sizes fit but the size 12 was a little tight in the waist. The size 14 seemed to be a little bigger in the chest and not as fitted as the size 12. The major focal point of this dress is the skirt. It is absolutely stunning!! Overall, I adored this dress!! I paired this with a gray Kate Spade necklace and a Helmut blazer (both were RTR rentals)!!
I was 13 weeks pregnant and this dress flattered by little itty bitty bump that is starting to form! Got so many compliments on the dress. Plus I loved the pockets!!

links_reviews_title: Pretty, structured dress. Lovely color and fit.
links_reviews_text: I felt put together and comfortable in this dress. I prefer solids with details (vs. prints) and this dress is perfect. The top detail is very cool, and helps to add to my small bust. Love the pockets! The top is a bit tight, but worked for me. I wore the 4, but could have worn the 6 for a slightly looser fit.

links_reviews_title: The dress was a perfect fit. The color and style were true to how it was advertised.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. The length is a little unusual but it was a very classy dress. Perfect for me as the matron of honor in a December weddig. Everyons loved my dress!

Beautiful dress! Received so many compliments!!! I have a busty DD top but still wore a 0 and kept the girls in place with enough room. Great form and sturcture to the dress. The midi length hits just right and pairs great with a nude or light pink heel. (What i wore) Perfect for a Holiday gala - you'll turn heads wherever you where this dress.
Its underrated and comfortable and a really great way to say I have my crap together at a work gala. Boyfriend loved it too :) Only wish 4 was available because a touch too big.

Beautiful dress. Lovely color. Reddish pink. If you want the perfect nail color, go with Essie Plumberry. It's an exact match. Received many complements regarding dress. Classy. I really like the length. Top is a bit big but worked out fine. The dress has the nonsticky rubber strip around the top inside to hold it in place. Comfy and kept everything in place. Fits loosely through hips so comfy. Would rent again.
I love the color and fun bow detail on this dress. The length keeps it ladylike and classic. A strapless bra would be best with this style. It was overall a great fit!

Love the bright color in a classic shape. The detail at the bust really makes this style and is a great option for a small bust. It was a bit longer than knee length as I am only 5'2" but it was still flattering.

This dress was beautiful and got so many compliments... My only complaint is the boning on the inside was sticking out when I got it and stabbed me all night. Otherwise gorgeous and I would have considered buying.

I typically like to wear dresses that show my figure but with an early preggo belly, I was able to successfully hide my belly while still showing off other curves. It was classic and very Audrey-Hepburn-esque.

links_reviews_title: I felt like the belle of the ball in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The bodice was a bit tight and the bust a bit loose, but there were no â€œwardrobe malfunctionsâ€. Fun dress to wear.
It runs very small, in my experience, and it was a little too long for my liking. It hits around mid-calf but the shape of the skirt makes it an awkward length.
Loved the color, fit, and material. Fit true to size and didn't fall down. Very satisfied.
I ordered this for my rehearsal dinner. I normally wear a 4 or 6. Even the 8 made it hard to breathe (and I'm small chested). Sadly, this is being sent back without wearing it.
The cut was not flattering on my frame.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear because it did not fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous but the 12 did not fit. It was really small. I loved the color and the fabric but couldn't get it on.

This was a backup style sent to me since one of my sizes wasn't available. To play it safe Iï¸ ordered the 10 (I'm usually an 8/10). Iï¸ couldn't even zip this up it was so tiny. The dress itself is beautiful - really nice structured fabric, the color is gorgeous, and the quality is top notch. Just a word to the wise to go up at least one size!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and beautiful fabric. I just thought it was too long on me. I'm 5'2".
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing this one because I didn't love the length. I'm 5'2'' and it was just too long.
I received lots of compliments and loved this dress :)

Gorgeous color, but ultimately not a very comfortable or flattering fit. The arms were very restrictive, which I didn't think would be a problem since I wasn't dancing, but it did make putting my shoes on and getting ready very difficult. The dress was also quite short and rode up throughout the night. I felt like I was constantly trying to shimmy it down but it continually creeped up, particularly when I was seated at dinner. If you wear any type of shapewear, it might show while seated. I did use the larger, back-up size which was more comfortable in the arms and hips, but I would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a work Holiday party.
links_reviews_text: I thought the fit was true to size, and the dress was comfortable to wear. I received a lot of compliments and many people were wondering where I bought my dress!

I am 5'2, 155 lbs. I have a pear shape. The 12 fit nicely on the bottom but was a bit lose in the bust and oddly tight in the shoulder area. I love the look of the dress and it photographed well, but I was glad I chose to rent this item for a dinner and not a wedding. The material had ZERO stretch so dancing would have been tricky.

I loved this dress but went with my back up dress for a couple reasons. I normally wear a 4, while it was wearable, it was pretty tight. The sleeves are small but okay for me, just wasnt able to lift my arms up past my shoulders. Overall I liked this dress a lot and may rent again (in a 6) for a wedding type function. My backup dress was more party style. LOVED the deep purple color!

links_reviews_title: I couldn't actually wear the dress out. It looked great, but I couldn't move my arms in it.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so stiff, that I couldn't lift my arms straight out. The fit around the body was perfect, so anything larger and it would have been too large. It was also very difficult to sit in. I'd recommend skipping on this dress, unless you're just looking for something that you'll only be standing in.

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing a dress that no one else had, and it matched the wedding colors perfectly!
links_reviews_text: The color and style of this dress were classic and perfect for a fall wedding. My only complaint is that because it ran a little small the arms were SO TIGHT. There was no give in that lace. The sleeves themselves were tight to the point that I had trouble lifting my arms. Overall though I give this dress 2 thumbs up!

Really liked the dress, the color and the lace were so nice and I got lots of compliments. I was nervous about reading the arms were tight but they were only tight if I raised my arms above my head (not very frequent). I'm 5'8'' and the length was perfect with or without heels. Recommend! : )

I rented this dress for a Marine Ball. My significant other's grandfather is a veteran and invites us every year. It was actually a last minute change due to the temperature dropping so suddenly, but I LOVED the dress and am so happy I rented it. It is a deep purple color, that looked great with the fall colors- I wore black shoes with it. I am typically a size 2, and ordered the 4 for a back up size. I went with the 4. I could have gone with the 2, but the 4 was more comfortable and I could move around more. I also liked that I could wear a standard bra with it. I would highly recommend this dress, just order up!

This dress is just as beautiful in person. I agree with what the others have said about the arms, they are tight, like I needed my boyfriend's help zipping me up, and forget about trying to fix your makeup or hair after its on tight. Other than the tight arms, I had no problems with the dress. It doesn't stretch so choose your actual size, don't try to go down a size. And unless you are 6' tall don't expect it to be as short as the model wearing it in the photo. I am 5'7 and the dress was about 2" above my knee. I wouldn't have wanted it any shorter though, as sitting down it tends to ride up quite a bit. Overall I loved the dress and the arms certainly stretched out during the evening, but don't expect to be able to fully execute the YMCA in this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color! Perfect for a fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: I loved the way this fit! Although as stated by others it was a bit snug in the armpit area, it wasn't by any means an issue. I just couldn't go crazy waving my arms around in the air-- but I don't think at any point in the night I ever really needed to do that, haha. It's a very flattering, pretty little dress. I ordered the 6 as a backup since I was worried about the snugness in the arms, but I never even tried it on because the 4 fit so great. I definitely recommend this one, she's a cutie.

links_reviews_title: Perfect comfortable dress for a daytime fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, the color is very rich and pretty. The lace gives it a more dressed up feel. I wore it to an outdoor fall wedding, it was cool at night so for the reception I paired the dress with a fitted denim jacket & it looked awesome. The dress does run small & has no give what so ever, but it was still very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for the occasion!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfect! Beautiful!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a "cocktail casual" fundraiser
links_reviews_text: I was surprised how vibrant the color is on the dress when you see it in person. It's really stunning. The fit was great. I rented a 2 and 4, and ended up wearing the 4 because it gave me a little more breathing room than the 2. One of the things that was a bummer was the inability to lift my arms high - as many of the other reviews mentioned. Luckily, this was not the event where I was dancing and moving a lot so it worked out, but if you choose to rent this for a wedding, it may prohibit getting too rowdy! Besides that, I really enjoyed this dress a lot and felt amazing in it!

links_reviews_title: It was my parents Wedding and my sister and I as the bridesmaid loved our matching dresses.
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed this dress for the most part. The color was a beautiful dark purple. The dress was mostly true to fit, however it DOES NOT stretch which is the only reason I couldn't give it a 5-star rating. It may be a personal preference but I like for my dresses to have a little give to them for dancing and moving, whereas this dress made that a bit difficult. In the picture I am the one on the right in the size 10 and my sister is on the left in the same dress in a size 6 if I remember correctly, just for comparative purposes.

Color was even better in person than in the picture. I opted for the 0 and the fit was perfect, very flattering. Other reviews mentioned that the sleeves were tight and I wondered if I would encounter the same. I do not usually have issues with sleeves/shoulders - my arms and shoulders are narrow, so if anything sleeves will run large. However, the sleeves were tight when I first put the dress on. After about an hour of wear, they gave a little and were less restrictive. Ultimately, they were definitely on the small side. Length was perfect, hitting me just above the knees.
Fit was true to size - very well made gorgeous classy dress

links_reviews_title: Grogeous color! Easy shipping and return
links_reviews_text: Based off the previous reviews I rented a size up and that was the one I went with. The sleeves were tight and a bit constricting, but the overall the dress was perfect. The color is gorgeous and I recieved a ton of compliments on it.

As other comments have mentioned, the arms were almost too snug--but they worked. Otherwise the dress fit true to size. It was flattering and very comfortable and easy to dance in. I highly recommend it and would rent again!

Worr this dress to an outdoor wedding in Feb. It was unseasonably warm but this was perfect. The sleeves kept me civered enough so when the sun went down i was warm but never got hot. The sleeves are on the small side so it was difficult to lift my srms above my head for dancing but other than that i really liked he dress. I would size up. Inam typically a 4/6 girl and probably could have wore an 8.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for UCA nationals FINALS!
links_reviews_text: Love the purple color. Fits true to size. So many compliments from my athletes, co-coaches and peers!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, but coudln't move my arms
links_reviews_text: The dress fit as expected, and I'd read the reviews about the sleeves being tight. That said, I couldn't raise my arms above shoulder height. That was not the kind of tightness I was expecting. I received numerous compliments, but could not wait to get this dress off by the end of the night.

links_reviews_title: Fit great, felt wonderful on, covered up areas I wanted hidden ;)
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable to wear & felt great on. I wore it for a friend's rehearsal dinner a few years ago, with plain nude pumps & gold jewelry. The sleeves are pretty but cover parts of my arm I am uncomfortable about. The waist hit at the perfect place for me, to cover part of my stomach but accentuate the waist. Big fan of this dress! I keep looking back at RTR every few months to be able to purchase it! I'm 5'9", 32D, body type average/hourglass, wt 135-140lbs. I wore a 4 and had a 6 as a backup. Fit true to size.

Just like others have said, this dress has NO give and is very restrictive. I could not life my arms or reach or anything. I wore this to a NYE dinner, so it worked for my needs but if I had been looking to dance or do more than sit and eat, this dress would have been a problem. That being said, it is a really beautiful dress, does great things for a good figure, and I got a lot of compliments on my looks!

I wore this dress to a church Christmas event, so I had to be relatively modest, but I wanted something unique. This dress fit the bill perfectly. The lace was beautiful and the color was great! It was a great deep purple. I was concerned about the sleeves, as other reviewers said they were tight. The sleeves were fine for me, but the shoulders is where I struggled a bit. That's the only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5. I couldn't lift my arms very high - where even driving to the event was a little tricky! It didn't bother me all night though (as arms up isn't a super common thing for me to do, lol). If you need good upper body range of motion, maybe pick something else. But overall, this dress was a wonderful choice!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, flattering fit, received several compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a formal company holiday party. Initially I wasn't crazy about the color (stronger purple tone than the photo shows, and I usually don't wear purple) but it looked better on. It was very comfortable (no issues wearing it all night) and flattering. The lace gives it an extra touch of looking fancy without being over the top. I received several compliments!
A little tight in the sleeves, but overall great fit. Pretty color!
This dress was perfect for a fall wedding. Color was beautiful and Iï¸ was comfortable in it all night!

I got lots of compliments on this dress, perfect amount of skin covered for a full Catholic wedding without feeling too boring. The arms were definitely a little tight, I ordered a 2 and a 4 and ended up going with the 4 simply because I couldn't get the sleeves all the way pulled up on the 2. The rest of the dress fit well but like many of the other reviews say, it runs a bit snug. The color was a very "true purple" and worked well for fall. All things considered it was a beautiful, timeless dress!

Love the deep purple color of this dress and the romantic lace. I wanted a dress that would work with cowboy boots since the wedding reception was in a barn -- this dress definitely did the trick! The 4 fit my 28" waist, 42"(ish) hips. Arms were snug, but not uncomfortable. Only thing to look out for is how the skirt rides up while sitting down.
The only issue I had was the sleeves were pretty tight. Other than that, I loved it!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a fall wedding. The double layers kept me warm even while it thunder-stormed!
links_reviews_text: This only comes in size 0 and 2 and the 0 was slightly large on me, as I normally wear a 00 or petite. The sleeves were not tight on me at all like many others said, but the hem did lift up pretty high when raising my arms. With my height, I had no qualms dancing through the night.

I loved the dress!! I was a bit afraid it would be short since I was attending a Christian Wedding, but it was the perfect length, just slightly above my knees. The lace is thick very high quality. Perfect lovely plum color ideal for fall. Loved it, I would highly recommend it.

I ordered the size I typically wear and a size up due to other reviews saying it ran small. I still ended up wearing the size 8 (typically I run between 6-8, but have a large chest). 8 was tight in the chest but still looked great!!

I wish this dress had fit better, because it's beautiful in person. I rented the 0, and it fit more like a 4. I'm a D in the chest, and the fit in both chest and waist was more like a sheath, which was disappointing because I felt shapeless. Also, when you sit, the dress runs up and exposes about 2" of the liner every time. Otherwise, the color and detail of the dress are very pretty, and the dress is high quality.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a wedding in mid September.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! The lace was beautiful and I loved the half sleeves. The photo was taken at sunset, so the purple colors look darker than it actually is. The coloring is definitely more similar to the color in the dress image icon. Maybe even a bit brighter. This was a perfect dress for an outdoor wedding. I got a little overheated during the day when the sun was hot, but it was perfect during the night. I usually wear a 2, but went with a 4 on this one based on other's advice. I can totally see how the sleeves could be restraining. The chest was a bit too big on me, but wasn't super noticeable. I would definitely wear this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, great color for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Overall great color and fit for a fall wedding. Like other reviews, it is a little tight in the arms but besides not being able to lift my arms all the way up it didn't have any impact. The lace has a slight amount of wear but was not visible to others. It ran very true to size, was slightly shorter than I anticipated ending at mid thigh but overall a great choice.
Loved this dress. Super comfortable. I was worried about the sleeves being too tight but they were fine.
Want to buy this dress! Love it so much. Perfect cut, perfect color and gorgeous detail.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color - great for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, a little tight in the sleeves. Ran pretty small - I would make sure to get one size up!
I received so many compliments throughout the night and felt beautiful while wearing it. I would definitely rent this again.

This was not my first choice for this wedding, but when my original dress wasn't available I was able to try on my back up (this one!) at the RTR store in Chicago and it for like a glove. I absolutely loved it and received so many compliments. Wore to a February wedding in Chicago.

This dress was perfect for my brother's wedding. Loved the lace and cold shoulder look. I ordered a M for my backup size, because I was worried the black lace panel would be too tight, but the small fit well & was flattering to my shape. The Medium was far too baggy to maintain the silhouette. I almost didn't have enough chest room, so women with larger breasts, be leery. Received compliments all night on this dress, definitely recommend!
Beautiful wine colored dress. Nice fit but will be long on petite frame. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So cute; had to write TWO reviews!!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color!! Photographs really well. Flattering! Still getting compliments :)

The color of this dress really is pretty and the lace details are feminine. I love this designer however my body fits between a small and medium so the fit is not the best for me. I only got one size because of my subscription so I kind of wish I would have squeezed into a small given that my shape falls flat when it doesn't hug my body, which this size medium did not. It still looks nice and the cold shoulder gives an extra bit of flare but those are just flaps that hang over your shoulder you don't actually put your arm through them at least I didn't cause I couldn't figure it out haha. The fit is my minus a star so that is all relative to your body shape. People that said size up it has no give --- I mean I sized up and I have too much give you know what I mean? Difficult being in between sizes so I suppose going with the bigger size and not having it as flattering is better than being uncomfortable? I don't know it depends as again this dress still looks good. Husband loved it.
The dress fit perfect, well made. The fabric and color was gorgeous. Received many compliments on the dress overall.

Wore this to a January wedding and it was perfect. I wore the Medium because the Large was unavailable and it justtt fit. The "sleeves" made me feel like I had some coverage but I didn't get too hot dancing. Like other people mentioned it doesn't have any stretch, and when I sat down the black line of lace on the bottom seemed a little high/tight, but wasn't a big deal. Would recommend sizing up if you have a larger chest and want to wear a bra. It felt supportive enough without one since the fabric is thick but at times I definitely felt the Large would have fit my upper body better.
This dress fit perfectly. I wore it to a party and received a million compliments. I didn't take enough pics that night. Guess I'll just have to rent it again!!

Ever want to wear a midi but find it goes to your ankles? Not with this one! I actually think it would've felt too short were I much taller. Great fit. Was able to wear a normal nude bra and underwear. An amazing rental!!!
Comfortable dress! Uniques details, including the sleeves! I did size up because the velvet in the skirt was a little constructing! Overall, I loved the dress! Perfect color for a winter wedding!
Fit as expected

Loved this rental. The length balanced out the sheer stripes on the skirt. I felt really glam and put together. The detailing of the sheer seams give it a little something extra. Slim fit for sure, but true to size. Heels are a must for short gals.
Looked great, I have broader shoulders done back so the area under the arms was a little tight. The dress has stretch and is very comfortable and extremely flattering.
Fit like a glove. V flattering. Pics don't do the color justice!

links_reviews_title: Elegant yet sexy- perfect for wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit as expected, beautiful color and just a little sexy yet still very appropriate for a wedding. Just not super crazy about the sleeves. Didn't think they were all that flattering.
Flattering and fitting loose around the bottom of the dress allowing for easy walking and dancing.
Wore for fall wedding. Loved the fit and detail.
True to size
I will rent this again and again and again. LOVE this and got so many compliments. The wedding photographer couldn't stop taking pictures of me and my date either.

links_reviews_title: a stunning dress with lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: this dress fit like a glove and was the perfect colour for a fall wedding. it was just sexy enough while still very classy. Everyone told me that I should go out and buy it right away! Should be a good fit for most body types
This dress is classy, girly and stylish
Amazing! So comfortable to wear and I received a ton of compliments. Would definitely rent again.
Loved this dress! Very comfortable! Got so many compliments on its beautiful unique lace and details! Would definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Fall Wedding on a Cloudy Day
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for a late fall wedding. Iâ€™m short with a large chest so between the medium and large I wore the large because the top of the dress was very tight for me. But overall a fabulous dress, I would definitely ware it again!!
Fit perfectly and ttys! Definitely recommend

I loved this dress. Perfect for a fall wedding. I reviewed so many complements. It's also really subtle sexy with the lace at the bottom. Here are my measurements: Chest - 32 Waist - 24 Overarm - 38 Hipes - 32 Height 5â€™4 (64 inches) Weight 107

links_reviews_title: Great for a wedding at a vineyard!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Something different and unique for a wedding at a vineyard. I am 5'4" and was worried about the length but wore high wedges which was key. I am ~132 lbs, and was almost 12 weeks pregnant in this photo. The dark color and lace helped hide the little bump as I wasn't ready to tell people yet (hence wine glass prop in this photo!). I rented a Small and Medium and wore the small.
Fit really well. Material was thick. Very flattering.
Great dress for a fall wedding. I received so many compliments. Very form fitting. I normally wear a size 12.

This was such a beautiful, form fitting, and tummy sucking dress! Definitely made for someone with hips/curves. I got 20 compliments at least. The large was snug but it held everything in really great! I'm usually a size 10.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress wish i owned it!
links_reviews_text: This dress has beautiful details. Loved the lace and the color. Felt really comfortable. Fits snug to the body and runs a bit long on my 5.3" frame . I'd rent this again !
This dress was the perfect fit! I wore it a fundraising gala and received so many compliments. The detail of the dress is the best part. Definitely would recommend getting this dress - I loved it!!!
This dress is super flattering. It's fitted but not skin tight. It was comfortable and although it fit more like a long dress on me, it was still a great length! I want to buy it!

I actually wore this for a holiday party in December 2017 and was the star. The details are what made me reserve this dress. Between the color, lace, cold shoulder and overall style, it is gorgeous! It was a perfect fit and a definite showstopper! I love the variety of dress options through RTR. Can't wait to reserve another dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a wedding and loved it. It was unique, stunning, and figure-flattering.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size. I loved the length, but it might appear long if you are on the shorter side.

Loved this dress! It was absolutely beautiful and i received so many compliments! It did ride up whenever you sat down, but it wasnt really a big deal. Overall, an amazing dress! I would highly recommend renting it!!
I wore this to a 20's theme party. The cold shoulder look showed just enough skin without going overboard. Not a lot of stretch in the material but it fit like a glove.
The dress is very pretty and flattering. The small was fitted the medium was loose, i opted to be comfortable and go with the medium. Really enjoyed the dress.
Just sexy enough while still being modest. It was a cold evening so I wore a cropped suit jacket over it. It was on the small side, but the LR fit great. Got a ton of compliments!!
Very flaterring! Classy yet sexy! I just love this dress!
Rented this dress for a weekend getaway/date night. The material is so comfortable and DOES NOT WRINKLE!
Was a tad short for my 5'11" frame but I made it work. Fit well and fabric was nice

links_reviews_title: Fun flirty dress for dressing up your everyday.
links_reviews_text: The dress essentially doesn't have form, so that a plus and minus, it's comfortable, but you don't have a shape. It's fun for a casual day. It would probably help if you have some chest to pull it off, they are really on display. The next is uncomfortable, do not reconvened if your neck is sensitive.

The dress flowed nicely and was a high quality material. The keyhole front was flattering! A medium was larger than I expected and I ended up wearing nipple petals instead of a strapless bra because it showed.
What a great fit! Had room to breathe for a summer night! Could be dressed up or down!

Rented this for an outdoor evening concert in hot weather and it was perfect. Loose and breezy, it was also pretty chic. Got compliments from strangers. Be forewarned that the only thing you can wear with it is a stick-on bra because of the cut around the arms. If you're busty the stick ons help keep the side boob issue under control.

Wore this at a client meeting w a jacket and tights. Got lots of compliments, very comfortable and neckline made for great drama. Wore for 12+ hrs and it didn't wrinkle too badly either, and I was sitting most of the day. Could easily be worn as nice evening look too.
This Dress was super long and unflattering. Very boxy .

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and flattering but a little "meh"
links_reviews_text: The dress definitely showed a lot of wear (loose strings on the hem, colors not as vibrant.) Won't order again but it was superrr comfortable to wear to work and really flatters your shoulders!
Love that I can dress it for work with a bandeau or without for weekend. Nice material.
Fit was horrible. Dress made me look huge.

links_reviews_title: Neck was too tight but fabric was nice
links_reviews_text: The neck fit a bit tight on me and the dress was not as flattering as I had hoped! I didn't end up wearing it as there was no shape to the dress. However, I did like the fabric! I wish it had worked.
I wore this dress to brunch and it was great. Very flowy and flattering. Perfect for a hot day!

links_reviews_title: The dress was airy and comfortable. It was perfect for the 4th of July.
links_reviews_text: n/a

links_reviews_title: Too low cut for work, too meh for a night out
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work - the plan was to style it with a blazer or denim jacket. But when I put it on, the front cutout went lower than my bra. Not okay for work. Then I thought, I'll save it for the weekend. But the body shape and pinstripes aren't super flattering or fun. So I never ended up wearing this dress. It's the equivalent of your co-worker who has one too many drinks at a work function. A little much for that environment, and still probably not someone you want to hang out with on a Saturday.
Very flattering
This dress is very cute to throw on for work. Easy fit is true to size. I should have definitely ordered my true size instead of a size up.
n

links_reviews_title: Great dress for work and very flowy
links_reviews_text: Didn't like the tie around the neck it felt too constricting. Had to keep pulling the neckline down since it kept shifting back.
A little too short for me. I 'm 5'10''
Very comfortable loose summer wedding dress!
So cute and comfy yet dressy, I loved it!!!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Great fit, very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Classic details and perfect for any event.
Perfect fit. Got many stares when wearing this. I felt so comfortable in it!
Unflattering, shapeless dress that I didn't wear. Maybe a size down would have helped.

It' a little loose under the arms, but the length was good and there's enough room in the thigh/hip area if you're wider down there. Material is high quality, and i'd say a medium weight. It's light a breezy, but the windy probably won't blow it up while you're living your life.
Couldn't wear it way too big

links_reviews_title: A cute twist on the little black dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore for an outdoor Hawaiian wedding. Very thick neoprene-like material but helped hide the jiggle bits while accentuating the great parts! Got a lot of compliments throughout the night. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my daughter to wear while being her cousin's wedding attendant.
links_reviews_text: My 15 yr old daughter needed a black dress to wear to be her cousin's wedding attendant and this was perfect. It was age appropriate, was made out of luxurious material and fun but formal. She said where the skirt flared out started to irritate her skin a bit, but this was after having it on for 10 hours. Was a bit tight around the arm holes too when she sat. Other than those 2 minor things she loved it!

This dress was very thick material, which I loved since I wore it in January. I loved that it could be worn with a normal bra, and I loved the shorter length. The zipper was defective on my first dress, they overnighted a second and it worked out well. I caution the zipper on the dress... Unzip halfway (or to the waist line) and put on over your head. It'll save you a ton of trouble because the zipper wanted to stick on all three I wore.

I absolutely loved this dress. I love how the website lets you read the reviews to see if the dress runs bigger or smaller. Usually I wear a size 8 but I ordered a size 4 and 6. Both sizes were very similar and I ended up wearing the size 6. I could have worn size 4 but the size 6 was more comfortable and I was able to move around. I only had one downfall. The zipper was very hard to zip up whenever you zipped it down more than halfway. I was worried that I was going to break the zipper. Other than that I love the website and the dress thank you so much

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an event honoring Trauma service and the people they help!!
links_reviews_text: Not typically a dress Id wear but it was my first time trying out renttherunway and I figured why not!! Loved this dress!!runs a little smaller side so I'm glad I got a backup size. I'm 5'2 and curvy 36DD bust and curvier so loved the way it made me feel. I didn't feel tight at all in the bust and was a really cute and flirty dress. I had tons of compliments all night! My husband was a big fan of it!! I wish I could BUY this dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a bachelorette party. Great length, comfortable all night long!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for a bachelorette party. It was on the shorter side which is what I was looking for, but not too short to make me feel uncomfortable. The flare in the skirt was perfect for dancing. The dress was comfortable all night long, and never felt too restrictive. I ordered a 38 and 40. They both fit, but the 38 felt a little restrictive. I figured after a night of eating, drinking, and dancing, I wouldn't want to feel uncomfortable, so I went with the 40. I'm glad I did; the only thing that was uncomfortable were my feet after wearing heels all night. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: LOVED the poof of this skirt!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun! It fit perfectly and was very flattering on my legs! It was stretchy fabric but very high quality and held up all night. I loved the deep V in front covered by the mesh so it wasn't so revealing. This was a great little number for a southern hot wedding!
Great dress, comfortable, and thick fabric. I received lots of compliments.
this was my first RTR and it fit perfectly!! now I'm going to rent more dresses for my school dances!!

This dress was very comfortable and I got compliments all night! The fit was a little big, I typically wear a 6 to an 8 but when I read the comments I saw it ran large so I rented the 4 and the 6 (I ended up with the 6). The material was very thick and kind of awkward but very easy to move in. Overall I would rent this again.

This dress was very comfortable and easy to wear. I appreciated being able to wear a standard bra with it. The material was thick and stretchy, which was nice for early March. The skirt of the dress does flare out quite a bit, more than i was expecting. Because of where the waist sat on me, it wasn't super figure flattering.
It fit very true to size. I ordered a 38 (size 2) and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: excellent dress! I'm usually a size 2 in dresses. I should have sized down to a zero in this dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable. I could have gone down a size. Loved it and got many compliments
Definitely a comfortable dress nice thick material for colder nights. Would have worn it but found something I loved at Macy's! I'll keep it in mind for a future event!
We rented this for my 14 y/o daughter. We went with the larger size. Totally appropriate and.very comfortable !
This dress let me feel comfortable yet show off the cleavage in a classy way. The fabric was thick but I didn't notice it being warm or anything. I loved the classy choice!

Loved this dress! The details are beautiful and the fabric felt high quality. I'm very petite and it still came a couple inches above the knee. The skirt was a little more poofy than I expected, but it looked very cute and I got lots of compliments on it. Great first experience with RTR! :)
Easy, comfortable to wear. I'm 5'8" so it was pretty short, but OK for a date night. Received many compliments.

I had ordered this dress for a Holiday party I had and I can say it was perfect. It was dressy enough yet not too over the top. The material is a bit heavier so it worked well seeing that the party was in December. I was a bit surprised in that the dress ran a bit big and I probably should have ordered a size smaller, but the dress still worked out great!!

Definitely go smaller, maybe even 2 sizes! I wore the 38 and it was still a little big. However, I loved the dress. The length was perfect for my NYE work party. A belt is a must so you can better define your waist since the skirt is pretty big. I received compliments all night long!

I absolutely loved this dress. I was a little on the fence when I rented it because of the lack of reviews by anyone my size BUT it was perfect for the occasion. The material was the right weight for a fall occasion plus it helped the dress keep its shape. My husband adored it also and asked if we could keep it!

links_reviews_title: Classy but a little fun for a black tie optional wedding - this dress was great!
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the smaller of the two sizes I got, and the dress itself still fit slightly large - BUT the arm holes were definitely a little tight. The only other thing is that the material is very thick, so probably isn't the best dress for a hot summer event outdoors! But very cute, doesn't even need a necklace because there's great detailing already.

Great classic black dress ! Super comfy seeing how you can wear a regular bra with this dress. Dress is made of a wet suite~ish material which makes it flattering and comfortable. Beware tho if you do not want a dress with a puffy bottom, it stays the shape you see in the pictures. Dress runs large so order a size down from normal size !
the material was thick, but not to hot. length was perfect, ton of compliments!

I absolutely loved this dress for homecoming. The material was wonderful and looked great in pictures, as well as the subtle pattern. I ended up wearing my back up size (38) instead of the 40, so I would recommend ordering your back up size a size down. Also, be careful your bra doesn't show in the front! The dress as so unique and looked great overall!

The dress was so comfortable, easy to move around in, and I received many compliments during the entire night. It does run large so size down. I normally wear a size 6 or 8 and in this dress I wore a size 4.

Overall I liked the dress, not my favorite rental but still a good one! It runs a bit large, I used a belt to make it more fitted. The length keeps it classy while the fit/ style of the dress keep it fun!

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved my dress and I received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It fits a little large, both the size I typically wear, as well as one size smaller fit just fine. I've gained a some weight (especially in my hips and thighs) and this dress was perfect for covering up those areas. It definitely complimented me shape. I wear a 34D, and I filled the top out nicely. However, I would not recommend it for much smaller (unless you have a great push-up).

links_reviews_title: Loved the way it made me feel
links_reviews_text: Super cute made me feel very girly the material is very thick so it was great for New Year's Eve I would so wear it again I went with smaller size

links_reviews_title: the dress was very comfortable and i felt really confident! it is incredibly flattering
links_reviews_text: i usually wear a size 6, but it was really wide in the shoulders and a little long for my taste. Instead i wore the size four and liked it much better!
It runs just a little big! So comfy though, would definitely rent it again!

Very cute dress with the most lightweight, full short skirt I've ever seen. When I tried it on in the Vegas store I felt like I was getting ready to go to Homecoming. It was just not age appropriate for me and the full skirt made my skinny legs look even skinnier. Very well made dress.

links_reviews_title: A lot of compliments at a gala event
links_reviews_text: Definitely a fun dress and easy to move around. I felt a bit grumpy and looked dress made me look pregnant

links_reviews_title: This dress was very forgiving, functional, flirty and classy.
links_reviews_text: Good fit-- I wear a size 10 jeans currently and the size 44 (US 8) fit great. I got tons of compliments. I've recently gained a little weight but this dress made me feel comfortable-- I didn't feel like I had to suck it in all night, yet it still looked like I had a waist. Also, I didn't have any problems with the top being too roomy. Dress was in good condition. The fabric was pretty heavy but I liked it...perfect for a crisp, October evening wedding. The whole rental process was nerve-wracking since I received the dresses only a day before my event but everything turned out great! First RTR experience but I'm definitely a return customer!

I worn this to homecoming but ordered a size to big. It was still wearable just really lose. My sister put a ribbon on it to tighten it, it didn't really work though. Overall I got a ton of compliments and it was an absolutely gorgeous dress.

I loved this dress, it was true to size for me in 38 and fit beautifully, no fit issue at all. Delightfully flared but the black color and tonal pattern still gave it an edge. The neoprene material was soft and spongy and the dress was well made and I felt looked better in person than on the website photos. I was very satisfied with this dress!

links_reviews_title: dress was light easy to move in.
links_reviews_text: I first ordered a 4 and a 6 and both were too big and ordered a 2 and that was a better fit, still a little roomy.
Fit true to size

This dress was perfect! I wore it to an evening wedding. It fit wonderfully. It is a stretchy material so the smaller size fit my bust perfectly. It was SO comfortable.. Had no problem dancing. Pictures don't do the fabric design justice either! Would absolutely rent again.

My friends and I nicknamed this dress the "Goth Cupcake." It was a bit edgy with a cute, fun twist to it. I really love dresses that are tight on top & flow out, as I have sizable hips, and this fit the bill. Only flaw: the material is amazing but heavy, so I got quite sweaty when dancing. Also, be sure to size down on this one. I at first received a bigger size & the Rent the Runway Customer Service rep was fantastic and helped me snag a smaller size in time for my event. Thank you, Rent the Runway!!

Loved this dress - it was comfortable on a hot July wedding evening, conservative enough because of the length and high neck, but the back was open to make it more fun. I received so many compliments! I also loved that I didn't need to fuss with a necklace, earrings and a bracelet were enough.

links_reviews_title: Effortless and easy! Great style dress
links_reviews_text: Great fit and style. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I got a ton of compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a wedding and I am so glad it worked out. This was my first time renting since having my first child and I was nervous about the fit. The dress basically fit like a glove and offered enough support up top that I didn't have to wear a bra which is not something I do often (being bigger chested). My only complaint was the straps in the back were a little tight and uncomfortable but not too bad.

links_reviews_title: Loved the straps in the back
links_reviews_text: Dress fit tight in the back but looser in the front, overall beautiful dress, comfy to dance in and received lots of compliments
Great fit. I did not need a bra and it was not constricting in anyway. I received many compliments on the dress. I would recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Stunning, sexy and sophisticated navy alternative to the usual black cocktail dress
links_reviews_text: This was a very pretty, sexy dress that I loved wearing to a semi formal holiday office party. Loved the lace overlay and the crossed narrow straps in the back. Takes a little shimmying to get on and off. I ended up sizing down to my back up (0) for the right fit. I am Usually a 2 or 2 petite, 32d bust, 5'4" height. The bust underlayer is cut quite low, though but the lace overlay keeps it from being scandalous! You can't wear a strapless bra with this dress as it is cut low in the back. Great choice!
I wore this dress to a wedding and it was absolutely perfect! It fit true to size. It was sexy and elegant and I could still dance and have a good time in it. I highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I did not want to return this dress
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was perfect! I got so many compliments that I did not want to send it back. My favorite part was the criss cross straps in the back. This is a dress I will probably rent again.

The dress fit great through the body, but it was tight in the neck and straps on the back. I would go up a size just because of that. Hard to get in and out of too. Out of all my rent the runways this was my least favorite.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous lace, perfect fit! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Gorgeous neckline, fit perfect.

I typically wear a 4, but the 6 was the only available. It fit great except slightly big in the bust area. This dress was perfect! Wish I could buy it! The lining on the inside had poked through in the bust area but I just placed a small bandaid on it! The dress was constructed so well that even though it was a size bigger, I didn't need any type of bra. I'm tall 5'11, and this hit right above the knee. I'm super glad I rented this!
The bust was just slightly tight in the 4 but I couldn't go up to the 6 because it was already loose on my midsection. Super cute. Loved the back.
Fit great, true to size! Loved the detail on the back with the criss cross. Got many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Nice, but I couldn't wear it all night.
links_reviews_text: The quality was great and I liked how it fit- except for the layer underneath the crochet on the chest. I kept having to pull it up and readjust constantly. I wore it to a wedding and I wore it for the ceremony, but I got so frustrated and ended up changing into a different dress for the reception. Totally bummed me out, but it felt way too low when the bottom layer kept falling down. If someone had a chest to fill it out maybe it wouldn't be so bad.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner. The back was cute and fun! I ended up wearing a sweater most of the night because the rehearsal dinner was on an outdoor patio. Would have loved to get this for a summer event.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful open back and detail at neck
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress for the summer evening wedding I attended! When I ordered it, I was worried about the open back and not being able to wear a regular strapless bra; but the dress fit great without one. The dress was comfortable and I received many compliments. My only critique was that the dress appeared "worn" in a few areas. These areas weren't all that visible though! I'm definitely happy with my choice!

I had brunch, went to see a matinee, had a fancy dinner and then a welcome reception for a wedding, so I wore this for 14+ hours. I found it very comfortable, and totally appropriate for all of the things I did. It's easy to dress down a little with a cardigan or up with some fancier earrings and lipstick. My current size situation seems to be that I can get into a 12, but I don't feel pretty or confident in it, so I got this in a 14 and it fit comfortably. It loosened up a bit as the day went on, and I think that resulted in the neckline sagging a little bit by the end of the night, but no one was noticing by that point. I'm giving it 4 stars because dresses like this are just hard to up-keep, and I noticed a few snags/tears in the top layer of material. Owning several dresses like this, I know how easy it is for that to happen, but that means you literally have to expect a slightly damaged dress to show up. The good news is the dark color keeps it from being noticeable!

links_reviews_title: Loved the lace and the back of the dress!
links_reviews_text: Love the dress and the fit! Wish the top was a little bit taller and it was a bit difficult to get in around my hair but it looked so nice!

I really loved the dress. I probably could have gotten by with a size four (which I normally am) but previous reviews sad ran small. I would disagree. This was a true six because there was a little more room than I wanted. I am mad at myself for not taking a picture of the back (THE BEST PART). Beautiful dress. I'm 5'3" and about 130 pounds. Athletic build.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and it was great to not have to wear a bra because it has plenty of support. It was not too long on me like some dresses this length and it was very comfortable for dancing. Would definitely suggest it

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on such a flattering dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner. Got so many compliments! My boyfriend loved it more than any dress I've worn. Wish I could have purchased.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Sophisticated, classy and sexy all in one! Great dress for date/party/wedding. LOVE
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! The color, length, texture, fit and overall look is absolutely beautiful. I received a size 10 and 12. The size 10 fit very well in the chest and bodice, but the straps in the back were a little tight. The size 12 fit very comfortably all over: was a bit loose, not big, but loose in the chest and bodice, but the back straps fit beautifully. So I chose to wear the 12 because it fit all over, not just in some areas. Overall, very happy with this dress and would rent or even buy again!
Lots of compliments on this dress. Form fitting

I love that this is more of a crochet than a true lace, it made it feel a bit more casual than stuffy. I wear either a 6 or 8 and while both fit the 8 was more comfortable. Its a bit hard to get the top on, got caught in the straps a bit. But once its on it fit great. Definitely need to go braless or use a backless bra. Im 5'10" and it came about mid thigh/close to my knees
So comfortable and everything was kept in place. Love the detail in the front and the straps in the back.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great, and I got so many compliments on it--especially the back!
links_reviews_text: This dress was my backup dress, and it worked out so well. I sized up to a 6, and I'm glad I did. It was a little bit tighter through the hips, but it ended up fitting perfectly. It was the perfect dress for my charity gala.

links_reviews_title: Amazing evening and loved the dress and love RTRW
links_reviews_text: Can be worn for formal or cocktail!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Pairs easy with a lot of different shoes!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so cute! The back was definitely my favorite part. The color and design were great for the fall wedding we attended. Since I am petite, the length was a little longer than I wanted, but that is a common thing in my life. I normally am an 8 and I wore the 8 that was sent, and it fit comfortably. The built in bra support was nice so I wasn't worried about the girls all night. However, the material around the metal support in the bra had worn off, so the metal was sticking through the material and stabbed me all night. It was very uncomfortable and by the end of the night I was so ready to get the dress off. Other than that the dress was great! I would rent this again, but I would be prepared for the metal!

I wore this dress to a fall wedding in New Orleans. It was comfortable to dance in and also to sit. It was a little tricky to get the straps in the back just right by yourself but with an extra set of hands to get them straight it was no problem.

links_reviews_title: AWESOME dress for a hot, outdoor, fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful! I got so many compliments on it which was awesome. I was pretty nervous because the size 2 that I normally wear was too damaged to send to me, but the 0 worked out perfectly (I range between 0-2 regularly). No bra was needed which is always a plus. If so, a sticky bra is the way to go because the back is pretty low. It was perfect for dancing the night away in. I loved this dress and was SO happy it worked out that I could wear it! I only wish I had a picture of the beautiful back!
Fit perfectly. No bra or additional support needed. Perfect for a semi-formal wedding.
Fit was great for an hourglass shape and I loved the lace in the front as well as the crisscross in the back! Great for a date night or a cocktail party!

4 fit great; a little big in the hips for me, but the texture of the dress made this unnoticeable. The head/neck hole is a little small so I had to maneuver into it, but once I got it on I was good to go for the rest of the night. Great choice for a late summer wedding, and good fabric weight for time shared between indoor/outdoor. Loved this rental!

Worst part of the dress is putting it on. If you plan to have a fancy updo, make sure someone is able to help you put it on as was tight over the head. The 8 fit me but opted for the 6 as was more form fitting. I wore a strapless bra as my boobs looked flat without one. Being tall, dress wasn't too short but doesn't have a lot of give at the bottom hem. If you plan to dance your face off, be aware you don't have full movement in this dress. Overall lovely dress that I would rent again.

I'm 5'6, 130, athletic build, small B-cup. This dress was the perfect length and cut. I didn't have to wear a bra because there's a silk liner and the lace added enough texture on top. Wore it to an outdoor Colorado wedding and it was perfect. Can be dressed up or down.

Wore this for a private home evening fundraiser for the Pittsburgh Symphony Orchestra and the Bodiography dance company. Rented both size 8 and 10. My usual size is an 8 petite. Could fit in the size 8, but was more comfortable in the roomier 10. Received compliments on the stunning look from both the host and the hostess.
Beautiful dress, the back was so cute and I got compliments all night! The lower half fit great and the dress wasn't too short for me!

This dress was FIRE! It is a dark navy color, looks black due to filter on photo. Totally held my girls in place so no need for a bra! I'm a 34C, and the 2 was PERFECT! I got so many compliments and felt super Hot in this dress. Fell to about 1-2 inches above my knee.

I rented this for my best friends rehearsal dinner. It's not too short or low low cut but the low and open back makes it sexy and was my favorite part. I felt fine without wearing any sort of bra. Usually my hips prevent me from sizing down on dresses that are form fitting around the waist but I easily got away with sizing down on this one. I would definitely rent again!
The dress fit well. It was a little loose in the waist. I couldn't wear a bra with it, but it has a semi built-in bra. I received lots of compliments on the dress.

The textures and added sparkle in the skirt make this an elegant little black dress perfect for any cocktail party, wedding or special occasion. At 5'2", it was a tad bit long on me but otherwise fit like a glove and I received lots of compliments. An added bonus-it has big wide pockets!

The dress fit well however the belt made it difficult to zip. I rented this for a night out in Vegas and it wasn't as pretty in person. This is the first dress I've rented and been disappointed. I guess I just wanted something different.

This cocktail dress was perfect for our holiday party with family and friends! Perfect amount of "sparkle", not too much cleavage (but enough to feel good!), and a nice skirt that covers up all of your eating and drinking. I personally found it fits true to size as the size down was too tight in the chest area. I'd definitely rent this one again!
I rented it for a Christmas party and i got so many compliments! It was fancy enough but comfortable and I am a sucker for a dress with pockets!
Too tight!! Love the idea of the dress. Maybe I will rent it in the size up next time.
I got so many compliments on this dress! The different textures were perfect! This was worn to a cocktail party. Length was great and fit was spot on!

links_reviews_title: This was for a business event/cocktail party. Everyone was wearing a LBD so I fit right in
links_reviews_text: Overall I really liked the dress. It was pretty and comfortable. However it was hard to zip and unzip. I needed help for both. I don't think I could have unzipped it myself.Do not try it on without someone there to help you get out of it!! It also wasn't a perfect fit. The 6 was a bit tight on top and the 8 was a bit too big. The waist fit well on both and I loved the pockets. It is a little low cut, but was fine for my smaller chest
Loved this dress! Hugged in all the right places. Was very flattering and i received many compliments from strangers!
Beautiful dress. Quality material. Loved the pockets. I have a small bust and it was a little big on top.
Loved the dress and received lots if compliments. I usually wear a size 8 but had to wear the 10 and it was still pretty tight through the bust.

I lost some weight recently, and wasn't sure which size would fit best. I ended up going with the 2, and it fit comfortably.
