The zipper stuck a bit the first time I tried it on, but after that it was fine. The material is heavy, which made it fabulous for a work Christmas party, and the cut was flattering. I loved the pockets and had a great place to stash my cell phone all night, and the dress is sturdy enough to not lose shape if you use the pockets! The cut was sexy but not inappropriate. I felt pretty and confident all night!

I rented this dress for my office holiday party and it was perfect. The cut would be flattering on just about anyone. The fabric is thick and I was able to eat dinner without feeling like I had to suck in my gut. This was my first RTR and I am hooked! I ended up wearing my backup size 2 instead of the 4. The stylist notes said to size down for your backup if you are small busted and I think that's accurate.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that was easy to move in
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Fun dress to wear to a wedding. Long enough that it was modest & offered a little bit of cleavage to make it a little sexy. Very easy to dance all night in!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress! It fit great and got many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The zipper wasnâ€™t great but the dress was a great fit. You can wear it with pretty much any shoes or necklaces.
Fit true to size. Felt it was more cleavage then I usually would show but everyone said it wasn't at all.

links_reviews_title: A huge step up from the LBD!
links_reviews_text: I want to buy this dress! It fit so perfectly - and I am short-waisted, so that doesn't happen often. It was stylish and the skirt material gives it a touch of glam. It is a heavier fabric, best for fall/winter.
This dress was even prettier in person. Fabric is great, very comfortable and the deep pockets were a plus!!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Love love love this dress! Looks great and very comfortable! Only con, it's a little heavy for a summer event.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the smaller size and it fit perfectly! I would have liked it to be a touch shorter, I'm 5'7" and it hit me right at my knee. But other than that it was a wonderful choice! Not too hot, super comfy and I could wear a real bra which is always a plus!
I wore the size 22 which is my normal size. It was a little big and I wish I would have worn the 20. I still loved it despite wearing the wrong size. The length is great as well.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a night out in Boston with my sister for my 40th birthday. Unbelievable night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fantastic. I ended up with the 18W. I was a little disappointed that the back up 16 didn't come along (although the back up dress they sent along in 2 sizes was beautiful) because this size ended up being larger on me than anticipated. Entirely comfortable, though, as well as being absolutely lovely. And pockets! Would totally rent again and HIGHLY recommend!

links_reviews_title: I received so, so many compliments with this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. I even left the spanx at home -- that's how flattering this dress was and how comfortable it made me feel :-)

links_reviews_title: Nice variation on the little black dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering and comfortable. It was a more interesting version of a little black dress thanks to the lace top and shimmery bottom. I could have worn the 2, but it was much more comfortable in the bust in the 4. Overall a great dress!
This dress was so comfortable! The pockets were a really nice feature as well. I got several compliments I loved how it made me look like I had a thinner waistline.
Loved this! The skirt is a little fuller than expected and was borderline too long, but with heels it was perfect. Everyone loved it. Would definitely recommend!
Received many compliments. Great style and fit. Wore it to a holiday party. Found it true to size. Did have issues with the zipper as others experienced. But overall worked out perfectly

links_reviews_title: Great dress ! Lots of compliments and very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: True to size, great length for Christmas/holiday party, and comfortable !
It was very comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Soooo much prettier in person than in photos!
links_reviews_text: Once again, RTR came through. At 5pm on Friday night, the dress I ordered didn't fit. At all. In a panic I called, they had this overnighted for my Saturday 1pm wedding! The stylist that recommended it NAILED it. Incredibly comfortable and flattering. The only person who got more compliments than me was the bride! I felt like a million bucks all night. Stunning dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my husband's work Christmas party and received a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wear between a size 4 & 6 in pants and dresses, depending on which store I purchase from. I decided to go ahead and order both sizes 4 & 6 for this dress and I am glad I did! The 4 barely zipped up half way before I decided it was just too small. The 6 fit well, despite the fact that my husband had a hard time zipping it past the belt, it got stuck there and needed a little force. The dress did seem to feel tighter after I ate dinner but I wasn't too terribly uncomfortable. I LOVED the pockets, especially since they were practically undetectable when you look at the dress. Overall a great dress! I felt beautiful!
True to size, though was a bit uncomfortable around the armpits due to the fabric. Length was appropriate for a night rehearsal dinner.

links_reviews_title: Endless compliments on this pocketed sparkley beauty.
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a wedding at a country club. It was just enough sparkle and pizzaz for a wedding that started at 4pm. It wasn't too night time and wasn't too day time. The thick fabric was perfect for fall in Upstate New York. My only complaint was getting into this is a 2 person job. The thick material and cinched waist complicates things a bit. The waist is also very much cut in and a bit tight but it got looser as the night went on. I'm a sucker for a dress with pockets so I really loved everything about it. Another great rent the runway success!
I rented this dress for a late fall wedding. I ordered a size 2 (my usual size) and it was too tight, but I wore it anyway. Definitely size up. I felt elegant and pretty. Definitely recommend.
Fit perfectly. I loved it.
It fit so perfectly and was wonderful to have pockets! Hubby had to help with the zipper but not too hard...lots of compliments on it from everyone, a show stopper!
I had two sizes to pick from - usually a 14w but the bust in the 16w felt better. Love the pockets! Very comfortable.
Super comfortable + super beautiful dress. Got tons of compliments all night. Loved the pockets. Another rent the runway win!
I wore this for a gala and it was beautiful, comfortable, and I got tons of compliments. I would definitely rent again. It runs a bit large so I probably could have gone down a size.

links_reviews_title: Great style, loved the fabric and cut
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a wedding rehearsal dinner and it was a perfect style for the semi-formal event. The skirt was a lovely shimmery black fabric that really stood out in an understated way. It flared out nicely and had pockets! The top was a pretty lace that paired nicely with the skirt. I would say that it runs a little big (my street size is a 16, but designer dress size is 18/20 thanks to a 45inch bust). I ordered a size up because my previous ML dress in an 18 was super tight around the waist, but this one was too big. I think the 18 would have fit me perfectly in this design. Thanks to the structured nature of the dress I was still able to wear it without issue, but I would have preferred a smaller size or a way to cinch it more at the waist.
I felt beautiful in this dress--I got so many compliments! Very flattering fit.

I am 5'9 with an hour glass shape size 32DDD bra. I can wear between a RTR 2 or 4 and this dress fit me well in a size 4. I'm busty and it was not tight at all. I wore this to a wedding shower and I loved the pockets!

I don't usually go for this color, but it was perfect! I got so many compliments at the bridal shower I wore it to. With this neckline, I chose to do a strapless bra, and it worked fine. It's a perfect summer color, and the pockets were clutch. They didn't make me look wider either, so bonus points. Sorry the picture isn't great.

Seriously, pockets. It's amazing. It is fully lined as well so no need for a bra. It's a little tight if you're well endowed, but had plenty of room for me. I got a bunch of compliments all day on my dress and the color is a beautiful coral color.

I wore this dress to a graduation party. It fit me super well and the lace felt high quality. I wore a strapless bra, the dress didn't provide enough support for me to go bra-less and the straps were too thin for a racer back bra. The pockets were an added bonus!

The dress itself would be fine if it weren't for the waist area. It poofs out and makes you look larger than you are. I didn't like the fit at all and almost didn't wear it. I decided to because the color and print designs are nice and I didn't have time to swap it out before my vacation. Would probably look fine on women with no curves.
Dress fit perfect! It was comfy, not too tight, and had pockets! I got compliments all night.
The dress fit beautifully and worked perfect for my homecoming dance. Light enough for Florida heat and humidity. The pockets were a huge plus to hide my phone. Size 0 worked perfect for my build.
This was perfect for summer beach wedding! The pockets were also a pleasant surprise!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color in person, very cute cut and fabric
links_reviews_text: The color really pops in person. I got compliments all day. I wore this for a med school white coat ceremony. Fit perfectly snug above the waist. Nice and loose in the skirt. The quality of the fabric is great, and was cool enough on a hot day. I wore a strapless bra because the cut of the top did not allow for many kinds of straps. Could do a racerback cross and it would probably work. Would rent again!
The dress was really pretty. The color was gorgeous for a summer wedding. It was a little longer than I expected, but still fit nicely.
Fit was perfect. Only down side is that there is not really a good kind of bra to wear with this dress. I ended up wearing a sticky bra

I really enjoyed this dress. I had a summer wedding to go to in NYC, and it was effortless. The dress was slightly big for me, so I could have possibly gone with a size smaller, but it wasn't noticeable to anyone else. Also, it was a super humid day and there's a layer under the dress that made it a lot warmer on my legs than I thought. Overall I loved the look of the dress and think it's a great wedding or occasion dress.
Would rent again!! Beautiful color and fit.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous coral color, fun shape for a nautical/semi-casual wedding
links_reviews_text: This was my THIRD and final attempt at a dress for a wedding -- and luckily I LOVED it. (RtR customer service is great.) I wore a strapless bra and low wedges since the wedding was pretty casual/on a sailing dock. The dress accentuated my waist but also allowed me to eat all the cake and wine and not show my belly. The color was so pretty. I got many compliments all night and from photos after the fact!

links_reviews_title: beautiful color, very comfortable and had pockets!
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress. The peach color made my tan stand out and it was comfortable for dancing.

The dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding. It did flair out at the hips a little bit and was a bit tight around the waist but it worked well. It is a different dress than I usually rent. It hit right above the knee so didn't have to worry about pulling it down or being too short.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a southern summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, was very comfortable, not too short for me being tall, and has pockets!
Perfect. Wore immediately upon receipt. Hidden pockets!

links_reviews_title: Cute summer dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress!! It fit perfectly and I got so many compliments. The color is so pretty. Definitely fits true to size and love the pockets!!

links_reviews_title: Bright pop of color in a fun lace design.
links_reviews_text: I was worried I wouldnâ€™t fit into this dress, but the material is a touch stretchy and the 4 worked! Major plus - POCKETS! Woo! The color was a gorgeous coral/peach and made even pale me look tan-ish. It was a bit tight around the ribcage, so if you are athletic/broad, prepare. It wasnâ€™t uncomfortable by any means, but I definitely felt a little constricted and constantly had to suck it in to maintain the look.
This dress has pockets (which every girl loves) Super comfortable and fit great.

Because this is one color I tried to pair it with a belt to help define the waist. It's a cute dress. Needed a better belt. I wore it to a Mother's Day brunch. I am a true size 2 but I feel like Trina Turk runs large so got the 0 and it was plenty big. Size down ladies.

I wore this for a morning wedding in May. The size 2 was a little tight around my waist so I went with the size 4, which fit perfectly. I love the fact that there are pockets. I got tons of compliments. The dress is very comfortable and I absolutely love the neckline. I pair this with a necklace, which I probably could've done without. Also I wore nude open toe sandals which looked great with the dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was light and springy the perfect mix of dressed up but not over dressed.
links_reviews_text: It fit nicely, no bra required as it grips well and the textured fabric is covering. Very cute, great colors, and a cute but conservative length.
The dress fit great and was perfect for the outdoor wedding I was apart of.
Great for a wedding - fitted on top and then airy on bottom- works well for a destination wedding - good length as I'm tall.

links_reviews_title: Perfect baby shower and wedding shower dress
links_reviews_text: I was lucky enough to have two parties for two separate families back to back and only need one dress. I loved the pockets and the no need for a bra. I got many compliments on this dress and would love to rent again.
I wore this for my birthday dinner in Nashville with brown cowboy boots. Incredibly cute, could be dressed up or down, fit well, fun flirty color.

This dress was perfect for the Bridal Shower that I went to! I ordered my usual size 0 and a size up because I was nervous about the chest area, but the 0 was fine and really comfortable! It has pockets too! Got so many compliments! Would highly recommend!

I rented this dress for an afternoon wedding and absolutely loved the style. The color is a very bright peach which made it feel like a Spring/Summer find. The dress fit true to size, with a cinched waist and full skirt. The top cuts in, so if you have concerns with any arm rolls, beware. I paired with gold accessories and got a ton of compliments. I would definitely rent this again.

I fit into both the size 6 and 8, but went with the size 6 since it was a little bit shorter. The 8 hit right at my knees, and the 6 a little bit above. Everyone loved the color of the dress and no one wore anything like it! It was comfortable to sit in and dance in. I also loved the pockets!

I rented this dress as a backup for my engagement pictures. This was one of my first rentals and the size 6 was slightly big. I believe the 4 would've been more flattering on the curves. I'm a true pear with a big booty and felt very comfortable in this dress. I still wore the dress out to dinner and dancing. I would rent again at the smaller size.
Loved the color and the bodice fit. It was perfect for a Summer bridal shower. Very pretty dress. I didn't feel particular "sexy"... More cute & pretty. :)

I rented this dress for a bridal shower and it was perfect! So comfy and it has pockets! The color is great for summer. I wore the size 2, although I usually wear a 4, so it does run a little big. Thanks again RTR!

This dress was an easy choice for an outdoor casual wedding. The pockets came in handy and loved how it fit, showing off my shoulders. The material doesn't stretch but definitely runs a smidge large. I usually wear a big 6 or 8 and I fit squarely in the 6. Standard strapless bra worked well here.
I wore this for a summer wedding, received as an alternate when my original dress wasn't available. Loved it! The top was a little roomy but not so bad that I couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my graduation commencement and then party. Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved the pockets! I would say rent based on your upper body size. I am a size 8-10 on bottom and size 6 on top and the 6 worked perfectly. Wonderful dress that was comfortable all day

Oh I LOVED this dress! Light, comfortable and a beautiful color! It was fantastic for a summer wedding and I got a lot of compliments! My only complaint is it definitely ran large! I had to pin the waist of the dress from the inside to try to hide the fact that it was a bit big and I was wearing the size 0!

Loved this dress! Wore it with cowboy boots for a Nashville celebration. I'm 5'8'' and it was perfect short length, not too short/long. I wore a strapless bra 34b, and not too tight in bust at all. Great color for fair/blonde.

Rented this dress for a wedding last weekend. The wedding ended up being outdoors in pretty nice weather and this dress was perfect. Fitted at the top with a flowy skirt and pockets--it was gorgeous and incredibly comfortable and despite having a full lace overlay, was not itchy at all. I received so many compliments on this number. I am normally a size 12 and ordered the 12 with 10 as a backup. I would say it runs pretty true-to-size, though someone with a smaller bust might get away with the smaller of the two. one word of advice, get a low profile strapless bra. The top cuts in a bit around the chest/shoulders and a regular bra will definitely show.

Rented this for a formal dinner preceding a holiday party weekend. This dress was perfect! First off: pockets were big enough that I even jokingly put a full wine bottle inside them and you could just barely see the top of the bottle! The sequins were in great shape and the fabric of the dress was so nice. Only thing we had to do was iron a bit of the dress at the very bottom. Would definitely rent again!
This dress was comfortable, fun and looked great! I received several compliments!

This dress fit true to size. I would size up for the backup size. The dress fit me perfectly. The zipper was a little stiff and I needed help. If you want to hide the tummy and hips., this is the perfect dress. However, I felt that cut of the dress and fullness of the skirt made me appear heavier than I was. Also, the straps around the neck felt a little tight but not enough to be bothersome. The sequins rubbed a little bit. I loved the deep pockets and the length of the dress was perfect. The dress was dressy but not overly so. Itâ€™s perfect for a cocktail party. You donâ€™t need a necklace. You can wear a strapless bra for support. However, the material is thick enough that you donâ€™t have to.
I am 5'7 135lbs and this dress fit me perfectly. I wore the 2. The dress is very comfortable and very flattering. I would absolutely rent again

links_reviews_title: Perfect shower dress for this non-traditional bride
links_reviews_text: White clothing and I do not get along, and my wedding day will be the only time I wear a white dress. So for my shower I picked this dress because I have been eyeing it for a long time! My bridesmaids are going to be wearing black for the wedding so it was like I was paying them an ode. Got lots of compliments and I loved that it had pockets! I am between a 2 and 4 normally and the 2 fit great - I would have been curious to see how a 0 fit though because I still had a little room in the waist.

I rented this dress for a charity gala, and it was perfect! It was extremely comfortable--loved the pockets!! I also loved that the top was form fitting and flattering while the skirt--which hit lower than an empire waist but higher than a natural waist--allowed for plenty of breathing room. No need for Spanx!! The sparkle on the top added a little bit of drama without being over the top. This dress is a winner!!!
This dress runs true to size, the perfect party dress especially if you are larger busted and want to be pulled back a bit. A strapless bra works great as well!

Wore this dress for a wedding. Perfect design, love the cut of the dress and the top part with the sequins. Classy but shimmering with the sequins, not over the top. Runs large, took the suggestions in the reviews to size down and they were right. The size down fits perfectly
The dress is perfect for a party!! It was comfortable and so pretty!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a sales awards night. It was just fancy enough and very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: The sequins did rub a bit after an entire evening but nothing unbearable. The dress has pockets which was great. Could be worn with or without tights, length was appropriate for a work event and the back cut in just a bit to give it a little edge.

Such a classy dress ! I generally wear a 6 and found the 6 to fit true to size as long as your not too big breasted. I think if you have a larger bust size up. Otherwise go by waist size since bottom is loose. No need to wear bra top is thick enough.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a wedding guest and my husband loved it on me.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well up top, which is sometimes a problem area for me because I am small. The dress was very flattering and I absolutely loved the pockets. I would definitely rent it again.

I rented this for my birthday dinner, but 2 problems were present. One, no one commented on the itchiness of the sequins, but it existed (though I do have relatively sensitive skin). Two, I say 4 is true to size, but it's actually slightly tight. I find that for most RTR dresses, if they aren't stretchy, they will be too tight because I have a wide chest. All in all just not flattering.

This dress was perfect for a LBD bachelorette party! The sequences were perfect and it was super comfortable! Great length. The only issue is that the netting on too under the left arm sticks out just a bit, but I don't think anyone by me noticed it!! Super cute and worth the rent!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable and flattering!
links_reviews_text: Fit very true to size. Only con would be the sequins under the arms- became irritated after a while but nothing too terrible. Would wear again in a heart beat. Also, the pockets were great!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: The first thing that I have to point out is that I rented this dress in 2 sizes and on both dresses it was next to impossible to zip up past where the material changes from the skirt to the top half, and the zipper on the size 6 was damaged when it arrived. The dresses both fit well and while I am generally an 8, I would've worn the 6 had the zipper been working. It is kind of hard to tell from the photos, but the top half has shiny black sequins in a cross cross pattern. Overall this dress worked perfectly for the occasion.

I received this dress as an alternate because my first choice wasn't available. I may have ended up liking it more! I'm usually a four or six in dresses and went with the six in this one. It had nice big pockets. I am smaller on the top and more pear shaped so the cut of this worked perfectly. The only downside was that the sequins were a little scratchy when my arms were by my sides but that didn't end up bothering me much. I'd definitely rent it again!

I loved this dress so much! It is very flattering and comfortable for a night of dancing, and pockets are always a great touch! I got a ton of compliments on the dress and was sad to return it. For me, the top was just a tad bit too narrow to wear a normal strapless bra with it, so I had to get an adhesive one, but that wasn't a big deal.. just a warning!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, appropriate for the occasion, loved the service!
links_reviews_text: Was a great dress to wear to a friend's wedding. Got lots of compliments on it. Loved the shimmer of the sequins on top and the pockets.
Fun to dance in! Pockets! Long enough to feel comfortable. The sequins didn't really bother me! Didn't wear a bra, but it was tight enough to not need one.

Love this dress. A smidge tight around the shoulders but I am broad! Fit great and super comfy!! Not too short for my tallness either!! Rented this for a semi-formal black tie dinner I hosted in my home. Great success!!

This dress was perfect for my winter formal dance. I can not tell you how many compliments I received on this dress. So many people I didn't even know came up to me and told me how much they loved my dress and begged to know where I got it!! I am SO happy I got this dress!!! Seriously, can not recommend this enough.
Dress was so comfy to wear. I received so many compliments. Nice and loose around the mid area. The pockets were my favorite part!!!!

This dress was super cute and formal enough for a summer event while also very comfortable! The deep pockets were a great addition--I was able to keep my phone and lipstick in them and you couldn't even tell they were there! A strapless bra also worked well with it. I loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Classy with a bit of flare! Fit perfectly and loved the pockets, too.
links_reviews_text: Ordered my normal size and a size up and went with my normal size. Zipper was a bit messed up, but I was able to get it to work. Great for my work holiday party. Conservative enough, but fun, too!

links_reviews_title: Loved this cozy but fancy dress
links_reviews_text: I needed the 10 for waist but the top part around shoulders and under arm was big on me but I made it work. Large pockets were great and the dress was comfortable and being tall I loved the length - I'm 5.8 and it hit just above knee.

Fits so well and isn't scratchy at all, wore it to a 007 themed school dance. It photographs so well and the pockets were the best part, some weird pilling on the skirt but it was so comfy and easy to wear
Wore to work party-- it fit great!

links_reviews_title: Great look, great quality, with little hassle.... Would definitely do it again!
links_reviews_text: After recovering from abdominal surgery, I needed a dress for a holiday fund raiser that would leave room at the waist and still be flattering. This dress worked out great! And I loved the large pockets!!! The top was a bit loose fitting, and did snag easily on jewelry. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Dazzling but not over the top!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my bachelorette party. I had rented another dress but I wasn't super impressed with the quality or fit. I took a risk and had this overnighted, and even though they only had the 2 left it was still great. I'm typically a size 4 and I do think the 4 would have fit better (it was a tad tight in the chest and I couldn't zip it to the tip top which was fine), but it still worked out perfect. Highly recommend this dress if you want to sparkle but don't want to be to flashy. Very happy with the dress and RTR :)

links_reviews_title: A comfortable, flattering, party dress that arrived in excellent condition
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 8 in pants but usually with formalwear I size up to 10 or even 12 depending on the designer. I ordered the 10 with a backup of 8 and the 8 fit like a glove. I was really impressed with the condition and quality of this dress. I was ready for some missing sequins or loose seams since that easily happens to beaded or sequined dresses with wear, but I couldn't find even one! It was in perfect condition, like I just bought it brand new. I'm 5'5 and wore 4-inch heels and the dress came a couple inches above my knee which I thought was a nice length. The skirt did need to be pressed/steamed so leave a little time to do that. Overall I LOVED IT and wish I could keep it! It was my first RTR experience and I won't hesitate to do it again next time I have an event.
This dress was perfect for my Homecoming dance! It fit perfectly, was made beautifully, and was so so comfortable! The pockets were a plus! I was so sad to send it back!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size, and I loved the pockets as well!
Absolutely loved this dress! So comfortable and fun to dance it. The pockets were a plus! Great length.
My daughter wore this for a sweet 16 party. She looked amazing and very appropriate. She loved the sparkle and the pockets!

links_reviews_title: The two size choices were great. Arrived on time and return was super easy!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a 5pm wedding. The balance of skirt material and the sequins on top were perfect. The fit of the 8 was great for me. With my low natural waist, the dress' waist was a little high, but I still loved this dress and fit. I even found the cutest wide band belt that had a sequin bow on it, it looked like it came with it. I got compliments all night on the dress, even from the bride! I think RTR gained a lot more followers that night! I will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Really cute dress but it was quite large and long
links_reviews_text: I wore this out to a club for my trip to San Diego. This was a second option dress and unfortunately they only had the size 14 available. The dress was beautiful and the top detail was really cute. I wore a sticky bra with it since I didn't have a regular strapless bra. I believe the 12 would have been a better fit since the bottom puffs out quite a bit and is long.

links_reviews_title: The sequins really made this dress fabulous for this black tie optional event.
links_reviews_text: I have a very boxy middle so I went with the 6 even though the 4 fit as well but the 6 was more comfortable and fit perfectly. This dress was very comfortable all night and I would certainly rent it again. Wish I could keep!

The dress was perfect. So elegant but fun. I received so many compliments. I went up to a size 4 to accommodate my bust so I could wear a strapless bra. I was worried about the dress being too short but it fell perfect above my knee. What I loved most about the dress were the large pockets. I was able to hold my cellphone and lip gloss. I will definitely rent this again.

This dress was a backup pick when the dress I originally ordered wouldn't be available in my size. It fit perfectly and ended up being a more fun choice than the style I thought I wanted. The neckline is amazing, the skirt is full without being obnoxious, and pockets are always a plus for me. I'd highly recommend this for a party or a night out. It didn't need hardly any accessories with the subtle shimmer of the sequins.
The color is beautiful and the shimmer is very subtle. The fit was comfortable! Very sexy with lots of cleavage! Iâ€™m only 5â€™5â€ and this dress was pretty short. I didnâ€™t have to wear a bra.
I felt amazing in this dress! It fit perfect and was just the right amount of fancy/bling for my event. I paired it with a great Oscar de la Renta necklace I rented and it was stunning!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and fun color!
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress. It ran true to size. My only complaint is that the shoulders are a little wide and made it difficult to dance at homecoming!

I sooooooo bad wanted this dress to be more of a brown hue as I was wearing it to a Fall gala. So, my miss, as the color is much more crimson and the *perfect* holiday alternate to the boring LBD. I'm a 42yo, 34D with just a bit of sag (I can hold a Sharpie), and I pulled this off without tape/without a bra and the girls were just fine. Such a fun dress! Definitely recommend!

I liked this dress a lot. It accentuated my waist and the length was just right for my height (5'1"). It has a little glitz to it and over all it's just a fun party dress. I wore a regular bra although I regretted it since the straps/sleeves were slightly off shoulder and there's enough structure that you don't need one even for bustier ladies. Loved it!
Loved the dress! Felt super sexy in it. Is booby so bigger chest beware if you don't like that

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for homecoming!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, although it is a little busty. I taped a piece of lace behind the v part to make it more sheer!

I loved this dress from top to bottom. The color was gorgeous, the length was perfect (came just above my knee and I'm short), and loved the sweetheart neckline. Just beware if you are full-chested, this might not be the dress for you. I'm only a 34C and it was pretty revealing in that department.

I loved this dress! I wore it for a Valentine's Day date with my boyfriend. Rented this in my normal size and it fit perfectly. It was easy to get on and nice that you can wear it with a normal black bra. I wore this to work with a cardigan over it (buttoned all the way up... because this dress is lowwww cut, people!). Very easy transition from day to night. The dress looks darker in real life than it does in RTR's pictures. It almost looked black with a red iridescence. But that was nice for me as I'm not really a fan of wearing red. This little number will take you direct to Cleavage Town, so you may want to consider wearing a camisole underneath if you're going to a more modest affair.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, too much cleavage for me
links_reviews_text: This is a really pretty dress and I was impressed with the quality. That being said the amount of cleavage was pretty embarrassing. When I put it on I thought whelp, I won't care after a few drinks, but looking back at the pictures I'm like damn self... why didn't I just wear a dress I already own? As a reference point, I'm a 34D/DD depending on the bra. This was my first time using rtr and I think I'll use it again, but I'll be more careful about picking a dress suited for my body!
Very pretty dress but was a little too low cut for me. I still wore it but have to be very cautious about bending over or dancing.

links_reviews_title: On-the-Hudson venue, breathtaking skyline view, good drinks, great friends, what more can I say?
links_reviews_text: Overall a very beautiful dressâ€”got a ton of compliments! The silhouette and fabric were perfect for a semi-formal wedding. The fit was very comfortable but, a little big in the bustâ€”I could have possibly went with a size 0. It was also a bit longer than expected but, was by no means dowdy. I paired it with simple black suede pumps, studded crystal statement earrings and a minimal diamond necklace. This dress gets a 8.5-9/10 for me!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. It made my first Rent The Runway experience a great one!
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for a fall wedding. The dress fit comfortably and it was fun to wear. In some lighting, the dress appears to be very dark, but it has a nice sparkle! I am sad to send it back!
Super pretty and fun dress. Size runs large, I usually wear an 8 but wore this in a 6, with no bra and fit perfectly. Quality material and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Classic dress and an amazing fit!
links_reviews_text: The reviews are correct on this dress, it does run about a size small. I'm a standard size 4 but the 2 was perfect. I did not need to wear a bra, which I love because that's a rare find for me with a bigger chest. It was an elegant dress, I received a ton of compliments on it! My only complaints are that the dress did arrive smelling pretty musty, and I could tell it was really worn out - there was a pretty significant crease around the waist, it was not a huge deal but definitely kept he dress from looking fresh. Overall a gorgeous dress I would love to wear again.

links_reviews_title: Dress was great, definitely a lot of cleavage! Had a lovely date.
links_reviews_text: The dress was definitely on the tight side when I tried it on, until I adjusted my chest. I didn't need to wear a bra, since the dress had great structure. (The neckline has wire in it, which is how it holds its shape.) The dress does make it very obvious if it's not centered properly, though, so be careful how you move and shift when you're wearing it. Had a great night!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a wedding in July....perfection!
links_reviews_text: I rented a 10 and 12. I ended up going with the 10 because It was a nicer fit. A lot of people complained about how low cut the dress is, but I disagreed. I didn't think it was too risque. I also don't have a lot of cleavage so not sure if that helped. I received lot of compliments. I would absolutely rent again! PS this was my first rental with RTR.

The dress was so pretty, I loved it! The material was thick and nice. However, I am so small chested that I had to invest in some major support to fill out the dress. Not the best option for the less-endowed ladies.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful! I loved the shimmer so much and felt so confident and beautiful in it.
links_reviews_text: Fit just like a glove.

links_reviews_title: I got to see a good friend get married and had many compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly. It was low cut in the front I would suggest wearing a strapless bra. #wedding

It was beautiful, color is stunning and different. Runs a little big... I have a small bust and had to wear a sticky bra with it clipped VERY LOW otherwise you would see it. Perfect for a New Years occasion! Or a wedding right around New Years!

Sorry for the photo, I rented this dress for Christmas Eve service, and forgot to take proper photos. That being said, this dress is beautiful. I wish I had something else to wear it to, because I wanted everyone to see me in this dress. It fit perfectly, and I would highly recommend this dress for people with a larger bust, it definitely flatters the hourglass shape.

This dress was perfect for a semi-casual wedding. The color is a pretty maroon with a gold sheen to it. I had to steam the skirt part of the dress for it to lay right. I liked the slight 'poof' of the skirt too to hide my hips. The straps didn't bother me dancing, and the sweetheart neckline was just enough skin. If you are pretty tall, this might be too short for you.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress! Perfect for a work holiday party.
links_reviews_text: I loved the neckline on this dress. It was flattering to the bust without being scandalous. The skirt length was fine for a work function, especially with tights. The fabric is pretty, and subtly sparkly. I chose size 8 with 6 as my backup, and ended up wearing the 6. It fit perfectly up until I ate a huge dinner and then I was kind of wishing I wore the 8! I wore it with the Nicole Miller Southern Plantation earrings, which were terrific with this dress. (My coworker in the photo is wearing the Sara Lace Shift by Milly, also from RTR!) This was my first Rent the Runway experience and I enjoyed it. I'm a nursing mom who is bigger than I'd rather post-baby, and hoping not to stay this size forever. Renting a dress was the ideal solution! I will definitely be back.

links_reviews_title: Usually wear a 2-4 and the 2 fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Usually wear a 2-4 and the 2 fit perfectly. It was snug around the ribs but the bottom is forgiving. Very well made and flattering!

I loved this dress. I wore my usual size--the straps were a little long on me, but as long as I didn't slouch it was ok. Had I gone a size down it probably would have been too snug in the waist. Was able to wear a normal bra, which was nice. The subtle sparkle was really pretty and I got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I usually opt to wear black when going out, but the red shimmer of this dress lent it a perfect holiday feel. The neckline cut was low, but since the material was structured it worked out fine. A nice length that worked well with black wedges. As long as you don't eat a big lunch before hand the fit will be perfect!

links_reviews_title: The color was amazing for a winter wedding!!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit pretty true to size. My only issue was that it was slightly tight in the chest. I ended up not being able to wear a bra with it which I can't normally pull off but the wiring in the bust of the dress made it work. I received tons of compliments and I felt amazing in it all night!

I wore this dress for what I thought was a dinner date with my Fiancee, but it turned out to be a surprise party for my birthday! I will say, the slit is VERY low. I felt great wearing it for a date night, but a little weird wearing something so low cut in front of my friends and family. regardless, the dress is gorgeous. Material is well made the the boning in the dress holds its shape and prevents nip slips :) I'm short waisted and have issues with dresses hitting me in the right spot, but this one did the trick!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering fit, eye catching color, great for curvy girls!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. If you want to feel comfortable, sexy and glamourous, get this dress! Definitely the type of style that's flattering on all body types. Got so many compliments throughout the night. Easy, no-brander dress!

links_reviews_title: Great fit! Perfect for a nighttime wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit just right, good for someone with smaller chest like mine. Even with my height it was still a good length, not too short.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and little bit of shine for a fall wedding- showed off the assets in a classy way!
links_reviews_text: So comfortable and got compliments all night! I went with the 10 instead of the 12 because I have a short torso and the shoulders fit better with the smaller size. The fabric was nicely structured without being stiff, and the shine was perfectly understated. I paired a belt with it to break up the dress, and be prepared to have the girls on display. I'm usually not comfortable with that, but the dress is so classy, I didn't feel bad about it! Would totally own this dress!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for a Fall Wedding in New England.
links_reviews_text: First of all, I got compliments on this dress all night. The color, the material, and the fit were all amazing. I was a little nervous it would be too low cut, but it was perfect for a tactful, slightly sexy dress for a wedding with family and friends. I am a 36DD and the size 12 fit a little bit big at the top. The straps just have to be frequently adjusted. I liked the fit of the 10 a little bit better but the zipper didn't quite zip all the way up (my sister informed me that that means that it did not fit and I didn't like the fit of it better, but I just wish I could have had a size in-between the 10 and the 12). If I owned the dress I would take in the top a little bit, however all-in-all I LOVED the fit and the dress. The material was a little bit thicker so it felt warm but not too hot on a chilly November night in New England. I would definitely recommend renting this dress and wish I could buy it from RTR because that is how much I liked it.
The dress fit very well. I'm 5'9" and it fit perfectly. The red hue is more subtle than original picture, but it's a beautiful dress and I felt like a million bucks!

links_reviews_title: Unique but classic, perfect for my senior homecoming!!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!! I have a large bust (32DDD) but small waist so I was worried about a dress fitting my shape. It was perfect in the bust and I was able to wear a regular bra with it, but I do wish that it could've been more form fitting in the waist to show off my figure. I got so many compliments on the dress and loved that it was such a unique color and style. I had a great experience and will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and the color was perfect for a fall wedding, I got so many complaints!
links_reviews_text: #fall #ranchwedding

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Got both the 8 and the 6, could squeeze into the 6, but was a little tight on the chest (I also just need to accept that I am now an 8 haha). Super comfortable! I am a 34DDD and it showed off the girls nicely all while strapping them in. Wish I could keep this dress!

links_reviews_title: The fabric is really pretty and not stiff.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small in the waist. The fabric is not too shiny and looks great in photos! The neckline is really unique.

This dress runs big as I typically wear a 0 or 2, and the 0 was a bit big in the bust for me. It was very low cut, often showing much more than I wanted to show up top! I thought the dress was very pretty and flattering. However, I was disappointed in the dress's color- the metallic didn't show through with the lighting in the room, so it basically looked black. I would recommend wearing this dress to a daytime, outdoor occasion to show off its color. Will rent a different dress next time!

I rented this and one other dress to choose from for a work event for my boyfriends company. Happy I went with this one, definitely more conservative than my other choice. The fabric and neckline were fantastic for fall. My only problem isn't really a dress problem, I'm not very busty so I had to wear a push up with extra inserts( pretty much two bras) in order to fill the dress out properly. Other than that it was a fantastic rental.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for my husband's holiday party. Very sleek and rich.
links_reviews_text: Loved the material and feel. Form-fitting and pretty sleek.

Loves this dress! The colors were great. It fit well and was flattering. It was tighter up top and down to the high waist. From there it flared but not too much. Would definitely recommend and/or rent again.

I could not have loved this dress more - it was ADORABLE with POCKETS! What more could you ask for! The blue iridescent color was even more fun in person and the fabric used for the inner lining was so soft it was like wearing silk pajamas! The length was perfect (would probably be short on a taller person) and the shape of the skirt was just big enough to be fun and flattering without overtaking me. Strongly considering buying this dress - have looked up other offerings for this designer on RTR but couldn't find any! DEF rent this dress - you won't be sorry!

Wore this to my companyâ€™s holiday party. It fit true to size; I didnâ€™t even take the back up size out of the bag. The bodice is body-skimming so I could dance and sit comfortably. The pleated skirt flared enough to fit over the hips but not so much it made hips look bigger. The neckline was unique, and really flattering.
Very age appropriate dress for my high schooler to wear to homecoming. From my daughter: Looked super hot and got a lot of complitments. Pretty sure everyone wished they had my dress

links_reviews_title: A little too prom-dress for me
links_reviews_text: Would be great for a formal gala type event or a broadway show but not a party
This dress was perfect for the wedding I attended! It was comfortable and fit like a glove!

I ordered this dress as my first dress was too small. I wore a 6 (I usually wear a 6 or a 8, depending on how the dress is cut). The color was really pretty and I loved the straps. I am smaller on top so the 6 worked as it was tight fitting and loose on the bottom half. I wore black tights and black shoes. It was really comfortable and I was able to get it zipped/unzipped on my own without any issues.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable to dance in since doesnâ€™t hug the hips. Sheen & pattern of dress better than pics
links_reviews_text: Not really a con but material isnâ€™t stretchy at all. Helps dress to fall straight though

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my 40th birthday party! Flattering, gorgeous color, iridescent but classy. LOVED it!
links_reviews_text: This was my first choice dress but I was more confident about the size so I ordered it as my backup. Good thing, because neither size of the other dress worked. I normally wear size 2, often size 0 in brands like WHBM, Ann Taylor, etc. But designer dresses often run smaller, and from reviews I was confident the 4 would fit and it was perfect. I don't have a full body photo, but the dress fit exactly as shown on the model. The dress will show off your shoulders much like a halter but with more coverage and support. Only posted the 2nd photo to show the back cutout a little. I was able to wear a strapless bra and have the band hidden just beneath the cutout. I would buy this dress if I could! I loved it so much I wore it to church the next morning with black tights and a black shrug to make it more conservative and weather-appropriate.
Not too much sparkle but enough to be fun. Conservative length and neckline so good for work function. No Spanx required!

links_reviews_title: I felt pretty and shiny the whole night :)
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and was so comfortable! Recommended.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Long Island wedding!
links_reviews_text: I found the top of this dress to fit a bit tight, leading me to wear the 12 instead of 10. Other than that, the dress was perfect to dance all night long in.

links_reviews_title: Size down if you have room to spare in the chest area
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the 6 not the 8. I have a small chest so it worked out. If you have a larger chest size up. The 8 fit but it wasn't as tailored feeling as the size 6. My husband said the 8 looked better but when ya just don't feel it...AND he wasn't going with me to this event ... wink wink. This dress held the chest in which helped hold my tape laced bra inserts(chicken cutlets) in place all night. No need for a bra, the material is nice a heavy(but not in a hot and thick way). The color is AMAZING, pics do no justice. Overall: Fun & Flirty for all ages. oh and I love the neckline.

links_reviews_title: Photo shoot for work- beautiful cut and color
links_reviews_text: Loved the neck line and vi rant color of the dress. The length was great for height at 5-6 and my age (47). Great for photo shoot
Loved this dress! Perfect fit for petite frame which is always hard to find!

The best part of this dress is that it is SO versatile! I wore it to a wedding where the dress code wasn't very clear, and it worked perfectly. The fabric definitely has a shimmer to it, so it could easily be dressed up to "cocktail" level with sparkly jewelry, but it also fit in perfectly at the more casual evening oceanside wedding I attended. My normal size 4 was unavailable, so I rented a 2 and a 6 - the 2 fit, but just barely! I am an hourglass shape, heavier on the bottom with a very small waist, so I loved that this dress hugged my top and waist and flared out to hide my lower half. The arm holes were a little small and the top was a tiny bit tight, but I was still able to dance and move comfortably. If you're bigger on top or straight up and down, I would probably recommend sizing up for your backup. I loved this and would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: How great I felt about myself
links_reviews_text: I was pleasantly surprised that I fit in the 10!! Although, once it was on, the dress made my chest look so tiny!! I'm a 36C and my boobs literally looked like they were B, possibly even a cup! I still Loved the dress, but if you're looking to accentuate your boobs, this is not the dress for you. Furthermore, if you're going to be doing a lot of sitting, I wouldn't recommend this because it puffs up in the front and looks silly. I seriosuly did love the dress- although it may seem I didn't- I'm Just trying to give you a better idea of what to Expect :)

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a fraternity reunion function
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress--it's possibly my favorite RTR dress to date. It was comfortable and flattering and just different enough to stand out in the crowd without standing out in the crowd (if that makes sense). There were all ages at this party--70+ year olds to current college students and I felt as though my dress was appropriately fun yet respectful and age-appropriate for me. I wore a NuBra with it but could have probably gone bra-less. I also loved that I didn't have to wear special underwear or Spanx. I paired the dress with nude strappy heels and black earrings. Based on the reviews, I ordered the size 6 and 8, thinking that the 8 might be better (because many said that it ran small) but the 6 was better and I would've even liked to have tried a 4, just in case. Overall though, it was perfect. The service of RTR continues to impress me--I've never had so much as a "hiccup" in my orders and I recommend it to everyone who'll listen.

I had 2 company Christmas parties to go to and rented 2 dresses. Unfortunately, I didn't have a back up size on this dress as I used the back up for the other dress. I still wore it although it was a bit tight. Still got lots of compliments in person and when I posted a pic on my social media. The dress is very photogenic. Another good rental!
Great fit, and loved the dress. Wore it to a NYE party.

Super comfortable. Length was perfect. Fit is great too. I probably could've sized down since the hips are not fitted so there was some extra fabric over my stomach, but I was still overall happy with the dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a wedding where you don't know how dressed up everyone else will be!
links_reviews_text: This definitely runs small. I am usually a 4-6, and thanks to the other reviewers I got an 8 as my backup size. Even that was slightly tight in the waist! It's really flattering though, very wearable, and I got lots of compliments! Just be sure to size up.
I rented this for a fundraiser. I loved the blue/black. It stood out without being over the top. Fit great!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a winter wedding
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR purchase and I couldn't have been happier! The length would normally be a little long for my liking, but because this was a winter wedding, I threw on some tights with it and it worked perfectly. I probably could have gotten away with wearing the 2 because the top part was real tight on me, but not restrictive enough to wear the larger size. It also hid my beer-drinking belly all night ;) The back cutout was adorable as well. I got several compliments throughout the night!
I fell in love with this dress the moment I put it on. Great cut and fit perfectly! Would rent it again in a heartbeat.

links_reviews_title: fitted in the bust and waist area
links_reviews_text: i tried to get a backup size (8) but only a 6 was avail. i am top heavy and the bust area was so tight, i couldn't breathe; the top portion of the dress looked uncomfortable to wear to me and my friends. there was no stretch in the waist and it is not forgiving. other than the dress being tight, i think if i was able to size up, it would have been perfect! the fabric and color shows well in pictures and the dress can be worn casually with booties and a leather jacket or fancied up with strappy heals and accessories. fun to wear and great for outings and occasions.

Im really short, and the 0 was just a tad snug and a little longer than I prefer, but the 2 was too large in the straps. The dress is thick enough to pull in a slight tummy, but still pretty comfortable. I got lots of compliments and the color was great in photos.

The color and fabric was nice and comfortable. The neckline was a little weird and came up high and sat on my collarbones which bothered me. It was also pretty long- longer than I expected. I am 5'5" and with heels on it still went to my knees. Would be a great holiday party dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a fall wedding in NC.
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely perfect for my event. The fit was true to size and very flattering - snug on top but not too constricting. The brocade fabric had a nice weight to it, length was great and the color was beautiful - not as shiny as I feared but still stood out. Totally comfortable and danced all night in this dress. This was my first time renting with RTR, and I was really happy with the experience!

Had rented this originally for a wedding. Unfortunately it didn't arrive on time, but my husband loved it so much I rented it again the following week for a work event. Fits true to size and makes your waist look tiny! Wore a longline strapless bra so no straps were showing. Seriously best rental yet! I wish I could purchase it!

links_reviews_title: This dress is very comfortable and I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress is made out of very good material and well lined. The 0 fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Fun party dress for fall wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an estate wedding in September. The top was a little snug on me, but I otherwise loved the fit and the flare. It shimmered but was not too sparkly. Would definitely rent this again!

Ordered 2 and 4...wore the 2! This fit true to size. The material was thick, but I wore it to an outside wedding, in Texas, in August, and it was not too hot! It was comfortable and did not squeeze or hug in any of the wrong places! Cute and fun!

I am absolutely in love with this dress. The colors are amazing and I got many compliments on it. I didn't have to worry about if it was too short. I usually am a size 6 but it was very tight in the chest so I wore the 8.

links_reviews_title: LOVED IT! The color was gorgeous and really stood out.
links_reviews_text: Fit really well. A little tight in the chest, but fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress wish I owned it!
links_reviews_text: The material is thick and shiny and rich looking. The material and cut of the dress hid all body flaws and was incredibly flattering. Too many compliments to count. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Great time with friends and looking good
links_reviews_text: I ordered sizes 12 and 10 as I usually fit into either depending on the cut. The 12 fit nicely but a bit snug. I know I have put on a few pounds so the fit is probably spot on. I was worried the snug fit would feel worse after eating, but that didn't happen. The dress was comfortable all night, which is much more than I can say about my shoes.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for grad dinner! Loved the color and flattering fit! True to size.
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect. Fitted bodice helped strapless bra stay in place. Gorgeous dress!

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a wedding and received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for our friends' vintage garden themed wedding and loved it. The 8 fit like a glove and I was able to get away with wearing a strapless bra without it showing. One of the bridesmaids in the party even came up to me and told me that they bridesmaids were watching the guests come into the ceremony space and everyone had commented on home much they loved my dress. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I'm 138lbs, 5,5, bust is 34B This dress fit comfortable. Super cute!!
links_reviews_text: It fit very comfortable. Lots of compliments!
Super cute. Wrinkles easily.

Original medium came in with a broken zipper. RTR was great & overnighted a new one for me in time for the wedding. I originally ordered a small & medium. Medium fit better since Iâ€™m curvy but it was loose in the bust area. I suggest using double sided tape to hold it up if youâ€™re larger on the bottom & smaller on the top like I am. All in all, the color was gorgeous and it worked out!

I usually wear a size 6 so I thought the medium would be perfect but that was way too small. I then ordered the large and it still was too small!! It was totally unwearable as I couldn't even zip the dress!!
too small.
Great fit. Wrinkled easily, but not very noticeable
great length for petites, but tight for me around the midsection

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear and perfect for dinner dates!
links_reviews_text: I first wore it on vacation and then 3 days later, my boyfriend asked me to wear it again for a dinner date. It is very flattering around the mid section and hides my little imperfections because of its flow.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, not my fav dress though
links_reviews_text: Loved the color but the material was thinner and less structured than I anticipated. I fluctuate between a S and M (4-6) in dresses and the M was definitely the better option for my curvy frame.
This dress was comfortable and cute. Perfect for an event. Love this brand.
I loved the material of this dress. Got a lot of compliments - great for a more formal event.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a rehearsal dinner and someone said this dress reminded them of Kate Middleton
links_reviews_text: Love how this dress was short in the front and longer in the back. The blue fabric on bottom with pleats dressed things up and the pockets were such an added bonus!

Another RTR winner for a wedding - this dress was very classy and beautiful for a summer wedding I just attended. I agree with the other reviews that it is tight at the waistline but not too tight to be uncomfortable. As always I loved the pockets. A dress with pockets is always amazing!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, got so many compliments, and super comfy with pockets!!
links_reviews_text: Ordered the 8 and 10 as a backup and went with the 8. The 10 was loose around the arms but the 8 was more snug in the top/waist area. Ultimately went with the 8 and had a great time in the dress! Only con was the arms were tight and made it slightly annoying for dancing but not a show stopper!

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments and had a great evening!
links_reviews_text: The dress is really tight at the waist, but a great fit everywhere else!

This was the first dress I rented from here and I've learned a lot in reading reviews. The dress was nice and had pockets which I love. However, it was a little snug in the body even though I size up since I'm fairly large in the chest. The shoulder sleeve straps kept creeping up which was annoying and I dislike in the photo that happened. Overall, the dress was decent and went over well at the event.

Ran a little small. I have broad shoulders and went with the 8 instead of the 6 to accommodate as the fabric doesn't stretch. The sleeves/shoulder straps plus the non-stretchy fabric make getting the zipper up without assistance quite a challenge. Once you get the right size and get it on though, oh baby. This dress is fun, and beautiful. Has pockets. So cute. Solidly would have bought it if that had been an option.

Loved this dress! Super fun and comfortable and easy to accessorize. I didn't find the arms to be too tight - to me they were tight enough to stay in place but not tight enough to be restrictive! I have narrow shoulders though, so those with broader shoulders might want to size up.

This dress was perfect for an outdoor, Autumn wedding. My favorite part about the dress was that it has pockets! The only complaint I have is that the arm sleeves were a bit tight under my armpit. Besides that the dress fit great and was very comfortable to wear and dance in. My mom told me to buy it, it was just that perfect!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a non black tie gala event
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress! Sturdy fabric and construction . I wasn't sure what to expect due to the inexpensive rental $. One of my all time favorites from RTR. Pockets are an added bonus. Received many compliments and overall felt amazing in this dress.

Dress was pretty comfortable and pockets were nice. I usually wear a 2 but that was a bit tight at the waistline so I sized up. The shoulder straps didn't feel uncomfortable at all but does prevent you from raising your arms. Fit was great. Overall would recommend.

links_reviews_title: It fit perfectly and had pockets!
links_reviews_text: They didn't have another size available in case the 10 didn't work but the 10 fit perfectly!!

This is a perfect dress for a wedding!! I am 5'7 and the length was perfect- I received so many compliments! I would say this dress runs small so order 1 size up. I could have worn the 10 it zipped but the 12 looked better and was more comfortable since I was at the wedding chasing my 3 kids around! Great dress!!

I'm 5'0", so really needed a dress that didn't cut me at a weird length. This was great for that reason. I have a slightly broad back for my size, but the 6 still zipped up with a little help. Some reviews say the sleeves were restricting with dancing, I didn't find that to be the case. Only thing was I guess the 6 just barely fit, because after the meal + dessert, it was uncomfortably tight in the midsection. Got great compliments and it's obviously a really nice material for the skirt.

Fit was great and true to size. Rented for a friend's wedding and felt so comfy all night. Off the shoulder top was the perfect amount of sexy, and the skirt was fun and great for dancing. Plus, POCKETS - need I say more?!

First time renting this style and loved it! Off the shoulder aspect wasn't too restricting, able to dance and lift my arms still! Very flattering!!! The real jewel tone and black was beautiful!! Pockets were a huge plus too. Would love to own this dress

Wore the larger size and I still could barely breathe. There's no give in the waist, and you have to adjust the shoulder every time you lift your glass. My boyfriend loved it though and told me he wanted to buy it for me.

I liked this dress overall -- super comfortable, loved the pockets, and got tons of compliments on it! I am SO glad I read the reviews first and ordered a size larger than I normally wear (I usually wear a 2 and I ended up wearing a 4 in this dress.) I had a hard time getting the sleeves to stay put and the front of the skirt kind of had a weird fold to it that made it look a little frumpy at times; but other than those things, I would recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Cool dress, totally didn't work on me
links_reviews_text: This dress looks amazing on the model in the picture and I love the color and idea but it was super not flattering on me. The bottom poofed out and the off the shoulder just didn't work but I'm sure it looks great on others!

links_reviews_title: Looked decently cute but not as flattering as I hoped.
links_reviews_text: I thought based on other reviews that this would be flattering to my larger bust and bigger arms. Not really. I have a long torso and it kept riding up on my waist. That said, the POCKETS are awesome, the skirt silhouette is beautiful, and it looks great with close-toed stilettos. I wore a black 1/2 sleeve bolero over the top and it looked much better.

This dress was a perfect outfit for a charity dinner I was attending with my boyfriend and coworkers. The pockets were perfect to hold small items when I was walking around checking out the silent auction. The zipper was a bit difficult where the material changes but I was able to get everything closed fairly easily. The sleeves were comfortable and not constricting at all. I ended up wearing a strapless bra for some support. Overall, loved the dress and I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Wore for bridal shower - never more compliments on a dress before!!! Highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: Outrageously comfortable and cute! Fits true to size, so much so that I didn't need to wear a bra (which is saying something, because I wear a 36DD!) - easy to dress up or down depending on your event!
Loved this dress- got lots of compliments! It's comfortable too. I wore a bigger size than normal bc my shoulders are broad. The smaller size felt too constricting to my arms.
I wore this at a wedding- the fit was perfect! I got so many compliments! I wish I owned it!

The dress was really pretty in person. I wore my usual size 2 and the fit was great, minus the shoulder straps which were really tight---it was hard to hug people/dance. But I got over it and I'm still happy I ordered this dress. Got lots of compliments! Great for a December wedding.

I wore this to a fall wedding and absolutely felt like a million bucks. The shoulders were a little tight, but I was still able to lift my arms and boogie on the dance floor. As the other reviews say, there isn't much give in the waist, but that's okay! I would definitely rent this one again. I LOVED it. Or, I may try to find it online so I can own it myself... :) At the time of wearing, I was between an 8 and a 10, but probably much closer to a 10 (it was the day after Thanksgiving, after all).

I rented this for a winter wedding in Florida and absolutely loved it. Overall the dress fits true to size, the heavier material with the off the shoulder sleeves did make it slightly difficult to lift your arms but it wasn't too constricting. I received many compliments on the dress, would definitely recommend renting!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! I wish I could keep it.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Very comfortable and has pockets! I wish I could keep it forever!

This dress is one of my favorites on RTR. Itâ€™s tight on the shoulders and bust, but I would rather it be tight than loose and have the straps slip. IT ALSO HAS POCKETS which was so convenient! The blue skirt is a nice wintery shade and I fit in perfectly at this winter wedding. The shape of the dress creates an incredibly flattering figure and it was comfortable enough to wearâ€”and dance inâ€”all day. I especially love the neckline and had no problem finding a bra that works with the dress. Would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Would buy it if I could!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. I loved the thickness of the upper fabric; it was comfortable and felt secure. I did not have any issues with the straps being too tight--definitely a bit restrictive but I wasn't at an event that required me to do more than walk around. I could have gone without a bra but chose to wear a strapless. The pockets were great--nice and big, though I mostly kept my hands in them rather than any items like my phone. Got a lot of compliments and I thought the style was really suited to me while still also being something different for me. My only complaint isn't regarding the dress, but the backup size and order fulfillment. I ordered a 6 and an 8, but the 8 was not in my shipment; instead, I received a pair of leather pants I definitely did not order! Luckily the 6 was perfect, but if it hadn't been, I would have been at a loss. This won't prevent me from renting again, but clearly mistakes can happen.

Loved this dress.. the style, the cut, the color, the pockets. It was mostly comfy and I think it would be flattering on many different body types. I do wish I had sized up tho. I usually fall between two sizes, but this dress was a bit tight in the midsection and both sizes I ordered were a little constricting were the black meets the blue (no stretch or give at all). I still wore it and got lots of compliments but breathed a literal sigh of relief when I took it off at the end of the night! Lol

links_reviews_title: Elegant, original, beautiful, comfortable. AND POCKETS
links_reviews_text: This is a fantastic dress. I got so many compliments on it, and it was soooooo comfortable. PLUS IT HAS POCKETS. I was nervous because I had never tried that off the shoulder look, but it was rather flattering. The inner material was so soft and satiny, I felt like I was wearing a nightgown that happened to serve up some serious fashion in its spare time. Have I mentioned the pockets? Every dress should have pockets. It runs slightly small, so get a size up as an option. I didn't need a bra, which was miraculous because my breasts are in the droopy department, but the dress managed to make it work. I know it's not structurally possible but I'm going to credit the pockets for that particular design achievement. I highly recommend this dress and the pockets it was built around.

This was my first RTR experience. I am usually between a size 10-12 and ended up wearing the 12. I would suggest sizing up when you rent this dress! It was a little snug around the waist- but was super comfortable and cute!! The shoulder straps stayed put and the length was perfect!

I rented two dresses for a wedding weekend and chose this one for rehearsal dinner. I typically wear a 6 and my backup size was an 8 because other review said the waist band didn't have any give. This is true, the waist band DID NOT have any give, but the 8 was too loose up top. So I opted for the 6. The skirt color was the perfect amount of bold, in an understated (not flashy) way. The sleeves can be pulled up if you need more arm movement, but I really liked the look of the full off-the-shoulder sleeve. Also, POCKETS!

I rented this dress for a NYE party. I liked the splash of color and fun pattern of the bottom! The off-the-shoulder top was stretchy and very comfortable - easy to wear a strapless bra. Wasn't in love but definitely a solid dress.

links_reviews_title: Classy but fun dress and POCKETS!!!
links_reviews_text: Great dress, I loved the style. The sleeves weren't a problem for me, I could put my hands up and dance all night. The fabric is thick but I wore this for a June wedding and was perfectly fine. The turquoise is deeper in person and the jacquard skirt adds unique detail. Also this was probably the most comfortable dress I've ever worn.
Super comfortable and perfect for a wedding, can be dressed up or down

I normally wear a 0 but ended up wearing the 2 because the waist was very tight. The fit was kind of odd in that the stretch of the top made it almost baggy, even with my DD chest! I loved the pockets, and the off the shoulder look.

I can't tell you how many compliments I got all night. The top is super comfortable and stretchy, and was very flattering on the rib cage. The bottom flares out enough that I could eat a meal and not feel uncomfortable or walk around sporting a food baby. Also, POCKETS! I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat.

links_reviews_title: Great for luau-themed party on a boat
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and forgiving dress. Super stretchy at the waist and beautiful colors. I ended up going bra-less but a regular bra would have been fine with this cut.

links_reviews_title: Cute, loved the high low cut!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a small or medium, but the XS fit perfectly. Beautiful turquoise color and cute floral pattern, not too overpowering. Love the high low cut! Very flowy. I wore with a belt as it was a tiny bit too big at the waist.
I rented for my daughter's rehearsal dinner. The dress is cute and flowy but my bra showed under my arms it is cut very low there. So I was always aware of that.

I loved this dress. Would rent again. I had to pin the straps to make it shorter but other than that I liked the fit. I wore it with and without a belt. Also paired it w jean jacket when cold. Great to wear on vacation in lake como.

links_reviews_title: Fun for going out in summer
links_reviews_text: The dress is super comfortable, but the top/straps were really big (too long) on me. I ended up pinning the bodice together, as well as putting a safety pin in the skirt in the front so it wouldn't fly completely open in the wind.

I loved this dress! The fabric is light and flows. The only drawback is when the wind blows, the skirt tends to fly open! The waistline has an elastic, so it's sure to fit every size and shape. The XS fit well, even with a larger chest. Go for your true size or size down if between.

links_reviews_title: Great daytime dress but don't forget a safety pin!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear during the day at a bachelorette weekend in Charleston. It was perfect, except the wrap-style skirt doesn't overlap nearly enough. I used a safety pin to make sure it wouldn't fly open while walking around -- I wouldn't have been able to wear the dress without it. The bust area was also a little big, although I'm sure it would have fit perfectly on someone with a larger chest. The length was perfect for me (5'5") to wear flat sandals without the back touching the ground.
Super cute. Really light-weight making it breathable/cool to wear. Thin material but not see through. My only complaint is the v-neck cut shifted every now and then revealing my bra.

This dress was very flattering but a little big in the chest area. I used a safety pin to make it church appropriate. Otherwise I got many compliments. I could see this dress being great for warm weather because it's so lightweight.

I rented this for Easter. It was perfect, though I was a little chilly since it was unusually cool that day. I received quite a few compliments on the dress. I wear a size 6 in dresses, but am smaller on top so went with the size small. I'm glad I did as the dress fit perfect from the waist down, but the top was a little large. I had to pin it so it wasn't too open. Also, you should be aware the bottom draping is not sewn together or attached at all, so the slit goes all the way up. The fabric does overlap, but since it's in the front, I did pin it shut because I wore it to Mass and felt more comfortable knowing it was held in place when I sat down. I would definitely rent this again in the summer!
Con: slit in front occasionally blew open, and material had to be held to side of dress so that I would not to be exposed.
Nothing great or horrible here. Oh except it has a high slit/wrap effect that shows all on a breezy day.
The top was fairly large on me and I had to pin it, once I pinned it I was able to wear a strapless bra. I also had to pin the slit so it didn't fly open. It was a very light fabric and comfortable

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous, really comfortable and very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Perfect for a spring or summer party. I got so many compliments on it. I'm very top heavy so I opted for the large to be safe but I could have done a medium. I did need to pin it at the chest, and pro tip, if you're wearing it anywhere windy bring an extra pin for the skirt. I may have flashed a few folks when the breeze kicked up :)
It was big between the bust and my armholes --- and my boobs are usually the problem for being to big. Weird fit but cute and fun for a hot evening dinner

links_reviews_title: Very cute but loose in the chest area
links_reviews_text: Very cute and fun dress for date night. Large and loose in the chest area but overall a very cute and flattering dress
the dress was cute but the cleavage was too low and didnt flatter

links_reviews_title: I wore this to dinner on vacation and it was perfect for tropical Florida nights.
links_reviews_text: The cleavage on this dress is a bit too low.
Had to pin the front to keep everything in
Flattering! I had to safety pin the chest to a less revealing plunge though.
