I really liked this dress. It was super comfortable. The material isn't very stretchy, so I would recommend getting a size bigger for the back-up. I felt mor comfortable in the large and I am normally a medium.
Great easy fit. Tough to wear a regular bra due to the front straps. I am normally a large but would rent the medium if I rent again- top was large and rest was elastic.
The fit was great and the dress was great quality

links_reviews_title: I loved the dress. Classy but still sexy.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. One con is I don't like dresses with a side zipper.

Wore this to a wedding. Usually I wear a 10 and found this true to size although many reviews say it runs small. It was figure flattering and the cutouts were a fun detail. Beautiful back. The top was a touch loose on me but I loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: Felt so CLASSY & SEXY in this dress !!
links_reviews_text: Great color for a fall wedding. Lace is beautiful and the cutouts are tastefully placed. Very fun to dance in too!

It fits true to size but beware, it is not at all stretchy so I would consider ordering your size and a size up just in case. I thought it looked way better on than it did off, so don't pass this up! It has cut-outs with lace covering that I thought gave it a little edge. Overall, I was happy with this dress.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but a pain to get on!
links_reviews_text: I ordered my regular size and one size up, but could've used two sizes up...this thing runs so small! The dress was very difficult to get on because of the zipper; it kept getting caught and took my fiance at least 10 minutes of working with it to finally get it zipped up. This could've been because I needed one more size up, but it was hard to zip even without it on. Also the ends were fraying a little and not in the best shape. It is a pretty dress and I felt very elegant at my friend's wedding, but I would probably not order again.
A bit tight around the ribs so go a size up. Really liked the lace cut out sections and back.

This dress is perfect for a wedding or event. The cutouts made me feel sexy but the lace coverage kept it very classy. My usual size is 2-4. I wore the 4 but would've preferred the 2; regardless I feel it's true to size. Easy to move in, nice and cool for summer time. You can't go wrong with a dress like this!
Wore this dress to an upscale wedding and got so many compliments. Runs a little small. Really loved the back and the dress fit nicely.

I loved this dress! It was easy to move around in and I loved how it worked with my curves! I wore it to a black tie optional wedding and it couldn't have been a more perfect dress choice. It definitely ran small. I recently lost some weight and was assuming I'd be a size 6 instead of an 8, but I chose both to try. Getting into the 8 took about 30 minutes, and the zipper seemed a little worn. But overall, loved it.

Fit perfectly. I'm not one to own dresses, I'm not a girlie girl. So to say it runs big or small isn't my specialty. I can tell you this. I'm very athletic, waist and hips are not proportioned. I listened to all the reviews and sized up. Didn't need the bigger size. I think I could have possibly sized down seeing there was about an inch in my midsection. I found this dress VERY comfortable. My only complaint is the side zipper, it's tough and hard to get into. Maybe those that wear dresses more wouldn't find it tricky.

links_reviews_title: This dress fits like a glove and made me feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a dream! The back is open and lacey so you canâ€™t really wear a bra with it - but in a size 4 it was very tight in the bust and I was able to get away with it. (That being said, this dress is probably not the best choice for someone with a very large chest.) Not much stretch to the material but it was comfortable. I got a ton of compliments!

I loved how this dress fit me and I am quite top heavy so it is hard to find a good fit and something that's not too revealing but I also don't want to be a nun. This definitely fit the bill. I could have worn size 8 but the 10 was more comfortable and looked just as good. The only down side was it kept bunching at the zipper on the side but overall not a big deal, no one noticed, and I forgot about it. Lots of compliments too!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, flattering dress. Conservative and sexy all in one.
links_reviews_text: Dress was very comfortable, soft lace, but not much give. Side zipper is difficult but manageable. Dress would fit better on someone taller than 5â€™4â€, however I didnâ€™t think it looked bad just didnâ€™t hug me at the cutouts. Wore a strapless bra with no problem. Another RTR favorite!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a Fall wedding!! Very flattering and but not too revealing
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size for me. I got the 2 in case the 0 didnâ€™t fit, but I didnâ€™t need it. I did notice that the 2 looked much more worn than the 0 did, so Iâ€™m glad I didnâ€™t have to wear it.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect. I loved it!!!
links_reviews_text: Itâ€™s forgivin, fit to size and great length.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: It did run a little tight, I usually wear an 8 but felt comfortable in the 10 so I would recommend sizing up for the backup. It is a beautiful dress with just enough "sexy" while still being classy. I got so many compliments and wearing this dress made me feel great! I'm 5'2 and it hit right below my knees. I highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Classy with a touch of sexy
links_reviews_text: Loved the lace details of this dress! It was the perfect classy length for a formal wedding but had sexy cut outs with lace overlay. I would recommend sizing up for your backup size. I was able to go braless! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but not my fit
links_reviews_text: The 10 fit very tight in the midsection, like a very tight 10, but was perfect for a modest chest. The 12 fit better in the midsection but was still tight for a 12. The 12 was too large in the chest, more for a large bust. I made the 12 work, but I'm normally a comfortable 10. I'm a straight up and down to a bit of an apple in shape. I wouldn't rent this dress again, even though it was very pretty.

I wore the size 4 dress out to a nice dinner. I am 115 pounds, 5 foot 2 and a 36 b. The dress was extremely snuggle around my rib case but fit perfect every where else. If in doubt order a size larger to be safe!! The dress was classy but a little bit of sass with the cut outs. Fit my personality to a "T" and I received many compliments. The RTR experience was easy and great and I would definitely do it again!!
Sexy and conservative at the same time. Wish I had a picture of the back(very beautiful). I sized up after reading other reviews and so glad I did! Would love to buy this dress.

Fit was pretty true to size. I'm normally a size 2 and went with the 0. It was very flattering and the length was longer then I'm used to but still worked well. Lace detail was beautiful...picture does not do the dress justice!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Fit perfect and still was able to dance in it!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Fit perfect and still was able to dance in it!
I loved the thicker material, longer length and cutouts under the lace. Perfect style for all seasons. I'd like to rent this again for a wedding in the fall!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments !!! I loved this dress !!
links_reviews_text: I tried on the 8 and it fit like a glove , I was a little worried because I couldn't get the zipper all the up , it was stuck but once my husband pulled it , it went up ! I received so many compliments on this dress ! I will order RTR again !!

Nice special occasion dress! Was a bit tight in the waist, but still wearable. A size 2 probably would've been a little more comfortable, but no problems sitting or dancing. Loved the sexy back, but thought it was still conservative enough to wear for a work event. I wore a strapless bra, but could've also gone braless and been fine.

Definitely order up! I am normally a 4/6 in dresses and had to squeeze myself into the 6 (thank you Spanx!) The dress has absolutely no stretch but the overall design of the dress is great. Even though it was definitely a little snug, I was comfortable dancing and wore it for almost 5 hours with no issues.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress! Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I am usually between a 0 and 2, but the 0 was impeccably small! There is an extra waist band that made it extremely tight in the middle. Zipper is harder than usual to pull in the middle where that extra material is. I went with the 2 which fit well besides on the bust line (a little large on the sides). It is comfortable and has a beautiful neckline. Will definitely rent again!
I was concerned the length would hit awkwardly because I'm petite, but it ended up being perfect!!
As many other reviews mentioned, I needed to size up. The dress was a very nice material but did not have much give.
The dress ran small as other reviewers noted, particularly in the hips. The dress was pretty, although the lace is not super nice. Overall, it was a comfortable dress for an outdoor wedding.
I loved this dress!! It's the perfect mix of classy and sassy with the cut outs and lace. It fits true to size. I waiver between a 4 and 6, so I rented both, but was more comfortable in the 4.

I'm 5'2" and am curvy on the bottom, I normally wear a 4 or 6 petite. And I had to wear the 8 for this dress, it was a little big on the top but fit perfect on the bottom. This fabric has no stretch! There's no squeezing in a smaller size! The color was great and the dress was absolutely beautiful! The only negative was the zipper was very tight and difficult to open and close.

links_reviews_title: Yes this dress runs small, but it's a good one!
links_reviews_text: Much like everyone says, this dress is small, I wear a 10 in jeans but in RTR I usually wear an 8. I ordered the 10 and 12 for this dress and literally went back and forth until the last second choosing which to wear. I went with the 10 and I'm glad because after an hour it stretched a little so I could breathe but the 12 was too gappy under my boobs. I wore a strapless bra, you might get away with no bra if you're top heavy. The color and lace were really pretty and the length was great.

I loved this dress, runs a bit small as the middle does not have much give. Perfect and flattering for a fall wedding. The particular dress I received had a very stubborn zipper but with some work we got it to work!

I wore this dress for my cousin's wedding. It is classic with a modern twist with the cutouts. I received many compliments. It was very comfortable and easy to dance in. I was able to wear a strapless bra, but I easily could have gone bra-less as well. It was long on me, but I expected that as I'm only 5'2". It felt like high quality material. The zipper was difficult to zip, even on the hanger. Overall, I enjoyed the dress and would happily own it!

I am 110-115 lbs, 5 4' and a 36 B cup. Dress fits true to size. I am typically a size 2 but I always get a 4 as a back-up; size 2 was perfect for this dress. You will need a strapless bra. Lovely material, of good quality. The dress is navy blue. Received multiple compliments from people I did know know. If you're looking for a dress with class yet is sexy and youthful, you will not be disappointed with this one.

I usually wear a 2P (28 inch waist) and the 2 fit well. Just enough room for some wedding dinner indulging but comfy enough to dance in. Length hit below the knee on my 5'2 frame. No stretch in the fabric so be wary if you have curvier hips. LOVED the back detail using the lace. If only it came in a bright color!
I agree with other reviews stating to size up. Very flattering and comfortable to wear!!

Definitey need to size up and had some difficulty with the zupper. If its a little tight the fabric can create a but of a roll in the sheer part. Loved it enough to wear it the morning afer my event to get xmas card photos.
This dress was so perfect I had to rent it a second time for my friend's rehearsal dinner! The color and fit is amazing!

links_reviews_title: As comfortable as could be for 35 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: This was a very comfortable dress for being 35 weeks pregnant at a wedding in August. I am tall and it still came to my knees even over my belly. I knocked on star off because the slip underneath wasn't even close to being long enough- I was planning on wearing maternity spanx anyways but it felt weird and kept riding up as we walked around at the cocktail our and after dinner. The good news is the dress isn't see through so no one else could see the slip was hitting halfway down my butt. This isn't designed to be a maternity dress so I'm not surprised I had the issue, but something to consider if you're renting and pregnant.

I wore this for a maternity photo shoot and loved it! It's so pretty and hits right above the bump, and flows so nicely down. It is tight in the bust, so you need a strapless bra that fits well with no overflowing cleavage so that it looks smooth. I was 5'5" and 156 lbs in my third trimester and I wore the small because it hit my bump in the right spot, but the medium would have worked too.

Rented this dress for a Christening party. Got lots of compliments! It was a very hot, humid day and this dress was nice and light. The slip underneath does tend to ride up a little but I donâ€™t think it was noticeable nor do I think you could have actually seen through it anyway. Would definitely rent again!

This dress fit great over my 27 week bump! It was light and airy and I received plenty of compliments. I normally wear a small and chose to wear the small which was a tad tight in the bust, but the medium back up would have also worked and just been a little bit too loose in the bust area. I wore a backless bra because the back was too low.

This was my back up dress and Iâ€™m glad I loved my other choice or I would have been forced to make this work with heals and a sweater. I love the pattern but the style didnâ€™t look great on my body type.

The light blue color is very pretty. Fabric is soft and free flowing. I'm petite at 5'1" so the dress hit low at my shins, but it still worked with heels. I like this dress for everyday. I paired it with a cardigan for work. It's a great dress - both my best friend and boyfriend thought it looked beautiful.
The fit was true to size, maybe slightly small at the band. I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and loved the color and length. Felt comfortable all night!

Wore this to a summer wedding and loved it! I got lots of compliments. I was worried that it would be too simple/casual looking but the neckline really elevates the look. I wore a strapless bra but probably could've gotten away with no bra. I'm only 5'2 so I liked the longer length without feeling like I was swimming in it. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for farm to table dinner event
links_reviews_text: Loved this flowy dress. Pattern was great for a late summer farm to table dinner event. Fabric was light weight and breathable. Very comfortable as well.
Great fit and super comfortable. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and was so comfortable for a night of dancing. It was nice, flowy fabric and felt very flattering.
Wonderful dress- I wore it for an outdoor wedding ceremony and reception. Many compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my sister's brunch bridal shower. I am the maid of honor so I knew I'd be somewhat in the spotlight and I wanted something cute but comfortable. This dress did both! I loved the length (hit me just below the knee) and the flowy fit. Perfect for a summer afternoon. The top did fit me a bit snug (I'm a 34C) but not too terribly tight that I was tugging on it all day. The dress was stylish but still classy. I wore it with a white belt and nude heels and got lots of compliments!
The fit of this dress is so flattering. The skirt isn't too long - I'm 5'4" and with heels it was perfect.
I love everything about this dress. The color, the fit, the way it fell. Seriously considered buying it, won't be surprised if I rent it again.
This dress was nice but it wasn't very flattering for my large chest! It was also snug on my waist and breasts. Beautiful design and material though

I love this pretty dress by Fleurtine! I'm 5'3 so it gave more of a maxi dress look on me than knee length on the model because it hit me right at tea length. I runs true to size and has a stretchy eslastic waistband. It's very flowy and comfortable in the chest and the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You will need to wear a strapless bra because of the straps. The colors in the floral print are so fresh and beautiful. You can easily dress this down with sandals or up with heels.
I rented this twice for just everyday. It's flattering and has stretchy material. It was cool and comfy on really hot summer days.
I didnâ€™t end up wearing the dress yet, but I plans to wear it during my upcoming anniversary weekend. Itâ€™s so pretty and comfortable!
This was so pretty and so flowy! Perfect for a hot day! I felt really pretty! I would purchase this dress, there are many times I wish I owned
The dress would be lovely except I was SO smooshed into the top I could not wear it. There was very little room if you have any kind of bust at all.
This dress is really pretty on. I loved it so much I bought it! Great for spring or summer, day or evening, dressy or casual!

links_reviews_title: Felt comfortable all day at my bachelorette wine tasting party!
links_reviews_text: Wore this from 10am-7pm on a warm spring day, walking around, climbing in and out of cars, and wine tasting. It was comfortable, (I did have to wear a strapless bra), and looked great with wedges and sandles. I wore a jean jacket almost the whole day to make it more casual, but it would be a beautiful dress for a summer wedding or bridal shower! I would buy this dress if it were for sale!

This dress was made beautifully and I was super excited to try it on. Once I did though, I realized that even though I ordered a large and I am usually a M, my DD chest did not fit into the dress. My boobs looked squished and looked terrible. I do not recommend this dress I Les you are flat chested. Waste of a rental and very disappointing
I wore this dress to a wedding and my date loved it. We also threw axes after, and the dress did not get in the way!
The top didn't fit me well so I didn't wear it.

Rented several times for a wedding and baby showers and other similar events. Straps adjust so it fits well. Also the waistline is elastic so it fits and is so comfy. The length is more of a tea length on my short frame. Light fabric and flattering fit. The best dress
Didn't wear because it was tight up top but make me look like I was wearing a circus tent below. Just not right for my proportions.
This dress is wonderful for an early fall wedding, brunch, showers, and dates.

links_reviews_title: Elegant silhouette and a beautiful color!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and pattern of this dress. The neckline and skirt length felt so elegant! I also appreciated that the straps were adjustable. I did feel like the waist was a little bit too high on me and I think it would have been more flattering had it hit at the correct spot. It hit more at the bottom of my rib cage than my natural waist. If an extra small were available I wonder if that would have been a more flattering size on me since it was such a flowy fabric with an elastic waistband. Overall, the dress was beautiful and I would consider renting it again.
Very pretty, great fit, can be worn casually or dressed up.
Beautiful, comfortable and perfect for summer!

I debated if I should have worn the small and just adjusted the straps more so that the top wasn't as tight. As other reviewers had said, the top was a bit small, but when I sized up to a medium, I felt it wore a little too big on me
didn't wear the ruffle and middle elastic was uneven on the dress I was sent :/

i'm typically a 4 and the small fit well. the elastic waist and adjustable straps make this dress very comfortable. hit tea length. very casual. wld recommend nubra or no bra because the back is rather low. great pattern. very comfortable and doesn't wrinkle easily.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - easy to wear - very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Nothing to add - just a great dress!

I rented this for my nephew's communion. I'm 5'1" so the dress was longer on me, like mid-calf. It was great for church and the family party afterwards. I could move freely, but the slip underneath was short and I had to keep checking that it was down all the way.

I loved everything about this dress - the colors, the cut, the way it highlighted my belly but covered the arms. It showed enough cleavage to make it sexy, but not be over the top. I got compliments all night!
Great fit at 25-27 weeks. Pre-pregnancy weight is 175, current is about 187 and I'm 5'9".

I rented this for a Hawaiian vacation and loved it so much I wore it to my baby shower too. The fabric hangs beautifully and is so soft. I got a ton of compliments on it. And it did a great job of disguising sweat! I'm 5'6" and was able to wear it with flip flops for both events with it just grazing the ground.
Stretchy material all over makes it very comfy. I wore at 20 weeks but it probably fits any size bump, very forgiving.

I wore this to my baby shower and it was so comfy, not to mention photographed beautifully! I am currently 7months and a 36D (full D) at this point. I am usually a size 8/10 hourglass shape, but have obviously gained some lbs. So the size large Fit perfectly.
Wore for my baby shower at 31 weeks and got sooooo many compliments. Super comfortable too!

I'm not pregnant, yet I did rent this dress. It was so beautiful and I didn't recognize it to be maternity until after I fell in love with the preview pic. I sized down- I'm typically a size 12/L/XL depending on designer due to breast's and hips. I went for M and it was lovely, very flowy, I'm short (5'3") and I floated around my b day in this lovely dress- you'd need heels if you didn't want to drag the dress and are also short. This dress is magic.
I'm 35 weeks pregnant, have gained 23 lbs and felt this is a true to size for maternity sizing. Size M worked but I would wear size S so the length came up a bit. Lots of room in the bust and belly.

links_reviews_title: I wore this while 6 months pregnant and felt comfortable all night long.
links_reviews_text: The material is so soft it feels like pajamas. It fit true to size and I was comfortable for the entirety of the wedding even while 6 months pregnant. Would definitely rent this again

links_reviews_title: I. Love. This. Dress. It is comfortable, beautiful, and just right (even though I'm not even preg)
links_reviews_text: I'm not pregnant but I saw this dress and was immediately smitten. I had to fly halfway across the country for a wedding and needed to be at a rehearsal dinner immediately upon arrival. So, I wore this cute little number on a plane (totally comfy and nice) and showed up looking cute as hell. I absolutely love everything about this dress. So comfortable, so cute, flattering, easy to wear - I could wear it a hundred times. I might buy it because it's just that perfect.

Beautiful dress though a little worn by the time I rented it. Love, love the bright colors, but I was unable to wear it due to length. To wear it, I would have needed 3" heels...not willing to do this with the baby bump!
Fits well, looks good in pictures and the material feels good.
Even though this is a maternity dress and I am not pregnant, I couldn't help myself and I absolutely LOVED this dress! Soooo many compliments and it is VERY comfy! I may have to buy this one!
Great for warm weather.
Cute but long

I wore as a maternity dress at 28 weeks to a wedding and loved it! I pinned at the chest for a little more coverage and wore relatively high heels as it's quite long. Paired with a red lip, this dress is to die for!

So, I'm not pregnant I just loved this dress. I got so many compliments. It was too long because I had no belly but I wore heals and carried it when I walked. I felt so feminine and elegant. It was also ridiculously comfortable.
Beautiful colors and cut. A little short for work and if windy it opens up in the front. Careful! However, it is a beautiful dress, I will totally rent it again

links_reviews_title: The beautiful pattern on this dress followed by its flattering cut makes it a win in my book.

links_reviews_text: Perfect for a birthday party. Received a lot of compliments. Runs a little small. I'm usually between 6-8 and the 8 fit well but was a little snug. Cute details like shoulder pads. Would probably rent again.
Gorgeous dress that fits like a glove. The mint color is so on trend!
The shoulder pads on this were a little extra for me. I felt like a line backer! So I didn't wear

I ordered the 10 for extra length...front hit mid thigh which was perfect but the back was significantly shorter and I would say I have a typical butt (not big/not small)...no way I could have bent over in the dress without giving everyone a show!!! It's a beautiful color but just too short for me! Didn't wear.
These pants are great with the matching top or separate! I sized up as everyone suggested and they fit well.

LOVED these pants. They looked so cute on! I was skeptical about the wide leg but they really looked so cute. My only complaint is that they were a bit tight around my butt/hips, but the waist might be too big if I sized up. I paired them with a black turtleneck for work, but you could easily pair with a crop top and wear them out on the weekend too. I will definitely rent these again!
Great pants! Flattering fit and not super tight at the waist. A drop short but was OK with sneakers. Lots of compliments. Would wear again in Warner weather with a tee and sandals.
Love the silky material, print and loose fit. Didn't want to return these.

These probably aren't the most flattering pants I've ever put on my body but I still loved them! Fit snug in the waist/ hips/ thighs on me. The material is thin so the high-waist was not forgiving on my belly -- definitely couldn't have pulled off a tucked-in shirt with my pouch -- but the twisted/fake French-tuck shirt worked perfectly. Got lots of compliments in them and I felt good and a little outside the box.
These are soooo cute, while also being light and comfy

links_reviews_title: Love the look, don't like the fit
links_reviews_text: So I love love love the look of these pants. The material is a little thinner than I expected so be warned if you rent during colder months. They fit great in the leg, but are a little awkward on me at the top. The waist was far too large but the crotch area was tight. I decided against wearing them for a full workday and will wear them to a happy hour event instead because I truly love how they look and the flare crop style.

links_reviews_title: Ok pant, but not for me.
links_reviews_text: Color is very orange, not at all what it looks like in the picture. Material made it look too much like pajamas
Couldn't even come close to zipping these up, but so cute! Wish I could have worn them.
I was worried these pants would be too long on my petite frame, but they fit perfectly. They are super comfortable and light-weight. Definitely going to get the matching top!
Cute pattern and lightweight. Way too small so I had to return without wearing. Size up.
Fit was perfect, length was perfect. Forgot to take a pic before returning, but trust me when I say: these pants are showstoppers!!
I wanted to love these but I would rate them an A- There was something about the fit that bothered me ...but it could be because I am short waisted.
Love!

These pants were super thin and silky. They were insanely comfortable like pajama bottoms. However, they ran really large and made me look huge. I opted not to wear them. Perhaps if I was taller it would have worked.

These pants were lovely and a great quality, but ultimately did not fit. I have a rounder mid-section and a side zip pants is never my friend. If i had read the details perhaps i would have noticed and not ordered, but likely i still would have because i'm a sucker for an animal print. They're really lovely looking and flowly legged.
Somehow too big and too small at once - length is awkward. Would not rent again. Also these are unlined - not great for winter/early spring but would be nice for summer or vacay if they fit well

I got compliments all day! The material is some kind of satin so it's very lightweight, which I didn't realize from the picture. It's definitely better suited for warmer weather, but regardless these are so cute! Will definitely rent again.
I loved this dress! One of the few mock necks that pair well with a jacket. It was perfect for my desert vacation.

links_reviews_title: All dressed up and nowhere to go
links_reviews_text: This is such an amazing dress, unfortunately I had nowhere to wear it to due to the virus. But I wore it around my house and it was fabulous.
I'm usually a 4, and the 2 fit perfectly. An early spring head turner!
Neck was too stiff so it chafed my neck! Otherwise a great dress, many complimentsâ€“â€“pearl details on the shoulder maybe are a bit unnecessary
nice buttons details and smocking. definitely not one to flatter your figure but looks beuaitufl.
Nice fabric and structure

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, its a little long as I am 5"2 but still looks fabulous
links_reviews_text: Loose fit, can be dressed up or worn down so very versitile
Very soft and comfortable. Love these!

I've had a lot of luck with past Rag & Bone jeans, but these were really tight around my hip bones. I wish I'd gone a size up, or maybe the rise just falls in the wrong spot for me. Great quality and look though.
I would have loved to have purchased these jeans
I sized up from my normal size and still found these to be snug. They are way too short for the tall girls out there and fit more like a Capri!
fits well and really comfortable

Super soft. Fit true to size. Happy these were not too long for my 5'2" stature. A little stretch which was great for my curves. Would definitely rent again. Only reason I did not buy is because I mostly wear dresses living in Florida.
A little tight, I could wear but will size up to a 31 for my next rental.
Perfect
It was love at first sight with these jeans. They fit like a glove. I'm so obsessed that I went and bought a new pair.

These jeans fit true to size. They are high-waisted and they just cover my belly button. They are so comfrotable! I love the frayed hem. I usually wear a 27 or 28 in jeans, with the 27s being snug and the 28s being a tiny bit loose. And these fit just as expected! Love them!
Runs very small. I couldn't zip the jeans. Great wash!
These are great, they stayed put all day and were very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Great jeans! Great cut on them!
links_reviews_text: I loveeee these jeans! They fit great and look great! I also feel great in them!
These jeans are perfect. Never lose shape and fit your body like a glove. Super soft too. BOUGHT!
Love these jeans. May consider keeping them. A pinch small but they stretch just enough. Color, details everything about them is great.
I really liked these jeans and it makes me want to order more from Rag & Bone. They fit like a glove and were super flattering. Very slight amount of stretch and perfect ankle length.
I love these jeans. They are comfortable and true to size. They may be a little on the short side for the taller girls.

Really easy to wear. Side zip. Fully lined. Great movement. The color works for a lot of skintones. The white Ciao lettering and stripes make it easy to pair with spring and summer separates. Feminine but also modern and clean. I'd buy but the price is a wee bit high for me at the moment.

I really enjoy the print and the pleats on this skirt. It runs small though. I rented the UK 8 based on the recommendation. It fits, but the waistband is realllllly tight. I typically wear a 4 in most brands and a 6 in Reformation and HVN. If you are between sizes, go up.

I wore this bright yellow shirt dress by Badgely Mischka. It was tight in the waist area so I suggest going up a size. Full skirt with pockets! I rarely wear yellow, this is a bold yellow and will certainly brighten up your day! ðŸŒž

links_reviews_title: Loved this. Bright and cheerful on a grey day.
links_reviews_text: Fits beautifully, the color can't help but make you happy. The only thing that could improve this dress would be a detachable belt over the front-cinching only "attached" belt.
Pleats aren't flattering on me. Neither is mid-calf length. But it didn't matter. This dress is too fun to be on a hanger. Enjoy its sunshine and 50s vibe!

I'm a very vibrant person & this dress matches my personality. I've gotten so many compliments on my outfit. I normally wear a 14/16 but this brand runs small so I got a size up. This dress fits like a glove!

When I first tried it on, I wasn't in love. Don't get me wrong. I liked it but I wanted to be wow'd. I tried it on today and said since I already rented it, I might as well wear it. I kid you not, I received compliments ALL day from women and men. I loved the color but I wasn't too sure about the material but I've been sold. I still don't "love" it but it's comfortable and cute enough to wear again.
This dress is so flattering. From the cut, to the pockets (!) every part of this dress was amazing. My students and coworkers complimented me all day.

links_reviews_title: I didn't get a chance to wear it cause of coronavirus cancellation. :(( Next time!
links_reviews_text: Waist was a little fitted but otherwise, very Mrs. Maisel vibes

links_reviews_title: Love the dress - waist a little tight
links_reviews_text: So I should have sized up because the waist is a little tight on me. Love the dress. Definitely a conversation starter because of the color! Will rent again but in a size 4 next time.

Love the color, the full skirt, the detail on the sleeves but I normally wear a 10/12 and this 12 does not fit. Not a whole lot of space in the shoulders/breast area. It's also a little high waisted for me. I love it but will have to return it and try a larger size.
In LOVE with this top. Fabric is a gorgeous Italian cotton/nylon blend and it feels amazing. Think 2010 Ina Garten Barefoot Contessa vibes. Oversized, luxe, and so comfortable.

this shirt is terrible. it feels like a combination between a tent and a sports fishing shirt. I had high hopes because of the glowing reviews but this is one of my least favorite rentals of all time.
Amazing shape. Great everyday top.
Swimming in this. I almost always size up but this was enormous even for someone who likes the oversized look. Didn't wear it, but would if sized down!
I'm 27 weeks pregnant so I ordered a M (normally a S) and it was huge! Not even a little bit flattering.

It's hard to describe what makes this top so special. One thing, it does run very large. I wore a Medium and it was still long enough that I could have worn it with leggings. BUT, this top is so flattering, so well made, it's the kind of thing you could wear your entire life. I wish I could keep it but that price tag is HEFTY.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute style - great fabric - so comfy!
links_reviews_text: Love love love this short but it runs very very big. I will rent again and size down one or two sizes. The flowy cut is so cute with leggings and sneakers, and the fabric is so comfy and travels well. Only complaint is that the sleeves are so oversized with so much fabric that when you roll them up the cuff/rolled part is really thick which is kind of annoying.

links_reviews_title: I can not wait to rent this again!!!
links_reviews_text: This sweater was my favorite *in between winter & spring sweater*. Was thick and comfy, I personally didn't find it as itchy as some of the other reviews said. It has a slit that allows some air flow. But I mostly wore with a tank under, even though I wore at work/working from home.

links_reviews_title: Cute! Oversized but in the best way.
links_reviews_text: Pairs with skinny jeans (which made my legs look even better). The fit is definitely oversized. But not tooo bulky. I think overall great fit. The sleeves are a bit wide but all international.
See picture- extremely large for an XS (reminds me of Madewell)
I definitely should have sized down. This sweater is cute but also itchy and HOT. I wore a tank underneath and would recommend.
Loved this oversized sweater. Loved the colors and the uniqueness of the cut! Wore it a couple times and will definitely rent it again!!
Cute and cozy! The slit is a nice touch that keeps it from grabbing to you like most sweaters and keeps things trendy. Loved the oversized fit!

What a cozy knit for winter. I love the slouchy sleeves and the asymmetrical cut in the front, which gives it much more character than a normal sweater. It's not scratchy. Fitwise, I am a true size 6 (I am tall with muscular shoulders), but can be S or M for sweaters depending on the brand. After reading the reviews I decided to go for S, and this fit perfectly while still keeping the intentional "oversized look". So ladies, if you straddle sizes I'd say pick the smaller size on this one.

It's definitely big, but it was incredibly warm and comfortable. I did question it when I first put it on because I felt like it made me look frumpy....I ended up pairing it with ankle boots that had a heel, longer gold earrings and styled my hair in a bun with a bold maroon lip. I felt much more sophisticated and attractive from the styling. Ended up wearing to work and got a few compliments.
I'm obsessed with the split. As you'll see in the photo, I styled this tucked into a skirt, giving it an asymmetrical look, which I loved.
It's an oversized sweater but even small is extremely large. Normally 4-6 and small but XS would be a better fit.
This sweater was all types of wrong. Massive on my petite frame. Not even cute in an over-sized way.

I tried taking everyone else's advice and ordered a size down, but it was still way too oversized. Maybe it was stretched out, but I typically wear a Medium or Large and I was swimming in the Small. It's really too bad because it was super cute otherwise.

links_reviews_title: Love it! So tempted to buy it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this sweater four times and it was the perfect chunky sweater. Looked great when I got it; condition was excellent. Looks great with skinny jeans and can be dressed up or down. The arms are chunky so wear it with a large coat or on a day with no jacket needed!
I am typically between a medium and large. This was humorously large on me. The arms started in my elbows.
probably should have sized down in this piece.
Nice sweater, feels like good quality but was HUGE! Unwearably big!

links_reviews_title: This sweater just did not fit right.
links_reviews_text: This sweater was too short on my torso to be as baggy as it was and the sleeves were huge and long.

links_reviews_title: Really love the look, but super oversized
links_reviews_text: Very oversized. Probably slightly more than I'd like, sleeves were really loose. But I still liked the look and wore the sweater to work and out at night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect oversized sweater with a twist
links_reviews_text: Dropped shoulders, oversized sleeves, and front slit make this a compliment catcher of a sweater. Wore to dinner date and to daytime errands.
I'm usually a medium but went with a small. It fit perfectly, and I love the slit on the side!

So I knew I needed the XS but it wasn't available so despite reviews I went ahead and got the S. It's comfy cozy which is good for cold days at the office, but the sleeves are honestly comically long. I rolled them twice and they were still hanging over my hands. The color blocking and neckline is really nice though.
Has potential to be cute but was WAY too big and baggy. A bit itchy too.

links_reviews_title: Will size down and rent again!
links_reviews_text: Very cute, fashionable and comfy. But huge! Definitely size one or two down.
Super oversized in shoulders and sleeves. I normally wear a large but was swimming in this. Would recommend sizing down
This is the perfect cozy over sized sweater for winter!
Not a huge fan of the oversized look but at a small size, it wouldve been a cute chunky knit

links_reviews_title: Loved this comfortable and fun, as it has multi colors.
links_reviews_text: it looks great with skinny jeans or leggings.
Usually order a medium, ordered this in a small and fit well. Only wish it was a little bit longer because of the slit in the front.
This is such a cute, oversized sweater. It's really trendy yet simple.

This is a great sweater. It's warm, it's cut in a modern way, its unique. The downfalls are that mine arrived with hanger horns, and the sleeves are extremely long and baggy - careful while eating and other messy situations.
You have to accept you will be swimming in this, that's the look and it's a comfy one. However, I needed reassurance from my BF it looked OK before heading to work in it...
I didn't get a photo, but this sweater pairs well with leather leggings and some black booties! Very comfy and would def rent again!

Obsessed with this sweater - would probably purchase if it weren't so pricey! I definitely agree with most of the reviews on here though, size down!! I'm typically a M/L in tops but after reading the reviews I ordered an XS (!) and it fit perfectly!
super cozy sweater, but runs really large. great if you want a super oversized look!

links_reviews_title: Great colors, great material... size down!
links_reviews_text: I rented a M (this is why you should read reviews first) and I swam in it. It's a great sweater but I think I could have worn a S or even an XS comfortably.
Cute oversize sweater for fall! Runs really big but I liked the look.

links_reviews_title: knit was so soft and comfy
links_reviews_text: will rent again! highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Im a size 10 and L was way too big. Sleeves were too long.

links_reviews_text: The fabric was not what I was expecting. I was thinking it was going to be a cotton dress (my fault for not checking the details on it). If I knew better, I would've sized up to an 8. It wasn't very figure flattering to my body type. Nice quality felt like a good dress for office work.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a work trip and then we all ended up #stayathome!! Made my video calls spiffy.
links_reviews_text: Very beautiful fabric and colors. I wore this with a tank, wideleg pants and...slippies, because quarantine WFH. Felt polished for video calls... I'm a 4-6 and ordered a Fr 40. It was fine but roomy. So... runs TTS-ish, but you can size up if that's what's available. One star off because the neck line is very wide open and I thought that looked bad with a crew neck, so I had to wear a lower cut tank top. I wish it had buttons or hooks to close the jacket.

links_reviews_title: This jacket is a great transitional piece. Great for spring and for layering with multiple pieces.
links_reviews_text: The strong shoulders and tweed are so on trend with this piece. Recommend !!!

links_reviews_title: WFH tweed that is fancy yet comfortable!
links_reviews_text: The metallic threads made this special. Fit was perfect and it translated well to virtual meeting environment.

Really beautiful jacket - colors are vibrant with a tiny bit of sparkle woven in. However, there were loose strings coming out everywhere and after a day of wearing the arms were quite wrinkled. Not what I would expect at this price point. Glad I'm only renting and not buying!
good, relaxed fit. Pretty details. Got a few compliments
Flattering for curvy petite pear shape. Lots of compliments. Wore twice. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: So cute with a blazer. Should have ordered a size 8 tho. Just too big without a blazer.

links_reviews_text: This top is great!!! If you are bigger chested I suggest going up a size. The 12 fit well everywhere except for in the chest. It is so great!!!
I was obsessed with this shirt! Loved the graphics and fit. Comfortable, light material, loose fit and a little cropped. Definitely recommend!
Pretty easy to wear - basic graphic tee
Got the XS. Glad I didn't size up. So cute and received many compliments. I'm 100 lbs and this fit perfect.
Sassy tee that made me feel strong and comfortable at the same time.
Love the graphic illustration. Otherwise, not remarkable

Awesome graphic tee, have gotten a ton of compliments! Definitely size up this runs really small. I got a medium and it definitely looks and fits like an Xs/s. Would love to buy but way too expensive for a basic graphic tee.
Cute, fun and comfy...

Love when an item is delivered new with the tags on! I wore this tank twice - once at a concert, once at an outdoor food festival. The tank is on the shorter side. But adjustable straps are great and can wear a strapless bra. I typically find buttons look too stretched across my chest, but I had no issues with the buttons here. Flattering and easy. I would rent again, I even thought about buying it.
Just what you'd expect from a tank, but with high-quality material. Could go bra-less if you so choose, as the thickness of the material hides the nips well, while still being breezy for a warm day.
This design is eye catching. I liked it.
I love this - I haven't sent it back yet. It's comfortable and flattering. Lots of compliments.
Great everyday sweater that fits well and isn't oversized.
Perfect for a quick and comfy outfit
Extremely soft - for someone who rarely wears sweaters because they're itchy!
I really like this sweater, it is a perfect true to size fit, warm and not itchy. It may be a little box-y for some, I do a french tuck to show more of my figure. I would recommend this sweater!
It was a lot shorter than I thought it was going to be
Nice sweater but looked a lot cuter in the picture. Colors are very subdued, not bold or bright. Fits true to size.

I loved the material of this sweater. It is a blend of cashmere and wool. Not itchy at all. Thick but not chunky. The pattern on the chest is also really flattering. I wore this to work and have worn it a couple times casually. Love this sweater!
So soft and cozy. Perfect winter sweater.
Very soft and warm material. I usually wear a medium in most brands, but small fit me fine.
Highly recommend. Very cute and easy to wear
Wore this a few times. The body is a bit loose but the sweater was on the shorter side so I would not size down. Comfy and warm without being itchy.

links_reviews_title: Super easy to wear and looked great!
links_reviews_text: Fit a little smaller than my typical sweaters, but i like a slouchy fit. This was still super flattering and comfortable!

I liked this sweater more than I expected! The fit is fantastic, definitely high quality, and the fabric still manages to look soft/ nice even with a little bit of wear. It's a bit more eye-catching in person too.
Softest, most comfy fabric - if the price to purchase weren't so high, this sweater would be mine. Love it!

links_reviews_title: I loved it but I expected complimentd...
links_reviews_text: I thought this sweater was so cool and I expected a ton of compliments and sadly, received none. I returned it may try again. Definitely worth a rent.
So soft and cozy it's amazing

I received so many compliments on this sweater it's very comfortable and flattering I would say this is true true to size so if you want a more oversized look to size up. I would consider keeping this sweater!
Love this unique design. Fabric is very soft and cozy. Paired with black pants for work. Fits perfectly and is a nice length among many short sweaters being shown. Highly recommended rental!
Cropped length

links_reviews_title: Cute, color isn't great for my complexion
links_reviews_text: Really like the print. It does wrinkle a bit when you travel with it. But the fabric is soft and it's pretty cozy without being itchy or too heavy. Liked it a lot.
Super soft and cute. A little smaller than I would have liked but not too small. Will rent again.
Very warm, great fit and cute details. Will definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: This is super comfortable, stylish and cozy, but not too hot or bulky.
links_reviews_text: I loved that this sweater walked that line between comfy and a bit oversized, but it wasn't too hot or overly bulky. The cute little graphic design bit on the top makes it cute enough for a holiday party, but you're getting away with wearing something pretty comfy :)

Lovedddddd this dress. I'm in quarantine and have realized dressing up as a routine has helped me stay sane. So here I put this dress together with some high platform shoes (because I'm 5'3" and with flats I looked way older than my age). Wore the dress alllll day and loved it. Super comfy. Nice quality fabric.

links_reviews_title: Adjustable waist, a bit short for work
links_reviews_text: The obi-style belt around the waist is adjustable, so you can cinch it in more or less as needed. It was a bit short for work, so I wore with black tights to make it seem more appropriate. It did wrinkle as the day went on

Super adorable dress with belt detail that is adjustable. I'm a 00/0 and I tightened the belt and it felt great. The top was a bit boxy, but I'm small on top so no biggie. Wore with a leather jacket. So cute!
This dress color is more like a tiffanies color...really like it

links_reviews_title: Not Great for Apple Shapes--Runs SMALL
links_reviews_text: I gambled on this one with no reviews. It's beautiful, if a bit oddly colored, and the top is nice with a dolman like sleeve. But it's going to be a rough fit for Apple or pear shapes. It's narrowest at the hip area, which is strange. Even ordering it in my larger size (which I rarely wear!) it wouldn't button comfortably over my hips. If you have any semblance of hips or a booty, size way up.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous pattern, but tiny in the hips!
links_reviews_text: I loved the pattern and fabric, but the hips were so small I couldn't even button it. Order a size up!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely fell in Love with this Sweater!
links_reviews_text: Such a great piece! Well made, cozy, Oversized chunky knit sweater with a twist ...

Oversized, heavy (soft) material, the neck hole wasn't too small like some other sweaters I try on. Yes the arms are oversized as well, but that's just the look. I'd absolutely rent this sweater again.
A nice oversized sweater for lounging around.
I am wearing a large right now cause I'm pregnant and normally wear a medium but the sleeves were a few inches longer than my hands and it was too think to roll up.

I rented this to just wear around. It was cozy and fit a little bit big but in a good way for a sweater. The only thing is that the arms are so long. I'm average height and pretty proportionate but the sleeves went a few inches past the tips of my fingers. And the cuffs were wide so they didn't stay put. I had to roll the sleeve cuffs a couple times and it felt kind of weird.
stylish yet comfy. off the shoulder is a nice touch on the webcam!

I wore this as part of a "Grace from Grace & Frankie" look, but wearing it without something underneath made me feel too exposed. Probably since it was still winter, and I wasn't feeling fit in my arms - it may work for others or at other times of the year.
Soft fabric, year round warm sweater. Nice for a more modest look. Cool lines from the ribbed sweater material.

This top was sooooo cute! I wore it for a weekend out getting drinks and seeing a band. It paired perfectly with my jeans and heels. It so cute and comfortable without trying too hard. Effortless easy look.
Liked this very much. Runs large with a loose fit. Long, can wear with leggings.
Definitely different. Surprisingly warm. I thought maybe the lack of sleeve was going to be an issue but it was cool. Instead
Definitely not my usual style, but I loved it and got a lot of compliments on how pretty and interesting this sweater is!
Comfortable and flattering!
Loose fit, nice cut, but faded material.

links_reviews_title: very cool, looks good but easy at the same time, casual.
links_reviews_text: very cool, looks good but easy at the same time, casual.

Got lots of compliments on the sweater -- definitely a unique look! When I first tried it on it felt a little bit small, but it did stretch out a bit so don't be alarmed if it doesn't feel off one shoulder right away.
Great sweater. This is my 2nd time ordering it. It's flattering and comfy.
So understated, elegant, sexy and sweet. Loved this sweater so much!
I love this sweater, great for a night out with jeans and boots or an upgraded look for during the day. Comfortable, flattering

I received a lot of complements on this sweater. The asymmetrical hem and one long sleeve is very unique. I loved it!! It was very comfortable. I'm usually a size 4 or a small but only a medium was available and it was fine.
so cute! Great for work & date night!
Sleeve fit was great, heavy fabric and great quality.

links_reviews_title: The event was a dinner and it was elegant.
links_reviews_text: Liked this and it looked nice.
What a fun asymmetrical casual shirt. Loved it, neutral with a twist, wore it a lot!
Color is getting a little faded

links_reviews_title: It was really cute and stylish
links_reviews_text: Mine didnt necessarily come down on my shoulder the way the model did but i still thought it was very cute
Great sweater for date night or the weekend. Fell perfectly off the shoulder and wasn't too big. Very cozy material but still felt dressed up. Paired with jeans and booties.

I loved this off-shoulder sweater. I wore it three times on a New England winter weekend when the temperature was in the 60s. So cute and stylish. I wore this casually at home, on a date with my husband, and out with girlfriends.
Cool and comfy! This was great for a casual night out.

This was a good sweater for casual days about town. Interesting cut, and somehow didn't manage to look overtly strange with the the asymmetrical arm thing. Sexy without trying too hard - wore with black skinnies for a casual date night. The fabric was soft, not scratchy.
I wore this For New Year's Eve to go to dinner with my husband. Great top, a little sexy but still warm

I rented for Passover and wanted something comfortable and happy. This fit the bill perfectly and matched the beautiful Tory Burch top. I wish the blazer was more tailored at the waist to make it more flattering. I rented with the coordinating pants. The cornflower blue color in my photo is off. It is true to the close up photo on the RTR site
Love the fit and the look.
Great fit and fabric. Wear with dress, skirt or jeans. Will rent again
Fit perfect! Wanted one of my own!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals yet
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this! Super high quality and a beautiful color. Got tons of compliments. Runs a tad large but it looked good that way. Could size down one for a more fitted look too.
Loved the material/feel, colors, fit, everything! Will definitely rent again!
My true size should have been a medium, but it wasn't available. I recommend sizing up, rather than down if your size isn't available.
Cute but starting to look worn. Was fine for WFH but wouldn't wear out

links_reviews_title: Cute camo colors, comfy casual, easy fit
links_reviews_text: Medium fit well
Very comfy. Fits great. Could have worn this everyday for sure.
Rented this for a weekend get away. It was cute and comfortable. Perfect!
Cute casual sweater. Very soft. Sleeves are a little long. Would rent again!
Super comfortable and soft fabric. Fits true to size.
Cozy, flattering sweater for everyday. It was starting to look worn with some pilling though.
Runs very small and is very cropped!
Super soft and comfy. I wore it several times on vacation and it kept its shape. Would consider buying it.

links_reviews_title: Cute wool sweater, but too big for me
links_reviews_text: Pro: the camo print is so cute. It would have been a great sweater for winter in the northeast. Con: RTR suggested an XXL for me, and I thought that might be too big and it was. The sleeves were so long they covered my hands completely. And the body of the sweater was so big it made me look boxy. Perhaps the XL would have been OK for my size.
Can't wait to wear! Soft simple sweater. Runs true to size.
Great material and a beautiful sweater. If you have a larger bust it will be very cropped. The top is elegant. Got lots of compliments!
Quality is incredible. It's so warm and cozy and has an elevated feel with its buttons. I also love the look of the fold over neck. It was a little cropped but nothing substantial

Loved this for work! Paired with a splash of color and felt pretty and polished all day at work! I have a short torso and the waste feel at my hips. If you have more of an hourglass shape, you might want to size up.
So soft and cozy, zero itch on this well made and expensive looking sweater. It's very warm!
Cute sweater, well made, somewhat thick but flattering and super soft

links_reviews_title: Comfy & cute enough for out and about.
links_reviews_text: #classy & perfect for many outings. Super soft material. Only thing I will point out is the torso is pretty short. So high waisted pants are important. I got a breeze a few times when I was moving about out to appointments and lunch.

I loved this sweater as it was chic but comfortable. It was everso slightly cropped (but not showing midriff or anything) because I have a longer torso, but would look cute with jeans to show off a cool belt.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, warm but too short for my taste

links_reviews_text: Warm, comfortable, chic
Great fit. Perfect with midi skirts. Warm, too. Wore for work and weekend. Will definitely rent again.
Sweater looks great with jeans or slacks. Nice piece for comfort and style. Sits right on waist. Super cute.

Very cute sweater, easy fit overall, but it hits me right at the natural waist, which is VERY short for most people (I'm 5'4") so if you are at all insecure about your waist it might not be a good choice. Also had to wear a camisole under it to make it work appropriate (no showing belly in the office ;))
Cropped by great flair in the arms. Nice thick material and super cute paired with a skirt or jeans. Loved!

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater- basic but looks expensive.
links_reviews_text: fit was perfect. I'm only 5' tall so it may be a touch short on a tall person. Sleeves had to be cuffed but it still looked nice.

links_reviews_title: The buttons made a statement. Lots of compliments. A drop short
links_reviews_text: A drop short and a little itchy but very cute
Just a black sweater with some nice gold buttons to give it something. Was a bit well loved.
Worn this sweater several times! It is perfect for winter and super cozy. But thick so just be aware
Loved everything about this sweater. Will rent again!
Classic winter sweater, TTS, nice gold detail at shoulder, soft- not itchy, very warm.

Deep expensive looking black color. Fabric is super luxe, soft and warm. Buttons and asymmetrical cut are so flattering. Obsessed with this sweater. I've already worn it with a plaid mini skirt and over the knee boots for Thanksgiving, with jeans and flats for a random weekend. Also planning to dress it up for the office (and okay maybe one more weekend look) before I send it back.

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering, thick sweater. Looks expensive. Received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for anything. Wore with jeans and booties for a Saturday out
Very true to size! Super cute!

Wish this piece stayed at my waist as shown on the model, but worked around it by clipping it tighter. The sash detail is purely decorative and fun to play with, placing it either up front or in the back
Love it so much!!! Tempted to buy
I would rent again. PROS -Kinda heavy, so good for the winter. -Love the color. You can pair with multiple types of denim. - Love the length. I love when sweaters cover the tummy area. CONS -None-
I love this designer. I want all the bags !
This is short, tight, t-shirt material. Maybe could be worn by a short person to a casual workplace.

links_reviews_title: Too short for me. Had to send back
links_reviews_text: I loved the material, but it was too short!
Runs really small and short.
Very flattering silhouette! Thick sweater like material. A tad on the short side but I still wore to work with black tights.
Seems like a good quality dress but ridiculously small and tight. Couldn't come close to zipping the size 0
I loved this but will size up next time. I have long arms and wasn't able to use the thumb holes and the blue part is kind of cropped around the waist. Turtle neck part is itchy
Very nice sweater with a slimming fit. It is quite itchy though so avoid if this something that would bother you. True to size. Not too heavy so could be worn on a warmer day.
Neck is pretty tight but overall love the fit. I'm very petite and the sweater fit well but was loose enough to sit at work all day and stay comfy. No brainer sweater for many different occasions!
This was fun and easy to go from desk to dinner. Super comfortable with the nice starched white shirt popping out. I would rent again. Not itchy and never needed lint roller.

The look is cute but make sure you don't order a size up otherwise you will be swimming in it. Also, if you have sensitive skin, the materials will make you itch like crazy. Order your normal size and be careful if you have sensitive skin.
Blocky fit. Did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Love it but way too small- couldn't wear.
links_reviews_text: I am normally a large and this large was really snug
Didn't wear. Not for women with hips, sides look weird. If you're not straight up and down, don't bother.

Really cute and nicely tailored. I thought I'd hate the high side slit on the sweater, but it gave it a nice look. Great work shirt! Unfortunately, too warm in California to rent this for long periods. This would've been a "buy"! Item for sure.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater for work and play
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. The neck was just a little tighter and a little scratchiest than I like. But not enough to knock it down a star.

links_reviews_title: Thick enough to take on the office cold air.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect and even has slits for your thumbs
Love this piece and considered adding it permanently to my wardrobe! It was a great winter staple.
I liked it but it was a bit itchy and the slit all the way up on the sides were a little high for my liking.
Nice length, covers butt. Fits well
Liked this a lot, more flattering than I expected it to be. White part got a little wrinkly but not bad at all wore it all day and then to class and then to dinner after.
Super flattering and comfortable, I loved this top! It's warm too, which is perfect for the winter months.

links_reviews_title: Extremely small. I'm usually a petite/xs and can't wear this.
links_reviews_text: Runs extremely small. Size up.

links_reviews_title: Nice change up to your typical turtleneck
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments on this one! Slimming, great color and quality. Great for going from work to date night.
Loved this! Fit true to size, sweater is thick. Really cute with flared jeans or straight. The white collar shirt will get wrinkled over time.
Wore with the sparkly navy leggings by Phat Buddha and it looked great.
Pros: Cute top for business casual office Cons: Itchy, runs small, neck is very tight against throat
I loved this top. Nice details and interesting pattern on the silk really elevate this blouse. Many compliments. This color was perfect for spring. Will definitely rent again.
Debated buying bc I received so many compliments! Runs a tad small but not uncomfortable

Sexy and sophisticated top! I wore it to work with slacks, and again for a date night with jeans and heels. Looked great both ways! Got a lot of compliments. Fit is true, if a little big. Looks good both tucked in, and out.
Great blouse - perfect with black and navy for work and transitions well to happy hour. Flattering fit and elegant, subtly textured fabric. Would rent again.
Wore this 2x while wfh due to Coronavirus. I love it and would rent again it was so cozy. I'm sad to give it back.
Super cute sweater! It was comfortable but not super soft. The polka dots are adorable, but the sparkly ones are kind of scratchy. But I'm a picky textile person. Lots of compliments though!
Love how some of the polka dots are in metallic thread ! Just don't try to wear it through TSA or you will get patted down! Ran large. Was comfortable, very warm, not itchy.
This was a little bit longer than I liked, but super casual and comfy! Thick and warm for sure!

links_reviews_title: Thick comfy sweater, great for winter!
links_reviews_text: This was too casual for work but I don't care. I got a lot of compliments and it kept me warm in the Arctic we call an office!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous sweater, amazing high quality feel
links_reviews_text: LOVED this sweater. Got it for a work conference. Size recommended was XL, which was definitely too big but I absolutely loved it, did a little French tuck and made it work for the day. Didn't want to take it off, it's so comfortable and a great quality piece.
Didn't end up wearing bc i didn't like how oversized it is. But love the mock turtleneck and polka dots.
So fun to wear and rent- but trendy enough that I was happy to have and send back. Super high quality!
Loved how soft and comfortable this sweater is. It's a little more grey than I thought but still love the color and the little bit of sparkle it is. Great for everyday!

links_reviews_title: Nice quality, a bit long and boxy
links_reviews_text: This feels and looks super expensive. It's very nice and so thick and warm. Some of the polka dots also have sparkle, which was unexpected. On me it was a little long and swallowed me up a bit though. Might work better on a tall person.

links_reviews_title: I Adore this and wish I could afford to buy it. So cute!!!

links_reviews_text: A really cute and easy sweater for everyday or work. The color is neutral and dots added some fun

links_reviews_title: Fun dots, high quality, too big
links_reviews_text: Cute and fun with the polka dots but the sleeves were too long for me and to much fabric in the back

LOVE this sweater! I wanted it to have a baggy fit so the XL for me was perfect (i like the sleeves to be long). Super high quality, thick material but not scratchy. Fun design, very flattering! I wore this to work but would also wear it around the house or out and about. Will rent again.
High quality as can be expected from tory burch. Not the most flattering cut, and just kinda boring.
Such a soft sweater! Definitely runs large, I'm normally an XS but will get a S for an oversized look, this was very oversized! Very cute though

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater. Very warm and a true classic!
links_reviews_text: sweater runs true to size

links_reviews_title: Cute and cozy - not terribly flattering though!
links_reviews_text: I feel like this sweater would have looked better on me if I was a bit more flat-chested. Either way, I still loved it. The texture of the polka dots is super interesting, and it worked perfectly for a casual work day!

links_reviews_title: Love wish I could keep it!
links_reviews_text: Hated having to give this back, so comfy and cozy, and warm. Definitely will be re-renting.

I'm so happy RTR started carrying Anine Bing!! I love everything she makes and couldn't wait to wear this T-shirt out. It's soft and very cool, rocker-chic kinda look. It it a tad too long on me, specially since I like to French tuck my shirts when wearing high waisted jeans... buts it's a minor con. I'm buying this one. It also came new with tags! Yay!

I liked this tee. Definitely overpriced regularly so glad it's on RTR! Unfortunately I got this during the CoronaVirus shelter in place so I just wore with leggings but would love to rent again to wear to work with light wash jeans

This is a gorgeous print, the silk feels luxurious, and the wrap style is cute. However the length is on the shorter side for me so it didn't feel flattering. Perhaps I should have sized up as when I walked it did move up.
The style and fit are nice, A bit gaping on top, overall it's fun print. I'm not really a YELLOW person so this was not my favorite on me.
Not the most flattering but a fun print.
Loved the colors! Such a pretty top that I paired with black faux leather leggings.
Runs big

links_reviews_title: Really flattering! Got tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: I rented this on a whim because the pattern is nothing I'd normally wear. I'm in love with it. The wrap shirt fit well and accentuated my curves. I had to wear a black tank under it because it was very low cut for my large bust but the black broke up the pattern nicely. I can't emphasize enough how amazing this shirt is. I was very tempted to buy!
The T-shirt is so soft and comfy. The colors are vibrant and fun!

Loved this T-shirt! So comfy and cool. Definitely a loose fit, got a M and it was a great slightly oversized look. Can be dressed up with some cute jeans or worn around the house with sweats. Something I noticed was that the color of the shirt was more of a cream color than a true white. Would definitely rent this again.

Pros: Colorful, super soft Cons: runs large. I sized up to wear with leggings but would have been better off staying with my normal size and still wearing them with leggings Takeaway: comfort and brightness in the midst of social distancing!
The shirt ran a little large but super fun & so soft!
It's an oversized tshirt. Great quality and really cute. Runs pretty large and I liked it.
I though this shirt would be womens sizing but it wasn't. It ran big. Would've rented 2 sizes down.
Loose fit, long enough to wear with leggings but not too long to tuck front. That soft lived in feel.
Such an easy wear! Perfect with jeans but could be dressed up too.

links_reviews_title: Fun prints and nice cut for a casual blouse
links_reviews_text: I rented this top for WFH (video meetings during corona isolation). I will rent again! I wore with jeans, but would be great with navy slacks or a pencil skirt as well. I'd buy if not so$$$
Such a well-made, tailored blouse with exceptional print and detail â€“ â€“ rent it, you're going to love it.

links_reviews_title: Lovely print for early spring - thin material.
links_reviews_text: Love the zebra print detailing. Very cute top!
It was a little tight in the shoulders, but that's not unusual for me. Loved the print and the cut of the sleeves.
The perfect trendy top. So fun and easy to wear!

links_reviews_title: Could be great for someone else
links_reviews_text: Piping made my shoulders look broader than I'd prefer. Otherwise a very pretty blouse.

links_reviews_title: This top has such amazing detail, and is great for work or going out.
links_reviews_text: I love the cowboy chic detail of this shirt. I love the animal print piping and the ruching on the sleeves.
Great for work and date night! I am 27 weeks pregnant and just ordered 1 size up, and it flows / fits perfectly!

links_reviews_title: It was an everyday rental, not for an event.
links_reviews_text: I think this runs very large and is. more of a babydoll style. Didn't like it.
Fun for a day party. A little boxy which can be unflattering, suggest adding a jacket for wedge

I rented this dress for a casual daytime birthday celebration at a brewery. Was disappointed that even with the smaller size, it seemed large and very unflattering - not great when I'm finally feeling like myself 9 months postpartum. Specifically made my shoulders seem wider, obviously no waist definition, and just seemed boxy.

I loved the comfort and simplicity of the dress which was super easy to get dressed and move comfortably after knee surgery. The dress was a little big for my petite 5'2" frame. I also felt the style made me look much older for some reason. This dress could be versatile for day to night--with a fitted blazer for a conservative work dress and add heels and remove blazer for an evening look.
I have a long torso, so the waist didn't hit right on me, and made me look sorry and frumpy. Pretty pattern and well made.
Great. Relaxed and sexy at the same time.
Generally I'm a S but I sized up to a M because I have a large bust. Sleeves were too long for my petite frame but otherwise a cute sweater for casual Friday!
The shirt was a little stiff and short.
Odd fit. The sweater was very short and hit me at a weird spot. It felt tight on my arms and chest and just sort of hangs heavily.
I was so disappointed in this outfit... it was frumpy and too baggy. I don't think getting a smaller size would help.

links_reviews_title: A little too cropped for me, but SO COMFY!
links_reviews_text: Love this sweater! Great for a cooler fall day at the office. I have a little bit longer torso for my height and am 16 weeks pregnant and still wearing my pre-maternity pants, so was hoping it would be a bit longer. Wore a black tank underneath to make sure I wouldn't have any skin showing throughout the day. Definitely recommend this, especially with a high waisted bottom.

links_reviews_title: Cute and nice thick material - looks expensive in person
links_reviews_text: I ordered this for work and just causal wear. The material is beautiful and thick, but the shoulders are very poofy.. I had to keep my sleeves pulled down in order to avoid so much poof but I still got a comment on them. Being so short (5'0"), poofy shoulders are too much for my frame.
It wasn't apparent to me from the pictures but this sweater is quite short and I was also surprised by how tight the arms were. Ended up not wearing it

I rented this in an XS. It was short...not quite cropped but close (mind you I am 5'1"). Also the sleeves were incredibly tight...and I have scrawny arms. That being said, this sweater is adorable, but I would plan on sizing up particularly if you planned on wearing something underneath it.

Beautiful knit and fit well overall. The arms were pretty tight and there is very little give to this fabric. It also was a bit short, although I have a longer torso. I'm hoping once the skirt comes, it will make up for the short length of the top.
Rented to wear with matching skirt. Too bulky, did not wear. Agree it might look better with black jeans.

I wasn't able to wear this item because when I put it on the sleeves were too tight and I could tell the fabric wouldn't be comfortable for a full workday. The pattern is cute and I liked the colors, but it wasn't wearable for me (and I don't think a bigger size would have helped the comfort issue).
Everyday chic
Really great quality, fit, and color with settle polka dots. I received so many compliments on this sweater. Would rent again!

I wore this with the skirt for a formal business meeting. Very warm and not itchy at all. But the medium ran large even with a full bust. I'd like to try one size down next time because the 2 pieces together looked nice.

links_reviews_title: Very cute especially with the matching skirt
links_reviews_text: I really liked this top paired with the matching skirt. I think a S would have fit better but the M wasn't too bad. It's boxy so for my body it's more tricky to pull that off. I'm not sure I'd like the top without the skirt.
This top is a great weight but looks very boxy on.
This is really cute! The top is short on its own. Rent with the skirt and you will look fab.

links_reviews_title: Too big and too small at the same time
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to like this, but it was too short/cropped but also too wide, I just felt like it made me look very short waisted and wide

links_reviews_title: This runs large, nice quality but beware. Didn't wear.
links_reviews_text: The matching skirt runs small but the sweater seems to run large.
Loved everything about the top but it was too big. Would have been perfect with the skirt which fit well.

Beautiful - but I'm usually a small and sized up to a medium at reviewers' recommendations. I didn't end up wearing it because in the medium size it just seemed boxy. Pretty - might have worn for something different. But just didn't work out this time

Wore this with the matching skirt and loved it. Fabric is thick and forgiving without being too hot for the office. I wish the L had been available because the XL was a little boxy/ bulky to pair with the skirt, though I think it would've fit well if I was wearing it with skinny jeans or leggings.
I liked this sweater much better with black jeans than with the matching skirt. Solid, if somewhat unexciting, rental.

links_reviews_title: This is a boxier and shorter than it looks on the photo, looks more like what the model is wearing
links_reviews_text: Nice material thick and high quality, pattern is great. It's just boxier and shorter than I expected
Nice thick sweater, perfect for cold days. The wrists on the sleeves were a little tight, so I wore it cuffed up.
It fit a little big but I did not mind. Sad I didn't get a picture!

Beautiful heavy knit, interesting detail that doesn't scream look at me. Looks expensive. Subtle and sophisticated. I rented the matching skirt too and there are countless ways I will wear this top and skirt... together and separately. Hope to buy them both at some point. Great closet workhorses. Thank you for having nice looking long sleeved dressy options, RTR.
Fits TTS and as shown on model. The fabric is good quality, and the subtle polka dots mix it up without being too much. Slightly cropped (top of hip bone), so high waist pants work best.
Nice top. I typically don't do animal print but this piece was cool. The cut made it a little more funky but you could totally wear this to an office setting as well.

Of course everyone said this is oversized, but it didn't fit my D cup. I could barely get it zipped. I'm happy I had it at the same time as the matching bottoms, the set is chic! But I think it would look nice with black trousers or a skirt as well
I got this with the pants but it looked like pajamas, so I'm doing them separately! Thought this was a winner. Totally a "I might be interviewing on my lunch break" look.
Rented this on a limb and enjoyed it. Paired with black skinny jeans and ankle boots. Cute!
I rented this leopard version as well as the floral one and they're both great with a black blazer for work.

I'm all about leopard print so I rented this as soon as it was listed. It's much more yellow/orange than I expected so the color wasn't great for me. But more importantly, it just hangs on the body so it was not flattering at all. I could tell it would have looked way cuter with a belt at the waist but I don't own one so I returned it without wearing it.
Didn't wear it.
Beautiful fit, fun fresh design. Dress is long and a bit heavy so if it is an usually hot day may be too much to wear.
