links_reviews_title: Loved it so much, I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Such a flattering and fashionable sweater! I love the high neck collar and the cut of the sleeves. The yarn is a beautiful tan color and the cross draping is just perfect. The sweater's length is a little long, but I found the cut perfect for wearing with skinny dress pants and jeans. Can't recommend this sweater enough!
Didn't flatter at all, bulky material and the wrap part just didn't work together for me.
Absolutely loved this top. It paired well with leggings and jeans. I run warm so having a sleeveless turtleneck in the winter works great for me. I wore this all week!
I wore a tight fitting long sleeve black shirt under it and it was great for work
You definitely need to have a cami on under so the flap in the front doesn't open! Cute otherwise
Fine

links_reviews_title: Such a cute top, just didn't love it on me!
links_reviews_text: Love the concept of this sweater but it's very boxy and a bit bulky.

This is a lovely sweater, great cut, color, and quality. But for my frame and size, it made me look chubbier than I am. It wasn't flattering. I wore it once on the weekend to run errands but not to work or out in the evening.
Wore this for work then to a dinner. Neutral color but the cut is unique so it stands out.
Perfect fit. Looks great with jeans or can be dressed up with black pants for a night out.
Nice fit--slightly large but it must be to ensure closure with movement. Very versatile piece & fabric feels soft to touch--looks higher quality given price.
Cute sweater with a great cut to it. Perfect for cool weather with a unique flair.
Cute! Glad I saw other reviews and ordered an XS which fit perfectly.
This sweater seemed longer in the model. I loved the fit and it was very comfortable but I wish it would have been longer.

I loved this sweater. The tutleneck kept me warm without being too hot because of the sleeveless nature. Front lap over feature is fun. I wore this once under a jacket and it was great because I didn't have "sausage arms".
Beautiful winter top
Very versatile, I wore it by itself and then again with a long sleeved black shirt underneath. Great if someone is breastfeeding because it has a slit!
Flattering fit and better style than an average sweater. I wore with skinny jeans and boots. Would rent again.
Was very comfortable. Loved the heavier sweater material. Good quality.

links_reviews_title: Fun for a dress (for me) day
links_reviews_text: I wore this with jeans and a pink moto jacket for shopping and lunch with a friend and felt very trendy! Wearing again for Thanksgiving.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous. I got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit nicely. I wore a shirt under it at one point and that worked too.

links_reviews_title: Great for colder weather at the office ...
links_reviews_text: ... where temperature control is always terrible. I wore a thin black long sleeved shirt underneath on a particularly chilly day and it was perfect. I dig the sculptural knits, too.
I really liked this sweater and got many compliments wearing it. The cross lap style is super cute!
Great material quality and length. Wore this several different ways. With boots and a turtle neck and a leather jacket and also with a button down and heels. Very versatile. Loved this skirt!!
Fun but not too much!

This skirt is HEAVY! Definitely a winter wear-only piece. Beautifully tailored, as expected. The waistband was a smidge tight but I got used to it quickly. I paired it with a Theory polka dot sweater and felt cute for work!

links_reviews_title: This is a skirt for ants
links_reviews_text: This skirt is cuuuuute. But the waistband is so ridiculously tight that I knew I wouldn't make it through lunch, let alone a full day. Had to send back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals ever
links_reviews_text: Such a statement piece, would work equally well for work or a dinner out. Got tons of compliments and the quality is great-- I felt so good in it all day!
This skirt was cute but really digs in at the waistband. The rest of it fit correctly so I was surprised.

I rented this skirt for work, and found it so beautiful and easy to dress up! The fabric is thick and really comfy in winter. However, the waist elastic band is a bit small - I'm a size 2, and the SR felt very tight.
Very small in the waist. Agree it was prickly on the legs too.
Very tight waist, thick fabric

Ugh - I should have listened to the reviews that said to size up. But I know I'm not alone in thinking, "these other girls aren't me. They don't know my body. I'm going to get my usual size because I definitely don't need to size up." Well shocker, I needed to size up. *face palm* SO, I will now be returning this size 4 and getting a 6 and will from now on listen to the reviews. Hopefully someone will read this and do themselves a favor and size up the first time

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a work event at an art exhibit. It was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Fit a little snug at waist.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful material and great length. Good for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric and warm.
Great - easy to wear. Be aware the inside of the skirt is a tiny picky on your legs.
Amazing skirt. Wore to work lunch and fit perfectly!
I'm going to rent it again in M. It was so thick and chic but just really right on the waist band.
Not wearable for me. I am usually a medium. The xs-s was way to big. Cut was weird too

links_reviews_title: Not flattering at all and see through
links_reviews_text: This dress was sent to me as a replacement, due to the dress I ordered was not available to ship. This was chosen by RTR stylist without consulting me. I was not pleased with choice. Color did not look good on me the fit was odd, had no shape and it was see through. I highly would not recommend this dress to anyone.

This dress is very true to the pictures, well made, and could have been super cute, however it was too large for me so wear. I typically wear a size 4 dress, 32C/D bra, size 27 jeans. The recommended size for me was a 1, but the 1 hung away from my ribs in the front and back, more like a trapeze dress instead of being fitted at the chest. The back half of the chest area of the dress is all elasticized, so no need to fear sizing down!

Loved everything about this. Great feminine shape and loved the color scheme with the black, which I feel like makes it more multi-season. Wore it with black booties since its still only 50 degrees here. It's very light and airy, so could easily wear in the spring/summer too.
This dress is completely sheer. You must wear something under it.

links_reviews_title: Excellent fit, not as sheer as feared
links_reviews_text: Love the print, and it is a very flattering fit. When I opened the garment bag, I was afraid it was going to be too sheer to wear, but with a black camisole and some black shorts underneath it was fine -- it's not close fitting enough to be a problem. Lovely dress.
the edgiest mom jeans on the block. wide legs with funky asymmetrical fading. waist runs small so size up.
Other reviews said these run small but they were loose on me at the waist, otherwise cute and comfortable. I would have wanted a 24 or even 23.

These are made of very stiff denim. The kind that requires time to stretch to form to your body. Definitely didn't want to take the time to make that happen so sent back right away. I think I was also one of the first people to rent this item because they came with the tag still on. Might fit better once a few more people wear them.
These pants have no give at all. Super stiff and uncomfortable.

I'm loving these. Agree they're a little right in the waist, but I wouldn't size up because they fit great on my butt and the waist stretched throughout the day. My only issue is that for a 5'4 girl they're a little long in the winter- as in they came almost to the top of my sneakers. I had to wear them with boots that elongated my legs. In the summer they'd be fine with sandals or flats. But if I owned them I'd prob want them to be a little more cropped

These came new with the tag which was awesome. I'm usually a 26 in Mother jeans and these were hard to get on. Not sure if they're really stiff because they're brand new but definitely not as comfortable as other Mother jeans. Size up
I usually wear a 29 in another and these wouldn't even come close to buttoning. Disappointing

I can't decide if this runs big or if the cut is just unflattering. It could be great if they cinched in the waist but instead it is boxy in an unflattering way. It's too bad because the color is beautiful!
Theses photos don't do it justice. This design was smart. I liked the drapes back and cut outs. SUPER easy to button yourself, which is a plus with these things. True to size. RENT THIS!

links_reviews_title: Not great for petite, curvy ladies.
links_reviews_text: Really nice jumpsuit. I am 5'4 and an hourglass - it did not flatter me very much. It arrived in great condition and is TTS.

This jumpsuit fit quite strangely, leaving a big gap behind my back (which made my back cold). The shoulders kept slipping off. The crotch had too much material. It was odd - but very comfortable! And I appreciated that I was fully dressed with just 1 item.
I wish I wasn't working from home and quarantined so I could show this off. Absolutely love the style, fit and quality. A must re-rent once the weather is nice and I get to go on a date night. :)
Comfortable, spring top to cheer up your day

links_reviews_title: Ehhhh - cute concept not so great fit
links_reviews_text: Although I received this brand new with tags on which I always laugh Unfortunately I did not wear thisâ€¦ I tried it on it gapped a little bit around the armpits and neck and it wasn't all that figure flatteringâ€¦ Wanted to wear it while I was working from home just didn't fit the bill Sweater material makes it kinda odd as a tank.
A little itchy. Cute, and oversized. Cozy

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater! I maintained social distance while looking put together!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, warm and comfy
Fit was great and I thought it was pretty flattering for a loose sweater. Felt a little itchy with nothing under so I wore a long sleeve underneath.
Ran a bit big but still very cute.
Loved this sweater ... arms are a little longer which was wonderful. It's chunky but not too chunky, the color is warm and so is the thread (as in the actual warmth of the seater). Loved it!

Absolutely love this sweater. It was absolutely gorgeous with little flecks of black in it. Very soft. Excellent shape to the sweater. Very flattering. Love the little "T" embroidered on it. I would have bought the sweater except even with the discount it was too expensive. Absolutely beautiful.
Loved this sweater! Cute cropped length with nice long sleeves and a heavy knit that doesn't add bulk! I wore this to the pub for a friend's campaign party and got lots of compliments on the sweater!
Good everyday sweater. Sleeves typical length, slightly loose fit. Fabric not particularly soft, but not scratchy either.

links_reviews_title: Engagement Party Bonfire, No Jacket Needed!
links_reviews_text: Loved, loved, loved this sweater! It was the perfect color and so warm for great for going with out a jacket! However it was a little short, still great and fit well everywhere else!
I wish I could own it! The beautiful oatmeal color goes with everything. It may runs a little large but I liked the oversized look.
Loved this soft, warm, thick turtleneck. If not for the ridiculous "T" on the front I would have purchased for sure.
It's a beautiful, comfy, cozy winter piece.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater. Sad to send it back!
links_reviews_text: Super cute fall or spring sweater. Beautiful yard and flattering cut.

This sweater has the heft and warmth of wool without being too scratchy. The yarn is really pretty with speckles to give the sweater depth. I would have bought this if it weren't for the giant 'T' logo embroidered on it. It's too spendy to be a walking billboard for them.

links_reviews_title: I received a complement everyone I wore this. An excellent cold weather piece.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Comfortable work piece. I wore it with black pants and it was a very pleasant look. Cons: The 'T' knitted into the front annoyed me.
Such a cute sweater but it gets incredibly hot! I'd only rent again if it was very very cold out.
Super warm and comfortable! I didn't need to wear a coat. Would rent again!
Fits well, looks good with a blazer. Can dress up or down easily.
High quality sweater that's very flattering

This was an adorable turtleneck, warm, comfy, and true to size. I only had a problem with the neck because it rose up high, was kind of stiff, and curled over at the top which made me look Elizabethan lol. Would rent again tho
Warm, cozy, fits well... i loved it! Just a little too pricey to purchase.
Runs small through body, extra long sleeves. Not proportioned to my body.
I loved this cozy sweater but it is ultimately too warm for indoor wear.
Great fit, cozy sweater, and really cute. I got it with the tags on, so that's always fun!

links_reviews_title: Great sweater that can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this sweater. It looks great with high waisted jeans. It's pretty thick/heavy but not itchy or uncomfortable
Didn't wear this due to it being 100% wool. Almost any amount of wool in a shirt will be incredibly uncomfortable for me. I did like the style and it feels like a good quality.

I wish I could live in this sweater! It was a heavy wool but not scratchy at all and was breathable so I never felt overheated or stuffy. The "T" logo was a great detail to elevate the look. Will definitely get this one again!

The dress seemed to fit properly....but the zipper lining on the side jutted out in a really awkward way, and would not lie flat. The picture doesn't really do it justice- it was super distracting. Not sure if it was my height or this specific dress, but I couldn't get past the weird bulge to wear it. Loved the color and the fit though!!
Love this dress! I am 5/2 and it made me look taller than I am. Got so many compliments. Would rent again!
I liked the dress. It had two different fabrics and textures from top to skirt part. Nice fit. I liked the slit. Perfect for work. Quality fabric.

Dress must run a little big, I'm usually a 4 but the 2 fit nicely. It's a nice dress, could probably use some better accessorizing to jazz it up. I didn't love the fabric of the skirt, it reminded me of curtains. Just ok

TTS and the top of the dress is a stretchy knit that easily accommodates a larger bust. The bottom is a silky, slightly textured fabric with no stretch - which unfortunately showcased the fat deposits at the tops of my thighs. The issue for me at 5'3" was the proportions. On me the upper seam hit at my natural waist but it looks much better as an empire waist. This dress would be much better suited to someone over 5'5".
This dress was very comfortable, it was flexible and warm. Looks like two pieces. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress, so flattering and feminine
links_reviews_text: LOVE this dress! The slit on the side comes just above the knee. Fitted at the waist, the sweater top fits absolutely perfect. Second time I've rented this dress. Highly recommend! Perfect for desk-to-dinner.
This is a cute transition piece. The hips fit a bit strange but great on my curvy figure. Very stylish without being over the top.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for dinner, zip is uncomfortable
links_reviews_text: Got this dress to go out to dinner. Paired it with tan knee high boots and pearl/gold jewellery. Loves the look and fit. It was more fitted and the top and then slightly looser in the skirt due to the different fabrics which was flattering over my stomach. Did find the zip uncomfortable as it dug into my armpit. Other than the zip I would wear it again.

Highly recommend you rent this dress -- I am 5'4 and the 0R fit perfectly. It is very well made with a modern design (looks like a skirt and top). Two things to note: it is not forgiving in the underarm sweat department lol & it can be unflattering if you're tummy conscious
Great dress even for pear-shaped, No need to size up

This dress ran a tad small in the hips, but fit me well overall. You may want a slip with this one as the skirt is not lined and the zipper pokes a bit. The different fabric/textures and color made for a really nice dress. I would definitely rent it again.

This dress was fantastic. I am a 0/2 and find TB runs a little small so went with the 1R. I am petite so this is maxi on me but sooooo flattering - makes you look long and lean. Loved the contrasting top and bottom which makes it look sort of like a two piece. Sleeves were long but the knit fabric is fine to fold over. A great, different take on the maxi trend - loved the color, the fabrics, and got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress couldn't be more perfect for me ðŸ˜
links_reviews_text: Fits like a dream everywhere. I am wearing it with tall camel colored boots similar to the model's photo and it feels super chic. I also paired it with a black down bomber jacket and it quickly became youthful, baddie chic.
Fit was spot on!
Everything i thought it would be, so cute and springy
This dress is so cute - wore them with a sandal heel to dress it up a bit but could have dressed down with sandals. Pattern is fun and summery. Fits TTS
Great for my vacation in Costa Rica. Sexy, but not too revealing and comfortable fabric.

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing in every way but it runs REALLY big
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress so much, but the XS was more like S/M. It hung on my body- but wish it fit! It would be a great dress from day to night!!
If this wasn't so expensive I'd have bought this. It is so high quality, and so perfect for so many types of occasions. True to size, and very comfortable.
Gorgeous top. Wore to work and then to an evening event. Didn't have to change. Will rent again and am contemplating just purchasing. Haven't seen anything else like it on this site yet.
Gorgeous and fit perfectly. The neck was scratchy because of the metallic stitching but got used to it and didn't notice after awhile
Loved this top so much! Wore for a work event with black pants then later went out for a date and paired with jeans. Both look super classy and put together. The details on this top are superb.

This was a great shirt. The material was great it was versatile.. dress up dress down. Look great. Lots of compliments!! Only downside. The elastic around the neck was a tiny bit itchy. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Nice shirt that would be good for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: Neck was definitely itchy. It was a little billowy and I would have sized down had a smaller size been available
High quality shirt! Very good fit.
Very comfortable, fit true to size, and tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This was a great shirt!! Super comfortable too.
links_reviews_text: It was great!
Wore this to dinner and a show, fits a bit large, in usually a 10 but could have gotten away with the 8. Material felt great, loved the top overall.

links_reviews_title: Cozy and comfy and perfect the dye
links_reviews_text: I sized up and got an xl (that's all that was available) and honestly loved this as an oversized sweatshirt. So comfy and cute. Def going to rent again
Comfy, cute and casual work from home sweater. Paired with my favorite agolde jeans. Perfect for comfortable at home or a day on the town
Perfect fit, easy crop length. Fabric is not too warm which I liked. Wore this several times. Would rent again in the summer to wear with shorts at night.

Rented this sweater for a ski weekend in park city! Loved it so much - perfect for skiing, lounging and traveling. The only thing is it slightly cropped and definitely runs small. I am usually a small/medium in sweaters but am super glad I got the medium. Overall super fun rental!
Cute would rent again

Perfect cropped sweatshirt! Super comfortable and stylish. I paired with relaxed denim and white booties and got tons of compliments on when I wore it to work. Would rent again... thinking about purchasing!
The colors were the best part of this sweatshirt. Fit true to size and was super comfortable.
Love everything about this sweatshirt! Wore it to work, around the city, to lounge & got lots of compliments. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Casual and comfy but not boring
links_reviews_text: Perfect with jeans and sneakers! God for walking around on a chilly day. The balloon sleeves and tie dye keep it interesting.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, trendy sweatshirt! Wore multiple times and loved!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'10 and usually wear a S/M in tops and the M fit great!! It was the perfect amount of room with out being too baggy. It was so soft and comfortable and the colors were bright and eye catching. I wore this two days in a row before returning it! Loved it!

This is definitely a cropped sweatshirt but that being said I wore the small and it hit right at most of my high waisted pants so it's not OVERLY cropped. Definitely boxy so if you are ok w cropped length I would recommend your size if not a size down - size up would be been too boxy for me! I wore this constantly - it was pretty warm and cozy! Definitely a soft material but not fuzzy or anything like that.
Very comfy and easy to style

Tie dye is definitively the new spring trend. This is really cute -but didn't wow me. Material is eh. My boyfriend asked me if I made it...I thought it ran small. I am usually a XS/S and would have gotten a S Instead.
Wore this almost every day at some point during the week I rented this. Loved the print and cut of the sweatshirt.
SOOOOO SOFT and the perfect combination of loose/comfortable but still makes you look trendy. Mine also came new with tags!
super cute with dark denim

links_reviews_title: Light as a feather top, but a skirt as heavy as a ballgown
links_reviews_text: I can't wait to rent again and wear this in the summer, but this dress is such an oxymoron . The top is so thin and scant it's like you're barely wearing anything - which I guess is all the fun of it. However , you're practically being pulled out of the top by the weight of the skirt which you'll notice the moment you pull it from your rental bag. The flimsy straps and waist tie do very little to bind the dress , there's a constant feeling that you're about to fall out

I rented this thinking it would be a super cute summer dress, perfect for daytime dates. There is so much fabric around the bottom that in order to pull it tight, you have to fasten the front ties a ton. Unfortunately by tightening the front ties, you shrink the bottom of the "triangle" that in theory is supposed to cover your boobs. You can also pull the back tighter and shorten the straps, but this dress is so massive that even full tightened it barely covers anything. Super disappointing if you're trying to wear this anywhere except your bedroom.
Joes jeans consistently perfect.
Wore this to a shower and received so many compliments! The cut is flattering and the material is comfortable and flowy. Styled with a belt and gold jewelry.

the fabric is gorgeous!!! i really loved this buuuut it's a bit short. i think it would be super cute in spring/summer once it gets warm but wear bike shorts. the fabric is definitely light enough to blow up in the wind!

links_reviews_title: Lots of fabric so size down of it kind of baloons on you.
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments even though I felt it bulked me up a bit. I paired with rtr Tory Burch earrings that were legit made for this dress.
Loved this dress but the arm holes ran a bit small.

links_reviews_title: super fun and comfy, so soft!
links_reviews_text: not usually a silk person but this was so lightweight and lovely, neckline a little revealing but otherwise so fun

Loved this dress but definitely runs big so you could probably size down. The material is so soft and slippery, didn't have any issues with wrinkling either. The neckline dips a bit low, so depending on the office it could be a little revealing for work! Overall absolutely loved it and would definitely rent again.
Beautiful silky fabric and sleeve detail. Looks much better in person than in pictures. However, there's a lot of fabric and pleating in the skirt, do consider sizing down for a more fitted look.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Ended up wearing it twice!
links_reviews_text: Dress was beautiful! Definitely runs a little big but the belt helps cinch it in. I ended up wearing it twice on vacation.The material is gorgeous, but does wrinkle easily. Got a bunch of compliments! Would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not my style
links_reviews_text: First, I got a TON of compliments from people wearing this. Even so, I'm not sure I would rent it again. It's just a little more boho than I'm used to or really like -- but that's part of the purpose of RTR! Try new things! The material is super silky, the colors are vibrant, and it is extremely comfortable. It's a great fall option. If this is more your style, I would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, perfectly flattering dress to lift quarantine spirits. It's silky, flowing, and versatile.
links_reviews_text: This is a perfect dress to wear while quarantined. It's breezy for the little fresh air I get when walking my dog. It's comfy to wfh, and lifts my mood to keep me motivated to work.
Nicely cinches waist and and colors are beautifully rich. I wore the six, but could have easily worn the 4 (waist size 27")
Loved way more than I thought I would. Adorable, springy, lightweight gorgeous. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved this way more than I thought I would
links_reviews_text: I kind of put this in my order as a last minute throw in, but then loved it so much, I'd have bought it if it was cheaper. I wore it once to work with loafers, a silk tank and black pants, and then once on the weekend with distressed jeans and a T-shirt. The color is such a good delicate yellow, the buttons add a fun touch, it's super soft and comfy and the cut is great (I did have to cuff the sleeves - so I'd say they're a little long.) I definitely recommend this.
I Wear A Medium But There Was Only A XL Left So I Got It And Pushed Up The Sleeves And Made It Work. May Be Small For The Average XL Person Because It Fit Me Only Slightly Big.
Perfect jacket! I wore it to go out but it'd be great for any semi-formal events with a blouse under The color makes your skin look tan. Would definitely rent it again (or buy!)

links_reviews_title: Power blazer in a beautiful color
links_reviews_text: I loved, loved, loved this blazer! It fit beautifully and the color was amazing. It's that perfect bright spring yellow. I wore it to work with jeans and a white blouse and then was able to wear it again for a weekend brunch with a tank top and black shorts and heels.
Wore this for a big presentation. Super fun and summery. Only complaint is that the armholes are too high. Wouldn't rent again for that reason
Loved this blazer so much. The color is everything. I felt like a rockstar. Got so many compliments. Will definitely rent again!

I wore this top as my second outfit for my bachelorette party. (Hey with RTR you can be as extra as you want!) I love Tibi, the structure, lines and cuts of their pieces. This top is no exception. It's so well made, the fabric is stretchy and the balloon sleeves I found can be styled in many different ways. I even think this top could work as a light layer of used open. It closes with a zipper, so you get to choose how much cleavage you want to show. Overall a winner!

i first rented this top and didn't know what to pair it with until i saw the tibi skirt. loved wearing this so much. two small cons, i wish i ordered a two instead of a four because of the waist, the sleeves on these are oversized so going down would be easy, i just wanted it more fitted on the waist as well, and also the sleeves aren't tight they sort of just hang, i've been noticing that with tibi pieces but it totally didn't matter, compliments all day

This blouse has been one of the best rentals of my subscription. The quality is flawless, the style fantastic, the details beautiful, and the fit superb. I am petite and wide at the hips but slim in the waist and it was very flattering. Those with a tummy, large chest or who are very long waisted may feel differently. The material is a bit more substantial the the classic white button down and the blouse zips up which was unexpected but so cute. I would definitely buy it. Many thumbs up!
I loved everything about this blouse-I felt it was a blouse /jacket combination

links_reviews_title: Really clean lines and unique details, very flattering piece.
links_reviews_text: The top hit right at the base of low cut jeans which was flattering, it didn't show any skin. You can wear it zipped all the way up for a more formal look or unzipped slightly to show some skin.
Cannot say enough good things about this jacket! Absolutely loved wearing it. It has a very slimming effect with the darting. Fabulous!!
I returned without wearing. It was a strange fit. The sleeves were very puffy and the bodice fit snug. Not flattering on my bodytype.

Not my favorite sweater. The color was nice but the holes where the cable crosses were too large for my liking - left a penny sized hole. The sweater also had super pronounced hanger bumps making it unwearable. I wish sweaters didn't come on a hanger to help prevent this!!

links_reviews_title: Compliments- wore to work and on the weekend
links_reviews_text: Cozy, well made, beautiful color, extra length to cover butt in back. Live this sweater.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully crafted sweater for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, the fit, and the length in the back over the rear. I wore this several times to casual events, over blouses and turtlenecks or alone. It is versatile and warm while still being stylish,

I like the cut of the sweater with the longer hem in the back. It was pretty scratchy so I had to wear a long sleeve top underneath it. It also had stretched out where the hanger ends hit. It eventually relaxed during the day. But I wasn't crazy about it when I first put it on.
It was a little big and stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Bulky but could show some belly
links_reviews_text: Nice design, although the knitting on the front can look bulky on your chest and overall. No shaping on the front panel, so not figure-flattering. However, it is a neat but interesting casual look. Definitely wear something underneath, as the braiding causes gaps.
Love!! Super cozy. The high low adds interest. Super warm for New England winter.
Fit nicely but had to wear something underneath because of larger cable openings.

links_reviews_title: Cute but size up if large chested.
links_reviews_text: This would normally fit PERFECTLY but having a bit of extra chest means the knit pulled too tight, so there were holes. Otherwise, fit beautifully all over. The material is not super soft but not overly scratchy.... also, the shoulders were puckered from being on a hanger, which seems like it would be a problem for ANY sweater.

I really liked the color and the yarn - it was very soft and definitely warm. I also like that the back is a bit longer and the front isn't too cropped. It was a little bulky but overall versatile and cute. Thinking about renting the gray one next...
Brb knitting a version of this sweater so I can wear it forever
The sweater was super cozy and the color was gorgeous

Very adorable sweater, the color and cut was great. I liked the complexity of the pattern but unfortunately the gaps have gotten big around the main swirls, making it look like there are holes in the sweater.

I didn't care for this. The front was super short and then the back was really long. In addition, the sweater looks stretched out, but only in two spots where my skin was showing. It had also stretched out in the shoulders - so much so that it looked like I was wearing shoulder pads. Color is nice for winter/fall though.
Sweater is ruined by being on hanger too long, love the color and how long the sleeves are. Too bad it hung too long and grew shoulder horns

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy - and a perfect fit!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top! Soft and flattering - medium was a TRUE medium and fit perfectly! I absolutely loved it! Great sweater for a casual day at the office.
Front is a little shorter than I liked but otherwise great sweater

This dress is comfortable and versatile if a bit more informal than I has expected (it's basically scuba fabric). I wore it as a dress and again as a tunic over a long-sleeves turtleneck t and skinny jeans. The 8 was a bit loose on me, but then I'm usually a size 6, sometimes 8, so that makes sense. The 6 would def have been tighter than I like.

links_reviews_title: Feel so confident wearing to work with a nice pair of black heels.
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit. I feel so good.

Really great dress and loved the fit. Hips flared out enough to accommodate my body shape really well. I usually have a hard time with fitted dresses that I can't tailor (top is too loose of stomach/hips fit). This was perfect!! Note it's a bit short - wouldn't wear to work. Fun enough for a date with the zipper details.
Flattering. Felt it was a little small at the bust but other than that fit well. Loved the material
This is a nice work dress and could transition to happy hour. Fabric is thick and nice. Love the zipper details.
Definitely needed some spanx because the material is clingy, but it's very cute, perfect length (I'm 5'5") and extremely comfy.

links_reviews_title: Cute, fun work to happy hour dress
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! Well made and zippers add an edge to this otherwise pretty basic work dress. Stretchy scuba material, next time I will rent the zero. I am usually a. 0 or 2.

Soft material, medium weight, light gray color. Covers your bum. Looks great with leggings. The only thing I didn't like is the front of the sweater is not a straight hem line. That may be just me I'm into silhouettes and lines.

I wanted to love this sweater but it was just bulky and shapeless. It kind of hung weird in the front. I tried it on a few times and just couldn't wear it out of the house. It is soft and if you really like big baggy sweaters-it may be for you.
I liked this - it's great material, not itchy and fairly flattering. It's good for the office or just hanging out. It was a little loose/stretched out around the neck but didn't really bother me.
Cozy sweater. I liked the longer back and short front detail. The neck is wide and sort of felt like it was being pulled back and I had to readjust. Would rent again. Easy winter sweater for work.
Not sure why but this sweater just doesn't ....fit....it hangs weird on me and the arm holes were odd. The material itself was itchy. Didn't wear it. Tried it on and hung it right back up. :(
This sweater was cute but was not in good condition. Stretched out and had picks.
Okay. Wore once and ready to send back
Made my shoulders look very large. The one I received was very over worn and was pilling
Too bulky. Should have sized-down

links_reviews_title: Cute but a little too short in front. Also shoulders were stretched from hanger. I did not wear it.

links_reviews_text: Stylish, comfortable and warm! Great for work if your office is cold or in winter!
Perfect with leggings as the back is longer so it covers the booty.

I thought this sweater was very warm and cute. It fit true to size. I personally did not like that it was longer in the back than the front, would have preferred it be one length. I am short in the torso and it was too short to wear with leggings. The only thing I did not expect is that it is very see thru you cannot see that well in the picture. Even a cami was not enough I actually needed to wear a t shirt.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater! Wore it for a casual brunch and was so warm and cozy!
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the L instead of the XL - definitely would rent again!
Wore this sweater with jean, boots and a matching scarf to go wine tasting. Very flattering- great fit! Would rent again! Considered buying it too!

links_reviews_title: Cozy for a cold winter day
links_reviews_text: This sweater is very cozy and warm. It runs very large, the xs was very big and oversized on me. The neck is a lot of material, felt like I was wearing a neck brace. Wore once with leather leggings, would probably not rent again, was just ok.

This sweater is actually oversized (not a little boxy like most other "oversized" things). I took off a star because the neck is uncomfortable. The fabric is really thick and there is a lot of it, so the neck looks kind of poofy and feels constricting. I ended up tugging at it all day.
Perfect warm and cozy, stylish sweater for a ski trip. Many compliments. It runs large but it's supposed to. Wore also to church on a snowy Sunday. I hate to send it back!
This is an oversized fit which makes it very comfortable. The only downside is how much fabric is in the turtleneck portion. It's like swearing a thick scarf more rather than a turtleneck.

Cute colors, nice length. Wasn't a fan of the tight neckline; I felt uncomfortable and too warm in this sweater. It looks extremely large on the hanger, but it actually is true to size when worn. Wasn't my style, returning it right back.

links_reviews_title: Runs larger even for an oversized
links_reviews_text: I really liked the sweater. It was bulkier than I expected (even for an oversized sweater) but still cute - I had to roll up the sleeves and wear a skinny pant and heel to make it appear less bulky. Would have gone xs.

links_reviews_title: Looks cute but was not on at all
links_reviews_text: Cute style but once you put it on you are like"wow this is awful". Also the neck is sooo right you can't really get it on or off without messing your hair.

I rented this for a trip to Jackson Hole thinking that it would be a big cozy sweater for apres ski. It's literally huge. Like the xs would be too big for my 6 foot tall husband. The neck is super stiff. It feels like you are wearing a neck brace that is too big for you. I didn't wear it and I sent it right back.
Saw this sweater all season and was able to finally rent it. Only had XL so I took it. Should have waited for the L. Too boxy and stretched out in weird places. Wanted to love it but I don't.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a trip to North Dakota
links_reviews_text: Loved this- warm and really fashionable- a bit large but thats the style
I didn't wear this. It was really cute, except the neck was so high and straight that it looked liked I was wearing a neck brace!

links_reviews_title: Really cute sweater for very cold temps!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous sweater it was just too heavy for everyday wear for me. I got overheated easily being indoors but this is great for colder temps if you have to be outside for awhile.

It is -11 today in Wisconsin, and I had to peel this sweater off because I'm sweating so much. It's adorable, oversized, and I suppose actually quite functional? You don't need a coat with this sweater on!
Fit is oversized, which didn't bother me. I wore it on a casual Friday to work with black pants. Very cute, but material was a bit itchy.
This thick, warm oversized sweater fit well over the body, but the sleeves were way to big and stiff to be flattering.
Beautiful fit. The sweater fell past my hips so definitely can be worn with leggings. So comfy and not itchy, very warm as well. Definitely plan on renting this again.
Super cute sweater but the turtle neck part was way to larger for me. Could not fit me comfortably
Fit large so I had to pin it up top. Nice material but was brighter than I expected.
Love the print/colors and even the cropped cut, but the V-neckline is way too low.

Nice thick material (very smooth for a â€œdenimâ€). A little shapeless other than the fantastic puffed shoulder, but I felt that it fit my skinny-pear shape fine - a little roomy around the middle and chest but not too tight in the hips. Pretty short, but great with tights, tho the fabric sticks to tights and tends to ride up a bit in the front when you walk. I didnâ€™t like the laced wrist detail (found it kind of tacky) and also the sleeves were too short imo. But very pretty and unique print/color

I should have sized down to the 10 as it's very generous in bust and stomach ... but perfect length ... great denim-like fabric but still soft ... the pics don't do it justice it's really really pretty Keep in mind I'm an Oompa Loompa (5'4) and wear 10-12 right now ... zero hips no ass but a really sexy big stomach

I was pretty excited about this jean dress, but the reality was it was not made for my body shape :/ the top was SO ROOMY, and the butt/hips were just tight enough that I could tell I would spend all day pulling it down bc it kept getting hung up everytime I moved my arms. The color also wasn't great for my fair skin- the pink comes off as flesh colored. I would definitely recommend for straight or apple shapes. Fun detail: there is a long pull on the half zipper in the back, easy on/off!

links_reviews_title: Super cute! BUT VERY SHORT. Size up
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress, but it is short! Size up!
Pretty top and nice material but hard to keep in place. Tie kept getting undone making the opening of the blouse to get wider and wider.

links_reviews_title: Nice shirt but not my favorite
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and length of this shirt. The tie and draping did make it feel somewhat pirate like.

Very pretty top! Took a couple minutes to adjust and tie but once I did it pretty much stayed in place at the office. Got a little wrinkled under my coat commuting and once my kids got to me after work but super cute with jeans and boots.

I have *never* worn a wrap top/dress without having to safety pin it shut until this top! The material is sturdy so that once you wrap it (you can control how low cut you want it to be) it stays in place! The material is thick and not see through at all. Could be appropriate for any occasion!

links_reviews_title: I am honestly confused by this dress
links_reviews_text: The pic I took looks fine and it looks fine on the model - but in real life it was not so cute. Maybe it's because I have a smaller waist and wider hips / thighs but I felt like it was unflattering and not my best look. I could see this being cute if you are looking to add a little junk in the trunk!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but I'm not sure about the materials, sleeves, or clinginess
links_reviews_text: The dress is cute, but it's maybe not the most flattering since it's really body conforming. The material is quite shiny, which I didn't love. And I'm still not sure about the sleeves. Still, it was a fun dress to wear once, even if it isn't really ME and I don't necessarily want it in my closet!

Omg, I love this dress! I would rent again! PROS -This is a stretchy fun flirty spring into the new season dress. -I could live in this dress. -The dress was flattering for the tummy and arms. -Breathable for when the weather turns hot. CONS -None-
This dress is dowdy and cheap looking. I ordered a medium and this thing was huge and just unattractive . I rented this dress for a date night and had to wear something else.
The fabric was great, but for some reason it didn't fit well on my body. I think a small would have fit better.

links_reviews_title: Nice cover up for my workout gear
links_reviews_text: Soft fabric

Definitely enjoyed the style of the sweater, but it was simply too big. It often slid down on my shoulders but thankfully I was working from home. I can see myself renting it again but in a medium. It's definitely comfortable while adding a little bit of extra flare for the girls that don't like to look too basic.
Perfect sweater for fall or winter. The fit was perfect and flattering while making a trendy statement

links_reviews_title: Had higher hopes for this but I think I just rented too big of a size
links_reviews_text: I rented the large bc that was the only one available, and it was too big. The puff sleeves lost their effect since th entire sleeve (even the forearm) was baggy on me. Also the v neck was too deep and made the sleeves continually slide off my shoulders. I would def rent again just would def do the medium or even the small. The color is cool too

The model didn't show the option of wearing the sweater off the shoulder but I decided to just add my own flare. It fit well around the torso and shoulders and gave a bit of sassy-ness to the occasion.

Definitely love the sweater. Very statement piece. Very well-made thick and heavy. The shoulder areas is a little bit white so I wore it off the shoulders with the strapless bra but it looked really cute
This is a comfortable sweater that is great for a night out in the winter!
Loved it. Might run slightly large. Fitted in body which creates a nice silhouette.

Warm and form fitting but not overly tight! The v neck isn't too low, I wore it to work and out at night. I'm usually an 8 and the medium fit perfectly - I wore it a few times and it stretched out a little by the last wear.

Love this top - probably could have sized down because it's a bit long and flowy, but SO comfortable and easy to throw on for work. It's 2 layers, so not see through but the fabric is light and soft. Perfect spring/summer top.
Great spring/summer top. Would be super cute with white jeans.
The pattern is really beautiful and fabric is really soft.
Right in the bust.
Loved the flutter sleeve. Didn't worry about show-through because the lining was nice.
The neckline was perfect not to deep , the cap sleeves were cute. The length was too short, just barely below pant waist.
Really cute cut and pattern. Very flattering on a full bust and curvier figure.
The perfect work top to wear with leggings! Wore my spanx faux leather leggings and felt super confident all day! For more work week looks follow @renttherunway_teacher on Instagram!
I love this sweater to pieces. It's comfortable, flattering (covers your bottom), doesn't wrinkle, and really ties together an outfit. Would love to purchase, Im hanging onto this for a little while.

links_reviews_title: Can dress it up with fancy pants and nice jewelry or down with jeans and junky jewelry.
links_reviews_text: Runs a little large
I just wanted something to wear around the house during quarantine. It was comfortable and cute.
Some tops with the faux blouse are not very becoming but this was. The blouse fabric was very nice and light. Sweater not bulky - very nice A-line style
I think this is a great piece for work, but you could dress it down with jeans and sneakers too. I didn't find it as scratchy as others did.
The waistline was snug on me
This shirt was super cute but I felt in the shoulder arm area it was a little snug. I would have been more comfortable in a medium.
Super flattering and easy to wear. A great work staple!
Enough said. No thank you to any itchy sweater.

links_reviews_title: Was cute on but material was a little itchy
links_reviews_text: This ran true to size and I really liked it in. I just didn't wear it because it was a little itchy when on.

links_reviews_title: Great to throw on with leggings

links_reviews_text: Simple and Easy for work.
I wanted to love this black basic, with the price tag it seems like a luxury item, but with the itch there's no way I could've kept this on for five minutes. Returned without wearing

links_reviews_title: Stylish top. I received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Pros: stylish, comfortable, true to size Cons: fits slightly longer than expected on shorter girls but still looks great

links_reviews_title: Nice shirt with length that makes it dressier and good to throw over leggings or tight pants.
links_reviews_text: Nice shirt. Fit was great except for the length. I'm 5'3" and it was an inch or so too long for my liking.
This sweater looks good and fits great. It appears to have a more lush feel but it doesn't. It feels a little stiff. If you are someone who is sensitive to fibers do not rent this.

This is a great professional dress that still shows a feminine side. Thicker silky fabric that does not wrinkle. Fitted at the waist for a very flattering fit. Mid calf length. Very happy to have had this for an interview day!

It felt snug but comfortable along my waist. I didn't think the neckline was too low, which can be a bit problematic depending on the work environment. The length is what I think made it a standout, different dress.

links_reviews_title: Nice quality dress- felt off brand for me
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a pitch at work and it was nice. I received compliments but didn't feel me in it. It also felt a bit big too me.

links_reviews_title: Interesting dress - didn't love but didn't hate
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress for work - I got a ton of compliments and it was very comfortable. I had a hard time figuring out the tie (as shown here haha), but overall really liked the dress. I would rent again but probably not buy it.

The dress is long and doesn't show cleavage or anything, so it's great for work. It accentuates your waistline and your curves though, so in that sense, it's kind of sexy. I liked it, but didn't love it. The length is a little hard to pull off without heels which I unfortunately can't wear. Also there is 0% stretch in the fabric, and the waist is pretty small. It fit, but wasn't the most comfortable thing I've ever worn. I enjoyed wearing it once, but it's not something I'd wear multiple times.
wish there were ways to tighten the waist a bit but otherwise really liked it.
excellent.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not made for petite girls
links_reviews_text: While I wanted this dress to work, it kind of just swallowed me up. I think it's best suited for a taller person.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, a nice way to change it up
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress for someone looking to change up their look. I had a ton of complements and even though the pattern was busy it was flattering. There's several ways to tie the tie in the front and the sleeves have cute little ties as well. The material is thick but not hot. I will definitely rent again.

The fabric was nicer, thicker and silkier than I expected. The cut was a little clunkier unfortunately - tight in the waist and flared out in the hips in a way that wasn't super flattering, but I paired it with an oversize sweater and it worked. Length was a bit awkward on me too but cute with boots. I'm usually a small for dresses that are fitted in the waist and loose in the hips but this medium fit snugly in the waist. So I'd say it runs just a TAD small, but close to true to size.
Rented for work. Great fit. Interesting details. Luxe fabric. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Fits perfectly and looks extremely flattering!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Shiny fabric that didn't wrinkle at all, fit was absolutely perfect. It is definitely on the heavier side so would say it's better to wear in the winter months. Wore this to Christmas Eve and got so many compliments!
You'll see I tried it on backwards initially .. it actually looks cute both ways. I'm 6'1 155lbs and hourglass. The medium fit well!

This one was a lot of fun, and it is the first dress I received with the tags still attached! It was definitely tight in the waist/rib area, but I managed. I would definitely rent again. Quality material and nice weight to it, but not too heavy.
Fit was alright, though the dress is much longer than the picture would have you think. I'm 5'9" and it's definitely midi length. If I owned it, I think I would shorten the skirt a bit.
Didn't love the ties at the sleeves and felt the waist was slightly smaller than a usual medium but not enough to make me want to size up.
The waist hit me up by my ribcage and was very tight. Not comfortable to wear it and was a bit too 70s for my liking.

This is just a beautiful piece. The waist fit perfectly; the fabric is rich and elegant. It is a little long, I will say. I think if I owned it I would have it hemmed up a few inches --- and I'm tall!-- because it did feel like a lot of fabric and a little Amish.. :)
Was so excited to wear this and year the style print fit everything went badly. I could try again with sizing down but I doubt it would make a huge difference

This fit perfectly and was great for work and a dinner date. The fabric is pretty cool, so I layered with a long sleeve shirt and leggings for the winter. This felt fun while still being conservative enough for work.

links_reviews_title: Great elegant dress. I wore this to a winter baby shower and was great with knee high boots.
links_reviews_text: Buttons should be real (not mock). It would help shape the silhouette better and make it more flowy.

Wanted to love this dress but found it just okay. It ties not just at the neck but also at the sleeves (I didn't notice this before renting) and that's a bit of a pain as they tend to come undone throughout the day. I also didn't love the material; it is a bit drab-looking but also not very warm. Overall not a terrible dress but a bit disappointing.
Loved this dress. The extra material on the wrists did get in the way at work so I stucked them in the sleeve at times

The fabric and print are so pretty! The style reminded me of Kate Middleton. I am between a medium and a large, and wish I had gone with the medium. With the length and the neck/wrist ties, I wished for the smaller size so the waist would have been a bit more fitted.
Beautiful material

links_reviews_title: Fit well, a bit conservative for my taste but ok for work.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, sized well & nice sturdy travel wear, as it really doesn't wrinkle!
Great dress. Loved it and wished I could keep

I wore this dr as to work with black leggings for warmth. Could barely see the leggings because this dress is so long and I loved it, especially flattering on tall girls. Tons of compliments on it at work. Wore my hair up to accentuate the neckline.

I felt like a movie star in this dress. It hit a little below mid calf so I'd say was pretty much tea length on me. It looked killer with stiletto pumps. The waist cinches in perfectly to hug an hourglass figure, and the tie collar was wide enough to make this full chested gal feel entirely comfortable at work. I'm obsessed with this dress, and if it ever goes on sale for real, I'm definitely buying it.
Great
Love the fit, it's flattering, comfortable, warm, and unique.
This dress was beautiful: silky, medium-weight material, hangs beautifully. I will rent again, one size smaller.
This dress was NOT flattering on me. It would look better on women with little curves. I looked a bit frumpy and larger than I am. The material is really nice!

I love this dress! If only I were about 5 inches taller. This was nearly long enough to be floor length on me, and I'm 5'2". Overall it fit great though, and the pattern is fun but professional enough for work.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it, it did not look good on.
links_reviews_text: Fit is fine, but found it generally an unflattering color and shape. It is also fairly transparent. I didn't wear it.
Loved this and wish I could buy it! I did have to wear a bralette because it gaped Open a little

links_reviews_title: dont size up its super weird
links_reviews_text: I thought I should size up idk why, this was the oddest thing i've ever worn.

Didn't realize there was a mid-tone blue somewhere between the lighter shade of this skirt and the black print, but wonderfully surprised by it! The best feature is probably the satin-y finish on the inside, which means static isn't a problem like it often is with similar length silks. I wish the button closures at the waist provided a tighter option rather than simply a zipper cover, because this fit slightly too loose at my waist. All in all, definitely one to try and quite likely one I'll be returning to later!
A friend of mine rented this and looked great in it so I gave it a try. The 4 JUST fit me but it was a flattering cut and the pattern is beautiful.
Fit was small
Will rent again in smaller size!

the line with yellow and pink at the waist is very tight and does not give at all. I was unable to wear the dress bc it was too tight at that area. the plunge in the neckline is very deep so make sure that you have a cami to put on with this dress.

links_reviews_title: So many people complimented the color and texture of this dress.
links_reviews_text: It shows a little more cleavage than I bargained for, but I WANT THIS DRESS.

The zipper was stuck, so I literally couldn't even put it on. Looks like it would have been super cute though. One item of note, this piece could potentially be challenging for curvy girls (like me)- because my hips/rear fill out the pants, there was a slight pull across the tummy... I think I would have been slightly self conscious in this had I had the opportunity to wear it.
Not as dressy as it looks online, it wrinkles very easily but would be great for a stand-up affair or cocktail party. Very comfortable!
This was fabulously made, vibrant color strapless beauty. I'll rent it again. Size down.
But, don't just go bye me, give it a try. It is cute but I was disappointed that it was way to small for me. I have rented other Derek Lam 10 Crosby and those items fit true to size. Go figure?
